original: śarīrādyabhedagrahādātmanaḥ prādeśikatvamabhimanyate nabhasa iva ghaṭamaṇikamallikādyupādhyavacchedāditi yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: śarīra ādi abheda grahāt ātmanaḥ prādeśika tvam abhimanyate nabhasaḥ iva ghaṭa maṇika mallikā ādi upādhi avacchedāt iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ

original: na cāhaṅkāraprāmāṇyāya dehādivadātmāpi prādeśika iti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca ahaṅkāra prāmāṇyāya deha ādi vat ātmā api prādeśikaḥ iti yuktam
tadā khalu ayam aṇu parimāṇaḥ vā syāt deha parimāṇaḥ vā
aṇu pariṃmāṇa tve sthūlaḥ ham
dīrghaḥ iti ca na syāt
deha parimāṇa tve tu sāvayavatayā deha vat anitya tva prasaṅgaḥ
kiñca asmin pakṣe avayava samudāyaḥ vā cetayet
pratyekam vā avayavāḥ

original: pratyekaṃ cetanatvapakṣe bahūnāṃ cetanānāṃ svatantrāṇāmekavākyatābhāvādaparyāyaṃ viruddhadikkriyatayā śarīramunmathyeta,
analyzed: pratyekam cetana tva pakṣe bahūnām cetanānām svatantrāṇām eka vākya tā bhāvāt aparyāyam viruddha diś kriyatayā śarīram unmathyeta
akriyam vā prasajyeta

original: samudāyasya tu caitanyayoge vṛkṇa ekasminnavayave cidātmano 'pyavayavo vṛkṇa iti na cetayet /
analyzed: samudāyasya tu caitanya yoge vṛkṇaḥ ekasmin avayave cit ātmanaḥ u pi avayavaḥ vṛkṇaḥ iti na cetayet
na ca bahūnām avayavānām paraspara avinābhāva niyamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: ya evāvayavo yadā viśīrṇastadā tadabhāve na cetayet /
analyzed: yaḥ eva avayavaḥ yadā viśīrṇaḥ tadā tad abhāve na cetayet
vijñāna ālambana tve pi ahaṃpratyayasya bhrānta tvam tad avastham eva
tasya sthira vastu nirbhāsa tvāt asthira tvāt ca vijñānānām

original: etena 'sthūlo 'ham andho 'ham gacchāmi' ityādayo 'pi adhyāsatayā vyākhyātāḥ /
analyzed: etena sthūlaḥ ham andhaḥ ham gacchāmi ityādayaḥ pi adhyāsa tayā vyākhyātāḥ

original: tadevamuktena krameṇa ahaṃpratyaye pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutiḥ apratyūhaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvasukhaduḥkhaśokādyātmatvamahamanubhavaprasañjitamātmano  #
analyzed: tat evam uktena krameṇa ahaṃpratyaye pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutiḥ apratyūham kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tva sukha duḥkha śoka ādi ātmatvam aham anubhava prasañjitam ātmanaḥ
niṣeddhum arhati iti
tat evam sarva pravāda śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa prathita mithyābhāvasya ahaṃpratyayasya sva rūpa nimitta phalaiḥ upavyākhyānam anyonyasmin ityādi
anyonyasmin dharmiṇi ātma śarīra ādau anyonya ātmaka tā madhyasya aham idam śarīrāt iti
idam iti ca vastutas
na pratītitaḥ
loka vyavahāraḥ lokānām vyavahāraḥ
sa ca ayam aham iti vyapadeśaḥ

original: iti śabdasūcitaśca śarīrādyanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ ca prameyajātaṃ pramāṇena pramāya tadupādānaparivarjanādiḥ /
analyzed: iti śabda sūcitaḥ ca śarīra ādi anukūlam pratikūlam ca prameya jātam pramāṇena pramāya tad upādāna parivarjana ādiḥ

original: anyonyadharmāṃścādhyasya anyonyasmindharmiṇi dehādidharmān janmamaraṇajarāvyādhyādīnātmani dharmiṇi adhyastadehādibhāve samāropya,
analyzed: anyonya dharmān ca adhyasya anyonyasmin dharmiṇi deha ādi dharmān janma maraṇa jarā vyādhi ādīn ātmani dharmiṇi adhyasta deha ādi bhāve samāropya

original: tathā caitanyādīnātmadharmān dehādāvadhyastātmabhāve samāropya 'mamedaṃ jarāmaraṇaputrapaśusvāmyādi' iti vyavahāro vyapadeśaḥ /
analyzed: tathā caitanya ādīn ātma dharmān deha ādau adhyasta ātma bhāve samāropya mama idam jarā maraṇa putra paśu svāmi ādi iti vyavahāraḥ vyapadeśaḥ
iti śabda sūcitaḥ ca tad anurūpaḥ pravṛtti ādiḥ

original: atra ca adhyāsavyavahārakriyābhyāṃ yaḥ kartā unnītaḥ sa samāna iti samānakartṛkatvena 'adhyasya vyavahāraḥ' ityupapannam /
analyzed: atra ca adhyāsa vyavahāra kriyābhyām yaḥ kartā unnītaḥ sa samānaḥ iti samāna kartṛka tvena adhyasya vyavahāraḥ iti upapannam

original: pūrvakālatvasūcitamadhyāsasya vyavahārakāraṇatvaṃ sphuṭayati - mithyājñānanimittaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti /
analyzed: pūrva kāla tva sūcitam adhyāsasya vyavahāra kāraṇa tvam sphuṭayati mithyājñāna nimittaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti
mithyā jñānam adhyāsaḥ
tad nimittaḥ
tad bhāva abhāva anuvidhānāt vyavahāra bhāva abhāvayoḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tadevamadhyāsasvarūpaṃ phalaṃ ca vyavahāramuktvā tasya nimittamāha - itaretarāvivekena iti /
analyzed: tat evam adhyāsa svarūpam phalam ca vyavahāram uktvā tasya nimittam āha itaretara avivekena iti
viveka grahaṇena iti arthaḥ
atha avivekaḥ eva kasmāt na bhavati

original: tathā ca nādhyāsa ityata āha - atyantaviviktayordharmadharmiṇoḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca na adhyāsaḥ iti atas āha atyanta viviktayoḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ

original: paramārthato dharmiṇoratādātmyaṃ vivekaḥ dharmāṇāṃ cāsaṃkīrṇatā vivekaḥ /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ dharmiṇoḥ a tādātmyam vivekaḥ dharmāṇām ca asaṃkīrṇa tā vivekaḥ
syāt etat
viviktayoḥ vastu satoḥ bheda agraha nibandhanaḥ tādātmya vibhramaḥ yujyate śukteḥ iva rajatāt bheda agrahe rajata tādātmya vibhramaḥ

original: iha tu paramārthasataḥ cidātmano 'nyanna dehādyasti vastusat,
analyzed: iha tu paramārtha sataḥ cit ātmanaḥ deha ādi asti vastu sat

original: tatkutaḥ cidātmano bhedāgrahaḥ kutaśca tādātmyavibhramaḥ ityata āha - satyānṛte mithunīkṛtya iti /
analyzed: tat kutas cit ātmanaḥ bheda agrahaḥ kutas ca tādātmya vibhramaḥ iti atas āha satya anṛte mithunīkṛtya iti
viveka āgrahāt adhi asya iti yojanā
satyam cit ātmā
anṛtam buddhīndriya deha ādiḥ
te dve dharmiṇī mithunīkṛtya yugalīkṛtya iti arthaḥ

original: na ca saṃvṛtiparamārthasatoḥ pāramārthakaṃ mithunamastītyabhūtatadbhāvārthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ /
analyzed: na ca saṃvṛti paramārtha satoḥ pāramārthakam mithunam asti iti abhūta tad bhāva arthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati - apratītasyāropāyogādāropyasya pratītirupayujyate na vastusatteti /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati apratītasya āropa ayogāt āropyasya pratītiḥ upayujyate na vastu sattā iti
syāt etat

original: āropyasya pratītau satyāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropanibandhanā ca pratītiriti durvāraṃ parasparāśrayatvamityata āha - naisargika iti
analyzed: āropyasya pratītau satyām pūrva dṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropa nibandhanā ca pratītiḥ iti durvāram paraspara āśraya tvam iti atas āha naisargikaḥ iti
śvābhāvikaḥ anādiḥ ayam vyavahāraḥ
vyavahāra anādi tayā tad kāraṇasya adhyāsasya
anāditā uktā

original: tataśca pūrvapūrvamithyājñānopadarśitasya buddhīndriyaśarīrādeḥ uttarottarādhyāsopayoga ityanāditvāt bījāṅkuravanna parasparāśrayatvamityarthaḥ
analyzed: tatas ca pūrva pūrva mithyājñāna upadarśitasya buddhīndriya śarīra ādeḥ uttara uttara adhyāsa upayogaḥ iti anādi tvāt bīja aṅkura vat na paraspara āśraya tvam iti arthaḥ
syāt etat
a t vā pūrva pratīti mātram upayujyate ārope
na tu pratīyamānasya paramārtha sattā

original: pratītireva tu atyantāsato gaganakamalinīkalpasya dehendriyādeḥ nopapadyate /
analyzed: pratītiḥ eva tu atyanta asataḥ gagana kamalinī kalpasya deha indriya ādeḥ na upapadyate

original: prakāśamānatvameva hi cidātmano 'pi sattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā vā dvaitāpatteḥ /
analyzed: prakāśamāna tvam eva hi cit ātmanaḥ sattvam na tu tad atiriktam sattā sāmānya samavāya ūrtha kriyā kāri tā vā dvaita āpatteḥ

original: sattāyāścārthakriyākāritāyāśca sattāntarārthakriyākāritāntarakalpane anavasthāpātāt prakāśamānataiva sattā abhyupetavyā /
analyzed: sattāyāḥ ca arthakriyā kāritāyāḥ ca sattā antara arthakriyā kārita antara kalpane anavasthā āpātāt prakāśamāna tā eva sattā abhyupetavyā
tathā ca deha ādayaḥ prakāśamāna tvāt na asantaḥ cit ātma vat
a sattve vā na prakāśamānāḥ
tat katham satya anṛtayoḥ mithunībhāvaḥ
tad abhāve vā kasya kutas bheda agrahaḥ
tad asaṃbhave kutas dhyāsaḥ

original: ityāśayavān āha ākṣeptā- ko 'yamadhyāso nāma iti /
analyzed: iti āśayavān āha ākṣeptā kaḥ yam adhyāsaḥ nāma iti
kaḥ iti ākṣepe

original: samādhātā lokasiddhamadhyāsalakṣaṇamācakṣāṇa evākṣepaṃ pratikṣipati- ucyate- smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāsa iti /
analyzed: samādhātā loka siddham adhyāsa lakṣaṇam ācakṣāṇaḥ eva ākṣepam pratikṣipati ucyate smṛti rūpaḥ paratra pūrva dṛṣṭa avabhāsaḥ iti
avasannaḥ avamataḥ vā bhāsaḥ avabhāsaḥ
pratyaya antara bādhaḥ ca asya avasādaḥ vamānaḥ vā
etāvatā mithyājñānam iti uktam bhavati
tasya idam upavyākhyānam pūrva dṛṣṭaḥ ityādi
pūrva dṛṣṭasya avabhāsaḥ pūrva dṛṣṭa avabhāsaḥ
mithyāpratyayaḥ ca āropa viṣaya āropaṇīya mithunam antareṇa na bhavati iti pūrva dṛṣṭa grahaṇena anṛtam āropaṇīyam upasthāpayati

original: tasya ca dṛṣṭatvamātramupayujyate na vastusatteti dṛṣṭagrahaṇam /
analyzed: tasya ca dṛṣṭa tva mātram upayujyate na vastu sattā iti dṛṣṭa grahaṇam

original: tathāpi vartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ nāropopayogīti pūrva- ityuktam /
analyzed: tathā api vartamānam dṛṣṭam darśanam na āropa upayogi iti pūrvaḥ iti uktam
tat ca pūrva dṛṣṭam sva rūpeṇa sat api āropaṇīya tayā anirvācyam iti anṛtam
āropa viṣayam satyam āha paratra iti
paratra śuktikā ādau paramārtha sati
tat anena satya anṛta mithunam uktam
syāt etat
paratra pūrva dṛṣṭa avabhāsaḥ iti alakṣaṇam
ativyāpaka tvāt

original: asti hi svastimatyāṃ gavi pūrvadṛṣṭasya gotvasya paratra kālākṣyāmavabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: asti hi svastimatyām gavi pūrva dṛṣṭasya go tvasya paratra kāla akṣyām avabhāsaḥ

original: asti ca pāṭaliputre pūrvadṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra māhiṣmatyāmavabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ /
analyzed: asti ca pāṭaliputre pūrva dṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra māhiṣmatyām avabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ
avabhāsa padam ca samīcīne pi pratyaye prasiddham
yathā nīlasya avabhāsaḥ pītasya avabhāsaḥ iti
atas āha smṛti rūpaḥ iti
smṛteḥ rūpam iva rūpam asya iti smṛti rūpaḥ
asaṃnihita viṣaya tvam ca smṛti rūpa tvam
saṃnihita viṣayam ca pratyabhijñānam samīcīnam iti na ativyāptiḥ
na api avyāptiḥ
svapna jñānasya api snṛti vibhrama rūpasya evaṃrūpa tvāt
tatra api hi smaryamāṇe pitṛ ādau nidrā upaplava vaśāt asaṃnidhāna aparāmarśe
tatra tatra pūrva dṛṣṭasya eva saṃnihita deśa kāla tvasya samāropaḥ
evam pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ tiktaḥ guḍaḥ iti atra api etad lakṣaṇam yojanīyam
tathā hi bahis vinirgaccha jati accha nayana raśmi saṃpṛkta pitta dravya vartinīm pīta tām pitta rahitām anubhavan
śaṅkham ca doṣa ācchādita śuklimānam anubhavan
pīta tāyāḥ ca śaṅkhā saṃbandham an anubhavan

original: asaṃbandhāgrahaṇasārūpye 'pītaṃ tapanīyapiṇḍaṃ' 'pītaṃ bilvaphalaṃ' ityādau pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pītatvaśaṅkhatvayorāropyāha 'pītaḥ  #
analyzed: asaṃbandha agrahaṇa sārūpye pītam tapanīya piṇḍam pītam bilva phalam ityādau pūrva dṛṣṭam sāmānādhikaraṇyam pīta tva śaṅkha tvayoḥ āropya āha pītaḥ
śaṅkhaḥ iti
etena tiktaḥ guḍaḥ iti pratyayaḥ vyākhyātaḥ

original: evaṃ vijñātṛpuruṣābhimukheṣvādarśodakādiṣu svaccheṣu cākṣuṣaṃ tejo lagnamapi balīyasā saureṇa tejasā pratisrotaḥ pravartitaṃ mukhasaṃyuktaṃ  #
analyzed: evam vijñātṛ puruṣa abhimukheṣu ādarśa udaka ādiṣu su accheṣu cākṣuṣam tejaḥ lagnam api balīyasā saureṇa tejasā pratisrotas pravartitam mukha saṃyuktam
mukham grāhayet
doṣa vaśāt tad deśa tām anabhimukha tām ca mukhyasya agrāhayat
pūrva dṛṣṭa abhimukha ādarśa udaka deśa tām ābhimukhyam ca mukhasya āropayati iti pratibimba vibhramaḥ pi lakṣitaḥ bhavati
etena dvi candra diś moha alāta cakra gandharva nagara vaṃśa uraga ādi vibhrameṣu api yathāsaṃbhavam lakṣaṇam yojanīyam
etat uktam bhavati na prakāśamāna tā mātram sattvam
yena deha indriya ādeḥ prakāśamāna tayā sadbhāvaḥ bhavet

original: na hi sarpātadabhāvena rajjvādayo vā sphaṭikādayo vā raktādiguṇayogino na pratibhāsante,
analyzed: na hi sarpa a tad abhāvena rajju ādayaḥ vā sphaṭika ādayaḥ vā rakta ādi guṇa yoginaḥ na pratibhāsante
pratibhāsamānāḥ vā bhavanti tad ātmānaḥ tad dharmāṇaḥ vā

original: tathā sati maruṣu marīcikānicayam 'uccāvacamuccalattuṅgataraṅgabhaṅgamāleyamabhyarṇabhavatīrṇā mandākinī' ityabhisaṃdhāya pravṛttaḥ tattoyamāpīya  #
analyzed: tathā sati maruṣu marīcikā nicayam uccāvacam uccalat tuṅga taraṅga bhaṅga mālā iyam abhyarṇa bhava tīrṇā mandākinī iti abhisaṃdhāya pravṛttaḥ tat toyam āpīya
pipāsām upaśamayet
tasmāt akāmena api prakāśamānasya api āropitasya na vastu sattvam abhyupagamanīyam

original: na ca marīcirūpeṇa salilamavastusat svarūpeṇa tu paramārthasadeva dehendriyādayastu svarūpeṇāpyasanta ityanubhavāgocaratvātkathamāropyanta  #
analyzed: na ca marīci rūpeṇa salilam avastu sat sva rūpeṇa tu paramārtha sat eva deha indriya ādayaḥ tu sva rūpeṇa api asantaḥ iti anubhava agocara tvāt katham āropyanta
iti sāṃpratam

original: yato yadyasanto nānubhavagocarāḥ kathaṃ tarhi marīcyādīnāmasatāṃ toyādyātmatayānubhavagocaratvam ?
analyzed: yatas yadi asantaḥ na anubhava gocarāḥ katham tarhi marīci ādīnām asatām toya ādi ātma tayā anubhava gocara tvam

original: na ca svarūpasattvena toyādyātmanāpi santo bhavanti /
analyzed: na ca svarūpa sattvena toya ādi ātmanā api santaḥ bhavanti
yadi ucyeta na abhāvaḥ nāma bhāvāt anyaḥ kaścid asti

original: api tu bhāva eva bhāvāntarātmanā abhāvaḥ svena rūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: api tu bhāvaḥ eva bhāva antarātmanā abhāvaḥ svena rūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ
yathā āhuḥ
bhāva antaram abhāvaḥ hi kayācid tu vyapekṣayā
iti
tatas ca bhāva ātmanā upākhyeya tayā asya yujyeta anubhava gocara tā
prapañcasya punar atyanta asataḥ nirasta samasta sāmarthyasya nistattvasya kutas nubhava viṣaya bhāvaḥ
kutas vā cit ātmani āropaḥ

original: na ca viṣayasya samastasāmarthyavirahe 'pi vijñānameva tattādṛśaṃ svapratyayasāmarthyādadṛṣṭāntasiddhasvabhāvabhedamupajātamasataḥ prakāśanam,
analyzed: na ca viṣayasya samasta sāmarthya virahe vijñānam eva tat tādṛśam sva pratyaya sāmarthyāt adṛṣṭānta siddha svabhāva bhedam upajātam asataḥ prakāśanam
tasmāt asat prakāśana śaktiḥ eva asya avidyā iti sāṃpratam
yatas yā iyam asat prakāśana śaktiḥ vijñānasya kim punar asyāḥ śakyam
asat iti ced
kim etat kāryam
āhosvit asyāḥ jñāpyam
na tāvat kāryam
asataḥ tattva anupapatteḥ
na api jñāpyam
jñāna antara anupalabdheḥ
anavasthā pātāt ca

original: vijñānasvarūpameva asataḥ prakāśa iti cet. kaḥ punareṣa sadasatoḥ saṃbandhaḥ ?
analyzed: vijñāna svarūpam eva asataḥ prakāśaḥ iti ced kaḥ punar eṣa sat asatoḥ saṃbandhaḥ

original: asadadhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ sato jñānasya asatā saṃbandha iti cet,
analyzed: asat adhīna nirūpaṇa tvam sataḥ jñānasya asatā saṃbandhaḥ iti ced

original: aho batāyamatinirvṛtaḥ pratyayatapasvī yadasya asatyapi nirūpaṇamāyatate /
analyzed: aho bata ayam ati nirvṛtaḥ pratyaya tapasvī yat asya asati api nirūpaṇam āyatate
na ca pratyayaḥ tatra ādhatte kiñcid
asataḥ ādhāra tva ayogāt

original: asadantareṇa pratyayo na prathata iti pratyayasyaivaiṣa svabhāvaḥ na tvasadadhīnamasya kiñciditi cet,
analyzed: asat antareṇa pratyayaḥ na prathate iti pratyayasya eva eṣa svabhāvaḥ na tu asat adhīnam asya kiñcid iti ced

original: aho batāsya asatpakṣapātaḥ yadayamatadutpattiḥ atadātmā ca tadavinābhāvaniyataḥ pratyaya iti /
analyzed: aho bata asya asat pakṣapātaḥ yat ayam a tad utpattiḥ a tad ātmā ca tad avinābhāva niyataḥ pratyayaḥ iti
tasmāt atyanta asantaḥ śarīra indriya ādayaḥ nistattvāḥ na anubhava viṣayāḥ bhavitum arhanti iti
atra brūmaḥ nistattvam ced na anubhava gocaraḥ

original: tatkimidānīṃ marīcayo 'pi toyātmanā satattvāḥ yadanubhavagocarāḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: tat kim idānīm marīcayaḥ toya ātmanā sa tattvāḥ yat anubhava gocarāḥ syuḥ
na sa tattvāḥ
tad ātmanā marīci nāma sattvāt

original: dvividhaṃ ca vastūnāṃ tattvam- sattvamasattvaṃ ca tatra pūrvaṃ svataḥ,
analyzed: dvividham ca vastūnām tattvam sattvam asattvam ca tatra pūrvam svatas
param tu paratas
yathā āhuḥ
svarūpa para rūpābhyām nityam sat asat ātmake
vastuni jñāyate kiñcid rūpam kaiścid kadācana
iti
tat kim marīciṣu toya nirbhāsa pratyayaḥ tattva gocaraḥ

original: tathā ca samīcīna iti na bhrānto nāpi bādhyeta /
analyzed: tathā ca samīcīnaḥ iti na bhrāntaḥ na api bādhyeta

original: addhā / na bādhyeta yadi marīcīnayaṃ atoyātmatattvānatoyātmanā gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: addhā na bādhyeta yadi marīcīn ayam a toya ātma tattvān a toya ātmanā gṛhṇīyāt
toya ātmanā tu gṛhṇan bhrāntaḥ
katham vai abādhyaḥ hanta
toya abhāva ātmanām marīcinām toya bhāva ātma tvam tāvat na sat
teṣām toya abhāvāt abhedena toya bhāva ātma tā anupapatteḥ
na api asat vastu antaram eva hi vastu antarasya asattvam āsthīyate
bhāva antaram abhāvaḥ nyaḥ na kaścid anirūpaṇāt iti vadadbhiḥ
na ca āropitam rūpam vastu antaram
tat hi marīcayaḥ vā bhavet
gaṅgā ādi gatam toyam vā
pūrvasmin kalpe marīcayaḥ iti pratyayaḥ syāt
na toyam iti
uttarasmin tu gaṅgāyām toyam iti syāt
na punar iha iti
deśa bheda a smaraṇe toyam iti syāt
na pulaḥ iha iti
na ca idam atyantam asat nirasta samasta svarūpam alīkam eva astu iti sāṃpratam
tasya anubhava gocara tva anupapatteḥ
iti uktam adhastāt
tasmāt na sat
na asat
nā api sat asat paraspara virodhāt
iti anirvācyam eva āropaṇīyam marīciṣu toyam āstheyam
tat anena krameṇa adhyastam toyam paramārtha toyam iva
atas eva pūrva dṛṣṭam iva
tattvataḥ tu na toyam
na ca pūrva dṛṣṭam
kim tu anṛtam anirvācyam
evam ca deha indriya ādi prapañcaḥ api anirvācyaḥ

original: apūrvo 'pi pūrvamithyāpratyayopadarśita iva paratra cidātmanyadhyasyata iti upapannam,
analyzed: apūrvaḥ pi pūrva mithyā pratyaya upadarśitaḥ iva paratra cit ātmani adhyasyate iti upapannam
adhyāsa lakṣaṇa yogāt
deha indriya ādi prapañca bādhanam ca upapādayiṣyate
cit ātmā tu śruti smṛti itihāsa purāma gocaraḥ tad mūla tad aviruddha nyāya nirṇīta śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvaḥ sattvena eva nirvācyaḥ
abādhitā svayaṃprakāśa tā eva asya sattā
sā ca svarūpam eva cit ātmanaḥ

original: na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyaḥ arthakriyākāritā vā iti sarvamavadātam /
analyzed: na tu tad atiriktam sattā sāmānya samavāyaḥ artha kriyā kāri tā vā iti sarvam avadātam

original: sa cāyamevaṃlakṣaṇako 'dhyāsaḥ anirvacanīyaḥ sarveṣāmeva saṃmataḥ parīkṣakāṇām ;

original: tadbhede paraṃ vipratipattirityanirvacanīyatāṃ draḍhayitumāha- taṃ kecit iti /

anya dharmasya jñāna dharmasya rajatasya

adhyāsaḥ anyatra bāhye

original: yadyapi na bāhyaṃ vastusat tathāpyanādyavidyāvāsanāropitamalīkaṃ bāhyam ;

upapattiḥ ca yat yādṛśam anubhava siddham rūpam tat tādṛśam eva abhyupetavyam iti utsargaḥ
anyathātvam punar asya balavat bādhaka pratyaya vaśāt

original: 'nedaṃ rajatam' iti bādhakasya idantāmātrabādhenāpyupapattau na rajatagocaratocitā /
analyzed: na idam rajatam iti bādhakasya idantā mātra bādhena api upapattau na rajata gocara tā ucitā

original: rajatasya dharmiṇo bhādhe hi rajataṃ ca tasya dharma idantā ca bādhite bhavetām ;
analyzed: rajatasya dharmiṇaḥ bhādhe hi rajatam ca tasya dharmaḥ idantā ca bādhite bhavetām
tat varam idantā eva asya dharmaḥ bādhyatām
na rajatam api dharmi

original: tathā ca rajataṃ bahirbādhitamarthādāntare jñāne vyavatiṣṭhata iti jñānākārasya bahiradhyāsaḥ sidhyati /

original: kecittu- jñānākārakhyātāvaparituṣyanto vadanti- yatra yadadhyāsaḥ tadvivekāgrahanibandhano bhrama iti /

anumānāt vā

rajata pratyayaḥ vā syāt
bādhaka pratyayaḥ vā

original: sa hi idaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamāvedayati na tvāntaram /

aham iti hi tadā syāt

original: sa kiṃ purovarti dravyaṃ rajatādvivecayati āho jñānākāratāmapyasya darśayati ?
analyzed: sa kim purovarti dravyam rajatāt vivecayati āho jñāna ākāra tām api asya darśayati

original: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /

purovarti tva pratiṣedhāt arthāt asya jñāna ākāra tā iti ced na
asaṃnidhāna agraha niṣedhāt asaṃnihitaḥ bhavati
pratipattuḥ atyanta saṃnidhānam tu asya pratipatra ātmakam kutastyam

na ca i t antāyāḥ

original: na ca rajatameva śuktikāyāṃ prasañjitaṃ rajatajñānena /

original: api cendriyādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajanane sāmarthyamupalabdhamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānasaṃbhavaḥ ?

original: doṣasahitānāṃ teṣāṃ mithyāpratyaye 'pi sāmarthyamiti cet, na,

idam iti ca dve vijñāne smṛti anubhava rūpe

original: doṣavaśāttadgataśuktitvasāmānyaviśeṣasyāgrahāt tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛtiṃ janayati /

sā ca gṛhīta grahaṇa svabhāvā api doṣa vaśāt gṛhīta tva aṃśa pramoṣāt grahaṇa mātram avatiṣṭhate

original: tathā ca rajatasamṛteḥ purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahaṇāt,
analyzed: tathā ca rajata samṛteḥ purovarti dravya mātra grahaṇasya ca mithas svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ ca bheda agrahaṇāt

original: ṭarajatam', iti dve ete api grahaṇasmaraṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravartayataḥ /
analyzed: ṭa rajatam iti dve ete api grahaṇa smaraṇe abheda vyavahāram sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśam ca pravartayataḥ
kvacid punargrahaṇe e mithas agṛhīta bhede
yathā pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ iti

original: atra hi vinirgacchannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kācasyeva svacchasya pītatvaṃ gṛhyate pittaṃ tu na gṛhyate /
analyzed: atra hi vinirgacchan nayana raśmi vartinaḥ pitta dravyasya kācasya iva svacchasya pīta tvam gṛhyate pittam tu na gṛhyate
śaṅkhaḥ u pi doṣa vaśāt śukla guṇa rahitaḥ sva rūpa mātreṇa gṛhyate
tat anayoḥ guṇa guṇinoḥ asaṃsarga agraha sārūpyāt pīta tapanīya piṇḍa pratyaya aviśeṣeṇa abheda vyavahāraḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca
bheda agraha prasañjita abheda vyavahāra bādhanāt ca na idam iti viveka pratyayasya bādhaka tvam api upapadyate

original: tadupapattau ca prāktanasya pratyayasya bhrāntatvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /

pratyaya tvāt
ghaṭa ādi pratyaya vat
tat idam uktam yatra yad adhyāse iti

original: yasmin śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsa iti lokaprasiddhiḥ nāsāvanyathākhyātinibandhanā,
analyzed: yasmin śuktikā ādau yasya rajata ādeḥ adhyāsaḥ iti loka prasiddhiḥ na asau anyathā khyāti nibandhanā

original: kiṃ tu gṛhītasya rajatādestatsmaraṇasya ca gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa gṛhītamātrasya yaḥ 'idam' iti puro 'vasthitāddravyamātrāttatprajñānācca vivekaḥ,
analyzed: kim tu gṛhītasya rajata ādeḥ tad smaraṇasya ca gṛhīta tā aṃśa pramoṣeṇa gṛhīta mātrasya yaḥ idam iti puras vasthitāt dravya mātrāt tad prajñānāt ca vivekaḥ
tad agrahaṇa nibandhanaḥ bhramaḥ
bhrānta tvam ca grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ itaretara sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ rajata ādi vyavahāraḥ ca iti

original: anye tu- atrāpyaparituṣyantaḥ- yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate /
analyzed: anye tu atra api a parituṣyantaḥ yatra yad adhyāsaḥ tasya eva viparīta dharma kalpanām ācakṣate

original: atredamākūtam- asti tāvadrajatārthinaḥ 'rajatamidam' iti pratyayātputovartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnām
analyzed: atrā idam ākūtam asti tāvat rajata arthinaḥ rajatam idam iti pratyayāt putas vartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca iti sarvajanīnām
tat etat na tāvat grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ tad gocarayoḥ ca mithas bheda agraha mātrāt bhavitum arhati
grahaṇa nibandhanau hi cetanasya vyavahāra vyapadeśau katham a grahaṇa mātrāt bhavetām
nanu uktam na agrahaṇa mātrāt

original: kiṃ tu grahaṇasmaraṇe eva mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataścāgṛhītabhede,
analyzed: kim tu grahaṇa smaraṇe eva mithas svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ ca agṛhīta bhede
samīcīna puras sthita rajata vijñāna sādṛśyena abheda vyavahāram sāmānādhikaṇya vyapadeśam ca pravartayataḥ
atha samīcīna jñāna sārūpyam anayoḥ gṛhyamāṇam vā vyavahāra pravṛtti hetuḥ
a gṛhyamāṇam vā sattā mātreṇa

original: gṛhyamāṇe 'pi 'samīcīnajñānasārūpyamanayoridamiti rajatamiti ca jñānayoḥ' iti grahaṇam,
analyzed: gṛhyamāṇe samīcīna jñāna sārūpyam anayoḥ idam iti rajatam iti ca jñānayoḥ iti grahaṇam

original: atha vā 'tayoreva svarūpato viṣayataśca mitho bhedāgrahaḥ' iti grahaṇam /
analyzed: atha vā tayoḥ eva svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ ca mithas bheda agrahaḥ iti grahaṇam

original: tatra na tāvatsamīcīnajñānasadṛśī iti jñānaṃ samīcīnajñānavadvyavahārapravartakam /
analyzed: tatra na tāvat samīcīna jñāna sadṛśī iti jñānam samīcīna jñānavat vyavahāra pravartakam

original: na hi 'gosadṛśo gavayaḥ' iti jñānaṃ gavārthinaṃ gavaye pravartayati /
analyzed: na hi go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti jñānam gava arthinam gavaye pravartayati
anayoḥ eva bheda agrahaḥ iti tu jñānam parāhatam
na hi bheda agrahe anayoḥ iti bhavati
anayoḥ iti grahe bheda agrahaṇam iti na bhavati

original: tasmātsattāmātreṇa bhedāgrahaḥ agṛhīta eva vyavahāraheturiti vaktavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt sattā mātreṇa bheda agrahaḥ agṛhītaḥ eva vyavahāra hetuḥ iti vaktavyam
tatra kim ayam āropa utpāda krameṇa vyavahāra hetuḥ
āho anutpādita āropaḥ eva svatas iti

original: vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ- cetanavyavahārasya ajñānapūrvakatvānupapatteḥ āropajñānotpādakrameṇaiva- iti /
analyzed: vayam tu paśyāmaḥ cetana vyavahārasya ajñāna pūrvaka tva anupapatteḥ āropa jñāna utpāda krameṇa eva iti
nanu satyam cetana vyavahāraḥ na ajñāna pūrvakaḥ
kim tu avidita viveka grahaṇa smaraṇa pūrvakaḥ iti
mā evam
na hi rajata prātipadika artha mātra smaraṇam pravṛttau upayujyate
idaṅkāra āspada abhimukhī khalu rajata arthinām pravṛttiḥ iti avivādam

original: kathaṃ cāyamidaṅkārāspade pravarteta yadi tu na tadicchet ?
analyzed: katham ca ayam idaṅkāra āspade pravarteta yadi tu na tat icchet
anyat icchati anyat karoti iti vyāhatam

original: na cedidaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamiti jānīyāt kathaṃ rajatārthī tadicchet ?
analyzed: na ced idaṅkāra āspadam rajatam iti jānīyāt katham rajata arthī tat icchet
yadi a tathātvena agrahaṇāt iti brūyāt
sa ca prativaktavyaḥ
atha tathātvena agrahaṇāt kasmāt na upekṣeta iti

original: so 'yamupādānopekṣābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇaścecanaḥ avyavasthitaḥ idaṅkārāspade rajatasamāropeṇopādāna eva vyavasthāpyate,
analyzed: saḥ yam upādāna upekṣābhyām ubhayatas ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ cecanaḥ avyavasthitaḥ idaṅkāra āspade rajata samāropeṇa upādāne eva vyavasthāpyate
iti bheda agrahaḥ samāropa utpāda krameṇa cetana pravṛtti hetuḥ
tathā hi bheda agrahāt idaṅkāra āspade rajata tvam samāropya
tad jātīyasya upakāra hetu bhāvam anucintya
tad jātīya tayā idaṅkāra āspade rajate tam anumāya
tad arthī pravartate iti ānupūrvyam siddham
na ca taṭastha rajata smṛtiḥ idaṅkāra āspadasya upakāra hetu bhāvam anumāpayitum arhati
rajata tvasya hetoḥ apakṣa dharma tvāt
eka deśa darśanam khalu anumāpakam na tu aneka deśa darśanam
yat āhuḥ jñāta saṃbandhasya eka deśa dara īśanāt iti
samārope tu eka deśa darśanam asti
tat siddham etat vivāda adhyāsitam rajata ādi jñānam purovarti vastu viṣayam
rajata ādi arthinaḥ tatra niyamena pravartaka tvāt
yad yad arthinam yatra niyamena pravartaka tvāt

original: yadyadarthinaṃ yatra niyamena pravartayati tajjñānaṃ tadviṣayaṃ yathobhayasiddhasamīcīnarajatajñānam ;
analyzed: yat yad arthinam yatra niyamena pravartayati tat jñānam tad viṣayam yathā ubhaya siddha samīcīna rajata jñānam
tathā ca idam
tasmāt tathā iti
yat ca uktam anavabhāsamāna tayā na śuktiḥ ālambanam iti

original: tatra bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām- kiṃ śuktikātvasya 'idaṃ rajatam' iti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvam āhosvit dravyamātrasya puraḥsthitasya sitabhāsvarasya
analyzed: tatra bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ vyācaṣṭām kim śuktikā tvasya idam rajatam iti jñānam pratyanālambana tvam āhosvit dravya mātrasya puras sthitasya sita bhāsvarasya
yadi śuktikā tvasya anālambana tvam addhā
uttarasya anālambana tvam bruvāṇasya tava eva anubhava virodhaḥ

original: tathā hi-'rajatamidam' ityanubhavannanubhavitā purovarti vastu aṅgulyādinā nirdiśati /
analyzed: tathā hi rajatam idam iti anubhavan anubhavitā purovarti vastu aṅguli ādinā nirdiśati
dṛṣṭam ca duṣṭānām kāraṇānām autsargika kārya pratibandhena kārya antara upajanana sāmarthyam
yathā dāva agni dagdhānām vetra bījānām kadalī kāṇḍa janaka tvam
bhasmaka duṣṭasya ca audaryasya tejasaḥ bahu annapacanam iti
pratyakṣa bādhā apahṛta viṣayam ca vibhramāṇām yathārtha tva anumānam ābhāsaḥ
hutavaha anuṣṇa tva anumāna vat
yat ca uktam mithyāpratyayasya vyabhicāre sarva pramāṇeṣu anāśvāsaḥ iti

original: tat bodhakatvena svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti vyutpādayadbhirasmābhiḥ parihṛtaṃ nyāyakaṇikāyāmiti neha pratanyate /

original: tadidamuktam- anye tu yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate iti /

na api mānasam
manasaḥ sahāyasya bāhye apravṛtteḥ
tasmāt apratyakṣam

original: atha ca tatra bālā avivekinaḥ paradarśitadarśinaḥ kadācitpārthivacchāyāṃ śyāmatāmāropya,
analyzed: atha ca tatra bālāḥ avivekinaḥ para darśita darśinaḥ kadācid pārthiva chāyām śyāma tām āropya
kadācid taijasam śukla tvam āropya
nīlotpala palāśa śyāmam iti vā rājahaṃsa mālā dhavalam iti vā nirvarṇayanti

original: tatrāpi pūrvadṛṣṭasya taijasasya vā tāmasasya vā rūpasya paratra nabhasi smṛtirūpo 'vabhāsa iti /
analyzed: tatra api pūrva dṛṣṭasya taijasasya vā tāmasasya vā rūpasya paratra nabhasi smṛti rūpaḥ vabhāsaḥ iti
evam tat eva talam adhyasyanti avāṅmukhībhūta mahā indranīla maṇi maya mahā kaṭāha kalpam iti arthaḥ

aviruddhaḥ pratyagātmani api anātmanām buddhi ādīnām adhyāsaḥ
nanu santi ca sahasram adhyāsāḥ

original: tatkimarthamayamevādhyāsa ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyutpāditaḥ nādhyāsamātramityata āha- tametamevaṃlakṣaṇamadhyāsaṃ paṇḍitā avidyeti manyante
analyzed: tat kimartham ayam eva adhyāsaḥ ākṣepa samādhānābhyām vyutpāditaḥ na adhyāsa mātram iti atas āha tam etam evaṃlakṣaṇam adhyāsam paṇḍitāḥ avidyā iti manyante
avidyā hi sarva anartha bījam iti śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa ādiṣu su prasiddham

original: taducchedāya ca vedāntāḥ pravṛttā iti vakṣyati /
analyzed: tad ucchedāya ca vedāntāḥ pravṛttāḥ iti vakṣyati

original: pratyagātmanyanātmādhyāsa eva sarvānarthahetuḥ na punā rajatādivibhramā iti sa evāvidyā,
analyzed: pratyagātmani anātma adhyāsaḥ eva sarva anartha hetuḥ na rajata ādi vibhramāḥ iti saḥ eva avidyā

original: tatsvarūpaṃ cāvijñātaṃ na śakyamucchettumiti tadeva vyutpādyaṃ nādhyāsamātram /
analyzed: tad svarūpam ca avijñātam na śakyam ucchettum iti tat eva vyutpādyam na adhyāsa mātram
atra ca evaṃlakṣaṇam iti evaṃrūpa tayā anartha hetu tā uktā

tasmāt anartha hetuḥ

original: na caivaṃ pṛthagjanā api manyante adhyāsam,
analyzed: na ca evam pṛthagjanāḥ api manyante adhyāsam
yena na vyutpādyeta iti atas uktam paṇḍitāḥ manyante iti

original: nanu iyamanādiratinirūḍhanibiḍavāsanānubaddhā avidyā na śakyā niroddhum,

original: pratyagātmani khalu atyantavivikte buddhyādibhyaḥ buddhyādibhedāgrahanimitto buddhyādyātmatvataddharmādhyāsaḥ /

original: adhyāsāpabādhātmakaṃ vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ vidyā cidātmarūpaṃ svarūpe vyavatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ /

original: atinirūḍhanibiḍhavāsanānuvidvā avidyā vidyayā apabādhitāpi svavāsanāvaśātpunarudbhaviṣyati pravartayiṣyati ca vāsanādikāryaṃ svocitamityaya  #
analyzed: ati nirūḍha nibiḍha vāsanā anuvid vā avidyā vidyayā apabādhitā api sva vāsanā vaśāt punar udbhaviṣyati pravartayiṣyati ca vāsanā ādi kāryam sva ucitam iti aya
āha tatra evam sati
evaṃbhūta vastu tattva avadhāraṇe sati
yatra yad adhyāsaḥ

original: tatkṛtena doṣeṇa guṇena vā aṇumātreṇāpi sa na saṃbadhyate,
analyzed: tad kṛtena doṣeṇa guṇena vā aṇu mātreṇa api sa na saṃbadhyate
antaḥkaraṇa ādi doṣeṇa aśanāya ādinā cit ātmā

original: cidātmano guṇena caitanyānandādinā antaḥkaraṇādi na saṃbadhyate /

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati - tattvāvadhāraṇābhyāsasya hi svabhāva eva sa tādṛśaḥ,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati tattva avadhāraṇa abhyāsasya hi svabhāvaḥ eva sa tādṛśaḥ
yat anādim api nirūḍha nibiḍa vāsanam api mithyāpratyayam apanayati

na bādhaḥ yatnavat tve pi buddheḥ tad pakṣapātataḥ
iti

original: viśeṣatastu cidātmasvabhāvasya tattvajñānasya atyantāntaraṅgasya kuto 'nirvācyayā avidyayā bādha iti /

original: 'ahamidam' 'mamedam' iti lokavyavahāraḥ“iti tatra vyapadeśalakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ kaṇṭhoktaḥ /

original: santu vā pratyakṣādīni saṃvṛtyāpi yathā tathā ;

original: śāstrāṇi tu puruṣahitānuśāsanaparāṇi avidyāpratipakṣatayā nāvidyāvadviṣayāṇi bhavitumarhantītyāha - śāstrāṇi ca iti /

samādhatte ucyate iti
deha indriya ādiṣu aham mama abhimāna hīnasya

pramātṛ tva anupapattau satyām pramāṇa pravṛtti anupapatteḥ

original: ayamarthaḥ- pramātṛtvaṃ hi pramāṃ prati kartṛtvam /

tat ca svātantryam

na ca sva vyāpāram antareṇa karaṇam prayoktum arhati

original: na ca kūṭasthanityaścidātmā apariṇāmī svato vyāpāravān /

pramāṇānām iti
atha mā pravartiṣata pramāṇāni

original: kiṃ naśchinnamityata āha- na hīndriyāṇyanupādāya pratyakṣādivyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati /

saṃbhavati

asati

original: ātaścādhyāsāśrayāṇi pramāṇānītyāha- na ca pramātṛtvamantareṇa pramāṇapravṛttirasti /

original: pramāyāṃ khalu phale svatantraḥ pramātā bhavati /

antaḥkaraṇa pariṇāma bhedaḥ ca prameya pravaṇaḥ kartṛ sthaḥ cit svabhāvaḥ pramā

yadi cit ātmā tatra na adhyasyeta
katham ca eṣa cit ātma kartṛkaḥ bhavet
yadi antaḥkaraṇam vyāpāra vat cit ātmani na adhyasyet

upasaṃharati tasmāt avidyāvat viṣayāṇi eva pratyakṣa ādīni pramāṇāni

original: āgamopapattipratipannapratyagātmatattvānāṃ vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇyeva pramāṇānītyata  #
analyzed: āgama upapatti pratipanna pratyagātma tattvānām vyutpannānām api puṃsām pramāṇa prameya vyavahārāḥ dṛśyante iti katham avidyā vat viṣayāṇi eva pramāṇāni iti atas
āha paśu ādibhiḥ ca aviśeṣāt iti

original: vidantu nāma āgamopapattibhyāṃ dehendriyādibhyo bhinnaṃ pratyagātmānam ;
analyzed: vidantu nāma āgama upapattibhyām deha indriya ādibhyaḥ bhinnam pratyagātmānam

original: yādṛśo hi paśuśakuntādīnāmavipratipannamugdhabhāvānāṃ vyavahārastādṛśo vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ dṛśyate /

tena tad sāmānyāt teṣām api vyavahāra samaye avidyāvat tvam anumeyam
caśabdaḥ samuccaye
ukta śaṅkā nivartana sahitā pūrvokta upapattiḥ avidyāvat puruṣa viṣayatvam pramāṇānām sādhayati iti arthaḥ

original: etadeva vibhajate- yathā hi paśvādaya iti /
analyzed: etat eva vibhajate yathā hi paśu ādayaḥ iti

original: atra ca śabdādibhiḥ śrotrādīnāṃ saṃbandhe sati iti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
analyzed: atra ca śabda ādibhiḥ śrotra ādīnām saṃbandhe sati iti pratyakṣam pramāṇam darśitam
śabda ādi vijñāne iti tad phalam uktam
pratikūle iti ca anumāna phalam

original: tathā hi- śabdādisvarūpamupalabhya tajjātīyasya pratikūlatāmanusmṛtya tajjātīyatayopalabhyamānasya pratikūlatāmanumimata iti /

udāharati yathā daṇḍaḥ iti
śeṣam atirohita artham
syāt etat
bhavantu pratyakṣa ādīni avidyāvat viṣayāṇi

original: śāstraṃ tu 'jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta' ityādi na dehātmādhyāsena pravartitumarhati /
analyzed: śāstram tu jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta ityādi na deha ātma adhyāsena pravartitum arhati
atra hi āmuṣmika phala upabhoga yogyaḥ adhikārī pratīyate

original: tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram- 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāttasmātsvayaṃ prayoge syāt' iti /
analyzed: tathā ca pāramarṣam sūtram śāstra phalam prayoktari tad lakṣaṇa tvāt tasmāt svayam prayoge syāt iti

original: na ca dehādi bhasmībhūtaṃ pāralaukikāya phalāya kalpata iti dehādyatiriktaṃ kañcidātmānamadhikāriṇamākṣipati śāstram ;
analyzed: na ca deha ādi bhasmībhūtam pāralaukikāya phalāya kalpate iti deha ādi atiriktam kañcid ātmānam adhikāriṇam ākṣipati śāstram
tad avagamaḥ ca vidyā
iti katham avidyāvat viṣayam śāstram iti āśaṅkya āha iti
tuśabdaḥ pratyakṣa ādi vyavahārāt bhinatti śāstrīyam

original: adhikāraśāstraṃ hi svargakāmasya puṃsaḥ paralokasaṃbandhaṃ vinā na nirvahatīti tāvanmātramākṣipet,
analyzed: adhikāra śāstram hi svarga kāmasya puṃsaḥ para loka saṃbandham vinā na nirvahati iti tāvanmātram ākṣipet
na tvarayā asaṃsāri tvam api
tasya adhikāre n upayogāt
pratyuta aupaniṣadasya puruṣasya akartuḥ abhoktuḥ adhikāra virodhāt

original: prayoktā hi karmaṇaḥ karmajanitaphalabhogabhāgī karmaṇyadhikārī svāmī bhavati /
analyzed: prayoktā hi karmaṇaḥ karma janita phala bhoga bhāgī karmaṇi adhikārī svāmī bhavati
tatra katham a kartā prayoktā
katham ca abhoktā karma janita phala bhoga bhāgī
tasmāt anādya vidyā labdha kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tva brāhmaṇa tva ādi abhimāninam naram adhikṛtya vidhi niṣedha śāstram pravartate
evam vedāntāḥ api avidyā vat puruṣa viṣayāḥ eva
na hi pramātṛ ādi vibhāgāt ṛte tad artha adhigamaḥ

original: te tvavidyāvantamanuśāsato nirmṛṣṭanikhilāvidyamanuśiṣṭaṃ svarūpo vyavasthāpayantītyetāvāneṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: te tu avidyāvantam anuśāsataḥ nirmṛṣṭa nikhila avidyam anuśiṣṭam sva rūpaḥ vyavasthāpayanti iti etāvān eṣām viśeṣaḥ
tasmāt avidyāvat puruṣa viṣayāṇi eva śāstrāṇi iti siddham
syāt etat

original: yadyapi virodhānupayogābhyāmaupaniṣadaḥ puruṣaḥ adhikāre nāpekṣyate tathāpyupaniṣadbhyo 'vagamyamānaḥ śaknotyadhikāraṃ niroddhum /
analyzed: yadi api virodha anupayogābhyām aupaniṣadaḥ puruṣaḥ adhikāre na apekṣyate tathā api upaniṣadbhyaḥ vagamyamānaḥ śaknoti adhikāram niroddhum

original: tataśca parasparaparāhatārthatvena kṛtsna eva vedaḥ prāmāṇyamapajahyādityata āha- prāk ca tathābhūtātma- iti /
analyzed: tatas ca paraspara parāhata artha tvena kṛtsnaḥ eva vedaḥ prāmāṇyam apajahyāt iti atas āha prāk ca tathābhūta ātmaḥ iti
satyam aupaniṣada puruṣa adhigamaḥ adhikāra virodhī

original: tasmāttu purastātkarmavidhayaḥ svocitaṃ vyavahāramabhinirvartayanto nānupajātena brahmajñānena śakyā niroddhum /
analyzed: tasmāt tu purastāt karma vidhayaḥ svocitam vyavahāram abhinirvartayantaḥ na anupajātena brahma jñānena śakyāḥ niroddhum
na ca paraspara parāhatiḥ
vidyā avidyāvat puruṣa bhedena vyavasthā upapatteḥ

original: yathā-'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti sādhyāṃśaniṣedhe 'pi 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta' iti śāstraṃ pravartamānaṃ 'na hiṃsyāt' ityanena na virudhyate
analyzed: yathā na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti sādhya aṃśa niṣedhe śyenena abhicaran yajeta iti śāstram pravartamānam na hiṃsyāt iti anena na virudhyate
tat kasya hetoḥ
puruṣa bhedāt iti
avajita krodha arātayaḥ puruṣāḥ niṣedhe adhikriyante
krodha arāti vaśīkṛtāḥ tu śyena ādi śāstre iti

original: avidyāvatpuruṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātivartata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva sphuṭayati- tathā hi iti /
analyzed: avidyāvat puruṣa viṣaya tvam na ativartate iti yat uktam tat eva sphuṭayati tathā hi iti
varṇa adhyāsaḥ rājā rājasūyena yajeta ityādiḥ
āśrama adhyāsaḥ gṛhasthaḥ sadṛśīm bhāryām vindeta ityādiḥ
vayaḥ dhyāsaḥ kṛṣṇa keśaḥ gnīn ādadhīte ityādiḥ
ādi grahaṇam pātaka upapātaka saṃkarīkaraṇa apātrīkaraṇa malinīkaraṇa ādi adhyāsa upasaṃgraha artham
tat evam ātma anātmanoḥ paraspara adhyāsam ākṣepa samādhānābhyām upapādya pramāṇa prameya vyavahāra pravartanena
ca dṛḍhīkṛtya tasya anahartha hetu tvam udāharaṇa prapañcena pratipādayan
smārayati adhyāsaḥ nāma a tasmin tad buddhiḥ iti avocāma
smṛti rūpaḥ paratra pūrva dṛṣṭa avabhāsaḥ iti asya saṃkṣepa abhidhānam etat
tatra aham iti dharmi tādātmya adhyāsa mātram mama iti anutpādita dharma adhyāsam na anartha hetuḥ iti
dharma adhyāsam eva mamakāram sākṣāt aśeṣa anartha saṃsāra kāraṇam udāharaṇa prapañcān āha
tat yathā putra bhāryā ādiṣu iti

original: dehatādātmyamātmanyadhyasya dehamarthaṃ putrakalatrādisvābhyaṃ ca kṛśatvādivat āropyāha- ahameva vikalaḥ,
analyzed: deha tādātmyam ātmani adhyasya deham artham putra kalatra ādi svābhyam ca kṛśa tva ādi vat āropya āha aham eva vikalaḥ
sakalaḥ iti

original: svasya khalu sākalyena svābhyasākalyāt svāmīśvaraḥ sakalaḥ saṃpūrṇo bhavati ;
analyzed: svasya khalu sākalyena sva abhi sākalyāt svāmī īśvaraḥ sakalaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ bhavati

original: tathā svasya vaikalyena svāmyavaikalyāt svāmīśvaro visalo 'saṃpūrṇo bhavati /
analyzed: tathā svasya vaikalyena svāmi avaikalyāt svāmī īśvaraḥ visalaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ bhavati

original: bāhyadharmā ye vaikalyādayaḥ svābhyapraṇālikayā saṃcaritāḥ śarīre tānātmanyadhyasyatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: bāhya dharmāḥ ye vaikalya ādayaḥ saṃcaritāḥ śarīre tān ātmani adhyasyati iti arthaḥ

original: yadā ca paropādhyapekṣe dehadharme svāmye iyaṃ gatiḥ,
analyzed: yadā ca para upādhi apekṣe deha dharme svāmye iyam gatiḥ

original: tadā kaiva kathā anaupādhikeṣu dehadharmeṣu kṛśatvādiṣu ityāśayavānāha- tathā dehadharmān iti /

dehāt api antaraṅgāṇām indriyāṇām adhyasta ātma bhāvānām dharmān mūka tva ādīn

original: tato 'pyantaraṅgasyāntaḥkaraṇasya adhyastātmabhāvasya dharmān kāmasaṃkalpādīn ātmanyadhyasyatīti yojanā /
analyzed: antaraṅgasya antaḥkaraṇasya adhyasta ātma bhāvasya dharmān kāma saṃkalpa ādīn ātmani adhyasyati iti yojanā

original: tadanena prapañcena dharmādhyāsamuktvā tasya mūlaṃ dharmyadhyāsamāha- evamahaṃpratyayinam /
analyzed: tat anena prapañcena dharma adhyāsam uktvā tasya mūlam dharmi adhyāsam āha evam ahaṃpratyayinam
ahaṃpratyayaḥ vṛttiḥ yasmin antaḥkaraṇa ādau

original: caitanyamupapādayati- taṃ ca pratyagātmānaṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ tadviparyayeṇa,

original: tadanena antaḥkaraṇādyavacchinnaḥ pratyagātmā idamanidaṃrūpaścetanaḥ kartā bhoktā

original: pramāṇaprameyavyavahāradṛḍhīkṛtameva śiṣyahitāya svarūpābhidhānapūrvakaṃ sarvalokapratyakṣatayā adhyāsaṃ sudṛḍhīkaroti- evamayamanādiranantaḥ,

anādi ananta tve hetuḥ uktaḥ naisargikaḥ iti

anirvacanīyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: virodhipratyayaṃ vinā kuto 'sya prahāṇamityaya uktam- ātmaikatvavidyāpratipattaye /

api tu avivakṣita arthāḥ japa mātre upayujyeran

original: tathā ca tadarthavicārātmikā caturlakṣaṇī śārīrakamīmāṃsā nārabdhavyā /

original: yena jijñāsyaḥ san vicāraṃ prayuñjīta- iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /

siddhāntaḥ tu bhavet etat evam yadi ahaṃpratyayaḥ pramāṇam

śruti ādibhiḥ ca samasta tīrthakaraiḥ ca prāmāṇya anabhyupagamāt adhyāsa tvam
evam ca vedāntāḥ na avivakṣita arthāḥ
na api upacarita arthāḥ
kim tu ukta kṣaṇāḥ
pratyagātmā eva teṣām mukhyaḥ ṛthaḥ

original: tasya ca vakṣyamāṇena krameṇa saṃdigdhatvāt prayojanatvācca yuktā jijñāsā- ityāśayavān sūtrakāraḥ tajjijñāsāmasūtrayat,

atha atas brahma jijñāsāḥ iti
jijñāsayā ca saṃdeha prayojane sūcayati
tatra sakṣāt icchā vyāpya tvāt brahma jñānam kaṇaṭha uktam prayojanam
na ca karma jñānāt parācīnam anuṣṭhānam iva brahma jñānāt parācīnam kiñcid asti
yena etat avāntara prayojanam bhavet
kim tu brahma mīmāṃsā ākhya tarka itikartavya tā anujñāta viṣayaiḥ vedāntaiḥ āhitam nirvicikitsam brahma jñānam eva samasta duḥkha upaśama rūpam ānanda eka rasam
paramam prayojanam
tam artham adhikṛtya hi prekṣāvantaḥ pravartantetarām
tat ca prāptam api anādya vidyā vaśāt aprāptam iva iti prepsitam bhavati

original: yathā svagrīvāgatamapi graiveyakaṃ kutaścidbhramānnāstīti manyamānaḥ pareṇa pratipāditamaprāptamiva prāpnoti /

original: tadevaṃ sūtratātparyaṃ vyākhyāya tasya prathamapadaṃ atha iti vyācaṣṭe- tatrāthaśabda ānantaryārthaḥ parigṛhyate /

original: teṣu sūtrapadeṣu madhye yo 'yaṃ athaśabdaḥ sa ānantaryārtha iti yojanā /

original: tatkimatrādhikārārtho na gṛhyata ityata āha- nādhikārārthaḥ /

original: tathā ca maṅgalahetutvāt pratyahaṃ brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti sūtrārthaḥ saṃpadyata ityata āha- maṅgalasya ca vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt /

original: iti smṛtivyākopa ityata āha- arthāntaraprayukta eva hyathaśabdaḥ śrutyā maṅgalaprayojano bhavati /
analyzed: iti smṛti vyākopaḥ iti atas āha artha antara prayuktaḥ eva hi atha śabdaḥ śrutyāḥ maṅgala prayojanaḥ bhavati

original: arthāntareṣvānantaryādiṣu prayuktaḥ athaśabdaḥ śrutyā śravaṇamātreṇa veṇuvīṇādhvanivanmaṅgalaṃ kurvan maṅgalaprayojano bhavati anyārthamānīyamānodakumbhadarśanavat
analyzed: artha antareṣu ānantarya ādiṣu prayuktaḥ atha śabdaḥ śrutyā śravaṇa mātreṇa veṇu vīṇā dhvani vat maṅgalam kurvan maṅgala prayojanaḥ bhavati anya artham ānīyamāna uda kumbha darśana vat
tena na smṛti vyākopaḥ

original: tena ca iha ānantaryārthasya sataḥ śravaṇamātreṇa maṅgalārthatetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tena ca iha ānantarya arthasya sataḥ śravaṇa mātreṇa maṅgala artha tā iti arthaḥ
syāt etat
pūrva prakṛta apekṣaḥ tha śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati vinā eva ānantarya artha tvam

original: tadyathā- iyamevāthaśabdaṃ prakṛtya vimṛśyate 'kimayamathaśabda ānantarye athādhikāre' iti /
analyzed: tat yathā iyam eva athaśabdam prakṛtya vimṛśyate kim ayam athaśabdaḥ ānantarye atha adhikāre iti
atra vimarśaka vākye tha śabdaḥ pūrva prakṛtam atha śabdam apekṣya prathama pakṣa upanyāsa pūrvakam pakṣa antara upanyāse
na ca asya ānantaryam arthaḥ
pūrva prakṛtasya prathama pakṣa upanyāsena vyavāyāt
na ca prakṛta anapekṣā
tad anapekṣasya tad viṣaya tva abhāvena asamāna viṣaya tayā vikalpa anupapatteḥ

original: na hi jātu bhavati- kiṃ nitya ātmā,
analyzed: na hi jātu bhavati kim nityaḥ ātmā
atha anityā buddhiḥ iti

original: tasmādānantaryaṃ vinā pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣa ihāthaśabdaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-
analyzed: tasmāt ānantaryam vinā pūrva prakṛta apekṣaḥ iha atha śabdaḥ kasmāt na bhavati iti atas āha
pūrva prakṛta apekṣāyāḥ ca phalataḥ ānantarya avyatirekāt
asya arthaḥ na vayam ānantarya artha tām vyasani tayā rocayāmahe
kim tu brahma jijñāsā hetu bhūta pūrva prakṛta siddhaye

original: sā ca pūrvaprakṛtārthāpekṣatve 'pyathaśabdasya sidhyatīti vyartha ānantaryārthatvāvadhāraṇāgraho 'smākamiti /
analyzed: sā ca pūrva prakṛta artha apekṣa tve pi atha śabdasya sidhyati iti vyarthaḥ smākam iti
tat idam uktam phalataḥ iti
paramārthataḥ tu kalpa antara upanyāse pūrva prakṛta apekṣā

original: na ceha kalpāntaropanyāsa iti pāriśeṣyādānantaryārtha eveti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca iha kalpa antara upanyāsaḥ iti pāriśeṣyāt ānantarya arthaḥ eva iti yuktam
bhavatu ānantarya arthaḥ

original: kimevaṃ satītyata āha- sati cānantaryārthatva iti /
analyzed: kim evam sati iti atas āha sati ca ānantarya artha tve iti
na tāvat yasya kasyacid atra ānantaryam iti vaktavyam
tasya abhidhānam antareṇa api prāpta tvāt
avaśyam hi puruṣaḥ kiñcid kṛtvā kiñcid karoti

original: na cānantaryamātrasya dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: na ca ānantarya mātrasya dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam vā prayojanam paśyāmaḥ

original: tasmāttasyātrānantaryaṃ vaktavyaṃ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati,
analyzed: tasmāt tasya atra ānantaryam vaktavyam yat vinā brahma jijñāsā na bhavati
yasmin sati tu bhavantī bhavati eva
tat idam uktam yat pūrva vṛttam niyamena apekṣate iti
syāt etat

original: dharmajijñāsāyā iva brahmajijñāsāyā api yogyatvāt svādhyāyādhyayanānantaryam,
analyzed: dharma jijñāsāyāḥ iva brahma jijñāsāyāḥ api yogya tvāt svādhyāya adhyayana ānantaryam
dharmavat brahmaṇaḥ pi āmnāya eka pramāṇa gamya tvāt
tasya ca agṛhītasya sva viṣaye vijñāna ajananāt
grahaṇasya ca svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti adhyayanena eva niyata tvāt

original: tasmādvedādhyayanānantaryameva brahmajijñāsāyā apyathaśabdārtha ityata āha- svādhyāyānantaryaṃ tu samānaṃ dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt veda adhyayana ānantaryam eva brahma jijñāsāyāḥ api atha śabda arthaḥ iti atas āha svādhyāya ānantaryam tu samānam dharma brahma jijñāsayoḥ

original: atra ca svādhyāyena viṣayeṇa tadviṣayamadhyayanaṃ lakṣayati /
analyzed: atra ca svādhyāyena viṣayeṇa tad viṣayam adhyayanam lakṣayati

original: tathā ca 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' ityanenaiva gatamiti nedaṃ sūtramārabdhavyam ;
analyzed: tathā ca atha atas dharma jijñāsā iti anena eva gatam iti na idam sūtram ārabdhavyam
dharma śabdasya veda artha mātra upalakṣaṇa tayā dharmavat brahmaṇaḥ api veda artha tva aviśeṣeṇa veda adhyayana ānantarya upadeśa sāmyāt iti arthaḥ

original: codayati - nanviha karmāvabodhānantaryaṃ viśeṣaḥ dharmajijñāsāto brahmajijñāsāyāḥ /
analyzed: codayati nanu iha karma avabodha ānantaryam viśeṣaḥ dharma jijñāsātaḥ brahma jijñāsāyāḥ

original: asyārthaḥ- 'vividiṣanti yajñena' iti tṛtīyāśrutyā yajñādīnāmaṅgatvena brahmajñāne viniyogāt,
analyzed: asya arthaḥ vividiṣanti yajñena iti tṛtīyā śrutyā yajña ādīnām aṅga tvena brahma jñāne viniyogāt
jñānasya eva karma tayā icchām prati prādhānyāt
pradhāna saṃbandhāt ca a pradhānānām padārtha antarāṇām
tatra api ca na vākya artha jñāna utpattau aṅga bhāvaḥ yajña ādīnām
vākya artha jñānasya vākyāt eva utpatteḥ

original: na ca vākyaṃ sahakāritayā karmāṇyapekṣata iti yuktam ;
analyzed: na ca vākyam sahakāri tayā karmāṇi apekṣate iti yuktam
akṛta karmaṇām api vidita pada padārtha saṃbandhānām samadhigata śābda nyāya tattvānām guṇa pradhāna bhūta pūrva apara padārtha ākāṅkṣā saṃnidhi yogyatā anusaṃdhānavatām apratyūham
vākya artha pratyaya utpatteḥ
anutpattau vā vidhi niṣedha vākya artha pratyaya abhāvena tad artha anuṣṭhāna parivarjana abhāva prasaṅgaḥ
tad bodhataḥ tu tad artha anuṣṭhāna parivarjane paraspara āśrayaḥ

original: tasmin sati tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjanaṃ tataśca tadbodha iti /
analyzed: tasmin sati tad artha anuṣṭhāna parivarjanam tatas ca tad bodhaḥ iti

original: na ca vedāntavākyānāmeva svārthapratyāyane karmāpekṣā na vākyāntarāṇāmiti sāṃpratam,
analyzed: na ca vedānta vākyānām eva sva artha pratyāyane karma apekṣā na vākya antarāṇām iti sāṃpratam
viśeṣa hetoḥ abhāvāt

original: nanu 'tattvamasi' iti vākyāt tvaṃpadārthasya kartṛbhoktṛrūpasya jīvātmano nityaśuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvena
analyzed: nanu tat tvam asi iti vākyāt tvam padārthasya kartṛ bhoktṛ rūpasya jīvātmanaḥ nitya śuddha buddha udāsīna svabhāvena
tad padārthena paramātmanā aikyam aśakyam drāk iti eva pratipattum āpātataḥ śuddha sattvaiḥ
yogyatā viraha viniścayāt
yajña dāna tapaḥ nāśaka tanūkṛta antarmalāḥ tu viśuddha sattvāḥ śraddadhāna ayogyatā avagama puraḥsaram tādātmyam avagamiṣyanti iti ced
tat kim idānīm pramāṇa kāraṇam yogyatā avadhāraṇam apramāṇāt karmaṇaḥ vaktum adhyavasitaḥ si
pratyakṣa ādi atiriktam vā karma api pramāṇam
vedānta aviruddha tad mūla nyāya balena tu yogyatā avadhāraṇe kṛtam karmabhiḥ

original: tasmāt 'tattvamasi' ityādeḥ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā,
analyzed: tasmāt tat tvam asi ityādeḥ śruta mayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātma bhāvam gṛhītvā
tad mūlayā ca upapattyā vyavasthāpya
tad upāsanāyām bhāvanā para abhidhānāyām dīrgha kāla nairantaryavatyām brahma sākṣātkāra phalāyām yajña ādīnām upayogaḥ
yathā āhuḥ sa tu dīrdha kāla nairantarya satkāra āsevitaḥ dṛḍha bhūmiḥ iti
brahmacarya tapaḥ śraddhā yajña ādayaḥ ca satkārāḥ

original: ata eva śrutiḥ- 'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ' /
analyzed: atas eva śrutiḥ tam eva dhīraḥ vijñāya prajñām kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ
iti

original: vijñāya tarkopakaraṇena śabdena prajñāṃ bhāvanāṃ kurvītetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: vijñāya tarka upakaraṇena śabdena prajñām bhāvanām kurvīta iti arthaḥ
atra ca yajña ādīnām śreyaḥ paripanthi kalmaṣa nibarhaṇa dvāreṇa upayogaḥ iti kecid
puruṣa saṃskāra dvāreṇa iti anye

original: yajñādisaṃskṛto hi puruṣaḥ ādaranairantaryadīrghakālairāsevamāno brahmabhāvanāmanādyavidyāvāsanāṃ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati ;
analyzed: yajña ādi saṃskṛtaḥ hi puruṣaḥ ādara nairantarya dīrgha kālaiḥ āsevamānaḥ brahma bhāvanām anādya vidyā vāsanām sa mūla kāṣam kaṣati
tatas sya pratyagātmā su prasannaḥ kevalaḥ viśadībhavati

original: ata eva smṛtiḥ- 'mahāyajñaiśca yajñaiśca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ' /
analyzed: atas eva smṛtiḥ mahā yajñaiḥ ca yajñaiḥ ca brāhmī iyam kriyate tanuḥ
iti yasya ete ṣṭācatvāriṃśat saṃskārāḥ iti ca
apare tu ṛṇa traya apākaraṇena brahma jñāna upayogam karmaṇām āhuḥ

original: asti hi smṛtiḥ- 'ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet' /
analyzed: asti hi smṛtiḥ ṛṇāni trīṇi apākṛtya manaḥ mokṣe niveśayet
iti

original: anye tu 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena' ityādiśrutibhyaḥ tattatphalāya coditānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃyogapṛthaktvena brahmabhāvanāṃ
analyzed: anye tu tam etam veda anuvacanena brāhmaṇāḥ vividiṣanti yajñena ityādi śrutibhyaḥ tad tad phalāya coditānām api karmaṇām saṃyoga pṛthaktvena brahma bhāvanām
kratu arthasya iva khādira tvasya vīrya artha tām
ekasya tu ubhaya artha tve saṃyoga pṛthaktvam iti nyāyāt

original: ata eva pāramarṣaṃ sūtram 'sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat' iti /
analyzed: atas eva pāramarṣam sūtram sarva apekṣā ca yajña ādi śruteḥ aśva vat iti
yajña tapaḥ dāna ādi sarvam
tad apekṣā brahma bhāvanā iti arthaḥ

original: tasmāt yadi śrutyādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vā pāramarṣaṃ sūtraṃ sarvathā yajñādikarmasamuccitā
analyzed: tasmāt yadi śruti ādayaḥ pramāṇam yadi vā pāramarṣam sūtram sarvathā yajña ādi karma samuccitā
mokṣa apara nāmne kalpate iti tad artham karmāṇi anuṣṭheyāni
na ca etāni dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa sāmavāyi kārāt upakāra hetu bhūta aupadeśika ātideśika krama paryanta aṅga grāma sahita paraspara vibhinna karma sva rūpa tad adhikāri bheda parijñānam
vinā śakyāni anuṣṭhātum
na ca dharma mīmāṃsā pariśīlanam vinā tad parijñānam
tasmāt sādhu uktam karma avabodha ānantaryam viśeṣaḥ iti

original: karmāvabodhena hi karmānuṣṭhānasāhityaṃ bhavati brahmopāsanāyā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: karma avabodhena hi karma anuṣṭhāna sāhityam bhavati brahma upāsanāyāḥ iti arthaḥ
tat etat nirākaroti naḥ iti
kutas karma avabodhāt prāk api adhīta vedāntasya brahma jijñāsā upapatteḥ
idam atra ākūtam brahma upāsanayā bhāvanā para abhidhānayā karmāṇi apekṣyante iti uktam
tatra brūmaḥ kva punar asyāḥ karma apekṣā

original: kiṃ kārye yathāgneyādīnāṃ paramāpūrve cirabhāviphalānukūle janayitavye samidādyapekṣā ?
analyzed: kim kārye yathā āgneya ādīnām parama apūrve cirabhāvi phala anukūle janayitavye samidh ādi apekṣā
svarūpe vā yathā teṣām eva dvis avatta puroḍāśa ādi dravya agni devatā ādi apekṣā
na tāvat kārye
tasya vikalpa asaha tvāt
tathā hi brahma upāsanāyāḥ brahma svarūpa sākṣātkāraḥ kāryam abhyupeyaḥ

original: sa cotpādyo vā syāt yathā saṃyavanasya piṇḍaḥ,
analyzed: sa ca utpādyaḥ vā syāt yathā saṃyavanasya piṇḍaḥ
vikāryaḥ vā yathā avaghātasya vrīhayaḥ
saṃskāryaḥ vā yathā prokṣaṇasya ulūkhala ādayaḥ
prāpyaḥ vā yathā dohanasya payaḥ
na tāvat utpādyaḥ

original: na khalu ghaṭādisākṣātkāra iva jaḍasvabhāvebhyo ghaṭādibhyo bhinna indriyādyādheyo brahmasākṣātkāro bhāvanādheyaḥ saṃbhavati,
analyzed: na khalu ghaṭa ādi sākṣātkāraḥ iva jaḍa svabhāvebhyaḥ ghaṭa ādibhyaḥ bhinnaḥ indriya ādi ādheyaḥ brahma sākṣātkāraḥ bhāvanā ādheyaḥ saṃbhavati

original: tato bhinnasya vā bhāvanādheyasya sākṣātkārasya pratibhāpratyayavat saṃśayākrāntatayā prāmāṇyāyogāt,
analyzed: tatas bhinnasya vā bhāvanā ādheyasya sākṣātkārasya pratibhā pratyaya vat saṃśaya ākrānta tayā prāmāṇya ayogāt
tadvidhasya tad sāmagrīkasya eva bahulam vyabhicāra upalabdheḥ

original: na khalu anumānāvagataṃ siddhaṃ vahniṃ bhāvayataḥ śītārtasya śiśirabharamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasya sphurajjvālājaṭilānalasākṣātkāraḥ pramāṇāntareṇa
analyzed: na khalu anumāna avagatam siddham vahnim bhāvayataḥ śīta ārtasya śiśira bhara mantharatara kāya kāṇḍasya sphurat jvālā jaṭila anala sākṣātkāraḥ pramāṇa antareṇa
visaṃvādasya bahulam upalambhāt
tasmāt prāmāṇika sākṣātkāra lakṣaṇa kārya abhāvāt na upāsanāyāḥ utpādye karma apekṣā

original: na ca kūṭasthanityasya sarvavyāpino brahmaṇa upāsanāto vikārasaṃskāraprāptayaḥ saṃbhavanti /
analyzed: na ca kūṭastha nityasya sarva vyāpinaḥ brahmaṇaḥ upāsanātaḥ vikāra saṃskāra prāptayaḥ saṃbhavanti
syāt etat
mā bhūt brahma sākṣātkāraḥ utpādi ādi rūpaḥ upāsanāyāḥ
saṃskāryaḥ tu anirvacanīya avidyā dvaya pidhāna apanayanena bhaviṣyati
prati sīrā apihitā nartakī iva prati sīrā apanaya dvārā raṅga vyāpṛtena
tatra ca karmaṇām upayogaḥ

original: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- pratisīrāpanaye pāriṣadānāṃ nartakīviṣayaḥ sākṣātkāro bhavati /
analyzed: etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ prati sīrāpanaye pāriṣadānām nartakī viṣayaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ bhavati
iha tu avidyā pidhāna apanaya mātram eva na aparam utpādyam asti
brahma sākṣātkārasya brahma svabhāvasya nitya tvena anutpādya tvāt
atra ucyate kā punar iyam brahma upāsanā
kim śābda jñāna mātra saṃtatiḥ
na tarhi iyam abhyāsyamānā api avidyām samucchettum arhati
tattva viniścayaḥ tad abhyāsaḥ vā sa vāsanam viparyāsam unmūlayet
na saṃśaya abhyāsaḥ
sāmānya mātra darśana abhyāsaḥ vā

original: na hi sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti vā,
analyzed: na hi sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti vā

original: ārohapariṇāhavat dravyamiti vā śataśo 'pi jñānamabhyasyamānaṃ puruṣa eveti niścayāya paryāptam,
analyzed: āroha pariṇāhavat dravyam iti vā jñānam abhyasyamānam puruṣaḥ eva iti niścayāya paryāptam
ṛte viśeṣa darśanāt

original: nanūktaṃ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā yuktimayena ca vyavasthāpyata iti /
analyzed: nanu uktam śruta mayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātma bhāvam gṛhītvā yukti mayena ca vyavasthāpyate iti
tasmāt niḥ vicikatsa śābda jñāna saṃtati rūpa upāsanā karma sahakāriṇī avidyā dvaya uccheda hetuḥ
na ca asau anutpādita brahma anubhavā tad ucchedāya paryāptā
sākṣātkāra rūpaḥ hi viparyāsaḥ sākṣātkāra rūpeṇa eva tattva jñānena ucchidyate
na tu parokṣa avabhāsena
diś moha alāta cakra calat vṛkṣa maru marīci salila ādi vibhrameṣu aparokṣa avabhāsiṣu aparokṣa avabhāsibhiḥ eva diś ādi tattva pratyayaiḥ nivṛtti darśanāt
no khalu āpta vacana liṅga ādi niścita diś ādi tattvānām diś moha ādayaḥ nivartante
tasmāt tvam padārthasya tad padārtha tvena sākṣātkāraḥ eṣitavyaḥ
etāvatā hi tvam padārthasya duḥkhi śoki tva ādi sākṣātkāra nivṛttiḥ na anyathā

original: na caiṣa sākṣātkāro mīmāṃsāsahitasyāpi śabdapramāṇasya phalam,
analyzed: na ca eṣa sākṣātkāraḥ mīmāṃsā sahitasya api śabda pramāṇasya phalam
api tu pratyakṣasya
tasya eva tad phala tva niyamāt
anyathā kuṭaja bījāt api vaṭa aṅkura utpatti prasaṅgāt
tasmāt niḥ vicikitsa vākya artha bhāvanā paripāka sahitam antaḥkaraṇam tvaṃ padārthasya aparokṣasya tat tat upādhya ākāra niṣedhena tad padārtha tām āvirbhāvayati iti
yuktam

original: na cāyamanubhavato brahmasvabhāvo yena na janyeta,
analyzed: na ca ayam anubhavataḥ brahma svabhāvaḥ yena na janyeta
api tu antaḥkaraṇasya eva vṛtti bhedaḥ brahma viṣayaḥ
na ca etāvatā brahmaṇaḥ pi para adhīna prakāśa tā

original: na hi śābdajñānaprakāśyaṃ brahma svayaṃ prakāśaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: na hi śābda jñāna prakāśyam brahma svayam prakāśam na bhavati
sarva upādhi vihīnam hi svayañjyotiḥ iti gīyate
na tu upahitam api
yathā āha sma bhagavān bhāṣyakāraḥ na tāvat ayam ekāntena aviṣayaḥ iti
na ca antaḥkaraṇa vṛttau api asya sākṣātkāre sarva upādhi vinirmokaḥ
tasya eva tad upādheḥ vinaśyat avasthasya sva para upādhi virodhinaḥ vidyamāna tvāt

original: anyathā caitanyacchāyāpattiṃ vināntaḥkaraṇavṛtteḥ svayamacetanāyāḥ svaprakāśatvānupapattau sākṣātkāratvāyogāt /
analyzed: anyathā caitanya chāyā āpattim vinā antaḥkaraṇa vṛtteḥ svayam acetanāyāḥ sva prakāśa tva anupapattau sākṣātkāra tva ayogāt
na ca anumita bhāvita vahni sākṣātkāra vat pratibhā tvena asya aprāmāṇyam
tatra vahni sva lakṣaṇasya parokṣa tvāt

original: iha tu brahmasvarūpasya upādhikaluṣitasya jīvasya prāgapyaparokṣatvāt /
analyzed: iha tu brahma sva rūpasya upādhi kaluṣitasya jīvasya prāk api aparokṣa tvāt
na hi śuddha buddha tva ādayaḥ vastutaḥ tatas tiricyante

original: jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhabuddhatvādisvabhāvo brahmeti gīyate /
analyzed: jīvaḥ eva tu tad tad upādhi rahitaḥ śuddha buddha tva ādi svabhāvaḥ brahma iti gīyate
na ca tad tad upādhi virahaḥ tiricyate
tasmāt yathā gāndharva śāstra artha jñāna abhyāsa āhita saṃskāra sacivaḥ śrotra indriyeṇa ṣaḍja ādi svara grāma mūrchanā bhedam adhyakṣam anubhavati
evam vedānta artha jñāna abhyāsa āhita saṃskāraḥ jīvaḥ svasya brahma bhāvam antaḥkaraṇena iti

original: antaḥkaraṇavṛttau brahmasākṣātkāre janayitavye asti tadupāsanāyāḥ karmāpekṣeti cet, na,
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa vṛttau brahma sākṣātkāre janayitavye asti tad upāsanāyāḥ karma apekṣā iti ced na

na khalu tat tvam asi ityādeḥ vākyāt nirvicikitsam śuddha buddha udāsīna svabhāvam akartṛ tva ādi upetam
apeta brāhmaṇa tva ādi jātim deha ādi atiriktam ekam ātmānam pratipadyamānaḥ karmasu adhikāram avaboddhum arhati

original: nanu śeṣaśeṣibhāvābhāve 'pi kramaniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ yathā godohanasya puruṣārthasya dārśapaurṇamāsikairaṅgaiḥ saha,
analyzed: nanu śeṣa śeṣi bhāva abhāve pi krama niyamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā godohanasya puruṣa arthasya dārśapaurṇamāsikaiḥ aṅgaiḥ saha

original: yathā vā 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta' iti darśapūrṇamāsasomayoraśeṣaśeṣiṇorityata āha- adhikṛtādhikāre vā pramāṇābhāvāt- iti yojanā
analyzed: yathā vā darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeta iti darśa pūrṇamāsa somayoḥ aśeṣa śeṣiṇoḥ iti atas āha adhikṛta adhikāre vā pramāṇa abhāvāt iti yojanā

original: svargakāmasya hi darśapūrṇamāsādhikṛtasya paśukāmasya sato darśapūrṇamāsa-
analyzed: svarga kāmasya hi darśa pūrṇamāsa adhikṛtasya paśu kāmasya sataḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa
kratu artha ap praṇayana āśrite godohane adhikāraḥ
na u khalu godohana dravyam a vyāpriyamāṇam sākṣāt paśūn bhāvayitum arhati
na ca vyāpāra antara āviṣṭam śrūyate yatas tat aṅga kramam atipatet
ap praṇayana āśritam tu pratīyate
camasena apaḥ praṇayet godohanena paśu kāma āsyaḥ iti samabhivyāhārāt
yogya tvāt ca asya apām praṇayanam prati
tasmāt kratu artha ap praṇayana āśrita tvāt godohanasya tad krameṇa puruṣa artham api godohanam kramavat iti siddham
śruti nirākaraṇena eva iṣṭi soma krama vat api kramaḥ u pāstaḥ veditavyaḥ
śeṣa śeṣi tva adhikṛta adhikāra abhāve pi kramaḥ vivakṣyeta yadi eka phala avacchedaḥ bhavet
yathā āgneya ādīnām ṣaṇṇām eka svarga phala avacchinnānām

original: yadi vā jijñāsyabrahmaṇaḥ aṃśo dharmaḥ syāt,
analyzed: yadi vā jijñāsya brahmaṇaḥ aṃśaḥ dharmaḥ syāt

original: yathā caturlakṣaṇīvyutpādyaṃ brahma kenacitkenacit aṃśenaikena lakṣaṇena vyutpādyate,
analyzed: yathā catur lakṣaṇī vyutpādyam brahma kenacid kenacid aṃśena ekena lakṣaṇena vyutpādyate

original: tatra caturṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ jijñāsyābhedena parasparasaṃbandhe sati kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
analyzed: tatra caturṇām lakṣaṇānām jijñāsyā bhedena paraspara saṃbandhe sati kramaḥ vivakṣitaḥ
tathā iha api eka jijñāsya tayā dharma brahma jijñāsayoḥ kramaḥ vivakṣyeta
na ca etat ubhayam api asti iti āha phala jijñāsya bhedāt ca
phala bhedam vibhajate abhyudaya phalam dharma jñānam iti

original: jijñāsāyā vastuto jñānatantratvāt jñānaphalaṃ jijñāsāphalamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: jijñāsāyāḥ vastutas jñāna tantra tvāt jñāna phalam jijñāsā phalam iti bhāvaḥ
na kevalam svarūpataḥ phala bhedaḥ

śābda jñāna abhyāsāt na anuṣṭhāna antaram apekṣate
jijñāsya bhedam ātyantikam āha bhavyaḥ ca dharmaḥ iti
bhavitā bhavyaḥ
kartari kṛtyaḥ

original: bhavitā ca bhāvakavyāpāranirvartyatayā tattantra iti tataḥ prāgjñānakāle nāstītyarthaḥ /

original: pravṛttabhedaṃ vibhajate- yā hi codanā dharmasya iti /

original: sā ca svasādhye puruṣavyāpāre bhāvanāyāṃ tadviṣaye ca yāgādau ;
analyzed: sā ca sva sādhye puruṣa vyāpāre bhāvanāyām tad viṣaye ca yāga ādau

original: bhāvanāyāstaddvāreṇa ca yāgāderapekṣitopāyatāmavagamayantī tatrecchopahāramukheṇa puruṣaṃ niyuñjānaiva yāgādidharmamavabodhayati nānyathā /

original: brahmacodanā tu puruṣamavabodhayatyeva kevalaṃ na tu pravartayantyavabodhayati /

original: puruṣo brahmāvabodhyata iti samānatvaṃ dharmacodanābhirbrahmacodanānāmityata āha-
analyzed: puruṣaḥ brahma avabodhyate iti samāna tvam dharma codanābhiḥ brahma codanānām iti atas āha
na puruṣaḥ vabodhe niyujyate
ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ na tāvat brahma sākṣātkāre puruṣaḥ niyoktavyaḥ

na api upāsanāyām

na api śābdabodhe
tasya api adhīta vedasya puruṣasya vidita pada tad arthasya samadhigata śābda nyāya tattvasya apratyūham utpatteḥ
atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā akṣa arthaḥ iti

original: api cātmajñānavidhipareṣu vedānteṣu nātmatattvaviniścayaḥ śābdaḥ syāt /

original: yasminnasati brahmajijñāsā na bhavati sati tu bhavantī bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /

original: tasyārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ- yasmādveda eva iti /

tatas ca jijñāsā iti siddham
brahma jijñāsā pada vyākhyānam āha brahmaṇaḥ iti

original: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapradarśanena prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ brahmaṇe jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ parāsto veditavyaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī samāsa pradarśanena prācām vṛtti kṛtām brahmaṇe jijñāsā brahma jijñāsā iti caturthī samāsaḥ parāstaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: 'tādarthyasamāse prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyam' iti kātyāyanīyavacanena yūpadārvādiṣveva prakṛtivikārabhūteṣu caturthīsamāsaniyamāt aprakṛtivikārabhūte  #
analyzed: tādarthya samāse prakṛti vikṛti grahaṇam kartavyam iti kātyāyanīya vacanena yūpa dārva ādiṣu eva prakṛti vikāra bhūteṣu caturthī samāsa niyamāt a prakṛti vikāra bhūte
iti evamādau tad niṣedhāt
aśva ghāsa ādayaḥ ṣaṣṭhī samāsāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti aśva ghāsa ādiṣu ṣaṣṭhī samāsa pratividhānāt
ṣaṣṭhī samāse ca brahmaṇaḥ vāstava prādhānya upapatteḥ iti
syāt etat

original: brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte tatrānekārthatvādbrahmaśabdasya saṃśayaḥ- kasya brahmaṇo jijñāsā ?- iti /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ jijñāsā iti ukte tatra aneka artha tvāt brahma śabdasya saṃśayaḥ kasya brahmaṇaḥ jijñāsā iti
asti brahma śabdaḥ vipra tva jātau
yathā brahmahatyā iti
asti ca vede
yathā brahma ujjham iti
asti ca paramātmani
yathā brahma veda brahmā eva bhavati iti

original: tamimaṃ saṃśayamapākaroti- brahma ca vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇam iti /
analyzed: tam imam saṃśayam apākaroti brahma ca vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇam iti

original: yato brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya tajjñāpanāya paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayati tato 'vagacchāmaḥ paramātmajijñāsaiveyaṃ na vipratvajātyādijijñāsā,  #
analyzed: yatas brahma jijñāsām pratijñāya tad jñāpanāya paramātma lakṣaṇam praṇayati tatas vagacchāmaḥ paramātma jijñāsā eva iyam na vipra tva jāti ādi jijñāsā
iti arthaḥ
ṣaṣṭhī samāsa parigrahe pi na iyam karma ṣaṣṭhī
kim tu śeṣa lakṣaṇā

original: saṃbandhamātraṃ ca śeṣa iti brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte brahmasaṃbandhinī jijñāsetyuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: saṃbandha mātram ca śeṣaḥ iti brahmaṇaḥ jijñāsā iti ukte brahma saṃbandhinī jijñāsā iti uktam bhavati

original: tathā ca brahmasvarūpapramāṇayuktisādhanaprayojanajijñāsāḥ sarvā brahmajijñāsārthā brahmajijñāsayāvaruddhā bhavanti,
analyzed: tathā ca brahma svarūpa pramāṇa yukti sādhana prayojana jijñāsāḥ sarvāḥ brahma jijñāsā arthāḥ brahma jijñāsayā avaruddhāḥ bhavanti
sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā brahma saṃbandhāt
karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyām tu brahma śabda arthaḥ karma
sa ca svarūpam eva iti tad pramāṇa ādayaḥ na avarudhyeran

original: tathā cāpratijñātārthacintā pramāṇādiṣu bhavet- iti ye manyante tānpratyāhabrahmaṇa iti karmaṇi iti /
analyzed: tathā ca apratijñāta artha cintā pramāṇa ādiṣu bhavet iti ye manyante tān pratyāha brahmaṇaḥ iti karmaṇi iti
atra hetum āha jijñāsyaḥ iti
jñānasya ca jñeyam brahma

original: no khalu jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vinā nirūpyate,
analyzed: no khalu jñānam jñeyam vinā nirūpyate
na ca jijñāsā jñānam vinā
iti pratipatti anubandha tvāt prathamam jijñāsā karma eva apekṣate
na tu saṃbandhi mātram
tad antareṇa api sati karmaṇi tad nirūpaṇāt

original: na hi candramasamādityaṃ vopalabhya kasyāyamiti saṃbandhyanveṣaṇā bhavati /
analyzed: na hi candramasam ādityam vā upalabhya kasya ayam iti saṃbandhi anveṣaṇā bhavati
bhavati tu jñānam iti ukte viṣaya anveṣaṇā kiṃviṣayam iti
tasmāt prathamam apekṣita tvāt karma tayā eva brahma saṃbadhyate
na tu saṃbandhi tā mātreṇa
tasya jaghanya tvāt
tathā ca karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī iti arthaḥ

original: nanu satyaṃ na jijñāsyamantareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate ;
analyzed: nanu satyam na jijñāsyam antareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate
jijñāsya antaram tu asyāḥ bhaviṣyati

original: brahma tu śeṣatayā saṃbhantsyata ityata āha- jijñāsyāntara iti /
analyzed: brahma tu śeṣa tayā saṃbhantsyate iti atas āha jijñāsya antare iti
nigūḍha abhiprāyaḥ codayati nanu śeṣa ṣaṣṭhī parigrahe pi iti
sāmānya saṃbandhasya viśeṣa saṃbandha avirodhena karmatāyāḥ avighātena jijñāsā nirūpaṇa upapatteḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nigūḍhābhiprāya eva dūṣayati- evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
analyzed: nigūḍha abhiprāyaḥ eva dūṣayati evam api pratyakṣam brahmaṇaḥ iti

original: vācyasya karmatvasya jijñāsayā prathamamapekṣitasya prathamasaṃbandhārhasya cānvayaparityāgena paścātkathañcidapekṣitasya saṃbandhimātrasya
analyzed: vācyasya karma tvasya jijñāsayā prathamam apekṣitasya prathama saṃbandha arhasya ca anvaya parityāgena paścāt kathañcid apekṣitasya saṃbandhi mātrasya
jaghanyaḥ prathamaḥ prathamaḥ ca jaghanyaḥ
iti su vyāhṛtam nyāya tattvam
pratyakṣa parokṣa tā abhidhānam ca prāthamya aprāthamya sphuṭa tva asphuṭa tva abhiprāyam

original: cedakaḥ svābhiprāyamudghāṭayati- na vyarthaḥ brahmāśritāśeṣa iti /
analyzed: cedakaḥ sva abhiprāyam udghāṭayati na vyarthaḥ brahma āśrita aśeṣaḥ iti
vyākhyātam etat adhastāt
samādhātā sva abhisaṃdhim udghāṭayati na
pradhāna parigrahaḥ iti
vāstavam prādhānyam brahmaṇaḥ
śeṣam sa nidarśanam atirohita artham
śruti anugamaḥ ca atirohitaḥ

original: tadevamabhimataṃ samāsaṃ vyavasthāpya jijñāsāpadārthamāha- jñātum iti /
analyzed: tat evam abhimatam samāsam vyavasthāpya jijñāsā padārtham āha jñātum iti
syāt etat
na jñānam icchā viṣayaḥ
sukha duḥkha avāpti parihārau vā tad upāyaḥ vā tad dvāreṇa icchā gocaraḥ
na ca evam brahma jñānam
na khalu etat anukūlam iti vā pratikūla nivṛttiḥ iti vā anubhūyate
na api tayoḥ upāyaḥ
tasmin sati api sukha bhedasya adarśanāt
anuvartamānasya ca duḥkhasya anivṛtteḥ

original: tasmānna sūtrakāravacanamātrādiṣikarmatā jñānasyetyata āha- avagatiparyantam iti /
analyzed: tasmāt na sūtrakāra vacana mātrāt iṣikarmatā jñānasya iti atas āha avagati paryantam iti

original: na kevalaṃ jñānamiṣyate kiṃ tvavagatiṃ sākṣātkāraṃ kurvadavagatiparyantaṃ sanvācyāyā icchāyāḥ karma /
analyzed: na kevalam jñānam iṣyate kim tu avagatim sākṣātkāram kurvat avagati paryantam san vācyāyāḥ icchāyāḥ karma

original: kasmāt ? phalaviṣayatvādicchāyāḥ tadupāyaṃ phalaparyantaṃ gocarayatīccheti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: kasmāt phala viṣaya tvāt icchāyāḥ tad upāyam phala paryantam gocarayati icchā iti śeṣaḥ
nanu bhavatu avagati paryantam jñānam
kim etāvatā api iṣṭam bhavati

original: na hyanapekṣaṇīyaviṣayamavagatiparyantamapi jñānamiṣyata ityata āha- jñānena hi pramāṇenāvagantumiṣṭaṃ brahma /
analyzed: na hi an apekṣaṇīya viṣayam avagati paryantam api jñānam iṣyate iti atas āha jñānena hi pramāṇena avagantum iṣṭam brahma
bhavatu brahma viṣaya avagatiḥ
evam api katham iṣṭā iti atas āha brahma avagatiḥ hi puruṣa arthaḥ
kim abhyudayaḥ

original: na, kiṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ vigalitanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgaparamānandaghanabrahmāvagatirbrahmaṇaḥ svabhāva iti saiva niḥśreyasaṃ puruṣārtha iti /
analyzed: na kim tu niḥśreyasam vigalita nikhila duḥkha anuṣaṅga paramānanda ghana brahma avagatiḥ brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ iti sā eva niḥśreyasam puruṣa arthaḥ iti
syāt etat
na brahma avagatiḥ puruṣa arthaḥ
puruṣa vyāpāra vyāpyaḥ hi puruṣa arthaḥ
na ca asyāḥ brahma svabhāva bhūtāyāḥ utpatti vikāra saṃskāra prāptayaḥ saṃbhavanti
tathā sati anitya tvena tad svābhāvya anupapatteḥ
na ca utpatti ādi abhāve vyāpāra vyāpya tā
tasmāt na brahma avagatiḥ puruṣa arthaḥ iti atas āha niḥśeṣa saṃsāra bīja avidyā ādi anartha nibarhaṇāt
satyam brahma avagatau brahma svabhāve na utpatti ādayaḥ saṃbhavanti
tathā api anirvacanīya anādya vidyā vaśāt brahma svabhāvaḥ para adhīna prakāśaḥ

original: na pratibhātīva parādhīnaprakāśa iva dehendriyādibhyo bhinno 'pyabhinna iva bhāsata
analyzed: na pratibhāti iva para adhīna prakāśaḥ iva deha indriya ādibhyaḥ bhinnaḥ u pi abhinnaḥ iva bhāsata

original: iti saṃsārabījāvidyādyanarthanibarhaṇātprāgaprāpta iva tasminsati prāpta iva bhavatīti
analyzed: iti saṃsāra bīja avidyā ādi anartha nibarhaṇāt prāk aprāptaḥ iva tasmin sati prāptaḥ iva bhavati iti
puruṣeṇa arthyamāna tvāt puruṣa arthaḥ iti yuktam
avidyā ādi iti ādi grahaṇena tad saṃskāraḥ varudhyate
avidyā ādi nivṛttiḥ tu upāsanā kāryāt antar karaṇa vṛtti bhedāt sākṣātkārāt iti draṣṭavyam
upasaṃharati tasmāt brahma jijñāsitavyam ukta lakṣaṇena mumukṣuṇā
na khalu tat jñānam vinā sa vāsana vividha duḥkha nidānam avidyā ucchidyate
na ca tad ucchedam antareṇa vigalita nikhila duḥkha anuṣaṅga ānanda ghana brahma ātmatā sākṣātkāra āvirbhāvaḥ jīvasya
tasmāt ānanda ghana brahma ātma tām icchatā tad upāyaḥ jñānam eṣitavyam

original: tacca na kevalebhyo vedāntebhyaḥ api tu brahmamīmāṃsopakaraṇebhya iti icchāmukhena brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ pravartyate,
analyzed: tat ca na kevalebhyaḥ vedāntebhyaḥ api tu brahma mīmāṃsā upakaraṇebhyaḥ iti icchā mukhena brahma mīmāṃsāyām pravartyate
na tu vedānteṣu tad artha vivakṣāyām vā

original: tatra phalavadarthāvabodhaparatāṃ svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ sūtrayatā 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' ityanenaiva pravartitatvāt,
analyzed: tatra phalavat artha avabodha para tām svādhyāya adhyayana vidheḥ sūtrayatā atha atas dharma jijñāsā iti anena eva pravartita tvāt
dharma grahaṇasya ca veda artha upalakṣaṇa tvena adharma vat brahmaṇaḥ upi upalakṣaṇa tvāt

original: yadyapi ca dharmamīmāṃsāvat vedārthamīmāṃsayā brahmamīmāṃsāpyākṣeptuṃ śakyate,
analyzed: yadi api ca dharma mīmāṃsā vat veda artha mīmāṃsayā brahma mīmāṃsā api ākṣeptum śakyate
tathā api prācyā mīmāṃsayā na tat vyutpādyate

original: nāpi brahmamīmāṃsāyā adhyayanamātrānantaryamiti brahmamīmāṃsārambhāya nityānityavivekādyānantaryapradarśanāya cedaṃ sūtramārambhaṇīyamityapaunaruktyam
analyzed: nā api brahmamīmāṃsāyāḥ adhyayana mātra ānantaryam iti brahmamīmāṃsā ārambhāya nitya anitya viveka ādi ānantarya pradarśanāya ca idam sūtram ārambhaṇīyam iti apaunaruktyam
syāt etat

original: etena sūtreṇa brahmajñānaṃ pratyupāyatā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyata ityuktam ;
analyzed: etena sūtreṇa brahma jñānam prati upāya tā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyate iti uktam
tat ayuktam
vikalpa asaha tvāt
iti codayati tat punar brahma iti
vedāntebhyaḥ pauruṣeya tayā svatas siddha prāmāṇyebhyaḥ prasiddham aprasiddham vā syāt
yadi prasiddham
vedānta vākya samutthena niścaya jñānena viṣayīkṛtam
tatas na jijñāsitavyam
niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi aviśeṣa ādhāyinaḥ sādhanasya sādhana nyāya atipātāt
atha aprasiddham vedāntebhyaḥ

original: tarhi na tadvedāntāḥ pratipādayantīti sarvathāprasiddhaṃ naiva śakyaṃ jijñāsitum /
analyzed: tarhi na tat vedāntāḥ pratipādayanti iti sarvathā aprasiddham nā eva śakyam jijñāsitum

original: anubhūte hi priye bhavatīcchā na tu sarvathānanubhūtāpūrve /
analyzed: anubhūte hi priye bhavati icchā na tu sarvathā ananubhūta apūrve
na ca iṣyamāṇam api śakyam jñātum
pramāṇa abhāvāt
śabdaḥ hi tasya pramāṇam vaktavyam
yathā vakṣyati śāstra yoni tvāt iti
sa ced tat na avabodhayati
kutas tasya tatra prāmāṇyam
na ca pramāṇa anantaram brahmaṇi prakramate

original: tasmātprasiddhasya jñātuṃ śakyasyāpyajijñāsanāt aprasiddhasyecchāyā aviṣayatvāt aśakyajñānatvācca na brahma jijñāsyamityākṣepaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt prasiddhasya jñātum śakyasya api ajijñāsanāt aprasiddhasya icchāyāḥ aviṣaya tvāt aśakya jñāna tvāt ca na brahma jijñāsyam iti ākṣepaḥ
pariharati ucyate asti tāvat brahma nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvam
ayam arthaḥ prāk api brahmamīmāṃsāyāḥ adhīta vedasya nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa ādi pariśīlana vidita pada tad artha saṃbandhasya
sat eva somya idam agre āsīt iti upakramāt tat tvam asi iti antāt saṃdarbhāt nitya tva ādi upeta brahma svarūpa avagamaḥ tāvat āpātataḥ vicārāt vinā api asti
atra ca brahma ityādinā avagamyena tad viṣayam avagamam lakṣayati
tad astitvasya sati vimarśe vicārāt prāk anirṇayāt
nityā iti kṣayi tā lakṣaṇam duḥkham upakṣipati
śuddha iti deha ādi upādhikam api duḥkham apākaroti
buddha iti apara adhīna prakāśam ānanda ātmānam darśayati
ānanda prakāśayoḥ abhedāt
syāt etat
muktau satyām asya ete śuddha tva ādayaḥ prathante

original: tatastu prāk dehādyabhedena taddharmajanmajarāmaraṇādiduḥkhayogādityata uktam- mukta iti /
analyzed: tatas tu prāk deha ādi abhedena tad dharma janma jarā maraṇa ādi duḥkha yogāt iti atas uktam muktaḥ iti

original: sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiva kevalo 'nādyavidyāvaśāttu bhrāntyā tathāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sadā eva muktaḥ sadā eva kevalaḥ na adya avidyā vaśāt tu bhrāntyā tathā avabhāsate iti arthaḥ

original: tadevamanaupādhikaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ darśayitvā avidyopādhikaṃ rūpamāha- sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisamanvitam /
analyzed: tat evam anaupādhikam brahmaṇaḥ rūpam darśayitvā avidyā upādhikam rūpam āha sarvajñam sarva śakti samanvitam
tat anena jagat kāraṇa tvam asya darśitam
śakti jñāna bhāva abhāva anuvidhānāt kāraṇa tva bhāva abhāvayoḥ

original: kutaḥ punarevaṃbhūtabrahmasvarūpāvagatiḥ ityata āha- brahmaśabdasya hi iti /
analyzed: kutas punar evaṃbhūta brahma svarūpa avagatiḥ iti atas āha brahma śabdasya hi iti

original: na kevalam 'sadeva somyedam' ityādīnāṃ vākyānāṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayā itthaṃbhūtabrahmāvagatiḥ /
analyzed: na kevalam sat eva somya idam ityādīnām vākyānām paurvāparya paryālocanayā itthaṃbhūta brahma avagatiḥ
api tu brahma padam api nirvacana sāmarthyāt imam eva artham svahastayati
nirvacanam āha bṛhateḥ dhātoḥ artha anugamāt
vṛddhi karmā hi bṛhatiḥ atiśāyane vartate
tat ca idam atiśāyanam anavacchinnam pada antara avagamitam nitya śuddha buddha tva ādyasya abhyanujānāti iti arthaḥ

original: tadevaṃ tatpadārthasya śuddhatvādeḥ prasiddhimabhidhāya tvaṃpadārthasyāpyāha- sarvasyātmatvācca brahmāstitvaprasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tat evam tad padārthasya śuddha tva ādeḥ prasiddhim abhidhāya tvam padārthasya api āha sarvasya ātma tvāt ca brahma astitva prasiddhiḥ
sarvasya pāṃsula pādakasya hālikasya api brahma astitva prasiddhiḥ
kutas ātma tvāt
etat eva sphuṭayati sarvaḥ hi iti

original: pratītimeva apratītinirākaraṇena draḍhayati- na na iti /
analyzed: pratītim eva apratīti nirākaraṇena draḍhayati na naḥ iti
na na pratyeti aham asmi iti
kim tu pratyeti eva iti yojanā

original: nanu 'ahamasmi' iti ca jñāsyati mā ca jñāsīdātmānamityata āha- yadi iti /
analyzed: nanu aham asmi iti ca jñāsyati mā ca jñāsīt ātmānam iti atas āha yadi iti
aham asmi iti na pratīyāt

original: ahaṅkārāspadaṃ hi jīvātmānaṃ cenna pratīyāt 'aham' iti na pratīyādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ahaṅkāra āspadam hi jīvātmānam ced na pratīyāt aham iti na pratīyāt iti arthaḥ
nanu pratyetu sarvaḥ janaḥ ātmānam ahaṅkāra āspadam

original: brahmaṇi tu kimāyātam ityata āha- ātmā ca brahma ;
analyzed: brahmaṇi tu kim āyātam iti atas āha ātmā ca brahma
tadaḥ tva mā sāmānādhikaraṇyāt

original: tasmāttatpadārthasya śuddhabuddhatvādeḥ śabdataḥ tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmanaḥ pratyakṣataḥ prasiddheḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt tad padārthasya śuddha buddha tva ādeḥ śabdataḥ tvam padārthasya ca jīvātmanaḥ pratyakṣataḥ prasiddheḥ
padārtha jñāna pūrvaka tvāt ca vākya artha jñānasya

original: tvaṃpadārthasya brahmabhāvāvagamaḥ 'tattvamasi' iti vākyādupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tvaṃ padārthasya brahma bhāva avagamaḥ tat tvam asi iti vākyāt upapadyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: ākṣeptā prathamakalpāśrayaṃ doṣamāha- yadi tarhi loka iti /
analyzed: ākṣeptā prathama kalpa āśrayam doṣam āha yadi tarhi lokaḥ iti
adhyāpaka adhyetṛ paramparā lokaḥ

original: tatra 'tattvamasi' iti vākyādyadi brahma ātmatvena prasiddhamasti /
analyzed: tatra tat tvam asi iti vākyāt yadi brahma ātma tvena prasiddham asti

original: 'ātmā brahmatvena' iti vaktavye 'brahma ātmatvena' iti abhedavivakṣayā gamayitavyam /

original: varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ ca kālato deśato vā paurvāparyāyogāt /

original: yathā hi yādṛśaṃ gātracalanādi nartakaḥ karoti tādṛśameva śikṣyamāṇānukaroti nartakī,

original: evaṃ yādṛśīmānupūrvīṃ vaidikānāṃ varṇapadādīnāṃ karotyadhyāpayitā tādṛśīmevānukaroti māṇavakaḥ,

na tu tām eva uccārayati

original: yathāhuḥ- 'yatnataḥ pratiṣedhyā naḥ puruṣāṇāṃ svatantratā' iti /
analyzed: yathā āhuḥ yatnataḥ pratiṣedhyā naḥ puruṣāṇām svatantra tā iti

vaiyāsikam tu matam anuvartamānāḥ śruti smṛti itihāsa ādi siddha sṛṣṭi pralaya anusāreṇa anādya vidyā upadhāna labdha sarva śakti sarva jñānasya api

original: paramātmano nityasya vedānāṃ yonerapi na teṣu svātantryam,
analyzed: paramātmanaḥ nityasya vedānām yoneḥ api na teṣu svātantryam

original: yathā hi yāgādibrahmahatyādayor'thānarthahetavo brahmavivartā api na sargāntare vipariyanti /
analyzed: yathā hi yāga ādi brahmahatyā ādayaḥ artha anartha hetavaḥ brahma vivartāḥ api na sarga antare vipariyanti
na hi jātu kvacid sarge brahmahatyā artha hetuḥ anartha hetuḥ ca aśvamedhaḥ bhavati
agniḥ vā kledayati
āpaḥ vā dahanti tadvat
yathā atra sarge niyata ānupūrvyam veda adhyayanam abhyudaya niḥśreyasa hetuḥ
anyathā tat eva vāc vajra tayā anartha hetuḥ

original: evaṃ sargāntareṣvapīti tadanurodhāt sarvajño 'pi sarvaśaktirapi pūrvapūrvasargānusāreṇa vedānviracayanna svatantraḥ /
analyzed: evam sarga antareṣu api iti tad anurodhāt sarvajñaḥ sarva śaktiḥ api pūrva pūrva sarga anusāreṇa vedān viracayan na svatantraḥ
puruṣa asvātantrya mātram ca apauruṣeya tvam rocayante jaiminīyāḥ api
tat ca asmākam api samānam
anyatra abhiniveśāt

original: na caikasya pratibhāne anāśvāsa iti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca ekasya pratibhāne anāśvāsaḥ iti yuktam

original: na hi bahūnāmapyajñānāṃ vijñānāṃ vā āśayadoṣavatāṃ pratibhāne yukta āśvāsaḥ ;

tattva jñānavataḥ tu apāsta samasta doṣasya ekasya api pratibhāne yuktaḥ evā āśvāsaḥ
sarga ādi bhuvām ca prajāpati devarṣīṇām dharma jñāna vairāgya aiśvarya saṃpannānām upapadyate tad svarūpa avadhāraṇam

original: tatpratyayena cārvācīnānāmapi tatra saṃpratyaya ityupapannaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śāstrayonitvam,
