śāstrasya ca apauruṣeya tvam
prāmāṇyam ca iti
iti prathama varṇakam
varṇaka antaram ārabhate
atha vā aiti
pūrveṇa adhikaraṇena brahma svarūpa lakṣaṇa asaṃbhava āśaṅkām vyudasya lakṣaṇa saṃbhavaḥ uktaḥ

original: tasyaiva tu lakṣaṇasyānena anumānatvāśaṅkāmapākṛtya āgamopadarśanena brahmaṇi śāstraṃ pramāṇamuktam /
analyzed: tasya eva tu lakṣaṇasya anena anumāna tva āśaṅkām apākṛtya āgama upadarśanena brahmaṇi śāstram pramāṇam uktam
akṣara arthaḥ tu ati rohitaḥ
śāstra pramāṇaka tvam uktam brahmaṇaḥ pratijñā mātreṇa
tat anena sūtreṇa pratipādanīyam
iti utsūtram pūrvapakṣam āracayati bhāṣyakāraḥ
katham punar iti

original: kim ākṣepe- śuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvatayā upekṣaṇīyaṃ brahma bhūtamabhidadhatāṃ vedāntānāmapuruṣārthopadeśināmaprayojanatvāpatteḥ ;
analyzed: kim ākṣepe śuddha buddha udāsīna svabhāva tayā upekṣaṇīyam brahma bhūtam abhidadhatām vedāntānām apuruṣa artha upadeśinām aprayojana tva āpatteḥ
bhūta artha tvena ca pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ samāna viṣaya tayā laukika vākya vat tad artha anuvādaka tvena aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt

original: na khalu laukikāni vākyāni pramāṇāntaraviṣayamarthamavabodhayanti svataḥ pramāṇam ;
analyzed: na khalu laukikāni vākyāni pramāṇa antara viṣayam artham avabodhayanti svatas pramāṇam
evam vedāntāḥ api iti anapekṣa tva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam eṣām vyāhanyeta
na ca taiḥ apramāṇaiḥ bhavitum yuktam
na ca aprayojanaiḥ
svādhyāya adhyayana vidhi āpādita prayojanavat tva niyamāt
tasmāt tad tad vihita karma apekṣita kartṛ devatā ādi pratipādana paratvena eva kriyā arthatvam
yadi tu asaṃnidhānāt tad para tvam na rocayante
tatas saṃnihita upāsana ādi kriyā paratvam vā vedāntānām

original: evaṃ hi pratyakṣādyanadhigatagocaratvenānapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ ca prayojanavattvaṃ ca sidhyatīti tātparyārthaḥ /
analyzed: evam hi pratyakṣa ādi anadhigata gocara tvena anapekṣa tayā prāmāṇyam ca prayojanavat tvam ca sidhyati iti tātparyārthaḥ

original: priyādibhāgī śarīro jīvo na brahma yujyate //

analyzed: na ca eteṣām prāc bhavīyaḥ dharmaḥ eva asti na pāpmā iti sāṃpratam
vidyā karma atiśaya samudācāre pi anādi bhava paraṃparā upārjitānām pāpmanām api prasuptānām saṃbhavāt
na ca śruti prāmāṇyāt idātya śarīra abhimāninaḥ sarva pāpma virahaḥ iti yuktam
brahma viṣaya tvena api asyāḥ prāmāṇya upapatteḥ
na ca vinigamana a hetu abhāvaḥ

original: tatra tatra sarvapāpmavirahasya bhūyobhūyo brahmaṇyeva śravaṇāt /
analyzed: tatra tatra sarva pāpma virahasya bhūyas bhūyas brahmaṇi eva śravaṇāt
tasya eva ca iha pratyabhijñāyamānasya vinigamanā hetoḥ vidyamāna tvāt
api ca sārvātmyam jagat kāraṇasya brahmaṇaḥ eva upapadyate
kāraṇāt abhedāt kārya jātasya
brahmaṇaḥ ca jagat kāraṇa tvāt
āditya śarīra abhimāninaḥ tu jīvātmanaḥ na jagat kāraṇatvam
na ca mukhya artha saṃbhave prāśastya lakṣaṇayā stuti artha tā yuktā
rūpavat tvam ca asya para anugrahāya kāya nirmāṇena vā
tad vikāra tayā vā sarvasya kārya jātasya
vikārasya ca vikāravataḥ na anyatvāt tādṛśa rūpa bhedena upadiśyate
yathā gandhaḥ saḥ iti
na ca brahma nirmitam māyā rūpam anuvadat śāstram aśāstram bhavati
apitu tām kurvat iti mā a śāstra tva prasaṅgaḥ
yatra tu nirasta samasta upādhi bhedam jñeya tvena upakṣipyate
tatra śāstram aśabdam asparśam arūpam avyayam iti pravartate
tasmāt rūpavat tvam api paramātmani upapadyate
etena eva maryādā ādhāra bhedau api vyākhyātau
api ca āditya deha abhimāninaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ ntaryāmī bhedena uktaḥ

original: sa evāntarāditya ityantaḥ śrutisāmyena pratyabhijñāyamāno bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: saḥ eva antarādityaḥ iti antaḥ śruti sāmyena pratyabhijñāyamānaḥ bhavitum arhati
tasmāt te dhana sanayaḥ iti
dhanavantaḥ vibhūtimantaḥ iti yāvat
kasmāt punar vibhūtimat tvam parameśvara parigrahe ghaṭate iti atas āha
yat yat vibhūtimat iti
sava ātmaka tve pi vibhūtimatsu eva parameśvara svarūpa abhivyaktiḥ
na tu avidyā tamaḥ pihita parameśvara svarūpeṣu a vibhūtimatsu iti arthaḥ
loka kāma īśitṛ tvam api iti
tyanta apārārthya nyāyena nirāṅkuśam aiśvaryam iti arthaḥ
ākāśaḥ tad liṅgāt
pūrvasmin adhikaraṇe brahmaṇaḥ sādhāraṇa dharma darśanāt vivakṣita upādhinaḥ syā eva upāsanā
na tu āditya śarīra abhimāninaḥ jīvātmanaḥ iti nirūpitam
idānīm tu asādhāraṇa dharma darśanāt tat eva udgīthe saṃpādya upāsya tvena upadiśyate
na bhūtākāśaḥ iti nirūpyate

original: tatra 'ākāśa iti hovāca' iti kiṃ mukhyakāśapādānurodhena 'asya lokasya kā gitaḥ' iti,
analyzed: tatra ākāśaḥ iti ha uvāca iti kim mukhya kāśa pāda anurodhena asya lokasya kā iti

original: 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni' iti 'jyāyā' itica 'parāyaṇam' iti ca kathañcidvyākhyāyatāṃ,
analyzed: sarvāṇi ha vai imāni bhūtāni iti jyāyāḥ iti ca parāyaṇam iti ca kathañcid vyākhyāyatām
uta etad anurodhena ākāśa śabdaḥ bhaktyā parātmāne vyākhyāyatām iti
patra prathvī tvāt pradhāna tvāt ākāśam mukhyam eva naḥ
tad ānuguṇyena anyāni vyākhyeyāni iti niścayaḥ

original: ' 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ' iti praśnottare 'ākāśa iti hovāca' ityākāśasya gatitvena pratipādyatayā prādhānyāt,
analyzed: asya lokasya kā gatiḥ iti praśna uttare ākāśaḥ iti ha uvāca iti ākāśasya gati tvena pratipādya tayā prādhānyāt

original: 'sarvāṇi ha vā' ityādīnāṃ tu tadviśeṣaṇatayā guṇatvāt,
analyzed: sarvāṇi ha vai ityādīnām tu tad viśeṣaṇa tayā guṇa tvāt
guṇe tu anyāṭya kalpanāḥ iti bahūni api apradhānāni pradhāna anurodhena netavyāni
apica ākāśaḥ iti ha uvāca iti uttare prathama avagatam ākāśam anupajāta virodhi

original: tena tadanuraktāyāṃ buddhau yadyadeva tadekavākyagatamupanipatati tattajjaghanyatayā upasaṃjātavirodhi tadānuguṇyenaiva vyavasthānamarhati
analyzed: tena tad anuraktāyām buddhau yat yat eva tat eka vākya gatam upanipatati tat tat jaghanya tayā upasaṃjāta virodhi tad ānuguṇyena eva vyavasthānam arhati

original: naca kkacidākāśaśabdo bhaktyā brahmaṇi prayukta iti sarvatra tena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
analyzed: na ca kkacid ākāśa śabdaḥ bhaktyā brahmaṇi prayuktaḥ iti sarvatra tena tad pareṇa bhavitavyam

original: nahi gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgapadamanupapattyā tīraparamiti yādāṃsi gaṅgāyāmityatrāpyanena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
analyzed: nahi gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ iti atra gaṅga padam anupapattyā tīra param iti yādāṃsi gaṅgāyām iti atra api anena tad pareṇa bhavitavyam
saṃbhavaḥ ca ubhayatra tulyaḥ
na ca brahmaṇi api ākāśa śabdaḥ mukhyaḥ
an aikārtha tvasya an yāṭya tvāt
bhaktyā ca brahmaṇi prayoga darśana upapatteḥ
loke ca asya nabhasi nirūḍha tvāt
tad pūrvaka tvāt ca vaidika artha pratīteḥ vaiparītya anupapatteḥ

original: tadānuguṇyena ca 'sarvāṇi ha vā' ityādīni bhāṣyakṛtā svayameva nītāni /
analyzed: tad ānuguṇyena ca sarvāṇi ha vā ityādīni bhāṣyakṛtā svayam eva nītāni
tasmāt bhūtākāśam eva atra upāsya tvena upadiśyate
na paramātmā iti prāptam
evam prāpte bhidhīyate
ākāśa śabdena brahmaṇaḥ grahaṇam
kutas
tad liṅgāt
tathā hi sāma anadhikaraṇyena praśna tad prativākyayoḥ
paurvāparya parāmarśāt pradhāna tve pi gauṇa tā

original: ' yadyapyākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ tathāpi yatpṛṣṭaṃ tadeva prativaktavyam /
analyzed: yadi api ākāśa padam pradhāna artham tathā api yat pṛṣṭam tat eva prativaktavyam
na khalu an unmattaḥ āmnān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidāsana ācaṣṭe

original: tadiha, 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ' iti praśno dṛśyamānanāmarūpaprapañcamātragativiṣaya iti tadanurodhādya eva sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ sa evākāśaśabdena  #
analyzed: tat iha asya lokasya kā gatiḥ iti praśnaḥ dṛśyamāna nāma rūpa prapañca mātra gati viṣayaḥ iti tad anurodhāt yaḥ eva sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ saḥ eva ākāśa śabdena
prativaktavyaḥ
na ca bhūtākāśaḥ sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ
tasya api loka madhya pāti tvāt
tat eva tasya matiḥ iti anupapatteḥ
na ca uttare bhūtākāśa śravaṇāt bhūtākāśa kāryam eva pṛṣṭam iti yuktam
praśnasya prathama avagataḥ n upajāta virodhinaḥ loka sāmānya viṣayasya upajāta virodhinā uttareṇa saṃkoca anupapatteḥ tad anurodhena uttara vyākhyānāt

original: naca praśnena pūrvapakṣarūpeṇānavasthitārthenottaraṃ vyavasthitārthaṃ na śakyaṃ niyantumiti yuktaṃ,
analyzed: na ca praśnena pūrvapakṣa rūpeṇa anavasthita arthena uttaram vyavasthita artham na śakyam niyantum iti yuktam
tad nimittānām ajñāna saṃśaya viparyasānām anavasthāne tasya sva viṣaye vyavasthānāt
anyathā uttarasya anālambana tva ātteḥ vaiyadhikaraṇya āpatteḥ vā
api ca uttare pi bahu asamañjasam

original: tathāhi-'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyakāśādeva samutpadyante' iti sarvaśabdaḥ kathañcidalpaviṣayo vyākhyeyaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi sarvāṇi ha vai imāni bhūtāni akāśāt eva samutpadyante iti sarva śabdaḥ kathañcid alpa viṣayaḥ vyākhyeyaḥ
evam eva kāraḥ pi asamañjasaḥ

original: na khalvapāmākāśa eva kāraṇamapi tu tejo 'pi /
analyzed: na khalu apām ākāśaḥ eva kāraṇam api tu tejaḥ

original: evamannasyāpi nākāśameva kāraṇamapi tu pāvakapāthasī api /
analyzed: evam annasya api na ākāśam eva kāraṇam api tu pāvaka pāthasī api
mūla kāraṇa vivakṣāyām tu brahmaṇi eva avadhāraṇam samañjasam
asamaḍhjasam tu bhūtākāśe
evam sarveṣām bhūtānām layaḥ brahmaṇi eva
evam sarvebhyaḥ jyāyaḥ tvam brahmaṇaḥ eva
evam paramayanam brahma eva
tasmāt sarveṣām lokānām iti praśna upakramāt
uttare ca tad tad asādhāraṇa brahma guṇa parāmarśāt pṛṣṭāyāḥ ca gateḥ param ayanam iti āsādhāraṇa brahma guṇa upasaṃhārāt
bhūyasīnām śrutīnām anugrahāya tyajet ekam kulasya arthe iti vat varam ākāśa pada mātram asamañjasam astu
etāvatā hi bahu samañjasam syāt
na ca ākāśasya prādhānyam uttare
kintu pṛṣṭārtha tvāt uttarasya
loka sāmānya gateḥ ca pṛṣṭa tvāt
parāyaṇam iti ca tasya eva upasaṃhārāḥ brahma eva pradhānam

original: tathāca tadarthaṃ sat ākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ bhavati, nānyathā /
analyzed: tathā ca tad artham sat ākāśa padam pradhāna artham bhavati na anyathā
tasmāt brahma eva pradhānam ākāśa padena iha upāsya tvena upakṣitam
na bhūtākāśam iti siddham
api ca
asya eva upakrame antavat kila te sāmaḥ iti
antavat tva doṣeṇa śālāvatyasya iti
na ca ākāśa śabdaḥ vilambita pratipattiḥ

original: tatra tatra brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya tatparyāyasya ca prayogaprācuryādatyantābhyāsenāsyāpi
analyzed: tatra tatra brahmaṇi ākāśa śabdasya tad paryāyasya ca prayoga prācuryāt atyanta abhyāsena asya api
mukhya vat pratipatteḥ avilambanāt iti darśana artham brahmaṇi prayoga prācuryam vaidikam
nidarśitam bhāṣyakṛtā
tatra eva ca prathama avagata ānuguṇyena uttaram nīyate
yatra tat anyathā kartum śakyam

original: yatra tu na śakyaṃ tatrottarānuguṇyenaiva prathamaṃ nīyata ityāha-
analyzed: yatra tu na śakyam tatra uttara ānuguṇyena eva prathamam nīyate iti āha
vākya upakrame pi iti
atas eva prāṇaḥ

original: udgīthe-'yā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā' ityukramya śrūyate-'katamā sā devateti prāṇa iti hovāca' uṣastiśkrāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: udgīthā iyāḥ devatā prastāvam anvāyattāḥ iti ukramya śrūyate ekatamā sā devatā iti prāṇaḥ iti ha uvāca uṣastiśkrāyaṇaḥ
udgītha upāsana prasaṅgena prastāva upāsanam api udgīthaḥ iti uktam bāṣyakṛtā

original: prastāva iti sāmno bhaktiviśeṣastamanvāyattā anugatā prāṇo devatā /
analyzed: prastāvaḥ iti sāmnaḥ bhakti viśeṣaḥ tam anvāyattā anugatā prāṇaḥ devatā

original: atra prāṇaśabdasya brahmaṇi vāyuvikāre ca darśanātsaṃśayaḥ-kimayaṃ brahmavacana uta vāyuvikāravacana iti /
analyzed: atra prāṇa śabdasya brahmaṇi vāyu vikāre ca darśanāt saṃśayaḥ kim ayam brahma vacanaḥ uta vāyu vikāra vacanaḥ iti

original: tatra ata eva brahmaliṅgādeva prāṇo 'pi brahmaiva na vāyuvikāra iti yuktam /
analyzed: tatra atas eva brahma liṅgāt eva brahma eva na vāyu vikāraḥ iti yuktam
yadi evam tena eva gatārtham etat iti kaḥ dhikaraṇa antarasya ārambha arthaḥ
tatra ucyate arthe śrutyā eka gamye hi śrutim eva ādriyāmahe
māna antara avagamye tu tad vaśāt tad vyavasthitiḥ
brahmaṇaḥ vā a sarva bhūta kāraṇa tvam

original: ākāśasya vā vāṭvādibhūtakāraṇatvaṃ prati nāgamādṛte mānāntaraṃ prabhavati /
analyzed: ākāśasya vā vāṭva ādi bhūta kāraṇa tvam prati na āgamāt ṛte māna antaram prabhavati

original: tatra paurvāparyaparyālocanayā yatrārthe samañjasa āgamaḥ sa evārthastasya gṛhyate,
analyzed: tatra paurvāparya paryālocanayā yatra arthe samañjasaḥ āgamaḥ saḥ eva arthaḥ tasya gṛhyate
tyajyate ca itaraḥ

original: iha tu saṃveśanodgamane bhūtānāṃ prāṇaṃ pratyucyamāne kiṃ brahma pratyucyate āho
analyzed: iha tu saṃveśana udgamane bhūtānām prāṇam pratyucyamāne kim brahma pratyucyate āho

original: vāyuvikāraṃ pratīti viśaye 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti' ityādikāyāḥ
analyzed: vāyu vikāram prati iti viśaye yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇam tarhi vāc apyeti ityādikāyāḥ
śruteḥ sarva bhūta sāra indriya saṃveśana udgamana pratipādana dvārā sarva bhūta saṃveśana udgamana pratipādikāyāḥ
māna antara anugraha labdha sāmarthyāyāḥ balāt saṃveśana udgamane vāyu vikārasya eva prāṇasya
na brahmaṇaḥ

original: api cātrodgīthapratihārayoḥ sāmabhaktyorbrahmaṇo 'nye ādityaścānnaṃ ca devate abhihite kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpe,
analyzed: api ca atra udgītha pratihārayoḥ sāma bhaktyoḥ brahmaṇaḥ nye ādityaḥ ca annam ca devate abhihite kārya kāraṇa saṃghāta rūpe
tad sāhacaryāt prāṇaḥ api kārya kāraṇa saṃghāta rūpaḥ eva devatā bhavitum arhati
nistaḥ pi ayam arthaḥ īkṣati adhikaraṇe
pūrva ukta pūrvapakṣa hetu upodbalāya punar upanyastaḥ
tasmāt vāyu vikāraḥ eva atra prāṇa śabda arthaḥ iti prāptam
evam prāpte bhidhīyate puṃvākyasya balīyaḥ tvam māna antara samāgamāt
apauruṣeye vākye tad saṃgatiḥ kim kariṣyati

original: ' no khalu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvamapauruṣeyaṃ vacaḥ svaviṣayajñānotpāde vā tadvyavahāre vā mānāntaramapekṣate,
analyzed: no khalu svatas siddha pramāṇa bhāvam apauruṣeyam vacaḥ sva viṣaya jñāna utpāde vā tad vyavahāre vā māna antaram apekṣate
tasya apauruṣeyasya nirasta samasta doṣa āśaṅkya svatas eva niścāyaka tvāt
niścāyaka tvāt
niścaya pūrvaka tvāt vyavahāra pravṛtteḥ

original: tasmādasaṃvādino vā cakṣuṣa iva rūpe tvagindriyasaṃvādino vā tasyaiva dravye nādārḍhyaṃ vā dārḍhyaṃ vā /
analyzed: tasmāt asaṃvādinaḥ vā cakṣuṣaḥ iva rūpe tvac indriya saṃvādinaḥ vā tasya eva dravye na a dārḍhyam vā dārḍhyam vā
tena stām indriya mātra saṃveśana udgamane vāyu vikāre prāṇe
sarva bhūta saṃveśana udgamane tu na tatas vākyāt pratīyate

original: pratītau vā tatrāpi prāṇo brahmaiva bhavenna vāyuvikāraḥ /
analyzed: pratītau vā tatra api prāṇaḥ brahmā eva bhavet na vāyu vikāraḥ

original: 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityatra vākye yathā prāṇaśabdo brahmavacanaḥ /
analyzed: yadā suptaḥ svapnam na kañcana paśyati atha asmin prāṇaḥ eva ekadhā bhavati iti atra vākye yathā prāṇa śabdaḥ brahma vacanaḥ

original: na cāsminvāyuvikāre sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamane mānāntareṇa dṛśyete /
analyzed: na ca asmin vāyu vikāre sarveṣām bhūtānām saṃveśana udgamane māna antareṇa dṛśyete
na ca māna antara siddha saṃvāda indriya saṃveśana udgamana vākya dārḍhyāt sarva bhūta saṃveśana udgamana vākyam kathañcid indri viṣaya tayā vyākhyānam arhati
svatas siddha pramāṇa bhāvasya svabhāva dṛḍhasya māna antara anupayogāt
na ca asya tena eka vākya tā
eka vākya tāyām ca tat api brahma param eva syāt iti uktam
indriya saṃveśana udgamanam tu avayutya anuvādena api ghaṭiṣyate
ekam vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇīte itivat
na tu sarva śabda arthaḥ saṃkocam arhati
tasmāt prastāva bhaktim prāṇa śabda abhidheya brahma adṛṣṭyā upāsīt
na vāyu vikāra dṛṣṭyā iti siddham

original: tathā copāsakasya prāṇaprāptiḥ karmasamṛddhirvā phalaṃ bhavatīti /
analyzed: tathā ca upāsakasya prāṇa prāptiḥ karma samṛddhiḥ vā phalam bhavati iti
vākyaśeṣa balena iti
vākyāt saṃnidhānam durbalam iti arthaḥ
udāharaṇa antaram tu nigada vyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa dūṣitam
jyotiḥ caraṇa abhidhānāt

original: idamāmananti-'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate niśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥ  #
analyzed: idam āmananti atha yat atas paras divaḥ jyotiḥ dīpyate niśvatas pṛṣṭheṣu sarvatas pṛṣṭheṣu anuttameṣu uttameṣu lokeṣu idam vāva tat yat idam asmin antar
puruṣe jyotiḥ iti

original: yajjyotirato divo dyulokātparaṃ dīpyate prakāśate viśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu viśveṣāmupari /
analyzed: yat jyotiḥ atas divaḥ dyu lokāt param dīpyate prakāśate viśvatas pṛṣṭheṣu viśveṣām upari

original: asaṃkucadvṛttirayaṃ viśvaśabdo 'navayavatvena saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ brūta iti darśayitumāha-
analyzed: asaṃkucat vṛttiḥ ayam viśva śabdaḥ nava yava tvena saṃsāra maṇḍalam brūte iti darśayitum āha
sarvatas pṛṣṭheṣu uttameṣu
na ca idam uttama mātram apitu sarva uttamam iti āha
anuttama iṣu na asti ebhyaḥ nyaḥ uttamaḥ iti arthaḥ
idam vāva tat yat idam asmin puruṣe ntar jyotiḥ tva grāhyeṇa śārīreṇa ūṣmaṇā

original: śrotragrāhyeṇa ca pihitakarṇena puṃsā ghoṣeṇa liṅgenānumīyate /
analyzed: śrotra grāhyeṇa ca pihita karṇena puṃsā ghoṣeṇa liṅgena anumīyate
tatra śārīrasya ūṣmaṇaḥ tvacā darśanam dṛṣṭiḥ
ghoṣasya ca śravaṇam śrutiḥ
tayoḥ ca dṛṣṭi śrutī jyotiṣaḥ eva
tad liṅgena tad anumānāt iti

original: atra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaḥ teja uta brahmeti /
analyzed: atra saṃśayaḥ kim jyotiḥ śabdaḥ tejaḥ uta brahma iti
kim tāvat prāptam tejaḥ iti
kutas gauṇa mukhya grahaṇa viṣaye mukhya grahaṇasya autsargika tvāt vākya stha tejaḥ liṅga upalambhanāt
vākya antareṇa aniyamāt tad artha apratisaṃdhitaḥ
balavat bādhaka upanipātena khalu ākāśa prāṇa śabdau mukhya artha tvāt pracya anyatra pratiṣṭhāpitau
tat iha jyotiṣpadasya mukhya tejaḥ vacana tve bādhakaḥ tāvat sva vākyaśeṣaḥ na asti
pratyuta tejaḥ liṅgam eva dīpyate iti

original: kokṣeyajyotiḥsārūpyaṃ ca cakṣuṣyo rūpavān śruto viśruto bhavatītyalpaphalatvaṃ ca svavākye śrūyate /
analyzed: kokṣeya jyotiḥ sārūpyam ca cakṣuṣyaḥ rūpavān śrutaḥ viśrutaḥ bhavati iti alpa phala tvam ca sva vākye śrūyate

original: na jātu jvalanāparanāmā dīptirvinā tejo brahmaṇi saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na jātu jvalana apara nāmā dīptiḥ vinā tejaḥ brahmaṇi saṃbhavati
na ca kaukṣeya jyotiḥ sārūpyam ṛte bāhyāt tojasaḥ brahmaṇi asti
na ca auṣṇya ghoṣa liṅga darśana śravaṇam audaryāt tejasaḥ nyatra brahmaṇi upapadyate
na ca mahā phalam brahma upāsanam aṇīyase phalāya kalpate

original: audarye tu tejasyadhyasya bāhyaṃ teja upāsanametat phalānurūpaṃ yujyate /
analyzed: audarye tu tejasi adhyasya bāhyam tejaḥ upāsanam etat phala anurūpam yujyate
tat etat tejaḥ liṅgam

iha tad nirāsa kāraṇa abhāvāt
na ca maryādāvat tvam tejorāśeḥ na saṃbhavati

original: tasya sauryādeḥ sāvayavatvena tadekadeśamaryādāsaṃbhavāt tasya copāsyatvena vidhānāt,

original: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi' iti vāgvadanasya brahma kāraṇamityāha-śarīradhāraṇamapi yadyapi mukhyaprāṇasyaiva tathāpi prāṇavyāpārasya paramātmāyattatvātparamātmana  #

original: 'ṛtaṃ pibantau ityatra hi jīvaparamātmānau prathamamanagatāviti tadanurodhena guhāpraveśādayaḥ paścādavagatā vyākhyātāḥ,
analyzed: ṛtam pibantau iti atra hi jīva paramātmānau prathamam ana gatau iti tad anurodhena guhā praveśa ādayaḥ paścāt avagatāḥ vyākhyātāḥ

original: tadvidihāpi 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' iti pratyakṣābhidhānātprathamamavagate chāyāpuruṣe tadanurodhenāmṛtatvābhayatvādayaḥ stutyā kathañcidvyākhyeyāḥ
analyzed: tad vid iha api yaḥ eṣa u kṣiṇi puruṣaḥ dṛśyate iti pratyakṣa abhidhānāt prathamam avagate chāyā puruṣe tad anurodhena amṛta tva abhaya tva ādayaḥ stutyā kathañcid vyākhyeyāḥ
tatra ca amṛta tvam katipaya kṣaṇa avasthānāt
abhaya tvam acetana tvāt
puruṣa tvam puruṣa ākāra tvāt
ātma tvam kanīnikā āyatana tvāt
brahma rūpa tva mukta rūpa amṛta tva ādi yogāt
evam vāmanī tva ādayaḥ pi asya stutyā eva kathañcid netavyāḥ

original: kaṃ ca khaṃ cetyādi tu vākyamagnīnāṃ nācāryavākyaṃ niyantumarhi /

original: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatyantarābhiprāyaṃ,

original: evaṃ khalūpākhyāyate-upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacaryamuvāsa /

original: pravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ cetanasya śarīriṇaḥ svaśarīrendriyādau vā śarīreṇa vā vāsyādau dṛṣṭaṃ nāśarīrasya brahmaṇo bhavitumarhati

nahi jātu vaṭa aṅkuraḥ kuṭaja bījāt jāyate
tat anena janma ādyasya yatas veditavyam
tasmāt paramātmanaḥ śarīra indriya ādi raha hitasya antaryāmi tva abhāvāt

original: pradhānasya vā pṛthivyādyabhimānavatyā devatāyā vāṇimādyaiśvaryayogino yogino vā jīvātmano vāntaryāmitā syāt /
analyzed: pradhānasya vā pṛthivī ādi abhimānavatyāḥ devatāyāḥ vā aṇima ādi aiśvarya yoginaḥ yoginaḥ vā jīvātmanaḥ vā antaryāmi tā syāt
tatra yadi api pradhānasya a dṛṣṭa tva a śruta tva a mata tva vijñāta tvāni santi
tathā api tasya acetanasya draṣṭṛ tva śrotṛ tva manṛ tva vijñātṛ tvānām śrutānām abhāvāt

original: anātmatvācca 'eṣa ta ātmā' iti śruteranupapatterna pradhānasyāntaryāmitā /
analyzed: anātma tvāt ca eṣa te ātmā iti śruteḥ anupapatteḥ na pradhānasya antaryāmi tā
yadi api pṛthivī ādi abimāninaḥ devasya ātmatvam asti
adṛṣṭa tva ādayaḥ ca saha dṛṣṭṛ tva ādibhiḥ upapadyante
śarīra indriya ādi yogāt ca
pṛthivī eva yasya āyatanam agniḥ lokaḥ manaḥ jyotiḥ ityādi śruteḥ

original: tathāpi tasya pratiniyataniyamanāt 'yaḥ sarvaṃllokānantaro yamayati yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyantaro yamayati' iti śrutivirodhādanupapatteḥ,
analyzed: tathā api tasya pratiniyata niyamanāt yaḥ sarvan lokān antaraḥ yamayati yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni antaraḥ yamayati iti śruti virodhāt anupapatteḥ

original: yogī tu yadyapi lokabhūtaviśatayā sarvāṃllokānsarvāṇi ca bhūtāni niyantumarhati tatra tatrānekavidhadehendriyādinirmāṇena 'sa ekadhā bhavati  #
analyzed: yogī tu yadi api loka bhūta viśatayā sarvān lokān sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni niyantum arhati tatra tatra anekavidha deha indriya ādi nirmāṇena saḥ ekadhā bhavati
tridhā bhavati ityādi śrutibhyaḥ

original: tathāpi 'jagadvyāpāravarjaṃ prakaraṇāt' iti vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vikāraviṣaye vidyāsiddhānāṃ vyāpārabhāvātso 'pi nāntaryāmī /
analyzed: tathā api jagat vyāpāra varjam prakaraṇāt iti vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vikāra viṣaye vidyāsiddhānām vyāpāra bhāvāt saḥ u pi na antaryāmī

original: tasmātpāriśeṣyājjīva eva cetano dehendriyādimān dṛṣṭṛtvādisaṃpannaḥ svayamadṛśyādiḥ svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /
analyzed: tasmāt pāriśeṣyāt jīvaḥ eva cetanaḥ deha indriya ādimān dṛṣṭṛ tva ādi saṃpannaḥ svayam adṛśya ādiḥ svātmani vṛtti virodhāt
amṛtaḥ ca deha indriya ādi nāśe pi anāśāt
anyathā āmuṣmika phala upabhoga abhāvena kṛta vipraṇāśa akṛta abhyāgama prasaṅgāt

original: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' iti cābhede 'pi kathañcidbhedopacārāt 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni' itivat /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan iti ca abhede pi kathañcid bheda upacārāt sa bhagavaḥ kasmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni itivat

original: 'yamātmā na veda' iti ca svātmani vṛttivirodhābhiprāyam /
analyzed: yam ātmā na veda iti ca sva ātmani vṛtti virodha abhiprāyam

original: 'yasyātmā śarīram' ityādi ca sarvaṃ 'sve mahimni' itivadyojanīyam /
analyzed: yasya ātmā śarīram ityādi ca sarvam sve mahimni itivat yojanīyam

original: yadi punarātmano 'pi niyantūranyo niyantā bhavet veditā vā tatastasyāpyanya ityanavasthā syāt /
analyzed: yadi punar ātmanaḥ niyantuḥ anyaḥ niyantā bhavet veditā vā tatas tasya api anyaḥ iti anavasthā syāt
sarva loka bhūta niyantṛ tvam ca jīvasya adṛṣṭa dvārā

original: tadupārjitau hi dharmājharmau niyacchata ityanayā dvārā jīvo niyacchati /
analyzed: tad upārjitau hi dharma ajharmau niyacchataḥ iti anayā dvārā jīvaḥ niyacchati
ekavacanam ca jāti abhiprāyam

evam prāpte bhidhīyate deha indriya ādi niyame na asya deha indriya antaram

original: ' śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tāvadatrabhavataḥ sarvajñasya sa4vaśakteḥ parameśvarasya jagadyonitvamavagamyate /
analyzed: śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu tāvat atrabhavataḥ sarvajñasya parameśvarasya jagat yoni tvam avagamyate

original: tathāca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tadavidyāśaktipariṇāmastasya śarīrendriyasthāne vartata iti yathāyathaṃ pṛthivyādidevatādikāryakaraṇaistāneva pṛthivyādidevatādīñchaknoti  #
analyzed: tathā ca sarvam vikāra jātam tat avidyā śakti pariṇāmaḥ tasya śarīra indriya sthāne vartate iti yathāyatham pṛthivī ādi devatā ādi kārya karaṇaiḥ tān eva pṛthivī ādi devatā ādīn śaknoti  /
niyantum
na ca anavasthā
nahi niyantṛ antaram tena niyamyate

original: kintu yo jīvo niyantā lokasiddhaḥ sa paramātmaivopādhyavacchedakalpitabhedastathā vyākhyāyata ityasakṛdāveditaṃ,
analyzed: kintu yaḥ jīvaḥ niyantā loka siddhaḥ sa paramātmā eva upādhi avaccheda kalpita bhedaḥ tathā vyākhyāyate iti asakṛt āveditam

original: tathāca 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' ityādyā api śrutaya upapannārthāḥ /

original: 'yaḥ sarvāṃllokān' 'yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni' ityatra ya ityekavacanamupapadyate /
analyzed: yaḥ sarvān lokān yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni iti atra yaḥ iti ekavacanam upapadyate

original: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' ityādau cābhede 'pi bhedopacārakleśo na bhaviṣyati /

original: āpaḥ, yato 'dbhyo 'nnamannācca rayirdhanaṃ tasmādāpo rayiruktāstāsāṃ ca mūtrībhūtānāṃ bastiḥ sthānamiti bastireva rayirityuktam /

vidheyasya vyāpārasya eva yogyatayā guṇaḥ pi parāmṛśyate

dyu bhū ādi āyatanam prakṛtyā avidyā ādi doṣa muktaiḥ upasṛtyam vyapadiśyate bhijyate hṛdaya granthiḥ ityādinā
tena tat dyubhva ādi āyatana viṣayam eva

original: brahmaṇaśca muktopasṛpyatvaṃ 'yadā sarve pramucyante' ityādau śrutyantare prasiddham /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ ca mukta upasṛpya tvam yadā sarve pramucyante ityādau śruti antare prasiddham
tasmāt mukta upasṛpya tvāt

hṛdaya granthiḥ ca avidyā rāga a dveṣa bhaya mohāḥ
mohaḥ ca viṣādaḥ śokaḥ
param hiraṇyagarbha ādi avaram yasya tat brahma tathā uktam
tasmin brahmaṇi yat dṛṣṭam darśanam tasmin tad artham iti yāvat

original: yathā 'carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti' iti carmārthamiti gamyate /

original: na khalu hiraṇyagarbhādiṣu jñāteṣu sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati kintu brahmaṇyeveti //6 // 1.3.1.7.
analyzed: na khalu hiraṇyagarbha ādiṣu jñāteṣu sarvam jñātam bhavati kintu brahmaṇi eva iti
sthiti adanābhyām ca

original: yadi jīvo hiraṇyagarbho vā dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ bhavet,
analyzed: yadi jīvaḥ hiraṇya garbhaḥ vā dyubhvā ādi āyatanam bhavet
tatas tad prakṛtyāḥ anaśran anyaḥ abhicākaśīti iti paramātma abhidhānam ākasmikam prasajyeta
na ca hiraṇyagarbhaḥ udāsīnaḥ
tasya api bhoktṛ tvāt
na ca jīvātmā eva dyubhvā ādi āyatanam
tathā sati saḥ eva atra kathyate
tad kathanāya ca brahmā api kathyate
anyathā siddhānte jīvātma kathanam ākasmikam syāt iti vācyam
yatas na adhigata artha avabodhana svarasena āmnāyena prāṇabhṛt mātra prasiddha jīvātma adhigamāya atyanta anavagatam alaukikam brahma avabodhyate iti subhāṣitam
yadā api paiṅgī upaniṣad kṛtena vyākhyānena iti

original: tatra hi 'anaśrannanyo 'abhicākaśīti' iti jīva upādhirahitena rūpeṇa brahmasvabhāva udāsīno 'bhoktā darśitaḥ /
analyzed: tatra hi an aśran anyaḥ abhicākaśīti iti jīvaḥ upādhi rahitena rūpeṇa brahma svabhāvaḥ udāsīnaḥ bhoktā darśitaḥ
tad artham eva acetanasya buddhi sattvasya apāramārthikam bhoktṛ tvam uktam

original: tathā cetthaṃbhūtaṃ jīvaṃ kathayatānena mantravarṇena dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ brahmaiva kathitaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: tathā ca itthaṃbhūtam jīvam kathayatā anena mantra varṇena dyubhva ādi āyatanam brahma eva kathitam bhavati

prapañca artham iti

bhūmā saṃprasādāt adhyupadeśāt

original: nāradaḥ khalu devarṣiḥ karmavidanātmavittayā śocyamātmānaṃ manyamāno bhagavantamātmajñamājānasiddhaṃ mahāyoginaṃ sanatkumāramupasasāda /

original: tadupaśrutya sanatkumāreṇa 'nāma brahmetyupāstva' ityukte nāradena pṛṣṭaṃ kiṃnāmno 'sti bhūya iti /
analyzed: tat upaśrutya sanatkumāreṇa nāma brahma iti upāstvai iti ukte nāradena pṛṣṭam kiṃnāmnaḥ sti bhūyaḥ iti

original: tatra sanatkumārasya prativacanam-'vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī' iti /
analyzed: tatra sanatkumārasya prativacanam vāc vāva nāmnaḥ bhūyasī iti
tat evam nārada sanatkumārayoḥ bhūyasī
praśna uttare vāc indriyam upakramya manaḥ saṃkalpa citta dhyāna vijñāna bala anna toya vāyu sahita tedaḥ nabhaḥ smāra śā prāṇeṣu paryavasite
kartavya akartavya vivekaḥ saṃkalpaḥ
tasya kāraṇam pūrva apara viṣaya nimitta prayojana nirūpaṇam cittam

original: prāṇasya ca samastakriyākārakaphalabhedena pitrādyātmatvena ca rathāranābhidṛṣṭāntena
analyzed: prāṇasya ca samasta kriyā kāraka phala bhedena pitṛ ādi ātma tvena ca ratha ara nābhi dṛṣṭāntena
sarva pratiṣṭha tvena ca prāṇa bhūyaḥ tva darśinā utivādi tvena ca nāma ādi prapañcāt aśāntāt bhūyaḥ tvam uktvā apṛṣṭa

original: eva nāradena sanatkumāra ekagranthena 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti
analyzed: eva nāradena sanatkumāraḥ ekagranthena eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyena ativadati iti
satya ādīn kṛti paryantān uktvā upadideśa sukham tu eva vijijñāsitavyam iti

original: tadupaśrutya nāradena 'sukhaṃ tveva bhagavo vijijñāse' ityukte sanatkumāraḥ 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukham' ityupakramya bhūmānaṃ vyutpādayāṃbabhūva-'yatra  #
analyzed: tat upaśrutya nāradena sukham tu eva bhagavaḥ vijijñāse iti ukte sanatkumāraḥ yaḥ vai bhūmā tat sukham iti upakramya bhūmānam vyutpādayāṃbabhūva yatra
na anyat paśyati ityādinā
viṣaye vicāraḥ ārabhyate

original: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ prāṇo bhūmā syādāho paramātmeti /

bhāva bhavitroḥ tādātma vivakṣayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam saṃśayasya bījam uktam bhāṣyakṛtā
tatra etasmin grantha saṃdarbhe yat uktāt bhūyasaḥ nyatas
ucyamānam tu tat bhūyas ucyate praśna pūrvakam

original: ' naca prāṇāt kiṃ bhūya iti pṛṣṭam /

original: apica bhūmeti bhāvo na bhavitāramāntareṇa śakyo nirūpayitumiti bhavitāramapekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇasyānantaryeṇa buddhisaṃnidhānāttameva bhavitāraṃ  #
analyzed: apica bhūmā iti bhāvaḥ na bhavitāram āntareṇa śakyaḥ nirūpayitum iti bhavitāram apekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇasya ānantaryeṇa buddhi saṃnidhānāt tam eva bhavitāram
prāpya nirvṛṇoti
yasya ubhayam haviḥ ārtim ārcchet iti atra ārti vārtam haviḥ
yathā āhuḥ mṛṣyāmahe haviṣā viśeṣaṇam iti

original: na cātmanaḥ prakaraṇādātmaiva buddhaistha iti tasyaiva bhūmā syāditi yuktam /
analyzed: na ca ātmanaḥ prakaraṇāt ātmā eva buddhaiḥ sthaḥ iti tasya eva bhūmā syāt iti yuktam
sanatkumārasya nāma brahma iti upāstvaḥ iti
pratīka upadeśa rūpeṇa uttareṇa nārada praśnasya api tad viṣaya tvena paramātma upadeśa prakaraṇasya anutthānāt
a tad viṣaya tve ca uttarasya praṣaśna uttarayoḥ vaiyadhikaraṇyena vipratipatteḥ aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt
tasmāt asati prakaraṇe prāṇasya ānantaryāt tasya eva bhūmā iti yuktam

original: tadetatsaṃśayabījaṃ darśayatā bhāṣyakāreṇa sūcitaṃ pūrvapakṣasādhanamiti na punaruktam /
analyzed: tat etat saṃśaya bījam darśayatā bhāṣyakāreṇa sūcitam pūrvapakṣa sādhanam iti na punar uktam

original: naca bhūyobhūyaḥ praśnātparamātmaiva nāradena jijñāsita iti yuktam /

prāṇa upadeśa anantaram tasya uparamāt

original: tadevaṃ prāṇa eva bhūmeti sthite yadyattadvirodhitayā vacaḥ pratibhāti tattadanuguṇatayā neyam /
analyzed: tat evam prāṇaḥ eva bhūmā iti sthite yat yat tad virodhi tayā vacaḥ pratibhāti tat tad anuguṇa tayā neyam
nītam ca bhāṣyakṛtā
syāt etat

original: 'eṣa tu vā ativadati' iti tuśabdena prāṇadarśino 'tivādino vyavacchidya satyenātilāditvaṃ vadan kathaṃ prāṇasya bhūmānamabhidadhītetyata āha-
analyzed: eṣa tu vai ativadati iti tuśabdena prāṇa darśinaḥ tivādinaḥ vyavacchidya satyena a tilādi tvam vadan katham prāṇasya bhūmānam abhidadhīta iti atas āha
prāṇam eva tu iti
prāṇa darśinaḥ ca ativādi tvam iti
nāma ādya aśāntam atītya vadana śīla tvam iti arthaḥ
etat uktam bhavatinā ayam tuśabdaḥ prāṇa ativādi tvāt vayavacchinatti

original: apitu tadativāditvamaparityajya pratyuta tadanukṛṣya tasyaiva prāṇasya satyasya śravaṇamananaśraddhāniṣṭhakṛtibhirvijñānāya
analyzed: apitu tad ativādi tvam a parityajya pratyuta tat anukṛṣya tasya eva prāṇasya satyasya śravaṇa manana śraddhā niṣṭha kṛtibhiḥ vijñānāya
niścayāya satyena ativadati iti prāṇa vratam eva ativādi tvam ucyate
tuśabdaḥ nāma ādi ativādi tvat vyavacchinatti
na nāma adya aśānta vādi ativādi
apitu satya prāṇa vādi ativādi iti arthaḥ
atra ca āgama ācārya upadeśābhyām satyasya śravaṇam
atha āgama avirodhi nyāya niveśanam mananam

original: matvā ca guruśiṣyasabrahmacāribhiranusūyubhiḥ saha saṃvādya tattvaṃ śraddhatte /

original: śraddhānantaraṃ ca viṣayāntaradarśī niraktastato vyāvṛttastattvajñānābhyāsaṃ karoti,
analyzed: śraddhā anantaram ca viṣaya antara darśī niraktaḥ tatas vyāvṛttaḥ tattva jñāna abhyāsam karoti
sā iyam asya kṛtiḥ prayatnaḥ
atha tattva jñāna abhyāsa niṣṭhā bhavati
yat anantaram eva tattva vijñānam anubhavaḥ prādurbhavati
tat etat bāhyā

original: apyāhuḥ-'bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ yogijñānam' iti bhāvanāprakarṣasya prayanto niṣṭhā tasmājjāyate tattvānubhava iti /

original: tasmātprāṇa eva bhūmeti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' ityuktvā bhūmocyate /
analyzed: tasmāt prāṇaḥ eva bhūmā iti prāpte bhidhīyate eṣa tu vai ativadati yaḥ satyena ativadati iti uktvā bhūmā ucyate

original: tatra satyaśabdaḥ paramārthe nirūḍhavṛttiḥ śrutyā paramārthamāha /
analyzed: tatra satya śabdaḥ paramārthe nirūḍha vṛttiḥ śrutyā paramārtham āha
paramārthaḥ ca paramātmā eva

original: tathāca 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivaditi' iti brahmaṇo 'tivāditaṃ śrutyānyanirapekṣayā
analyzed: tathā ca eṣa tu vai ativadati yaḥ satyena ativaditi iti śrutyā anya nirapekṣayā
liṅga ādibhyaḥ balīyasyā avagamitam katham iva saṃnidhāna mātrāt śruti ādi apekṣāt ati durbalāt katham
cit prāṇa niṣaya tvena śakyam vyākhyātum

original: evaṃ ca prāṇādūrdhvaṃ brahmaṇi bhūtāmavagamyamāno na prāṇaviṣayo bhavitumarhati,
analyzed: evam ca prāṇāt ūrdhvam brahmaṇi bhūtām avagamyamānaḥ na prāṇa viṣayaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: evaṃ cānātmavida ātmānaṃ vividiṣornāradasya praśne paramātmānamevāsmai vyākyāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānsanatkumāraḥ
analyzed: evam ca an ātma vidaḥ ātmānam vividiṣoḥ nāradasya praśne paramātmānam eva asmai vyākyāsyāmi iti abhisaṃdhimān sanatkumāraḥ

original: naca praśnapūrvatāpravāhapatitenottareṇa sarveṇa praśnapūrveṇaiva bhavitavyamiti niyamo 'stītyādisugamena bhāṣyeṇa vyutpaditam /

original: ācāryeṇa hi 'daharo 'sminnantakarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyam' ityupadiṣṭe 'tevāsinākṣiptam-'kiṃ tadatra vidyate  #

original: 'asminkāmāḥ' iti ca 'eṣaḥ' iti caikavacanāntaṃ na dve dyāvāpṛthivyau parāmnaṣṭumarhatīti daharākāśa eva parāmraṣṭavya iti samudāyārthaḥ /

original: tadanena krameṇa 'tasminyadantaḥ' ityatra tacchabdo 'nantaramapyākāśamatilaṅgasya hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ parāmṛśatatyuktaṃ bhavati /

original: uttarebhya ityasya prapañcaḥ etameva daharākāśaṃ prakramya batāho kaṣṭamidaṃ vartate jantūnāṃ tattvāvabodhavikalānāṃ,

yat ebhiḥ svādhīnam api brahma na prāpyate

saṃcaradbhiḥ api pānthaiḥ dhanāyadbhiḥ grāva khṇḍa nivaha vibhrameṇa etāni na upādiyante iti abisaṃdhimatī

original: sādbhutamiva sakhedamiva śrutaḥ pravartate-'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya
analyzed: sa adbhutam iva sa khedam iva śrutaḥ pravartate imāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ ahar ahar gacchanti

original: svāpakāle hi sarva evāyaṃ vidvānavidvāṃśca jīvaloko hṛtpuṇḍarīkāśrayaṃ daharākāśākhyaṃ

original: so 'yaṃ brahmalokaśabdastadgatiśca pratyahaṃ jīvalokasya daharākāśasyaiva brahmarūpalokatāmāhatuḥ /

original: itaśca parameśvara eva daharo yasmāddaharavākyaśeṣa iti /

tathā hi dṛṣṭam iti sūtra avayavam vyācaṣṭe

original: yadyapi suṣuptasya brahmabhāve laukikaṃ na pramāṇāntaramasti,

original: īdṛśī nāmeyaṃ vaidiko prasiddhiryalloke 'pi gīyata iti /

original: yathā śrutyantare yathā ca loke tatheha brahmalokaśabdo 'pīti yojanā /

nanu kamalāsana lokam api iti
pariharati
gamayet yadi brahmaṇaḥ loke iti
atra tāvat niṣāda sthapati nyāyena ṣaṣṭhī samāsāt karmadhārayaḥ balīyān iti sthitam eva

original: tathāpīha ṣaṣṭhisamāsanirākaraṇena karmadhārayasamāsasthāpanāya liṅgamapyadhikamastīti tadapyuktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa /

original: naca daharākāśo brahmaṇo lokaḥ kintu tadbrahmeti brahma ca tallokaśceti karmadhārayaḥ siddho bhavati /

hṛd puṇḍarīka sthaḥ khalu ayam lokyate

original: yatkhalu puṇḍarīkasthamantaḥkaraṇaṃ tasminviśuddhe pratyāhṛtetarakaraṇānāṃ yogināṃ nirmala ivodake candramaso bimbamatisvacchaṃ caitanyaṃ jyotiḥsvarūpaṃ  #

original: tathā caiṣa parāmarśo brahmaṇa eveti na saṃprasādasamutthāne jīvaliṅgam,

original: daharākāśameva prakṛtyopākhyāyate-yamātmānamanviṣya sarvaṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmān,

atha etau prajāpatiḥ uvāca

original: tāvūcatuḥ, ya ātmāpahatapāpmā tamāvāṃ vividiṣāva iti /

prajāpatim ca prapacchatuḥ
atha yaḥ yam bhagavaḥ upsu dṛśyate
yaḥ ca ādarśaḥ

original: yaśca svaṅgādau katama eteṣvasau atavaika eva sarveṣviti /

asmābhiḥ akṣi sthāne ātmā upadiṣṭaḥ
etau ca chāyāpuruṣam pratipannau

original: tadyadi vayaṃ bhrāntau stha iti brūmastataḥ svātmani samāropitapāṇḍityabahumānau vimānitau santau daurmanasyena yathāvadupadeśaṃ na gṛhṇīyātām,

iti anayoḥ āśayam anurudhya yathārtham grāhayiṣyāmaḥ iti abisaṃdhimān pratyuvāca
uda śarave ātmānam avekṣethām asmin yat paśyathaḥ tat brūtam iti
tau ca dṛṣṭvā saṃtuṣṭa hṛdayau na abrūtām
atha prajāpitiḥ etau viparīta grāhiṇau mā bhūtām iti āśayavān papraccha
kim atra apaśyatām iti
tau ha ūcatuḥ
yathā eva amicira brahmacarya caraṇa samupajāta āyata nakha loma ādimantau evam āvayoḥ pratirūpakam nakha loma ādimat uda śarāve paśyāva iti
punar etayoḥ chāyā ātma vibhramam apaninīṣuḥ yathā eva hi chāyā puruṣaḥ upajana apāya dharma abhedena avagamyamānaḥ ātma lakṣaṇa virahāt na ātmā eva evam eva idam śarīram
kintu tatas bhinnam iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām etau jānīyātām iti āśayavān prajāpatiḥ uvāca

original: sādhvalaṅkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvā punarudaśarāve paśyatamākmānaṃ,

original: tau ca sādhvalaṅkṛtau suvasanau chinnanakhalomānau bhūtvā tathaiva cakratuḥ /
analyzed: tau ca sādhu alaṅkṛtau su vasanau chinna nakha lomānau bhūtvā tathā eva cakratuḥ

original: tadupaśrutya prajāpatiraho batādyāpi na praśānta enayorvibhramaḥ,
analyzed: tat upaśrutya prajāpatiḥ aho bata adya api na praśāntaḥ enayoḥ vibhramaḥ

original: kālena kalmaṣe kṣīṇe 'smadvacanasaṃdarbhapaurvāparyalocanayātmatattvaṃ pratipatsyete svayameveti matvovāca,

eṣaḥ ātmā etat amṛtam abhayam etat brahma iti

original: tayorvirocano dehānupātitvācchāyāyā deha evātmatattvamiti matvā nijasadanamāgatya tathaivāsurānupadiśyate /

original: taṃ taṃ doṣaṃ paribhāvayan nāhamatra chāyātmadarśane bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti prajāpatisamīpaṃ
analyzed: tam tam doṣam paribhāvayan na aham atra chāyā ātma darśane bhogyam paśyāmi iti prajāpati samīpam

original: samitpāṇiḥ punarevevāya āgataśca prajāpatināgamanakāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pathi paribāvitaṃ jagad /
analyzed: samidh pāṇiḥ punar eva iva āyaḥ āgataḥ ca prajāpatinā āgamana kāraṇam pṛṣṭaḥ pathi paribāvitam jagat
prajāpatiḥ tu su vyākhyātam api ātma tattvam akṣīṇa kalmaṣa āvaraṇa tayā na agrahīḥ

original: tatpunarapi tatprakṣayāyā carāparāṇi dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ,
analyzed: tat punar api tad prakṣayāya cara aparāṇi dvātriṃśatam varṣāṇi brahmacaryam
atha prakṣīṇa kalmaṣāya te aham etam eva ātmānam bhūyas nuvyākhyāyasyāmi iti avocat

original: sa ca tathā caritatbrahmacaryaḥ surendraḥ prajāpatimupasasāda /
analyzed: sa ca tathā carita brahmacaryaḥ sura indraḥ prajāpatim upasasāda
upapannāya ca asmai prajāpatiḥ vyacaṣṭe

original: ya ātmāpahatapāpmadilakṣaṇo 'kṣaṇa darśitaḥ so 'yaṃ ya eṣa svapne mahiyamāno vanitādibhiranekadhā svapnopabhogān bhuñjāno virahatīti /

asmin api deva indraḥ bhayam dadarśa
yadi api ayam chāyā puruṣa vat na śarīra dharmān anupatati
tathā api śoka bhaya ādi vividha bādhā anubhavāt na tatra api asti svasti prāptiḥ iti uktavati maghavati

original: punaraparāṇi cara dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi svacchaṃ brahmacaryamidānīmapyakṣīṇakalmaṣo
analyzed: punar aparāṇi cara dvātriṃśatam varṣāṇi svaccham brahmacaryam idānīm api akṣīṇa kalmaṣaḥ
sīti ūce prajāpatiḥ
atha asmin evaṅkāram upasanne maghavati prajāpatiḥ uvāca

original: ya eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇo darśito 'kṣiṇi ca svapne ca sa eṣa yo viṣayendriyasaṃyogavirahātprasannaḥ suṣuptāvasthāyāmiti /
analyzed: yaḥ eṣaḥ ātmā apahata pāpma ādi guṇaḥ kṣiṇi ca svapne ca saḥ eṣa yaḥ viṣaya indriya saṃyoga virahāt prasannaḥ suṣupta avasthāyām iti
atra api na indraḥ nirvavāra

original: yathā hi jāgradvā svapnagato vāyamahamasmīti imāni bhūtāmani ceti vijānāti naivaṃ suṣuptaḥ kiñcidapi vedayate,
analyzed: yathā hi jāgrat vā svapna gataḥ vā ayam aham asmi iti imāni bhūta āmani ca iti vijānāti na evam suṣuptaḥ kiñcid api vedayate
tadā khalu ayam acetayamānaḥ bhāvam prāptaḥ iva bhavati
tat iha kā nirvṛtiḥ iti

original: eva muktavati maghavati batādyāpi na te kalmaṣakṣayo 'bhūt /
analyzed: eva muktavati maghavati bata adya api na te kalmaṣa kṣayaḥ bhūt
tat punar aparāṇi cara pañca varṣāṇi brahmacaryam iti avocat prajāpatiḥ
tat evam asya maghonaḥ tribhiḥ paryāyaiḥ vyatīyuḥ ṣaṇṇau ati varṣāṇi

original: caturthe ca paryāye pañca varṣāṇītyekottaraṃ śataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ carataḥ sahasrākṣasya sopedire /
analyzed: caturthe ca paryāye pañca varṣāṇi iti eka uttaram śatam varṣāṇi brahmacaryam carataḥ sahasrākṣasya sā upedire

original: athāsmai brahmacaryasaṃpadunmṛditakalmaṣāya maghavate ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi yaśca svapne suṣupte anusyūta eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇako darśitaḥ,

original: tameva 'maghavan martyaṃ vai śarīram' ityādinā vispaṣṭaṃ vyācaṣṭe prajāpatiḥ /

kim aṅguṣṭha mātra śruti anugrahāya jīva upāsana param etat vākyam astu

original: ātmaśabdo hyayaṃ svabhāvavacano vā jīvavacano vā brahmavacano vā syāt /

tathā ca anekāntaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ
sveda ja udbhid jānām śarīrāṇām a tad bhetu tvāt
icchā mātra nirmāṇa tvam deha ādīnām adṛṣṭa caram iti ced na
bhūta upādāna tvena icchā mātra nirmāṇa tva asiddheḥ

original: bhūtavaśināṃ hi devādīnāṃ nānākāyacikīrṣāvaśādbhūtakriyotpattau bhūtānāṃ parasparasaṃyogena nānākāyamasutpādāt /

yathā viṣa vidyā vidaḥ icchā mātreṇa viṣa śakala preraṇam
na ca viṣa vidyā vidaḥ darśanena adhiṣṭhāna darśanāt vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa bhūta adarśanāt deva ādīnām katham adiṣṭhānam iti vācyam
kāca abhra paṭala pihitasya viprakṛṣṭasya ca bhauma śanaiścara ādeḥ darśanena
asaktāḥ ca dṛṣṭayaḥ deva ādīnām kāca abhra paṭala ādi vat mahī mahīdhara ādibhiḥ na vyavadhīyante

original: na cāsmadādivatteṣāṃ śarīritvena vyavahitāviprakṛṣṭādidarśanāsaṃbhavo 'numīyata iti vācyam,

original: tena saṃnihitānāmapi na kratudeśe darśanaṃ bhaviṣyati /

original: na caikaṃ vākyamubhayaparaṃ bhavatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta /

original: kathamupayujyantāṃ teṣa teṣu karmasvityapekṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭe prakāre saṃbhavati nādṛṣṭakalpanocitā /
analyzed: katham upayujyantām teṣu karmasu iti apekṣāyām dṛṣṭe prakāre saṃbhavati na adṛṣṭa kalpanā ucitā
dṛṣṭaḥ ca prakāraḥ prayoga samaveta artha smāraṇam
smṛtvā ca anutiṣṭhanti khalu anuṣṭhātāraḥ padārthān

original: autsargikī cārthaparatā padānamityapekṣitaprayogasamavetārthasmaraṇatātparyāṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ nānadhigate vigrahādāvapi tātparyaṃ yujyata iti na  #
analyzed: autsargikī ca artha para tā padānam iti apekṣita prayoga samaveta artha smaraṇa tātparyāṇām mantrāṇām na anadhigate vigraha ādau api tātparyam yujyate iti na
tebhyaḥ pi tad siddhiḥ
tasmāt devatā vigrahavat tā ādi bhāva graha pramāṇa abāvāt prāptā ṣaṣṭha pramāṇa gocara tā asya iti prāptam  /
evam prāpte bhidhīyate bhāvam tu bādarāyaṇe sti hi

atra brūmaḥ iti

atra aha pūrvapakṣī
śābdī khalu iyam gatiḥ
yat tātparya adhīna vṛtti tvam nāma
na hi anya paraḥ śabdaḥ nyatra pramāṇam bhavitum arhati

original: nahi śvitrinirṇejanaparaṃ śveto dhāvatīti vākyamitaḥ sārameyagamanaṃ gamayitumarhati /
analyzed: nahi śvitri nirṇejana param śvetaḥ dhāvati iti vākyam itas sārameya gamanam gamayitum arhati
na ca nañvati mahāvākye vā antara vākya arthaḥ vidhi rūpaḥ śakyaḥ vagantum
na ca pratyaya mātrāt saḥ pi arthaḥ sya bhavati
tad pratyayasya bhrānti tvāt
na punar pratyakṣa ādīnām iyam gatiḥ

original: nahyudakāharaṇārthinā ghaṭadarśanāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣurghaṭapaṭau vā paṭaṃ vā kevalaṃ nopalabhate /
analyzed: nahi udaka āharaṇa arthinā ghaṭa darśanāya unmīlitam cakṣuḥ ghaṭa paṭau vā paṭam vā kevalam na upalabhate
tat evam eka deśini pūrvapakṣiṇā dūṣite parama siddhānta vādī āha
atra ucyate viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ iti

original: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-loke viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanāya padāni prayuktāni tadantareṇa na svārthamātrasmāraṇe paryavasyanti /
analyzed: ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ loke viśiṣṭa artha pratyāyanāya padāni prayuktāni tad antareṇa na svārtha mātra smāraṇe paryavasyanti

original: nahi svārthasmāraṇamātrāya loke padānāṃ prayogo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /

original: na caitānyasmāritasvārthāni sākṣādvākyārthaṃ pratyāyayitumīśate iti svārthasmāraṇaṃ vākyārthamitathe 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ kalpitaḥ padānām /
analyzed: na ca etāni a smārita sva arthāni sākṣāt vākya artham pratyāyayitum īśate iti svārtha smāraṇam vākya artham itathe vā antara vyāpāraḥ kalpitaḥ padānām

original: naca yadarthaṃ yattattena vinā paryavasyatīti na svārthamātrabhidhāne paryavasānaṃ padānām /

na ca nañvati vākye vidhāna paryavasānam

iti

original: yatra tu vākyasyaikasya vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhastatra lokānusārato bhūtārthavyutpattau
analyzed: yatra tu vākyasya ekasya vākya antareṇa saṃbandhaḥ tatra loka anusārataḥ bhūta artha vyutpattau

original: yathā 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta' ityatra /

original: iha hi yadi na svādhyāyādhyāyanavidhiḥ svādhyāyaśabdavācyaṃ vedarāśiṃ puruṣārthatāmaneṣyattato bhūtārthamātraparyavasitā nārthavādā vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāgamiṣyam
analyzed: iha hi yadi na svādhyāya adhyāyana vidhiḥ svādhyāya śabda vācyam vedarāśim puruṣa artha tām aneṣyat tatas bhūta artha mātra paryavasitāḥ na arthavādāḥ vidhi uddeśena ekavākya tām āgamiṣyam

original: tasmāt svādhyāyavidhivaśātkaimarthyākāṅkṣāyāṃ vṛttāntadigocarāḥ santastatpratyāyanadvāreṇa vidheyaprāśastyaṃ lakṣayanti,
analyzed: tasmāt svādhyāya vidhi vaśāt kaimarthya ākāṅkṣāyām vṛttānta digocarāḥ santaḥ tad pratyāyana dvāreṇa vidheya prāśastyam lakṣayanti
na punar avivakṣita svārthāḥ eva tad lakṣaṇe prabhavanti

abhidheya avinābhāvasya tad bījasya abhāvāt

original: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārthasaṃbaddhabheva tīraṃ lakṣayati na tu samudratīraṃ,
analyzed: atas eva gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ iti atra gaṅgā śabdaḥ svārtha saṃbaddha bhā iva tīram lakṣayati na tu samudra tīram
tat kasya hetoḥ
svārtha pratyāsattyā abhāvāt
na ca etat sarvam sva artha avivakṣāyām kalpate

original: ata eva yatra pramāṇāntaraviruddhārtā arthavādā dṛśyante,
analyzed: atas eva yatra pramāṇa antara viruddha ārtāḥ artha vādāḥ dṛśyante
yathā ādityaḥ vai yūpaḥ yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ iti evamādayaḥ
tatra yathā pramāṇa antara avirodhaḥ
yathā ca stutya artha tā
tad ubhaya siddhi artham guṇa vādaḥ tu iti ca tad siddhiḥ iti ca asūtrayat jaiminiḥ

original: tasmādyatra sor'thorthavādānāṃ pramāṇāntaraviruddhastatra guṇavādena prāśastyalakṣaṇeti lakṣitalakṣaṇā /
analyzed: tasmāt yatra sa ūrtha ūrtha vādānām pramāṇa antara viruddhaḥ tatra guṇa vādena prāśastya lakṣaṇā iti lakṣita lakṣaṇā

original: yatra tu pramāṇāntarasaṃvādastatra pramāṇāntarādivārthavādādapi sor'thaḥ prasidhyati,
analyzed: yatra tu pramāṇa antara saṃvādaḥ tatra pramāṇa antarāt iva artha vādāt api saḥ ṛthaḥ prasidhyati
dvayoḥ paraspara anapekṣayoḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ iva ekatra arthe pravṛtteḥ

original: pramātā hyavyutpannaḥ prathamaṃ yathā pratyakṣādibhyor'thamavagacchati na tathāmnāyataḥ,
analyzed: pramātā hi avyutpannaḥ prathamam yathā pratyakṣa ādibhyaḥ ṛtham avagacchati na tathā āmnāyataḥ

na tu pramāṇa apekṣayā
dvayoḥ svārthe na apekṣa tvāt iti uktam

vedāntaiḥ iva advaita viṣayaiḥ prati ādayaḥ prapañca gocarāḥ

atrā ucyate loka anusārataḥ dvividhaḥ hi viṣayaḥ śabdānām
dvārataḥ ca tātparyataḥ ca

original: yathaikasminvākye padānāṃ padārthā dvārato vākyārthaśca tātparyato viṣayaḥ evaṃ vākyadvayaikavākyatāyāmapi /
analyzed: yathā ekasmin vākye padānām padārthāḥ dvārataḥ vākya arthaḥ ca tātparyataḥ viṣayaḥ evam vākya dvaya eka vākya tāyām api
yathā iyam devadattīyā gauḥ kretavyā iti ekam vākyam
eṣā bahu kṣīrā iti aparam tat asya bahu kṣīra tva pratipādanam dvāram
tātparyam tu kretavyā iti vākya antara arthe
tatra yad dvārataḥ tat pramāṇa antara virodhe nyathā nīyate

original: yathā viṣaṃ bhakṣayeti vākyaṃ mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti vākyāntarārthaparaṃ sat /
analyzed: yathā viṣam bhakṣaya iti vākyam mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣva iti vākya antara artha param sat

original: yatra tu tātparyaṃ tatra mānāntaravirodhe pauruṣeyapramāṇameva bhavati /
analyzed: yatra tu tātparyam tatra māna antara virodhe pauruṣeya pramāṇam eva bhavati
vedāntāḥ tu paurvāparya paryālocanayā nirasta masta bheda prapañca brahma pratipādana parā
apauruṣeya tayā svatas siddha tāttvika pramāṇa vākyam ādityasya yūpa tva pratipādana param api tu yūpa stuti param
tasmāt pramāṇa antara virodhe dvārībhūtaḥ viṣayaḥ guṇa vādena nīyate
yatra tu pramāṇa antaram virodhakam na asti
yathā devatā avagraha ādau

original: tatra dvārato 'pi viṣayaḥ pratīyamāno na śakyastyaktum /
analyzed: tatra viṣayaḥ pratīyamānaḥ na śakyaḥ tyaktum
na ca guṇa vādena netum
kaḥ hi mukhye saṃbhavati gauṇa mātrayā ud atiprasaṅgāt

original: tathā satyanadhigataṃ vigrahādi pratipādayam vākyaṃ bhidyeteti cet addhā /

bhinnam eva etat vākyam

original: tasmādviśiṣṭapratyayaparebhyo 'pi viśeṣaṇāni pratīyamānāni tasyaiva vākyasya viṣayatvenānicchatāpyabhyupeyāni yathā,
analyzed: tasmāt viśiṣṭa pratyaya parebhyaḥ viśeṣaṇāni pratīyamānāni tasya eva vākyasya viṣaya tvena an icchatā api abhyupeyāni yathā

original: tadyānyaparebhyo 'pyarthavādavākyebhyo devatāvigrahādayaḥ pratīyamānā asati pramāṇāntaravirodhe na yuktāstyaktum /
analyzed: tat yāni aparebhyaḥ pi arthavāda vākyebhyaḥ devatā vigraha ādayaḥ pratīyamānāḥ asati pramāṇa antara virodhe na yuktāḥ tyaktum
nahi mukhya artha saṃbhave guṇa vādaḥ yujyate

syāt etat
tātparya aikye pi yadi vākya bhedaḥ
katham tarhi artha ekatvāt ekam vākyam na

original: sa tu padārthāntaraviśiṣṭaḥ padārtha ekaḥ kkacid dvārabhūtaḥ kkacid dvārītyetāvān viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: sa tu padārtha antara viśiṣṭaḥ padārthaḥ ekaḥ kkacid dvāra bhūtaḥ kkacid dvāri iti etāvān viśeṣaḥ

original: nanvevaṃ sati odanaṃ bhuktvā grāmaṃ gacchatītyatrāpi vākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /

anyaḥ hi saṃsargaḥ odanam bhuktvā iti
anyaḥ tu grāmam gacchati iti na
ekatra pratīteḥ aparyavasānāt

original: bhuktveti hi samānakartṛkatā pūrvakālatā ca pratīyate /
analyzed: bhuktvā iti hi samāna kartṛka tā pūrva kāla tā ca pratīyate

original: tasmādyāvati padābhyāṃ viśiṣṭārthapratyayaparyavasānāt pañcaṣaṭpadavati vākye ekasminnānātvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yāvati padābhyām viśiṣṭa artha pratyaya paryavasānāt pañca ṣaṣ padavati vākye ekasmin nānātva prasaṅgaḥ

original: tasmādvidhivākyādarthavādavākyamanyaditi vākyayoreva svasvavākyārthapratyayāvasitavyāpārayoḥ paścātkutaścidapekṣāyāṃ parasparānvaya iti siddham
analyzed: tasmāt vidhi vākyāt arthavāda vākyam anyat iti vākyayoḥ eva sva sva vākya artha pratyaya avasita vyāpārayoḥ paścāt kutaścid apekṣāyām paraspara anvayaḥ iti siddham
api ca vidhibhiḥ eva indra ādi daivatyāni iti

original: devatāmuddiśya haviravamṛśya ca tadviṣayasvatvatyāga iti yāgaśarīram /

original: naca rūparahitā cetasi śakyata ālekhitumiti yāgavidhinaiva tadrūpāpekṣimā yādṛśamanyaparebhyo 'pi mantrārthavādebhyastadrūpamavagataṃ tadabhyupeyate,
analyzed: na ca rūpa rahitā cetasi śakyate ālekhitum iti yāga vidhinā eva tad rūpa apekṣimā yādṛśam anya parebhyaḥ mantra arthavādebhyaḥ tat rūpam avagatam tat abhyupeyate
rūpa antara kalpanāyām māna abhāvāt
mantra arthavādayoḥ atyanta parokṣa vṛtti prasaṅgāt ca

original: yathā hi 'vrātyo vrātyastomena yajate' iti vrātyasvarūpāpekṣāyāṃ yasya pitā pitāmaho vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti vidhināpekṣitaṃ sadarthavādato  #
analyzed: yathā hi vrātyaḥ vrātyastomena yajate iti vrātya svarūpa apekṣāyām yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ vā somam na pibet sa vrātyaḥ iti vidhinā apekṣitam sat arthavādataḥ
vagamyamānam vidhi pramāṇakam
tathā devatā rūpam api
nanu uddeśaḥ rūpa jñānam apekṣate na rūpa sattām api

original: devatāyāḥ samāropeṇāpi ca rūpajñānamupapadyata iti samāropitameva rūpaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādairucyate /
analyzed: devatāyāḥ samāropeṇa api ca rūpa jñānam upapadyate iti samāropitam eva rūpam devatāyāḥ mantra arthavādaiḥ ucyate
satyam rūpa jñānam apekṣate
tat ca anyatas saṃbhavāt mantra arthavādebhyaḥ eva

original: tasya tu rūpasyāsati bādhake 'nubhāvarūḍhaṃ tathābhāvaṃ parityajyānyathātvamananubhūyamānamasāṃprataṃ kalpiyatum /
analyzed: tasya tu rūpasya asati bādhake tathābhāvam parityajya anyathātvam ananubhūyamānam asāṃpratam
tasmāt vidhi ayapekṣita mantra arthavādaiḥ anya paraiḥ api devatā rūpam buddhau upanidhīyamānam vidhi pramāṇakam eva iti yuktam
syāt etat
vidhi apekṣāyām anya parāt api vākyāt avagataḥ ṛthaḥ svīkriyate
tad apekṣā eva tu na asti
śabda rūpasya devatā bhāvāt
tasya ca māna antara vedya tvāt iti atas āha
na ca śabda mātram iti
na kevalam mantra arthavādataḥ vigraha ādi siddhiḥ

original: api tu itihāsapurāṇalokasmaraṇebhyo mantrārthavādamūlebhyo vā pratyakṣādamūlebhyo vetyāha-
analyzed: api tu itihāsa purāṇa loka smaraṇebhyaḥ mantra arthavāda mūlebhyaḥ vā pratyakṣa āda mūlebhyaḥ vā iti āha
itihāsa iti
śliṣyate yujyate
nigada mātra vyākhyātam anyat

original: tadevaṃ mantrārthavādādisiddhe devatāvigrahādau gurvādipūjāvaddevatāpūjātmako yāmo devatāprasādādidvāreṇa saphalo 'vakalpate /
analyzed: tat evam mantra arthavāda ādi siddhe devatā vigraha ādau guru ādi pūjā vat devatā pūjā ātmakaḥ yāmaḥ devatā prasāda ādi dvāreṇa saphalaḥ
acetanasya tu pūjām apratipadyamān sya tad anupapattiḥ

original: na caivaṃ yajñakarmaṇo devatāṃ prati guṇabhāvāddevatātaḥ phalotpāde yāgabhāvanāyāḥ śrutaṃ phalavattvaṃ yāgasya ca tāṃ prati tatphalāṃśaṃ vā  #
analyzed: na ca evam yajña karmaṇaḥ devatām prati guṇa bhāvāt devatātaḥ phala utpāde yāga bhāvanāyāḥ śrutam phalavat tvam yāgasya ca tām prati tad phala aṃśam vā
prati śrutam karaṇa tvam hātavyam
yāga bhāvanāyāḥ eva hi phalavatyāḥ yāga lakṣaṇa svakaraṇa avāntaravyāpāra tvāt devatā bhojana prasāda ādīnām
kṛṣi karmaṇaḥ iva tad tad avāntara vyāpārasya sasya adhigama sādhana tvam
āgneya ādīnām iva utpatti parama apūrva avāntara vyāpārāṇām bhavat mate svarga sādhana tvam

original: tasmātkarmaṇo 'pūrvāvāntaravyāpārasya vā devatāprasādāvāntaravyāpārasya vā phalavattvāt pradhānatvamubhayasminnapi pakṣe samānaṃ,
analyzed: tasmāt karmaṇaḥ pūrva avāntara vyāpārasya vā devatā prasāda avāntara vyāpārasya vā phalavat tvāt pradhāna tvam ubhayasmin api pakṣe samānam

original: natu devatāyā vigrahādimatyāḥ prādhānyamiti na dharmamīmāṃsāyāḥ sūtram-'api vā śabdapūrvatvādyajñakarma pradhānaṃ guṇatve devatāśrutiḥ' iti  #

tatra iti

hanta

na ca adhyayana abhāvāt tad sādhanāyām anadhikāraḥ brahma vidyāyām iti sāṃpratam
yatas yuktam yat āhavanīye juhoti iti āhavanīyasya homa adhikaraṇa tayā vidhānāt tad rūpasya alaukika tā an ārabhya adhīta vākya vihitāt ādhānāt anyatas
nadhigamāt ādhānasya ca dvijāti saṃbandhi tayā vidhānāt tad sādhyaḥ gniḥ alaukikaḥ na śūdrasya atīti
na āhavanīya ādi sādhye karmaṇi śūdrasya adhikāraḥ iti

original: naca tathā brahmavidyāyāmalaukikamasti sādhanaṃ yacchūdrasya na syāt /

original: nahi 'svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ' iti kañcit kratuṃ prakṛtya paṭhyate,
analyzed: nahi svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti kañcid kratum prakṛtya paṭhyate

na ca an ārabhya adhītam api avyabhāciritakratu saṃbandhi tayā kratum upasthāpayati
yena vākyena eva kratunā saṃbadhyeta adhyayanam

original: nahi yathā juhvādi avyabhicaritakratusaṃbaddhamevaṃ svādhyāya iti /
analyzed: nahi yathā juhū ādi avyabhicarita kratu saṃbaddham evam svādhyāyaḥ iti
tasmāt na eva kratu arthe niyamaḥ
na api puruṣa arthe
puruṣa icchā nibandhanā eva
itikartavya tāsu tu sāmānyatas viśeṣataḥ ca pravṛttiḥ vidhi para adhīnā eva
na hi anadhāgata karaṇa bhedaḥ itikartavya tāsu ghaṭate
tasmāt vidhi adhīna pravṛtti tayā aṅgānām kratu artha tā
kratuḥ iti hi vidhi viṣayeṇa vidhim parāmṛśati viṣayiṇam
tena arthyate viṣayīkriyate iti kratu arthaḥ

original: na cādhyayanaṃ vā svādhyāyo vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā prāgvidheḥ puruṣecchādhīnapravṛttiḥ,
analyzed: na ca adhyayanam vā svādhyāyaḥ vā tad artha jñānam vā prāk vidheḥ puruṣa icchā adhīna pravṛttiḥ
yena puruṣa arthaḥ syāt
yadi ca adhyayanena eva artha avabodha rūpam niyamyeta tatas māna nānā antara virodhaḥ
tad rūpasya vinā api adhyayanam pustaka ādi pāṭhena api adhigamāt
tasmāt suvarṇam bhārmaḥ iti vat adhyayanāt eva phalam kalpanīyam

original: tathā cādhyayanavidheraniyāmakatvācchūdrasyādhyayanena vā pustakādipāṭhena vā sāmarthyamastīti so 'pi brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyeta /
analyzed: tathā ca adhyayana vidheḥ aniyāmaka tvāt śūdrasya adhyayanena vā pustaka ādi pāṭhena vā sāmarthyam asti iti saḥ u pi brahmavidyāyām adhikriyeta
mā bhūt vā adhyayana abhāvāt sarvatra brahma vidyāyām adhikāraḥ
saṃvarga vidyāyām tu bhaviṣyati

original: 'aha hāretvā śūdra' iti śūdraṃ saṃbodhya tasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ /
analyzed: aha śūdraḥ iti śūdram saṃbodhya tasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ
na ca eṣa śūdra śabdaḥ kayācid avayava vyutpattyā a śūdre vartanīyaḥ
avayava prasiddhitaḥ samudāya prasiddheḥ anapekṣa tayā balīyaḥ tvāt

original: tasmādyathānadhīyānasyeṣṭau niṣādasthapateradhikāro vacanasāmarthyādevaṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śūdrasyādhikāro bhaviṣyatīti prāptam /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā an adhīyānasya iṣṭau niṣāda sthapateḥ adhikāraḥ vacana sāmarthyāt evam saṃvarga vidyāyām śūdrasya adhikāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti prāptam
evam prāpte brūmaḥ
na śūdrasya adhikāraḥ veda adhyayana abhāvāt iti
ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ yadi api svādhyāyaḥ dhyetavyaḥ iti adhyayana vidhiḥ na kiñcid phalavat karma ārabhya āmnātaḥ
na api avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandha padārtha gataḥ
nahi juhū ādi vat svādhyāyaḥ vyabhicarita kratu sabandhaḥ
tathā api svādhyāyasya adhyana saṃskāra vidhiḥ adhyayanasya apekṣita upāya tām avagamayan kim piṇḍapitṛyajña vat svargam vā

original: suvarṇaṃ bhāryamitivadārthavādikaṃ vā phalaṃ kalpayitvā viniyogabhaṅgena svādhyāyenādhīyītetyevamarthaḥ kalpatāṃ,
analyzed: suvarṇam bhāryam iti vat ārthavādikam vā phalam kalpayitvā viniyoga bhaṅgena svādhyāyena adhīyīta iti evam arthaḥ kalpatām
kiṃvā parama prayāpī anyatas upekṣitam adhigamya nirvṛṇotu iti viṣaye

original: na dṛṣṭadvāreṇa paramparayāpyanyato 'pekṣitapratilambhe ca yathāśrutiviniyogopapattau ca saṃbhavantyāṃ śrutiviniyogabhaṅgenādhyayanādevāśrutādṛṣṭaphalakalpanocitā
analyzed: na dṛṣṭa dvāreṇa paramparayā api anyatas upekṣita pratilambhe ca yathā śruti viniyoga upapattau ca saṃbhavantyām śruti viniyoga bhaṅgena adhyayanāt eva aśruta adṛṣṭa phala kalpanā ucitā
dṛṣṭaḥ ca svādhyāya adhyayana saṃskāraḥ
tena hi puruṣeṇa sa prāpyate
prāptaḥ ca phalavat karma brahma avabodham abhyudaya niḥśreyasa prayojanam upajanayati

original: natu suvarṇadhāraṇādau dṛṣṭadvāreṇa kiñcit paramparayāpyastyapekṣitaṃ puruṣasya,
analyzed: na tu suvarṇa dhāraṇa ādau dṛṣṭa dvāreṇa kiñcid paramparayā api asti apekṣitam puruṣasya

yadā ca adhyana saṃskṛtena svādhyāyena phalavat karma brahma avabodhaḥ bhāvyamānaḥ byudaya niḥśreyasa prayojana

original: iti sthāpitaṃ tadā yasyādhyayanaṃ tasyaiva karmabrahmāvabodho 'bhyudayaniḥśreyasaprayojano nānyasya,
analyzed: iti sthāpitam tadā yasya adhyayanam tasya eva karma brahma avabodhaḥ bhyudaya niḥśreyasa prayojanaḥ na anyasya

sa ca dvijātīnām eva iti upanayana abhāvena adhyayana saṃskāra abhāvāt pustaka ādi paṭhita svādhyāya janyaḥ ūrtha avabodhaḥ

analyzed: tasmāt tad ādravaṇāt iti tad śabdena śuc vā jānaśrutiḥ vā raikkaḥ vā parāmṛśyate iti uktam
kṣatriya tva gateḥ ca uttaratra caitrarathena liṅgāt

original: itaśca na jātiśūdro jānaśrutiḥ yatkāraṇaṃprakaraṇanirūpeṇa kriyamāṇe kṣatriyatvamasya jānaśruteravagamyate caijñarathena liṅgāditi vyācakṣāṇaḥ  #
analyzed: itas ca na jāti śūdraḥ jānaśrutiḥ yatkāraṇam prakaraṇa nirūpeṇa kriyamāṇe kṣatriya tvam asya jānaśruteḥ avagamyate caijñarathena liṅgāt iti vyācakṣāṇaḥ
prakaraṇam nirūpayati
uttaratra hi saṃvarga vidyā vākya śeṣe

original: caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā niścitakṣātriyatvena samānāyāṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ samabhivyāhārālliṅgātsaṃdigdhakṣatriyabāvo jānaśrutiḥ kṣatriyo niścīyate
analyzed: caitrarathena abhipratāriṇā niścita kṣātriya tvena samānāyām saṃvarga vidyāyām samabhivyāhārāt liṅgāt saṃdigdha kṣatriya bāvaḥ jānaśrutiḥ kṣatriyaḥ niścīyate

original: 'atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyamabhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe' iti prasiddhayājakatvena kāpeyenābhiprayāriṇo  #
analyzed: atha ha śaunakam ca kāpeyam abhipratāriṇam ca kākṣasenim sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe iti prasiddha yājaka tvena kāpeyena abhiprayāriṇaḥ
yogaḥ pratīyate
brahmacāri bhikṣayā ca asya a śūdra tvam avagamyate
nahi jātu brahmacārī śūdrān bhikṣate
yājakena ca kāpeyena yogāt yājyaḥ bhipratārī
kṣatriya tvam ca asya caitrarathi tvāt
tasmāt caitrarathī nāma ekaḥ kṣatra patiḥ ajāyata iti vacanāt
caitrarathi tvam ca asya kāpeyena yājakena yogāt

original: etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayannitichandogānāṃ dvirātre śrūyate /
analyzed: etena vai citraratham kāpeyāḥ ayājayan iti chandogānām dvirātre śrūyate
tena citrarathasya yājakāḥ kāpeyāḥ

original: eṣa cābhipratāri citrarathādanyaḥ sanneva kāpeyānāṃ rājyo bhavati /
analyzed: eṣa ca abhipratāri citrarathāt anyaḥ san eva kāpeyānām rājyaḥ bhavati

original: yadi caitrarathiḥ syāt samānānvayānāṃ hi prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
analyzed: yadi caitrarathiḥ syāt samāna anvayānām hi prāyeṇa samāna anvayāḥ yājakāḥ bhavanti
tasmāt caitrarathi tvāt abhipratārī kākṣaseniḥ kṣatriyaḥ
tad samabhivyāhārāt ca jānaśrutiḥ api kṣatriyaḥ saṃbhāvyate
itas ca kṣatriyaḥ jānaśrutiḥ iti āha
kṣattṛ preṣaṇa ādi aiśvarya yogāt ca

original: kṣattṛpreṣaṇe cārthasaṃbhave ca tādṛśasya vadānyapraṣṭhasyaiśvaryaṃ prāyeṇa kṣatriyasya dṛṣṭaṃ yudhiṣṭhirādivaditi //35 // 1.3.9.36.
analyzed: kṣattṛ preṣaṇe ca artha saṃbhave ca tādṛśasya vadānya praṣṭhasya aiśvaryam prāyeṇa kṣatriyasya dṛṣṭam yudhiṣṭhira ādi vat iti
saṃskāra parāmarśāt tad abhāva abhilāpāt ca

original: na kevalamupanītādhyayanavidhiparāmarśena na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ kintu teṣu teṣu vidyopadeśeṣūpanayanasaṃskāraparāmarśāt śūdrasya tadabhāvābhidhānādbrahmavidyāyāmanadhikāra  #
analyzed: na kevalam upanīta adhyayana vidhi parāmarśena na śūdrasya adhikāraḥ kintu teṣu teṣu vidyā upadeśeṣu upanayana saṃskāra parāmarśāt śūdrasya tad abhāva abhidhānāt brahma vidyāyām anadhikāra
iti
nanu anupanītasya api brahma upadeśaḥ śrūyate itas ha an upanīya eva iti
tathā śūdrasya anupanītasya eva adhikāraḥ bhavīṣyati iti atas āha
tān ha an upanīya eva iti api pradarśitā eva upanayana prāptiḥ
prāpti pūrvaka tvāt pratiṣedhasya yeṣām upanayanam prāptam teṣām eva tat niṣidhyate

original: tacca dvijātīnāmiti dvijātaya eva niṣiddhopanayanā adhikriyante na śūdra iti //36 // 1.3.9.37.
analyzed: tat ca dvijātīnām iti dvijātayaḥ eva niṣiddha upanayanāḥ adhikriyante na śūdraḥ iti
tad abhāva nirdhāraṇe ca pravṛtteḥ

original: satyakāmo ha vai jābālaḥ pramītapitṛkaḥ svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāṃ prapaccha,
analyzed: satyakāmaḥ ha vai jābālaḥ pramīta pitṛkaḥ svām mātaram jabālām prapaccha
aham ācārya kule brahmacaryam cariṣyāmi
tat bravītu bhavatī kiṅgotraḥ ham iti
sā bravīt
tvad janaka paricaraṇa para tayā na aham ajñāsiṣam gotram tava iti
sa cu ācāryam gautamam upasasāda
upasadya uvāca
he bhagavan
brahmacaryam upeyām tvayi iti

original: sa hovāc, nāvijñātagotra upanīyata iti kiṅgotro 'sīti /
analyzed: sa ha uvāca na a vijñāta gotraḥ upanīyate iti kiṅgotraḥ si iti

original: athovāca satyakāmo nāhaṃ veda svaṃ gotraṃ,
analyzed: atha uvāca satyakāmaḥ na aham veda svam gotram
svām mātaram jabālām apṛccham
sā api na veda iti
tat upaśrutya abhyadhāt gautamaḥ
na a dvijanmanaḥ ārjava yuktam īdṛśam vacaḥ

original: tenāsminna śūdratvasaṃbhāvanāstīti tvāṃ dvijātijanmānamupaneṣya ityupanetamanuśāsituṃ ca jābālaṃ gautamaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
analyzed: tena asmin na śūdra tva saṃbhāvanā asti iti tvām dvijāti janmānam upaneṣye iti upanetam anuśāsitum ca jābālam gautamaḥ pravṛttaḥ
tena api śūdrasya na adhikāraḥ iti vijñāyate
na satyāt agāḥ iti
na satyam atikrāntavān asi iti
śravaṇa adhyayana artha pratiṣedhāt samṛteḥ ca
nigada vyākhyānena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyātam
ati rohita artham anyat
kampanāt

original: prāṇavajraśrutihalādvākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca bhaṅktvā vāyuḥ pañcavṛttirādhyātmiko bāhyaścātra pratipādyaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa vajra śruti halāt vākyam prakaraṇam ca bhaṅktvā vāyuḥ pañca vṛttiḥ ādhyātmikaḥ bāhyaḥ ca atra pratipādyaḥ
tathā hi prāṇa śabdaḥ mukhyaḥ vāyava ādhyātmike
vajra śabdaḥ ca aśanau
aśaniḥ ca vāyu pariṇāmaḥ

original: vāyureva hi vāhyo dhūmajyotiḥsalilasaṃvalitaḥ parjanyabhāvena pariṇato vidyutstanayitnuvṛṣṭyaśanibhāvena vivartate /
analyzed: vāyuḥ eva hi vāhyaḥ dhūma jyotiḥ salila saṃvalitaḥ parjanya bhāvena pariṇataḥ vidyut stanayitnu vṛṣṭi aśani bhāvena vivartate

original: yadyapi ca sarvaṃ jagaditi savāyukaṃ pratīyate tathāpi sarvaśabda āpekṣiko 'pi na svābhidheyaṃ jahāti kintu saṃkucadvṛttirbhavati /
analyzed: yadi api ca sarvam jagat iti sa vāyukam pratīyate tathā api sarva śabdaḥ āpekṣikaḥ na sva abhidheyam jahāti kintu saṃkucat vṛttiḥ bhavati
prāṇa vajra śabdau tu brahma viṣaya tve sva artham eva tyajataḥ
tasmāt sva artha tyāgāt varam vṛtti saṃkocaḥ
sva artha leśa avasthānāt

original: amṛtaśabdo 'pi maraṇābhāvavacano na sārvakālikaṃ tadabhāvaṃ brūte,
analyzed: amṛta śabdaḥ pi maraṇa abhāva vacanaḥ na sārvakālikam tad abhāvam brūte
jyotiḥ jīvi tayā api tad upapatteḥ
yathā amṛtāḥ devāḥ iti
tasmāt prāṇa vajra śruti anurodhāt vāyuḥ eva atra vivakṣitaḥ na brahma iti prāptam
evam prāptaḥ ucyate
kampanāt
sa vāyukasya jagataḥ kampanāt
paramātmā eva śabdāt pramitaḥ iti maṇḍūka plutyā anuṣajjate

original: brahmaṇonahi bibhdetajjagatkṛtnnaṃ svavyāpāre niyamena pravartate na tu maryādāmativartate /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ na hi bibhdā etat jagat kṛtnnam sva vyāpāre niyamena pravartate na tu maryādām ativartate
etat uktam bhavati na śruti saṃkoca mātram śruti artha parityāge hetuḥ
api tu pūrva apara vākya eka vākya tā prakaraṇābhyām saṃvalitaḥ śruti saṃkocaḥ
tat idam uktam
pūrva aparayoḥ grantha bhāgayoḥ brahma eva nirdiśyamānam upalabhāmahe
iha eva katham antarāle vāyum nirdiśyamānam pratipadyemahi iti
tat anena vākya eka vākya tā darśitā
prakaraṇāt api iti bhāṣyeṇa prakaraṇam uktam

original: yatkhalu pṛṣṭaṃ tadeva pradhānaṃ prativaktavyamiti tasya prakaraṇam /
analyzed: yat khalu pṛṣṭam tat eva pradhānam prativaktavyam iti tasya prakaraṇam
pṛṣṭāt anyasmin tu ucyamāne śāstram apramāṇam bhavet asaṃbaddha pralāpi tvāt
yat tu vāyu vijñānāt kkacid amṛta tvam abhihitam āpekṣikam tat iti

original: 'apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati' iti śrutyā hyapamṛtyorvijaya ukto natu paramamṛtyuvijaya ityāpe..kitvaṃ (?)
analyzed: apapunarmṛtyum jayati iti śrutyā hi apamṛtyoḥ vijayaḥ uktaḥ na tu parama mṛtyu vijayaḥ iti āpeki tvam
tat ca tatra eva prakaraṇa antara karaṇena hetunā

original: na kevalamapaśrutyā tadāpekṣikamapi tu paramātmānamabhidhāya 'ato 'nyadārtam' iti vāṭvāderārtatvābhidhānāt /
analyzed: na kevalam apaśrutyā tad āpekṣikam api tu paramātmānam abhidhāya atas iti vāṭu ādeḥ ārta tva abhidhānāt
na hi ārta abyāsāt an ārtaḥ bhavati iti bhāvaḥ
jyotiḥ darśanāt
atra hi jyotiḥ śabdasya tejasi mukhya tvāt
brahmaṇi jaghanya tvāt
prakaraṇāt ca śruteḥ balīyaḥ tvāt
pūrva vat śuti saṃkocasya ca atra abhāvāt
pratyuta brahmajyotiḥ pakṣe ktvā śruteḥ pūrva kāla arthāyāḥ pīḍanā prasaṅgāt
samutthāna śruteḥ ca tejaḥ eva jyotiḥ
tathā ahi samuttha nāma udgamanam ucyate
na tu viveka vijñānam
udgamanam ca tejaḥ pakṣe rciḥ ādi mārgeṇa upapadyate

original: ādityaścārcirādyapekṣayā paraṃ jyotirbhavatīti tadupasaṃpadya tasya samīpe bhūtvā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate,
analyzed: ādityaḥ ca arciḥ ādi apekṣayā param jyotiḥ bhavati iti tat upasaṃpadya tasya samīpe bhūtvā svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate
kārya brahma loka prāptau krameṇa mucyate

original: brahmajyotiḥpakṣe tu brahma bhūtvā kā parā svarūpaniṣpattiḥ /
analyzed: brahmajyotiḥ pakṣe tu brahma bhūtvā kā parā sva rūpa niṣpattiḥ
na ca deha ādi vivikta brahma svarūpa sākṣātkāraḥ vṛtti rūpaḥ

original: sā hi brahmabhūyātprācīnā na tu parācīnā /
analyzed: sā hi brahma bhūyāt prācīnā na tu parācīnā
sā iyam upasaṃpadya iti ktvā śruteḥ pīḍā

original: tasmāttisṛbhiḥ śrutibhiḥ prakaraṇabādhanātteja evātra jyotiriti prāptam /
analyzed: tasmāt tisṛbhiḥ śrutibhiḥ prakaraṇa bādhanāt tejaḥ eva atra jyotiḥ iti prāptam
evam prāpte bhidhīyate
param eva brahma jyotiḥ śabdam
kasmāt
darśanāt

yat khalu pratijñāyate
yat ca madhye parāmṛśyate
yat ca upasaṃhriyate
saḥ eva pradhānam prakaraṇa arthaḥ
