original: natu śrutyanurodhamātreṇa prakaraṇādapakraṣṭavyā iti hi lokasthitiḥ /
analyzed: na tu śruti anurodha mātreṇa prakaraṇāt apakraṣṭavyāḥ iti hi loka sthitiḥ

original: anyathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisādhānopasaṃhāre ca tadantaḥ pātino 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo vidhiśrutyanurodhena  #
analyzed: anyathā upāṃśuyāja vākye jāmitā doṣa upakrame tad pratisādhāna upasaṃhāre ca tad antar pātinaḥ viṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ ityādayaḥ vidhi śruti anurodhena
pṛthak vidhayaḥ prasajyeran

original: tatkimidānīṃ 'tisra eva sāhnasyopasadaḥ kāryā dvādaśāhīnasya' iti prakaraṇānurodhātsāmudāyaprasiddhibalalabdhamahargāṇābhidhānaṃ
analyzed: tat kim idānīm tisraḥ eva sāhnasya upasadaḥ kāryāḥ dvādaśa ahīnasya iti prakaraṇa anurodhāt sāmudāya prasiddhi bala labdham ahargāṇa abhidhānam
parityajya ahīna śabdaḥ sa annam jyotiṣṭomam abhidhāya tatra eva
dvādaśa upasattām vidhattām

original: sa hi kṛtsnavidhānānna kutaścidapi hīyate kratorityahīnaḥ śakyo vaktum /
analyzed: sa hi kṛtsna vidhānāt na kutaścid api hīyate kratoḥ iti ahīnaḥ śakyaḥ vaktum
mā evam

original: avayavaprasiddheḥ samudāyaprasiddhirbalīyasīti śrutyā prakaraṇabādhanānna dvādaśopakratomahīnaguṇayukte jyotiṣṭome śaknoti vidhātum /
analyzed: avayava prasiddheḥ samudāya prasiddhiḥ balīyasī iti śrutyā prakaraṇa bādhanāt na dvādaśa upakrato mahīna guṇa yukte jyotiṣṭome śaknoti vidhātum
na api atas pakṛṣṭam sat ahargaṇasya vidhatte
para prakaraṇe
asaṃbaddha pada vyavāya vicchinnasya prakaraṇasya punar anusaṃdhāna kleśāt

original: tenānapakṛṣṭenaiva dvādaśāhīnasyetivākyena sāhnasya tisra usapadaḥ kāryā iti vidhiṃ
analyzed: tena anapakṛṣṭena eva dvādaśa ahīnasya iti vākyena sāhnasya tisraḥ usapadaḥ kāryāḥ iti vidhim

original: stotuṃ dvādaśāhavihitā dvādaśopasattā tatprakṛtitvena ca sarvāhīneṣu prāptā nivītādivadanūdyate /
analyzed: stotum dvādaśa aha vihitā dvādaśa upasattā tad prakṛti tvena ca sarva ahīneṣu prāptā nivīta ādi vat anūdyate

original: tasmādahīnaśrutyā prakaraṇabādhe 'pi na dvādaśāhīnasyeti vākyasya prakaraṇādapakarṣa /
analyzed: tasmāt ahīna śrutyā prakaraṇa bādhe na dvādaśa ahīnasya iti vākyasya prakaraṇāt apakarṣa
jyotiṣṭoma prakaraṇa āmnātasya pūṣa ādi anumantraṇa mantrasya yat liṅga balāt prakaraṇa bādhena apakarṣaḥ tat agatyā
pauṣṇa ādau ca ta karmaṇi tasya arthavat tvāt

original: iha tvapakṛṣṭasyārcirādimārgopadeśe phalasyopāyamārgapratipādake 'tiviśade 'eṣa saṃprasādaḥ' iti vākyasyāviśadaikadeśamātrapratipādakasya niṣprayojanatvāt
analyzed: iha tu apakṛṣṭasya arciḥ ādi mārga upadeśe phalasya upāya mārga pratipādake ti viśade eṣa saṃprasādaḥ iti vākyasya a viśada eka deśa mātra pratipādakasya niṣprayojana tvāt

original: naca dvadaśāhīnasyetivadyathoktātmadhyānasādhanānuṣṭhānaṃ stotumeṣa saṃprasāda iti vacamarcirādimārgamanuvadatīti yuktam,
analyzed: na ca dvadaśa ahīnasya iti vat yathā ukta ātma dhyāna sādhana anuṣṭhānam stotum eṣa saṃprasādaḥ iti vacam arciḥ ādi mārgam anuvadati iti yuktam
stuti lakṣaṇāyām sva abhidheya saṃsarga tātparya parityāga prasaṅgāt dvādaśa ahīnasya iti tu
vākye sva artha saṃsarga tātparye prakaraṇa vicchedasya ca aprayojana tvam iti
stuti arthau lakṣyate
na ca etad doṣa bhayāt samudāya prasiddhim ullaṅghaya avayava prasiddhim upāśritya sāhnasya eva dvādaśa upasattām vidhātum arhati
tritva dvādaśatvayoḥ vikalpa prasaṅgāt
na ca satyām gatau vikalpaḥ nyāṭyaḥ
sāhna ahīna padayoḥ ca prakṛta jyotiṣṭoma abhidhāyinoḥ ānarthakya prasaṅgāt
prakaraṇāt eva tad avagateḥ

original: iha tu svārthasaṃsargatātparye noktadoṣaprasaṅga iti paurvāparyālocanayā prakaraṇānurodhādrūḍhimapi pūrvakālatāmapi parityajya prakaraṇānuguṇyena  #
analyzed: iha tu svārtha saṃsarga tātparye na ukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti paurvāparya ālocanayā prakaraṇa anurodhāt rūḍhim api pūrva kāla tām api parityajya prakaraṇa ānuguṇyena
jyotiḥ param brahma pratīyate
yat tu uktam mumukṣoḥ āditya prāptiḥ abhihitā iti
na asau ātyantikaḥ mokṣaḥ
kintu kārya brahma loka prāptiḥ

original: naca kramamuktyabhiprāyaṃ svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vacanam /
analyzed: na ca krama mukti abhiprāyam svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate iti vacanam
na hi etad prakaraṇa ukta brahma tattva viduṣaḥ gati utkrāntī staḥ

original: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasmāt prāṇā utkrāmanti atraiva samavanīyante' iti /
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ na tasmāt prāṇāḥ utkrāmanti atra eva samavanīyante iti
na ca tad dvāreṇa krama muktiḥ

original: arcirādimārgasya hi kāryabrahmalokaprāpakatvaṃ na tu brahmabhūyahetubhāvaḥ /
analyzed: arciḥ ādi mārgasya hi kārya brahmaloka prāpaka tvam na tu brahmabhūya hetu bhāvaḥ
jīvasya tu nirūpādhi nitya śuddha buddha brahma bhāva sākṣātkāra hetuke mokṣe kṛtam arciḥ ādi mārgeṇa kārya brahma loka prāptyā
atra api brahma vidaḥ tad upapatteḥ

original: tasmānna jyotirādityamupasaṃpadya saṃprasādasya jīvasya svena rūpeṇa pāramārthikena brahmaṇābhiniṣpattirāñjasīti śruteratrāpi kleśaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na jyotiḥ ādityam upasaṃpadya saṃprasādasya jīvasya svena rūpeṇa pāramārthikena brahmaṇā abhiniṣpattiḥ āñjasī iti śruteḥ atra api kleśaḥ

original: apica paraṃ jyotiḥ sa uttamapuruṣa itihaivopariṣṭādviśeṣaṇāttejaso vyāvartya puruṣaviṣayatvenāvasthāpanājjyotiḥpadasya,
analyzed: api ca param jyotiḥ saḥ uttamapuruṣaḥ iti ha eva upariṣṭāt viśeṣaṇāt tejasaḥ vyāvartya puruṣa viṣaya tvena avasthāpanāt jyotiḥ padasya

original: parameva brahma jyotiḥ na tu teja iti siddham //40 // 1.3.12.41.
analyzed: param eva brahma jyotiḥ na tu tejaḥ iti siddham  /
ākāśa ūrdhva antara tva ādi vyapadeśāt
yadi api ākāśaḥ tad liṅgāt iti atra brahma liṅga darśanāt ākāśaḥ paramātmā iti vyutpāditam
tathā api tadvat atra paramātma liṅga darśana abhāvāt nāma rūpa nirmahaṇasya bhūtākāśe pi avakāśa dānena upapatteḥ akasmāt na rūḍhi parityāgasya ayogāt

original: nāmarūpe antarā brahmeti ca nākāśasya nāmarūpayornirvahiturantarālatvamāha,
analyzed: nāma rūpe antarā brahma iti ca na ākāśasya nāma rūpayoḥ nirvahituḥ antarāla tvam āha
api tu brahmaṇaḥ
tena bhūtākāśaḥ nāma rūpayoḥ nirvahitā
brahma ca etayoḥ antarālam madhyam sāram iti yāvat
na tu nirvoḍā eva brahma
antarālam vā nirvāḍhṛ
tasmāt prasiddheḥ bhūtākāśaḥ na tu brahma iti prāptam
evam prāptaḥ ucyate param eva ākāśam brahma
kasmāt artha antara tva ādi vyapadeśāt
nāma rūpa mātra nirvāhakam iha ākāśam ucyate

original: bhūtākāśaṃ ca vikāratvena nāmarūpāntaḥpāti sat kathamātmānamudvahet /
analyzed: bhūtākāśam ca vikāra tvena nāma rūpa antaḥpāti sat katham ātmānam udvahet

original: nahi suśikṣito 'pi vijñānī svena skandhenātmānaṃ voḍhumutsahate /
analyzed: nahi su śikṣitaḥ pi vijñānī svena skandhena ātmānam voḍhum utsahate

original: naca nāmarūpaśrutiraviśeṣataḥ pravṛttā bhūtākāśavarjaṃ nāmarūpāntare saṃkocayituṃ sati saṃbhave yujyate /
analyzed: na ca nāma rūpa śrutiḥ aviśeṣataḥ pravṛttā bhūtākāśa varjam nāma rūpa antare saṃkocayitum sati saṃbhave yujyate

original: naca nirvāhakatvaṃ niraṅkuśamavagataṃ brahmaliṅgaṃ kathañcitkleśena paratantre netumucitam
analyzed: na ca nirvāhaka tvam niraṅkuśam avagatam brahma liṅgam kathañcid kleśena paratantre netum ucitam

original: 'anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi' iti ca sraṣṭṛtvamatisphuṭaṃ brahmaliṅgamatra pratīyate /
analyzed: anena jīvena ātmanā anupraviśya nāma rūpe vyākaravāṇi iti ca sraṣṭṛ tvam ati sphuṭam brahma liṅgam atra pratīyate

original: brahmarūpatayā ca jīvasya vyākartṛtve brahmaṇa eva vyākartṛtvamuktam /
analyzed: brahma rūpatayā ca jīvasya vyākartṛ tve brahmaṇaḥ eva vyākartṛ tvam uktam
evam ca nirvahituḥ eva nā atarāla tā upapatteḥ anyaḥ nirvahitā anyat ca antarālam iti artha bheda kalpanā api na yuktā

original: tathā ca te nāmarūpe yadantaretyayamarthāntaravyapadeśa upapanno bhavatyākāśasya /
analyzed: tathā ca te nāma rūpe yat antarā iti ayam artha antara vyapadeśaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati ākāśasya
tasmāt artha antara vyapadeśāt
tathā tat brahma tat amṛtam iti vyapadeśāt brahma eva ākāśam iti siddham  /
suṣupti utkrāntyoḥ bhedena
ādi madhya avasāneṣu saṃsāri pratipādanāt
tad pare grantha saṃdarbhe sarvam tatra eva yojyate
saṃsārī eva tāvat ātma ahaṅkāra āspada prāṇa ādi parītaḥ sarva jana siddhaḥ

original: tameva ca 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' ityādiśrutisaṃdarbha ādimadhyāvasāneṣvāmṛśatīti tadanuvādaparo bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: tam eva ca yaḥ yam vijñāna mayaḥ prāṇeṣu ityādi śruti saṃdarbhaḥ ādi madhya avasāneṣu āmṛśati iti tad anuvāda paraḥ bhavitum arhati
evam ca saṃsārī ātmā eva kiñcid apekṣya mahān
saṃsārasya ca anādi tvena anādi tvāt ajaḥ ucyate

original: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kaścidatra nityaśuddhabuddhamuktatvabhāvaḥ pratipādyaḥ /
analyzed: na tu tad atiriktaḥ kaścid atra nitya śuddha buddha mukta tva bhāvaḥ pratipādyaḥ

original: yattu suṣuptyutkrāntyoḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta iti bhedaṃ manyase,
analyzed: yat tu suṣupti utkrāntyoḥ prājñena ātmanā saṃpariṣvaktaḥ iti bhedam manyase
na asau bhedaḥ kintu ayam ātma śabdaḥ svabhāva vacanaḥ

original: tena suṣuptyutkrāntyavasthāyāṃ viśeṣaviṣayābhāvātsaṃpiṇḍitaprajñeva prājñenātmanā svabhāvenā pariṣvakto na kiñcidvedetyabhede 'pi bhedavadupacāreṇa  #
analyzed: tena suṣupti utkrānti avasthāyām viśeṣa viṣaya abhāvāt saṃpiṇḍita prajñā iva prājñena ātmanā svabhāvena ā pariṣvaktaḥ na kiñcid veda iti abhede pi bheda vat upacāreṇa
yojanīyam
yathā āhuḥ prājñaḥ saṃpiṇḍita prajñaḥ iti

original: patyādayaśca śabdāḥ saṃsāriṇyeva kāryakaraṇasaṃghātātmakasya jagato jīvakarmārjitatayā tadbhogyatayā ca yojanīyāḥ /
analyzed: pati ādayaḥ ca śabdāḥ saṃsāriṇī eva kārya karaṇa saṃghāta ātmakasya jagataḥ jīva karma arjita tayā tad bhogya tayā ca yojanīyāḥ

original: tasmātsaṃsāryevānūdyate na tu paramātmā pratipadyata iti prāptam /
analyzed: tasmāt saṃsārī eva anūdyate na tu paramātmā pratipadyate iti prāptam
evam prāpte bhidhīyate suṣupti utkrāntyoḥ bhedena vyapadeśāt iti anuvartate
ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ kim saṃsāriṇaḥ nyaḥ paramātmā na asti
tasmāt saṃsāri ātma param yaḥ yam vijñāna mayaḥ prāṇeṣu iti vākyam
āhosvit iha saṃsāri vyatirekeṇa paramātmanaḥ saṃkīrtanāt saṃsāriṇaḥ ca ādi madhya avasāneṣu avamarśanāt saṃsāri ātma param
na tāvat saṃsāri atiriktasya tasya abhāvaḥ

original: tatpratipādakā hi śataśa āgamāḥ 'īkṣaternāśabdam' 'gatisāmānyāt' ityādibiḥ sūtrasaṃdarbhairupapāditāḥ /
analyzed: tad pratipādakāḥ hi śataśas āgamāḥ īkṣateḥ na aśabdam gati sāmānyāt ityādibiḥ sūtra saṃdarbhaiḥ upapāditāḥ
na ca atra api saṃsāri atirikta paramātma saṃkīrtana abhāvaḥ
suṣupti utkrāntyeḥ tad saṃkīrtanāt

original: naca prājñasya paramātmano jīvādbhedena saṃkīrtanaṃ sati saṃbhave rāhoḥ śira itivadaupacārikaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na ca prājñasya paramātmanaḥ jīvāt bhedena saṃkīrtanam sati saṃbhave rāhoḥ śiraḥ iti vat aupacārikam yuktam

original: naca prājñaśabdaḥ prajñāprakarṣaśālini nirūḍhavṛttiḥ kathañcidajñaviṣayo vyākhyātumucitaḥ /
analyzed: na ca prājña śabdaḥ prajñā prakarṣa śālini nirūḍha vṛttiḥ kathañcid ajña viṣayaḥ vyākhyātum ucitaḥ
na ca prajñā prakarṣaḥ saṃkucat vṛttiḥ vidita samasta veditavyāt sarva vidaḥ nyatra saṃbhavati
na ca itthaṃbhūtaḥ jīvātmā

original: tasmātsuṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena jīvātprājñasya paramātmano vyapadeśāt 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ' ityādinā jīvātmānaṃ lokasiddhamanūdya tasya paramātmabhāvo  #
analyzed: tasmāt suṣupti utkrāntyoḥ bhedena jīvāt prājñasya paramātmanaḥ vyapadeśāt yaḥ yam vijñāna mayaḥ ityādinā jīvātmānam loka siddham anūdya tasya paramātma bhāvaḥ
na anadhigataḥ pratipādyate
na ca jīvātma anuvāda mātra parāṇi etāni vacāṃsi
anadhigata artha avabodhana param hi śābdam pramāṇam
na tu anuvāda mātra niṣṭham bhavitum arhati
atas eva ca saṃsāriṇaḥ paramātma bhāva vidhānāya ādi madhya avasāneṣu anupādya tayā avamarśaḥ upapadyate

original: evaṃ ca mahattvaṃ cājatvaṃ ca sarvagatasya nityasyātmanaḥ saṃbhavānnāpekṣikaṃ kalpayiṣyate /
analyzed: evam ca mahā tvam ca aja tvam ca sarva gatasya nityasya ātmanaḥ saṃbhavāt na āpekṣikam kalpayiṣyate
yaḥ tu madhye buddhānta ādi avasthā upanyāsāt iti
na anena avasthāvat tvam vivakṣyate
api tu avasthānām upajana apāya dharmaka tvena tad atiriktam avasthā rahitam paramātmānam vivakṣati
uparitana vākya saṃdarbha ālocanāt iti
pati ādi śabdebyaḥ
sarvasya vaśī
vaśaḥ sāmarthyam sarvasya jagataḥ prabhavati ayam
vyūha avasthāna samarthaḥ iti
atas eva sarvasya īśānaḥ
sāmarthyena hi ayam uktena sarvasya īṣṭe
tad icchā anuvidhānāt jagataḥ
atas eva sarvasya adhipatiḥ sarvasya niyantā
antaryāmī iti yāvat

original: kiñca sa evaṃbhūto hyadyantarjyotiḥ puruṣo vijñānamayo na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānutkṛṣṭo bhavatītyevamādyāḥ śrutayo 'saṃsāriṇaṃ paramātmānameva  #
analyzed: kiñca saḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ hi adi antar jyotiḥ puruṣaḥ vijñāna mayaḥ na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyān utkṛṣṭaḥ bhavati iti evamādyāḥ śrutayaḥ saṃsāriṇam paramātmānam eva
pratipādayanti

original: tasmājjīvātmānaṃ mānāntarasiddhamanūdya tasya brahmabhāvapratipādanaparo 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ' ityādivākyasaṃdarbha iti siddham //43 //
analyzed: tasmāt jīvātmānam māna antara siddham anūdya tasya brahma bhāva pratipādana paraḥ yaḥ yam vijñāna mayaḥ ityādi vākya saṃdarbhaḥ iti siddham  /
iti śrīmat vācaspatimiśra viracita śārīraka bhagavat pāda bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām prathamasya adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
iti prathama adhyāyasya jñeya brahma pratipādaka aspaṣṭa śruti samanvaya ākhyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ
prathama adhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ
ānumānikam api ekeṣām iti ced na śārīra rūpaka vinyasta gṛhīteḥ darśayati ca
syāt etat

original: brahmajījñāsāṃ pratijñāya brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamuktam-'janmādyasya yataḥ' iti /
analyzed: brahma jījñāsām pratijñāya brahmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇam uktam janma ādyasya yatas iti
tat ca idam lakṣaṇam na pradhāna ādau gatam
yena vyabhicārāt alakṣaṇam syāt
kintu brahmaṇi eva iti īkṣateḥ na aśabdam iti pratipāditam

original: gatisāmānyaṃ ca vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmakaraṇavādaṃ prati vidyate,
analyzed: gati sāmānyam ca vedānta vākyānām brahmakaraṇa vādam prati vidyate
na pradhāna kāraṇa vādam prati iti prapañcitam adhas tatena sūtra saṃdarbheṇa
tat kim avaśiṣyate tad artham uttaraḥ saṃdarbhaḥ ārabhyate

original: naca 'mahataḥ paramavyaktam' ityādīnāṃ pradhāne samanvaye 'pi vyabhāciraḥ /
analyzed: na ca mahataḥ param avyaktam ityādīnām pradhāne samanvaye
na hi ete pradhāna kāraṇa tvam jagataḥ āhuḥ
apitu pradhāna sadbhāva mātram

original: naca tatsadbhāvamātreṇa 'janmādyasya yataḥ' iti brahmalakṣaṇasya kiñciddhīyate /
analyzed: na ca tad sadbhāva mātreṇa janma ādyasya yatas iti brahma lakṣaṇasya kiñcid hīyate
tasmāt anarthakaḥ uttaraḥ saṃdarbhaḥ iti atas āha
brahma jijñāsām pratijñāya iti
na pradhāna sadbhāva mātram pratipādayanti mahataḥ param avyaktam ajām ekām ityādayaḥ
kintu jagat kāraṇam pradhānam iti
mahataḥ param iti atra hi para śabdaḥ viprakṛṣṭa pūrva kāla tvam āha
tathā ca kāraṇa tvam
ajām ekām ityādīnām tu kāraṇa tva abhidhānam ati sphuṭam

original: evaṃ ca lakṣaṇavyabhicārādavyabhicārāya yukta uttarasaṃdarbhārambha iti /
analyzed: evam ca lakṣaṇa vyabhicārāt avyabhicārāya yuktaḥ uttara saṃdarbha ārambhaḥ iti
pūrvapakṣayati
tatra yaḥ eva iti
sāṃkhya pravāda rūḍhim āha
tatra avyaktam iti
sāṃkhya smṛti prasiddheḥ na kevalam rūḍhiḥ
avayava prasiddhyā api ayam eva arthaḥ vagamyate iti āha
na vyaktam iti
śānya ghora mūḍha śabda ādi hīna tvāt ca iti
śrutiḥ uktā
smṛtiḥ ca sāṃkhīyā
nyāyaḥ ca bhedānām parimāṇāt samanvayāt śaktitaḥ pravṛtteḥ ca
kāraṇa kārya vibhāgāt avibhāgāt vaiśvarūpyasya
kāraṇam asti avyaktam iti
na ca mahataḥ param avyaktam iti prakaraṇa pariśeṣābhyām avyakta padam śarīra gocaram
śarīrasya śānta ghora mūḍhapa śabda ādi ātmaka tvena avyakta tva anupapatteḥ
tasmāt pradhānam eva avyaktam ucyate iti prāpte ucyate
na etat evam
na hi etat kāṭhakam vākyam iti
laukikī hi prasiddhī rūḍhiḥ veda artha nirṇaye nimittam
tad upāya tvāt

original: yathāhuḥ-'ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāsta eva caiṣāmarthāḥ' iti /
analyzed: yathā āhuḥ ye eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ te eva vaidikāḥ te eva ca eṣām arthāḥ iti
na tu parīkṣakāṇām pāribhāṣikī
pauruṣeyī hi sā na veda artha nirṇaya nibandhana siddhauya nimittam
ṣadha ādi prasiddhi vat
tasmāt rūḍhitaḥ tāvat na pradhānam pratīyate
yogaḥ tu anyatra api tulyaḥ
tat evam avyakta śrutau anyathā asiddhāyām prakaraṇa pariśeṣābhyām śarīra gocaraḥ yam avyakta śabdaḥ
yathā ca asya tad gocara tvam upapadyate tathā agre darśayiṣyati
teṣu śarīra ādiṣu madhye viṣayān tad ge carān viddhi
yathā aśvaḥ dhvānam ālambya calati evam indriya hayāḥ sva gocaram ālambya iti
ātmā bhoktā iti āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
katham indriya manaḥ yuktam yogaḥ yathā bhavati
indriya artha manaḥ saṃnikarṣeṇa hi ātmā gandha ādīnām bhoktā

original: pradhāsyākāṅkṣāvato vacanaṃ prakaraṇamiti gantavyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ pradhānamiti tadākāṅkṣāmavatārayati-
analyzed: pradhā asya ākāṅkṣāvataḥ vacanam prakaraṇam iti gantavyam viṣṇoḥ paramam padam pradhānam iti tad ākāṅkṣām avatārayati
taiḥ ca indriya ādibhiḥ asaṃyataiḥ iti
para śabdaḥ śreṣṭha vacanaḥ

original: nanvāntaratvena yadi śreṣṭhatvaṃ tadendriyāṇāmeva bāhyebhyo gandhāhibhyaḥ śreṣṭhatvaṃ syādityata āha-
analyzed: nanu āntara tvena yadi śreṣṭha tvam tadā indriyāṇām eva bāhyebhyaḥ gandha ahibhyaḥ śreṣṭha tvam syāt iti atas āha
arthāḥ ye śabda ādayaḥ iti
na antara tvena śreṣṭha tvam api tu pradhāna tayā
tat ca vivakṣā adhīnam

original: grahebhyaścendriyebhyo 'tigrahayārthānāṃ pradhānyaṃ śrutyā vivakṣitamitīndriyebhyor'thānāṃ prādhānyātparatvaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: grahebhyaḥ ca indriyebhyaḥ tigrahayā arthānām pradhānyam śrutyāḥ vivakṣitam iti indriyebhyaḥ ṛthānām prādhānyāt paratvam bhavati

original: ghrāṇajihvāvākcakṣuḥ śrotramanohastatvaco hi indriyāṇi śrutyāṣṭau grahā uktāḥ /
analyzed: ghrāṇa jihvā vāc cakṣuḥ śrotra manaḥ hasta tvacaḥ hi indriyāṇi śrutyā aṣṭau grahāḥ uktāḥ
gṛhṇanti vaśīkurvanti khalu etāni puruṣa paśum iti
na sva rūpavataḥ vaśīkartum īśate
yāvat asmai puruṣa śave gandha rasa nāma rūpa śabda kāma karma sparśān na upaharanti
atas eva gandha ādayaḥ ṣṭau atigrahāḥ
tad upahāreṇa grahāṇām graha tva upapatteḥ
tat idam uktam
indriyāṇām grahaṇam viṣayāṇām atigraha tvam iti śruti prasiddheḥ iti

original: grahatvenendriyaiḥ sāmye 'pi manasaḥ svagatena viśeṣeṇārthebhyaḥ paratvamāha
analyzed: graha tvena indriyaiḥ sāmye manasaḥ svagatena viśeṣeṇa arthebhyaḥ paratvam āha
viṣayebyaḥ ca manasaḥ para tvam iti
kasmāt pumān rathi tvena upakṣiptaḥ gṛhyate iti atas āha
ātma śabdāt iti
tad pratyabhijñānāt iti arthaḥ
śreṣṭha tve hetum āha
bhoktuḥ ca iti
tat anena jīvātmā svāmi tayā mahān uktaḥ
athavā śruti smṛtibhyām hairaṇyagarbhī buddhiḥ ātma śabdena ucyate iti āha
athavā iti
pūḥ iti
bhogya jātasya buddhiḥ adhikaraṇam iti buddhiḥ pūḥ

original: tadevaṃ sarvāsāṃ buddhīnāṃ prathamajahiraṇyagarbhabuddhyekanīḍatayā hiraṇyagarbhabuddhermahattvaṃ cāpanādā(copanādānā?)tmatvaṃ ca /
analyzed: tat evam sarvāsām buddhīnām prathama ja hiraṇyagarbha buddhi eka nīḍa tayā hiraṇyagarbha buddheḥ mahat tvam ca apanādāt ca upanādān ātma tvam ca
atas eva buddhi mātrāt pṛthakkaraṇam upapannam

original: nanvetasminpakṣe hiraṇyagarbhabuddherātmatvānna rathita ātmano bhokturatropādānamiti na rathamātraṃ pariśiṣyate 'pi tu rathavānapītyata āha-
analyzed: nanu etasmin pakṣe hiraṇyagarbha buddheḥ ātma tvāt na rathitaḥ ātmanaḥ bhoktuḥ atra upādānam iti na ratha mātram pariśiṣyate tu rathavān api iti atas āha
etasmin tu pakṣe iti

original: yathā hi samāropitaṃ pratibimbaṃ bimbānna vastuto bhidyate tathā na paramātmano vijñānātmā vastuto bhidyata iti paramātmaiva rathavānihopāttastena  #

kam yaḥ nyatra ātmanaḥ brahma brāhmaṇa jātim veda
evam kṣatriya ādiṣu api draṣṭavyam

original: ātmaiva jagatastattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ kiñcittaditi /
analyzed: ātmā eva jagataḥ tattvam na tu tad atiriktam kiñcid tat iti
atra eva bhagavatī śrutiḥ upapattim dṛṣṭānta prabandhena āha

original: yat khalu yadgrahaṃ vinā na śakyate grahītuṃ tattato na vyatiricyate /
analyzed: yat khalu yad graham vinā na śakyate grahītum tat tatas na vyatiricyate
yathā rajatam śuktikāyāḥ
bhujaṅgaḥ vā rajjoḥ
dundubhi ādi śabda sāmānyāt vā tad tad śabda bhedaḥ

original: na gṛhyante ca cidrūpagrahaṇaṃ vinā sthitikāle nāmarūpāṇi /
analyzed: na gṛhyante ca cit rūpa grahaṇam vinā sthiti kāle nāma rūpāṇi
tasmāt na cit ātmanaḥ bhidyante
tat idam uktam
sa yathā dundubheḥ hanyamānasya iti
dundubhi grahaṇena tad gatam śabda sāmānyam upalakṣayati
na kevalam sthiti kāle nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ cit ātma atirekeṇa agrahaṇāt cit ātmanaḥ na vyatiricyate

original: 'pi tu nāmarūpotpatteḥ prāgapi cidrūpāvasthānāt tadupādānatvācca nāmarūpaprapañcasya tadanatirekaḥ,
analyzed: tu nāma rūpa utpatteḥ prāk api cit rūpa avasthānāt tad upādāna tvāt ca nāma rūpa prapañcasya tad anatirekaḥ

original: rajjūpādānasyeva bhujaṅgasya rajjoranatireka ityetadvṛṣṭāntena sādhayati bhagavatī
analyzed: rajju upādānasya iva bhujaṅgasya rajjoḥ anatirekaḥ iti etat vṛṣṭāntena sādhayati bhagavatī

original: śrutiḥ-'sa yathārdraidho 'grerabhyāhitasya pṛthagdhūnā viniścarantyevaṃ vā are 'sya
analyzed: śrutiḥ sa yathā ārdra edhaḥ greḥ abhyāhitasya pṛthak dhūnāḥ viniścaranti evam vai are sya

original: mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ' ityādinā caturvidho mantra uktaḥ /
analyzed: mahataḥ bhūtasya niḥśvasitam etat yat ṛgvedaḥ ityādinā caturvidhaḥ mantraḥ uktaḥ
itihāsaḥ ityādinā aṣṭavidham brāhmaṇam uktam
etat uktam bhavati yathā agni mātram prathamam avagamyate śrudrāṇām visphuliṅgānām upādānām
atha tatas visphuliṅgāḥ vyuccaranti
na ca ete gneḥ tattva anya tvābhyām śakyantam
evam ṛgveda ādayaḥ pi alpa prayatnāt brahmaṇaḥ vyuccarantaḥ na tatas tattva anyatvābhyām nirucyante
ṛk ādibhiḥ nāma upalakṣyate

original: yadā ca nāmadheyasyeyaṃ gatistadā tatpūrvakasya rūpadheyasya kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yadā ca nāmadheyasya iyam gatiḥ tadā tad pūrvakasya rūpadheyasya kā eva kathā iti bhāvaḥ

original: na kevalaṃ tadupādānatvāttato na vyatiricyate nāmarūpaprapañcaḥ,
analyzed: na kevalam tad upādāna tvāt tatas na vyatiricyate nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ
pralaya samaye ca tad anupraveśāt tatas na vyatiricyate

original: yathā sāmudramevāmbhaḥ pṛthivītejaḥ saṃparkāt kāṭhinyamupagataṃ saindhavaṃ khilyaḥ,
analyzed: yathā sāmudram eva ambhaḥ pṛthivī tejaḥ saṃparkāt kāṭhinyam upagatam saindhavam khilyaḥ

original: sa hi svākāre samudre kṣipto 'mbha eva bhavati,
analyzed: sa hi su ākāre samudre kṣiptaḥ mbhaḥ eva bhavati

original: evaṃ cidambhodhau līnaṃ jagacchideva bhavati na tu tato 'tiricyata iti /
analyzed: evam cit ambhodhau līnam jagat chid eva bhavati na tu tiricyate iti
etat dṛṣṭānta prabandhena āha
sa yathā sarvāsām apām ityādi
dṛṣṭānta prabandham uktvā dārṣṭāntike yojayati

bahu tvena brahma uktam

bhūtam satyam
anantam nityam
apāram sarva gatam
vijñāna ghanaḥ
vijñāna eka rasaḥ iti yāvat

original: etebhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya sāmyenotthāya /
analyzed: etebhyaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena vyavasthā etebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya sāmyena utthāya

original: kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya hyavacchedādduḥ khitvaśokitvādayastadavacchinne cidātmani tadviparīte 'pi pratīyante,
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa saṃghātasya hi avacchedāt duḥ khi tva śoki tva ādayaḥ tad avacchinne cit ātmani tad viparīte pi pratīyante
yathā udaka pratibimbite candramasi toya gatāḥ kampa ādayaḥ
tat idam sāmyena utthānam
yadā tu āgama ācārya upadeśa pūrvaka manana nididhyāsana prakarṣa paryanta jaḥ sya brahma svarūpa sākṣātkāra
upāvartate tadā nirmṛṣṭa nikhila vāsanā vidyā malasya kārya kāraṇa saṃghāta bhūtasya vināśe

original: tānyeva bhūtāni naśyantyani tadupādhiścidātmanaḥ khilyabhāvo vinaśyati /
analyzed: tāni eva bhūtāni naśyanti ani tad upādhiḥ cit ātmanaḥ khilya bhāvaḥ vinaśyati
tatas na pretya kārya kāraṇa bhūta nivṛttau rūpa gandha ādi saṃjñā asti iti

original: na pretya saṃjñāstīti saṃjñāmātraniṣedhādātmā nāstīti manyamānā sā maitreyī hovāca,
analyzed: na pretya saṃjñā asti iti saṃjñā mātra niṣedhāt ātmā na asti iti manyamānā sā maitreyī ha uvāca

original: atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanmohitavān na pretya saṃjñāstīti /
analyzed: atra eva mā bhagavān amūmuhat mohitavān na pretya saṃjñā asti iti
sa ha uvāca yājñavalkyaḥ sva abhiprāyam
dvaite hi rūpa ādi viśeṣa saṃjñā nibandhanaḥ duḥkhi tva ādi abhimānaḥ

original: ānandajñānaikarasabrahmādvayānubhave tu tat kena kaṃ paśyet,
analyzed: ānanda jñāna eka rasa brahma advaya anubhave tu tat kena kam paśyet
brahma vā kena vijānīyāt
nahi sva prakāśa tvāt
etat uktam bhavati na saṃjñā mātram mayā vyāsedhi
kintu viśeṣa saṃjñā iti
tat evam amṛta tva phalena upakramāt
madhye ca ātma vijñānena sarva vijñānam pratijñāya tad upapādanāt
upasaṃhāre ca mahat bhūtam anantam ityādinā ca brahma rūpa abhidhānāt

original: dvaitanindayā cādvaitaguṇakīrtanādbrahmaiva maitreyībrahmaṇe pratipādyaṃ na jīvātmeti nāsti pūrvapakṣa ityanārabhyamevedamadhikaraṇam /
analyzed: dvaita nindayā ca advaita guṇa kīrtanāt brahma eva maitreyī brahmaṇe pratipādyam na jīvātmā iti na asti pūrvapakṣaḥ iti anārabhyam eva idam adhikaraṇam
atrā ucyate bhoktṛ tva jñātṛ tā jīva rūpa utthāna samādhaye maitreyībrahmaṇe pūrvapakṣeṇa upakramaḥ kṛtaḥ
pati jāyā ādi bhogya saṃbandhaḥ na a bhoktuḥ brahmaṇaḥ yujyate

original: nāpijñānakartṛtvamakartuḥ sākṣācca mahato bhūtasya vijñānātmabhāvena samuttānābhidhānaṃ vijñānātmana eva draṣṭavyatvamāha /
analyzed: na api jñāna kartṛ tvam akartuḥ sākṣāt ca mahataḥ bhūtasya vijñāna ātma bhāvena samuttāna abhidhānam vijñāna ātmanaḥ eva draṣṭavya tvam āha

original: anyathā brahmaṇo draṣṭavyatvapare 'smin brāhmaṇo tasya vijñānātmatvena samutthānābhidhānamanupayuktaṃ syāttasya tu draṣṭavyamupayujyata ityupakramamātraṃ  #
analyzed: anyathā brahmaṇaḥ draṣṭavya tva pare tasya vijñāna ātma tvena samutthāna abhidhānam anupayuktam syāt tasya tu draṣṭavyam upayujyate iti upakrama mātram
pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ
bhoktṛ artha tvāt ca bhogya jātasya iti tat upodbala mātram
siddhāntaḥ tu nigada vyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa uktaḥ

original: tadevaṃ paurvāparyālocanayā maitreyībrāhmaṇasya brahmadarśanaparatve sthite bhoktrā jīvātmanopakramamācāryadeśīyamatena tāvatsamādhatte sūtrakāraḥ-
analyzed: tat evam paurvāparya ālocanayā maitreyībrāhmaṇasya brahma darśana para tve sthite bhoktrā jīvātmanā upakramam ācārya deśīya matena tāvat samādhatte sūtrakāraḥ
pratijñā siddheḥ liṅgam āśmaradhyaḥ

original: yathā hi vahnervikārā vyuccaranto visphuliṅgā na vahneratyantaṃ bhidyante,
analyzed: yathā hi vahneḥ vikārāḥ vyuccarantaḥ visphuliṅgāḥ na vahneḥ atyantam bhidyante
tad rūpa nirūpaṇa tvāt
na api tyantam abhinnāḥ
vahneḥ iva paraspara vyāvṛtti abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: tathā jīvātmano 'pi brahmavikāra na brahmaṇo 'tyantaṃ bhidyante,
analyzed: tathā jīvātmanaḥ pi brahma vikāra na brahmaṇaḥ tyantam bhidyante
cit rūpa tva abhāva prasaṅgāt
na api atyantam na bhidyante
parasparam vyāvṛtti abhāva prasaṅgāt
sarvajñam pratyupadeśa vaiyarthyāt ca
tasmāt kathañcid bhedaḥ jīva ātmanām abhedaḥ ca

original: tatra tadvijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāsiddhaye vijñānātmaparamātmanorabhedamupādāya paramātmani darśayitavye vijñānātmanopakrama ityāśmaradhya  #
analyzed: tatra tad vijñānena sarva vijñāna pratijñā siddhaye vijñāna ātma paramātmanoḥ abhedam upādāya paramātmani darśayitavye vijñāna ātmanā upakramaḥ iti āśmaradhya
ācāryaḥ mene  /
ācārya deśīya antara matena samādhatte
utkramiṣyataḥ evaṃbhāvāt iti auḍulomiḥ

original: jīvo hi paramātmano 'tyantaṃ bhinna eva san dehendriyamanobuddhyupadhānasaṃparkātsarvadā kaluṣaḥ,
analyzed: jīvaḥ hi tyantam bhinnaḥ eva san deha indriya manaḥ buddhi upadhāna saṃparkāt sarvadā kaluṣaḥ
tasya ca jñāna dhyāna ādi sādhana anuṣṭhānāt saṃprasannasya deha indriya ādi saṃghātāt utkramiṣyataḥ paramātmanā aikya upapatteḥ idam abhedena upakramaṇam
etat uktam bhavati bhaviṣyantam abhedam upādāya bheda kāle pi abhedaḥ uktaḥ

original: yathāhuḥ pāñcarātrikāḥ-'āmukterbheda eva syājjīvasya ca parasya ca /
analyzed: yathā āhuḥ pāñcarātrikāḥ āmukteḥ bhedaḥ eva syāt jīvasya ca parasya ca
bhuktasya tu na bhedaḥ sti bheda hetoḥ abhāvataḥ
iti
atra eva śrutim upanyasyati
śrutiḥ ca evam iti
pūrvam deha indriya ādi upādhi kṛtam kaluṣatvam ātmanaḥ uktam

original: saṃprati svābhāvikameva jīvasya nāmarūpaprapañcāśrayatvalakṣaṇaṃ kāluṣyaṃ pārthivānāmaṇūnāmiva śyāmatvaṃ kevalaṃ pākeneva /
analyzed: saṃprati svābhāvikam eva jīvasya nāma rūpa prapañca āśraya tva lakṣaṇam kāluṣyam pārthivānām aṇūnām iva śyāma tvam kevalam pākena iva
jñāna dhyāna ādinā tat apanīya jīvaḥ parātparataram puruṣam upaiti iti āha
kkacid ca jīva akṣayam api iti
nadī nidarśanam yathā somya imāḥ nadyaḥ iti
tat evam ācārya deśīya mata dvayam uktvā atra a parituṣyan ācārya matam āha sūtrakāraḥ
avisthiteḥ iti kāśakṛtsnaḥ
etat vyācaṣṭe
asya eva paramātmanaḥ iti
na jīvaḥ ātmanaḥ nyaḥ
na api tad vikāraḥ kintu ātmā eva avidyā upādhāna kalpita avacchedaḥ

original: ākāśa iva ghaṭamaṇikādikalpitāvacchedo ghaṭākāśo maṇikākāśo na tu paramākāśādanyastadvikāro vā /
analyzed: ākāśaḥ iva ghaṭa maṇika ādi kalpita avacchedaḥ ghaṭa ākāśaḥ maṇika ākāśaḥ na tu parama ākāśāt anyaḥ tad vikāraḥ vā
tatas ca jīva ātmanā upakramaḥ parām ātmanā eva upakramaḥ tasya tatas bhedāt
sthūla darśi loka pratīti saukaryāya aupādhikena ātma rūpeṇa upakramaḥ kṛtaḥ
atra eva śrutim pramāṇayati
tathā ca iti

original: atha vikāraḥ paramātmano jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavatyākāśādivadityāha-
analyzed: atha vikāraḥ paramātmanaḥ jīvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati ākāśa ādi vat iti āha
na ca tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām iti

original: nahi yathā tejaḥprabhṛtīnāmātmavikāratvaṃ śrūyate evaṃ jīvasyeti /
analyzed: nahi yathā tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām ātma vikāra tvam śrūyate evam jīvasya iti
ācārya traya matam vibhajate
kāśakṛtsnasya ācāryasya iti
ātyantike sati abhede kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt anātyantikaḥ bhedaḥ āstheyaḥ

original: tathāca kathañcidbhedo 'pīti tamāsthāya kāryakāraṇabhāva iti matatrayamuktvā kāśakṛtsnīyamataṃ sādhutvena nirdhārayati-
analyzed: tathā ca kathañcid bhedaḥ api iti tam āsthāya kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti mata trayam uktvā kāśakṛtsnīya matam sādhu tvena nirdhārayati
tatra tad iṣu madhye
kāśakṛtsnīyam matam iti

sākṣāt kāraṇe vidyayā śakyaḥ sa mūla kāṣam kaṣitum

original: rājaputrasyeva va mlecchakule vardhamānasyātmani samāropito mlecchabhāvo rājaputro 'sīti āptopadeśena /
analyzed: rāja putrasya iva mleccha kule vardhamānasya ātmani samāropitaḥ mleccha bhāvaḥ āpta upadeśena

original: na tu mṛdvikāraḥ śarāvādiḥ śataśo 'pi mṛnmṛditi cintyamānastajjanmanā mṛdbhāvasākṣātkāreṇa śakyo nivartayituṃ,
analyzed: na tu mṛd vikāraḥ śarāva ādiḥ mṛd mṛd iti cintyamānaḥ tad janmanā mṛd bhāva sākṣātkāreṇa śakyaḥ nivartayitum
tat kasya hetoḥ
tasya api mṛdaḥ bhinna abhinnasya tāttvika tvāt
vastutas tu jñānena ucchettum aśakya tvāt
saḥ yam

original: api ca jīvasyātmavikāratve tasya jñānadhyānādisādhanānuṣṭhānāt svaprakṛtāvapyaye sati nāmṛtatvasyāśāstītyapuruṣārthatvamamṛtatvaprāpiśrutivirodhaśca
analyzed: api ca jīvasya ātma vikāra tve tasya jñāna dhyāna ādi sādhana anuṣṭhānāt sva prakṛtau apyaye sati na amṛta tvasya āśāsti iti apuruṣa artha tvam amṛta tva prāpi śruti virodhaḥ ca
kāśakṛtsna mate tu etat ubhayam na asti iti āha
evam ca sati iti

original: nanu yadi jīvo na vikāraḥ kintu brahmaiva kathaṃ tarhi tasminnāmarūpāśrayatvaśrutiḥ,
analyzed: nanu yadi jīvaḥ na vikāraḥ kintu brahmā eva katham tarhi tasmin nāma rūpa āśraya tva śrutiḥ
katham ca yathā agneḥ śrudrāḥ visphuliṅgāḥ iti brahma vikāra śrutiḥ iti āśaṅkām upasaṃhāra vyājena nirākaroti
atas ca sva āśrayasya iti
yatas vikāra pakṣe na saṃbhavataḥ
atas ca iti yojanā
dvitīya pūrvapakṣa bījam anayā eva tri sūtryā apākaroti
yat api uktam iti
śeṣam a tirohita artham vyākhyāta artham ca
tṛtīya pūrvapakṣa bīja nirāse kāśakṛtsnīyena eva iti avadhāraṇam tad mata āśrayaṇena eva tasya śakya nirāsa tvāt

original: aikāntike hyādvaite ātmano 'nyakarmakaraṇe 'kena kaṃ paśyet' iti ātmanaśca karmatvaṃ 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti śakyaṃ niṣeddhum /
analyzed: aikāntike hi ādvaite ātmanaḥ kena kam paśyet iti ātmanaḥ ca karma tvam vijñātāram are kena vijānīyāt iti śakyam niṣeddhum
bheda abheda pakṣe vā aikāntike vā bhede sarvam etat advaita āśrayam aśakyam iti avadhāraṇasya arthaḥ

original: na kevalaṃ kāśakṛtsnīyadarśanāśrayaṇena bhūtapūrvagatyā vijñātṛtvamapi tu śrutipaurvāparyaparyālocanayāpyevamevetyāha-
analyzed: na kevalam kāśakṛtsnīya darśana āśrayaṇena bhūta pūrva gatyā vijñātṛ tvam api tu śruti paurvāparya paryālocanayā api evam eva iti āha
api ca yatra hi iti

original: kasmāt punaḥ kāśakṛtsnasya matamāsthīyate netareṣāmācāryāṇāmityata āha-
analyzed: kasmāt punar kāśakṛtsnasya matam āsthīyate na itareṣām ācāryāṇām iti atas āha
darśitam tu purastāt iti

original: kāśakṛtsnīyasya matasya śrutiprabandhopanyāsena punaḥ śrutimattvaṃ smṛtimattvaṃ copasaṃhāropakramamāha-
analyzed: kāśakṛtsnīyasya matasya śruti prabandha upanyāsena punar śrutimat tvam smṛtimat tvam ca upasaṃhāra upakramam āha
atas ca iti
kkacid pāṭhaḥ ā taḥ ca iti
tasya avaśyam ca iti arthaḥ
janana jarā maraṇa bhītayaḥ vikriyāḥ tāsām sarvāsām mahān ajaḥ ityādinā pratiṣedhaḥ
pariṇāma pakṣe nyasya ca anya bhāva pakṣe aikāntika advaita pratipādana parāḥ ekam eva advitīyam ityādayaḥ
dvaita darśana nindā parāḥ ca sau anyaḥ ham asmi ityādayaḥ
janma jarā ādi vikriyā pratiṣedha parāḥ ca eṣa mahān ajaḥ ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ uparudhyeran

original: apica yadi jīvaparamātmanorbhedābhedāvāsthīyeyātāṃ tatastayormitho virodhātsamuccayābhāvādekasya balīyastve nātmani nirapavādaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyeta,
analyzed: apica yadi jīva paramātmanoḥ bheda abhedau āsthīyeyātām tatas tayoḥ mithas virodhāt samuccaya abhāvāt ekasya balīyaḥ tve na ātmani nirapavādam vijñānam jāyeta
balīyasā ekena durbala pakṣa avalambinaḥ jñānasya bādhanāt
atha tu agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tayā na bala abala avadhāraṇam

original: tataḥ saṃśaye sati na suniścitārthamātmani jñānaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tatas saṃśaye sati na su niścita artham ātmani jñānam bhavet

original: suniścitārthaṃ ca jñānaṃ mokṣopāyaḥ śrūyate-'vedāntavijñānasuniścitārthāḥ' iti /
analyzed: su niścita artham ca jñānam mokṣa upāyaḥ śrūyate vedānta vijñāna su niścita arthāḥ iti
tat etat āha
anyathā mumukṣūṇām iti

nanu yadi kṣetrajña paramātmanoḥ abhedaḥ bhāvikaḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi vyapadeśabuddhibhedau kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti kathañca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya bhagavataḥ saṃsāritā /
analyzed: katham tarhi vyapadeśa buddhi bhedau kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmā iti kathañca nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvasya bhagavataḥ saṃsāri tā
avidyā kṛta nāma rūpa upādhi vaśāt iti ced
kasya iyam avidyā
na tāvat jīvasya
tasya paramātmanaḥ vyatireka abhāvāt
na api paramātmanaḥ
tasya vidyā ekarasya avidyā āśraya tva anupapatteḥ
tat atra bhāvikaḥ iti atas āha
sthite ca paramātma kṣetrajña ātma eka tva iti

original: na tāvadbhedadābhedāvekātra bhāvikau bhavitumarhata iti viprapañcitaṃ prathame pāde /
analyzed: na tāvat bheda da abhedau eka atra bhāvikau bhavitum arhataḥ iti viprapañcitam prathame pāde

original: dvaitadarśananindayā caikāntikādvaitapratipādanaparāḥ paurvāparyālocanayā sarve vedāntaḥ pratīyante /
analyzed: dvaita darśana nindayā ca aikāntika advaita pratipādana parāḥ paurvāparya ālocanayā sarve vedāntaḥ pratīyante

original: tatra yathā bimbādavadatāttāttvike pratibimbānāmabhede 'pi nīlamaṇikṛpāṇakācādyupadhānabhedātkālpaniko jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedau
analyzed: tatra yathā bimbāt avadatāt tāttvike pratibimbānām abhede nīla maṇi kṛpāṇa kāca ādi upadhāna bhedāt kālpanikaḥ jīvānām bhedaḥ buddhi vyapadeśa bhedau

original: idaṃ bimbamavadātamimāni ca pratibimbāni nīlotpalāśaśayāmalāni vṛttadīrghādibhedabhāñji bahūnīti,
analyzed: idam bimbam avadātam imāni ca pratibimbāni nīlotpala aśaśaya amalāni vṛtta dīrgha ādi bheda bhāñji bahūni iti
evam paramātmanaḥ śuddha svabhāvāt jīvānam abhedaḥ aikāntike pi anirvacanīya anādya vidyā upadhāna bhedāt kālpanikaḥ

original: jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedāvayaṃ ca paramātmā śuddhavijñānānandasvabhāva ime
analyzed: jīvānām bhedaḥ buddhi vyapadeśa bhedau ayam ca paramātmā śuddha vijñāna ānanda svabhāvaḥ ime

original: avidyopadhānaṃ ca yadyapi vidyāsvabhāve paramātmani na sākṣādasti tathāpi tatpratibimbakalpajīvadvāreṇa parasminnucyate /
analyzed: avidyā upadhānam ca yadi api vidyā svabhāve paramātmani na sākṣāt asti tathā api tad pratibimba kalpa jīva dvāreṇa parasmin ucyate
na ca evam anyonya āśrayaḥ jīva vibhāga āśrayā avidyā
avidyā āśrayaḥ ca jīva vibhāgaḥ iti

atas eva kān uddiśya eva īśvaraḥ māyām āracayati anārthikām
sarga ādau jīvānām abhāvāt

original: kathaṃ cātmānaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ vividhavedanābhājaṃ kuryādityādyanuyogo niravakāśaḥ /
analyzed: katham ca ātmānam saṃsāriṇam vividha vedanā bhājam kuryāt ityādi anuyogaḥ niravakāśaḥ

original: hanta jīvaḥ sphuṭa iti brahmāpi tathā syāt,

original: tathā ca 'nihitaṃ guhāyām' iti nopapadyata ityata āha-
analyzed: tathā ca nihitam guhāyām iti na upapadyate iti atas āha
na hi satyam iti

original: yathāhi bimbasya maṇikṛpāṇādayo guhā evaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi pratijīvaṃ bhinnā avidyā guhā iti /

original: yathā pratibimbeṣu bhāsamāneṣu bimbaṃ tadabhinnamapi guhyamevaṃ jīveṣu bhāsamāneṣu tadabhinnamapi brahma guhyam /
analyzed: yathā pratibimbeṣu bhāsamāneṣu bimbam tat abhinnam api guhyam evam jīveṣu bhāsamāneṣu tat abhinnam api brahma guhyam

na ca brahmaṇaḥ nyaḥ iti

original: brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanā bhagaśo vā pariṇāmābhyupagame tasya kāryatvādanityatvācca tadaśrito mokṣo 'pi tathā syāt /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanā bhagaśas vā pariṇāma abhyupagame tasya kārya tvāt anitya tvāt ca tad āśritaḥ tathā syāt
yadi tu evam api mokṣam nityam kṛtakam brūyuḥ tatra āha

original: evaṃ ye nadīsamudranidarśanenāmukterbhedaṃ muktasya cābhedaṃ jīvasyāsthiṣata teṣāmapi nyāyenāsaṃgatiḥ /
analyzed: evam ye nadī samudra nidarśanena amukteḥ bhedam muktasya ca abhedam jīvasya asthiṣata teṣām api nyāyena asaṃgatiḥ
na u jātu ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ bhavati

kā punar nadī abhimatā āyuṣmataḥ

original: kiṃ pāthaḥ paramāṇava utaiṣāṃ saṃsthānabheda āhosvittadārabdho 'vayavī /

original: tatra saṃsthānabhedasya vāvayavino vā samudraniveśe vināśāt kasya samudreṇaikatā /

original: nadīpāthaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ tu samudrapāthaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrvavasthitebhyo bheda eva nābhedaḥ /

original: niṣphalamiti sāvayavatvaṃ vyāsedhi na tu sāṃśatvam,

original: aṃśaśca jīvaḥ paramātmano nabhasa iva karṇanemimaṇḍalāvacchinnaṃ nabhaḥ śabdaśravaṇayogyaṃ,

original: vāyoriva ca śarīrāvacchinnaḥ pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇa iti cet /

original: hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vetyuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: hanta tarhi prāpta aprāpta vivekena karṇa nemi maṇḍalam vā tad saṃyogaḥ vā iti uktam bhavati

anupapatteḥ

original: nabhodharmatve hi tadanavayavaṃ sarvatrābhinnamiti tatsaṃyogaḥ sarvatra pratheta /

original: ' tadihāpi pratijñādṛṣṭāntau mukhyārthāveva yuktau na tu 'yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ' itivadguṇakalpanayā netavyau,

original: tadanena pramāṇena siddhamanṛtatvaṃ vikārajātasya kāraṇasya nirvācyatayā sattvaṃ 'mṛttiketyeva satyam' ityādinā prabandhena dṛṣṭāntatayānuvadati  #

śrutiḥ

original: 'yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ' iti cākṣapādasūtraṃ pramāṇasiddho dṛṣṭānta ityetatparaṃ,
analyzed: yatra laukika parīkṣakāṇām buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti ca akṣapāda sūtram pramāṇa siddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti etad param
na punar loka siddha tvam atra vivakṣitam
anyathā teṣām paramāṇu ādiḥ na dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt

original: anekābhiḥ śaktibhiryāḥ pravṛttayo nānākāryasṛṣṭayastadyuktaṃ brahmaikaṃ nānā ceti /

original: yadi punarekatvameva vastusadbhavet tato nānātvābhāvādvaidikaḥ karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ samasta evocchidyeta /

analyzed: yatra tu asya sarvam ātmā eva abhūt tat kena kam paśyet ityādinā mithyājñāna adhīnaḥ vyavahāraḥ kriyā kāraka ādi lakṣaṇaḥ samyak jñānena apanīyate itri na

original: yadyapi sāṃvvahārikasya satyādeva bhayātsatyaṃ maraṇamutpadyate tathāpi bhayaheturahistajjñānaṃ vāsatyaṃ tato bhayaṃ satyaṃ jāyata ityasatyātsatyasyotpattiruktā
analyzed: yadi api sāṃvvahārikasya satyāt eva bhayāt satyam maraṇam utpadyate tathā api bhaya hetuḥ ahiḥ tad jñānam vā asatyam tatas bhayam satyam jāyate iti asatyāt satyasya utpattiḥ uktā

original: yadyapi cāhijñānamapi svarūpeṇa sattathāpi na tajjñānatvena bhayaheturapi tvanirvācyāhirūṣitatvena /

original: yataḥ samāropitadhūmabhāvāyā dhūmamahiṣyā vahnijñānaṃ satyaṃ syāt /

original: yadyapi śārīrātparamātmano bhedamāhuḥ śrutayastathāpyabhedamapi darśayanti śrutayo bahvayaḥ /

original: sa ca svabhāvapratibandhaḥ śaṅkitasamāropitopādhinirāse sati niścīyate /
analyzed: sa ca svabhāva pratibandhaḥ śaṅkita samāropita upādhi nirāse sati niścīyate
tad niścayaḥ ca anvaya vyatirekayoḥ āyatate

original: tau cānvayavyatirekau na tathopādānācaitanye yathopādānācaitanye yathā cetanaprayuktatve 'tiparisphuṭau /
analyzed: tau ca anvaya vyatirekau na tathā upādāna acaitanye yathā upādāna acaitanye yathā cetana prayukta tve ti parisphuṭau
tat alam atra antaraṅga tvena iti bhāvaḥ

original: evamapi cetanaprayuktatvaṃ nābhyupeyeta yadi pramāṇāntaravirodho bhavet,
analyzed: evam api cetana prayukta tvam na abhyupeyeta yadi pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ bhavet
pratyuta śrutiḥ anuguṇatarā atra iti āha
na ca evam sati iti
cakāreṇa suḥkha duḥkha ādi samanvaya lakṣaṇasya hetoḥ asiddha tvam samuccinoti iti āha
anvaya ādi anupapatteḥ ca iti

original: āntarāḥ khalvamī suḥkhaduḥkhamohaviṣādā bāhyebhyaścandanādibhyo 'tivicchinnapratyayapravedanīyebhyo vyatiriktā adhyakṣamīkṣyante /
analyzed: āntarāḥ khalu amī suḥkha duḥkha moha viṣādāḥ bāhyebhyaḥ candana ādibhyaḥ ti vicchinna pratyaya pravedanīyebhyaḥ vyatiriktāḥ adhyakṣam īkṣyante

original: yadi punareta eva suḥkhaduḥkhādisvabhāvā bhaveyustataḥsvarūpatvādhemante 'pi candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi punar ete eva suḥkha duḥkha ādi svabhāvāḥ bhaveyuḥ tatas sva rūpa tvāt hemante candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt
nahi candanaḥ kadācid acandanaḥ
tathā nidāgheṣu api kuṅkuma paṅkaḥ sukhaḥ bhavet
na hi asau kadācid a kuṅkuma paṅkaḥ iti

original: evaṃ kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasya sukha iti manuṣyādīnāmapi prāṇabhṛtāṃ sukhaḥ syāt /
analyzed: evam kaṇṭakaḥ kra melakasya sukhaḥ iti manuṣya ādīnām api prāṇabhṛtām sukhaḥ syāt
na hi asau kāṃścid prati eva kaṇṭakaḥ iti

original: tasmādasukhādisvabhāvā api candanakuṅkumādayo jātikālāvasthādyapekṣayā sukhaduḥkhādihetavo na tu svayaṃ sukhādisvabhāvā iti ramaṇīyam /
analyzed: tasmāt asukha ādi svabhāvāḥ api candana kuṅkuma ādayaḥ jāti kāla avasthā ādi apekṣayā sukha duḥkha ādi hetavaḥ na tu svayam sukha ādi svabhāvāḥ iti ramaṇīyam

original: tasmātsukhādirūpasamanvayo bhāvānāmasiddha iti nānena tadrūpaṃ kāraṇamavyaktamunnīyata iti /
analyzed: tasmāt sukha ādi rūpa samanvayaḥ bhāvānām asiddhaḥ iti na anena tad rūpam kāraṇam avyaktam unnīyate iti
tat idam uktam
śabda ādi aviśeṣe ca bhāvanā viśeṣāt iti
bhāvanā vāsanā saṃskāraḥ tad viśeṣāt
karabha janma saṃvartakam hi karma karabha ucitām eva bhāvanām abhivyaniktim
yathā asmai kaṇṭakāḥ eva rocante
evam anyatra api draṣṭavyam
parimāṇāt iti sāṃkhyīyam hetum upanyasyati
tathā parimitānām bhedānām iti

original: saṃsargapūrvakatve hi saṃsargasyaikasminnadvaye 'saṃbhavānnānātvaikārthasamavetasya nānākaraṇāni saṃsṛṣṭāni kalpanīyāni,
analyzed: saṃsarga pūrvaka tve hi saṃsargasya ekasmin advaye saṃbhavāt nānātva eka artha samavetasya nānā karaṇāni saṃsṛṣṭāni kalpanīyāni
tāni ca sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi eva iti bhāvaḥ
tat etat parimita tvam sāṃkhyīya rāddhānta ālocanena anaikāntikam iti dūṣayati
sattva rajaḥ tamasām iti
yadi tāvat parimita tvam iyat tā
sā nabhasaḥ api na asti iti avyāpakaḥ hetuḥ parimāṇāt iti

original: atha na yojanādimitatvaṃ parimāṇamiyattāṃ nabhaso brūmaḥ kintvavyāpitām,
analyzed: atha na yojana ādi mita tvam parimāṇa miyat tām nabhasaḥ brūmaḥ kintu avyāpi tām
avyāpi ca nabhaḥ tanmātra ādeḥ
nahi kāryam kāraṇa vyāpi
kintu kāraṇam kārya vyāpi iti parimitam nabhaḥ tanmātra ādi avyāpi tvāt
hanta sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi api na parasparam vyāpnuvanti
na ca tattva antara pūrvaka tvam eteṣām iti vyabhicāraḥ

original: nahi yathā taiḥ kāryajātamāviṣṭamevaṃ tāni parasparaṃ viśanti,
analyzed: nahi yathā taiḥ kārya jātam āviṣṭam evam tāni parasparam viśanti
mithas kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvāt
paraspara saṃsargaḥ tu āveśaḥ citi śaktau na asti
nahi citi śaṅktiḥ kūṭastha nityā taiḥ saṃsṛjyate
tatas ca tad avyāpakāḥ guṇāḥ iti parimitāḥ

original: evaṃ citiśaktirapi guṇairasaṃsṛṣṭeti sāpi parimitetyanaikāntikatvaṃ parimitatvasya hetoriti /
analyzed: evam citi śaktiḥ api guṇaiḥ asaṃsṛṣṭā iti sā api parimitā iti anaikāntika tvam parimita tvasya hetoḥ iti
tathā kārya kāraṇa vibhāgaḥ pi samanvaya vat viruddhaḥ iti āha
kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tu iti
pravṛtteḥ ca

original: na kevalaṃ racanābhedā na cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa bhavantyapi tu sāmyāvasthāyāḥ pracyutirvaiṣamyaṃ,
analyzed: na kevalam racanā bhedāḥ na cetanā adhiṣṭhānam antareṇa bhavanti api tu sāmya avasthāyāḥ pracyutiḥ vaiṣamyam

original: tathā ca yadudbhūtaṃ balīyastadaṅgyabhibhūtaṃ ca tadanuguṇatayā sthitamaṅgam,
analyzed: tathā ca yat udbhūtam balīyaḥ tad aṅgi abhibhūtam ca tad anuguṇa tayā sthitam aṅgam

original: evaṃ hi guṇapradhānabhāve satyasya mahadādau kārye kā pravṛttiḥ,
analyzed: evam hi guṇa pradhāna bhāve satyasya mahat ādau kārye kā pravṛttiḥ
sā api cetanā adhiṣṭhānam eva gamayati

original: na hi cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa mṛtpiṇḍe pradhāne 'ṅgabhāvena cakradaṇḍasalilasūtirādayo 'vatiṣṭhante /
analyzed: na hi cetanā adhiṣṭhānam antareṇa mṛd piṇḍe pradhāne ṅga bhāvena cakra daṇḍa salila sūtiḥ ādayaḥ vatiṣṭhante

original: tasmātpravṛtterapi cetanādhiṣṭhānasiddhiriti 'śaktitaḥ pravṛtteśca' ityayamapi hetuḥ sāṃkhyīyo viruddha evetyuktaṃ vakroktyā /
analyzed: tasmāt pravṛtteḥ api cetanā adhiṣṭhāna siddhiḥ iti śaktitaḥ pravṛtteḥ ca iti ayam api hetuḥ sāṃkhyīyaḥ viruddhaḥ evā iti uktam vakroktyā
atra sāṃkhyaḥ codayati
nanu cetanasya api pravṛttiḥ iti

original: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-- tvayā kilaupaniṣadenāsmadhetūn dūṣayitvā kevalasya cetanasyaivānyanirapekṣasya jagadupādānatvaṃ nimittatvaṃ ca samarthanīyam
analyzed: ayam abhiprāyaḥ tvayā kila aupaniṣadena asmad hetūn dūṣayitvā kevalasya cetanasya eva anya nirapekṣasya jagat upādāna tvam nimitta tvam ca samarthanīyam
tat ayuktam
kevalasya cetanasya pravṛtteḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇī anupalabdheḥ iti

original: aupaniṣadastu cetanahetukāṃ tāvadeṣa sāṃkhyaḥ pravṛttimabhyupagacchatu paścāt svapakṣamata eva samādhāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānāha--
analyzed: aupaniṣadaḥ tu cetana hetukām tāvat eṣa sāṃkhyaḥ pravṛttim abhyupagacchatu paścāt sva pakṣam atas eva samādhāsyāmi iti abhisaṃdhim ānāha
satyam etat
na kevalasya cetanasya pravṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā iti
sāṃkhyaḥ āha
na tu acetana saṃyuktasya iti
tuśabdaḥ aupaniṣada pakṣam vyāvartayati

original: acetanāśrayaiva sarvā pravṛttirdṛśyate na tu cetanāśrayā kācidapi /
analyzed: acetana āśrayā eva sarvā pravṛttiḥ dṛśyate na tu cetanā āśrayā kācid api
tasmāt na cetanasya jagat sarjane pravṛttiḥ iti arthaḥ
atra aupaniṣadaḥ gūḍha abhisaṃdhiḥ praśna pūrvakam vimṛśati
kim punar atra iti
atra antare sāṃkhyaḥ brūte
nanu yasmin iti

original: na tāvaccetanaḥ pravṛtyāśrayatayā tatprayojakatayā vā pratyakṣamīkṣyate,
analyzed: na tāvat cetanaḥ pravṛti āśraya tayā tad prayojaka tayā vā pratyakṣam īkṣyate
kevalam pravṛttiḥ tad āśrayaḥ ca acetanaḥ deha ratha ādiḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate
tatra acetanasya pravṛttiḥ tad nimittā eva na tu cetana nimittā

original: sadbhāvamātraṃ tu tatra cetanasya gamyate rathādivailakṣaṇyājjīvaddehasya /
analyzed: sadbhāva mātram tu tatra cetanasya gamyate ratha ādi vailakṣaṇyāt jīvat dehasya
na ca sadbhāva mātreṇa kāraṇa tva siddhiḥ

original: mā bhūdākāśa utpattimatāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇamasti hi sarvatreti /
analyzed: mā bhūt ākāśaḥ utpattimatām ghaṭa ādīnām nimitta kāraṇam asti hi sarvatra iti

original: tadanena dehātirikte satyapi cetane tasya na pravṛttiṃ prati nimittabhāvo 'stītyuktam /
analyzed: tat anena deha atirikte sati api cetane tasya na pravṛttim prati nimitta bhāvaḥ sti iti uktam

original: yataścāsya na pravṛttihetubhāvo 'sti ata eva pratyakṣe dehe sati pravṛttidarśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamiti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ,
analyzed: yatas ca asya na pravṛtti hetu bhāvaḥ sti atas eva pratyakṣe dehe sati pravṛtti darśanāt asati ca adarśanāt dehasya eva caitanyam iti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ

original: tathā ca na cidātmanimittā pravṛttiriti siddham /
analyzed: tathā ca na cit ātma nimittā pravṛttiḥ iti siddham

original: tasmānna racanāyāḥ pravṛttervā cidātmakāraṇatvasiddhirjagata iti aupaniṣadaḥ pariharati--
analyzed: tasmāt na racanāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ vā cit ātma kāraṇatva siddhiḥ jagataḥ iti aupaniṣadaḥ pariharati
tat abhidhīyate na brūmaḥ iti

original: na tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamasiddhaḥ śārīro vā paramātmā vāsmābhiridānīṃ sādhanīyaḥ,
analyzed: na tāvat pratyakṣa anumāna āgama siddhaḥ śārīraḥ vā paramātmā vā asmābhiḥ idānīm sādhanīyaḥ
kevalam asya pravṛtti prati kāraṇa tvam vaktavyam

original: tatra mṛtaśarīre vā rathādau vānadhiṣṭhite cetanena pravṛtteradarśanāt tadviparyaye ca pravṛttidarśanādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cetanahetukatvaṃ
analyzed: tatra mṛta śarīre vā ratha ādau vā anadhiṣṭhite cetanena pravṛtteḥ adarśanāt tad viparyaye ca pravṛtti darśanāt anvaya vyatirekābhyām cetana hetuka tvam
na tu cetana sadbhāva mātreṇa
yena atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavet
bhūta caitanikānām api cedana adhiṣṭhānāt acetanānām pravṛttiḥ iti atra avivādaḥ iti āha
laukāyatikānām api iti
syāt etat

original: dehaḥ svayaṃ cetanaḥ karacaraṇādimān svavyāpāreṇa pravartayatīti yuktaṃ,
analyzed: dehaḥ svayam cetanaḥ kara caraṇa ādimān sva vyāpāreṇa pravartayati iti yuktam

original: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kūṭasthanityaścetano vyāpārarahito jñānaikasvabhāvaḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt pravartako yukta iti codayati--
analyzed: na tu tad atiriktaḥ kūṭastha nityaḥ cetanaḥ vyāpāra rahitaḥ jñāna eka svabhāvaḥ pravṛtti abhāvāt pravartakaḥ yuktaḥ iti codayati
nanu tava iti
pariharati
na
ayaskānta vat rūpa ādi vat ca iti
yathā ca rūpa ādayaḥ iti

original: sāṃkhyānāṃ hi svadeśasthā rūpādaya indriyaṃ vikurvate,
analyzed: sāṃkhyānām hi sva deśa sthāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ indriyam vikurvate

original: tena tadindrayamarthaṃ prāptamarthākāreṇa pariṇamata iti sthitiḥ /
analyzed: tena tat indrayam artham prāptam artha ākāreṇa pariṇamate iti sthitiḥ
saṃprati codakaḥ sva abhiprāyam āviṣkaroti
eka tvāt iti

original: yeṣāmacetanaṃ cetanaṃ cāsti teṣāmetadyujyate vaktuṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ pravartata iti /
analyzed: yeṣām acetanam cetanam ca asti teṣām etat yujyate vaktum cetanā dhiṣṭhitam acetanam pravartate iti
yathā yoginām īśvara vādinām
yeṣām tu cetanā atiriktam na asti advaita vādinām

original: teṣāṃ pravartyābhāve kaṃ prati pravartakatvaṃ cetanasyetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām pravartya abhāve kam prati pravartaka tvam cetanasya iti arthaḥ
pariharati
na avidyā iti

original: kāraṇabhūtayā layalakṣaṇayāvidyayā prāksargopacitena ca vikṣepasaṃskāreṇa yat pratyupasthāpitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ tadeva māyā,
analyzed: kāraṇa bhūtayā laya lakṣaṇayā avidyayā prāc sarga upacitena ca vikṣepa saṃskāreṇa yat pratyupasthāpitam nāma rūpam tat eva māyā
tad āveśena asya codyasya asakṛt prayukta tvāt

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- neyaṃ sṛṣṭirvastusatī yenādvaitino vastusato dvitīyasyābhāvādanuyujyeta /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati nā iyam sṛṣṭiḥ vastu satī yena advaitinaḥ vastu sataḥ dvitīyasya abhāvāt anuyujyeta

original: kālpanikyāṃ tu sṛṣṭāvasti kālpanikaṃ dvitīyaṃ sahāyaṃ māyāmayam /
analyzed: kālpanikyām tu sṛṣṭau asti kālpanikam dvitīyam sahāyam māyā mayam
yathā āhuḥ sahāyāḥ tādṛśāḥ eva yādṛśī bhavitavya tā
iti
na ca evam brahma upādānatva vyāghātaḥ
brahmaṇaḥ eva māyā āveśena upādāna tvāt tad adhiṣṭhāna tvāt jagat vibhramasya
rajata vibhramasya iva śuktikā adhiṣṭhānasya śuktikā upādāna tvam iti niravadyam
payaḥ mbu vat ced tatra api

original: yathā payombunoścetanānadhiṣṭhitayoḥ svata eva pravṛttirevaṃ pradhānasyāpīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
analyzed: yathā payaḥ mbunoḥ cetanā anadhiṣṭhitayoḥ svatas eva pravṛttiḥ evam pradhānasya api iti śaṅkā arthaḥ

sarvatra asya sulabha tvāt
na ca asādhyam
atra api cetanā adhiṣṭhānasya āgama siddha tvāt

original: na ca sapakṣeṇa vyabhicāra iti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /

original: iha tu sarvasya cetanāpekṣā pravṛttiḥ pratipādyata iti kuto na virodha ityata āha--
analyzed: iha tu sarvasya cetanā apekṣā pravṛttiḥ pratipādyate iti kutas na virodhaḥ iti atas āha

original: sthūladarśilokābhiprāyānurodhena taduktaṃ na tu paramārthata ityarthaḥ //3 //
analyzed: sthūladarśi loka abhiprāya anurodhena tat uktam na tu paramārthataḥ iti arthaḥ
vyatireka anavasthiteḥ ca anapekṣa tvāt

original: yadyapi sāṃkhyānāmapi vicitrakarmavāsanāvāsitaṃ pradhānaṃ sāmyāvasthāyāmapi tathāpi na karmavāsanāḥ sargasyeśate,
analyzed: yadi api sāṃkhyānām api vicitra karma vāsanā vāsitam pradhānam sāmya avasthāyām api tathā api na karma vāsanāḥ sargasya īśate

original: kintu pradhānameva svakārye pravartamānamadharmapratibaddhaṃ sanna sukhamayīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartumutsahata iti dharmeṇādharmapratibandho 'panīyate
analyzed: kintu pradhānam eva sva kārye pravartamānam adharma pratibaddham sat na sukha mayīm sṛṣṭim kartum utsahate iti dharmeṇa adharma pratibandhaḥ upanīyate
evam adharmeṇa dharma pratibandhaḥ upanīyate daḥkha mayyām sṛṣṭau
svayam eva ca pradhānam an apekṣya sṛṣṭau pravartate

original: yathāhuḥ-- 'nimittamaprayojakaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ varaṇabhedastu tataḥ kṣetrikavat' iti /
analyzed: yathā āhuḥ nimittam aprayojakam prakṛtīnām varaṇa bhedaḥ tu tatas kṣetrika vat iti

original: tataśca pratibandakāpanayasādhane dharmādharmavāsane api saṃnihite ityāgantorapekṣaṇīyasyābhāvāt sadaiva sāmyena pariṇameta vaiṣamyeṇa vā,
analyzed: tatas ca pratibandaka apanaya sādhane dharma adharma vāsane api saṃnihite iti āgantoḥ apekṣaṇīyasya abhāvāt sadā eva sāmyena pariṇameta vaiṣamyeṇa vā
na tu ayam kādācitkaḥ pariṇāma bhedaḥ upapadyeta

original: īśvarasya tu mahāmāyasya cetanasya līlayā vā yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvavaicitryādvā karmaparipākāpekṣasya pravṛttinivṛttī upapadyete eveti //4
analyzed: īśvarasya tu mahāmāyasya cetanasya līlayā vā yadṛcchayā vā svabhāva vaicitryāt vā karma paripāka apekṣasya pravṛtti nivṛttī upapadyete eva iti
anyatra abhāvāt ca na tṛṇa ādi vat

original: dhenūpayuktaṃ hi tṛṇapallavādi yathā svabhāvata eva cetanānapekṣaṃ kṣīrabhāvena pariṇamate na tu tatra dhenūcaitanyamapekṣyate,
analyzed: dhenu upayuktam hi tṛṇa pallava ādi yathā svabhāvataḥ eva cetanā anapekṣam kṣīra bhāvena pariṇamate na tu tatra dhenū caitanyam apekṣyate
upayoga mātre tad apekṣa tvāt

original: evaṃ pradhānamapi svabhāvata eva pariṇaṃsyate kṛtamatra cetaneneti śaṅkārthaḥ /
analyzed: evam pradhānam api svabhāvataḥ eva pariṇaṃsyate kṛtam atra cetanena iti śaṅkā arthaḥ

original: dhenūpayuktasya tṛṇādeḥ kṣīrabhāve kiṃ nimittāntaramātraṃ niṣidhyate,
analyzed: dhenu upayuktasya tṛṇa ādeḥ kṣīra bhāve kim nimitta antara mātram niṣidhyate
uta cetanam
na tāvat nimitta antaram
dhenu deha sthasya audaryasya vahni ādi bhedasya nimitta antarasya saṃbhavāt

original: buddhipūrvakārī tu tatrāpīśvara eva sarvajñaḥ saṃbhavatīti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /

original: tato 'sau paramāṇvantareṇa saṃyujyadvyaṇukamārabhate. bahavastu paramāṇavaḥ saṃyuktā na sahasā sthūlamārabhante,

original: tathā cākāśaparamāṇvoḥ paramāṇvośca saṃyuktayoryutasiddhiḥ siddhā bhavati /

nahi tatra śauklya paṭābhyām saṃbandhibhyām anya deśau śauklya paṭau

tat na
nityayoḥ ātma ākāśayoḥ aja saṃyoge ubhayasyāḥ api yuta siddheḥ abhāvāt

original: evaṃ lakṣaṇe 'pi hi samavāye guṇaguṇinorabhyupagamyamāne saṃbaddhe iti pratyayaḥ syānna tādātmyapratyayaḥ /

original: sa cedāsthito 'pi na pratyayamimamupapādayet kṛtaṃ tatkalpanayā /

original: tadgocaratve hi paṭe śukla ityevamākaraḥ syānna tu paṭaḥ śukla iti /

original: nahyagnirmāṇavaka ityupacaritāgnibhāvo māṇavakaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dahanātmanā prathate /

original: guṇādisadbhāve tadbhede ca pratyakṣānubhavādanyasya pramāṇasyābhāvāttasya ca bhrāntatve sarvābhāvaprasaṅgāt /

original: saṃbandhidvayādhīnasadbhāvo hi saṃbandho nāsatyekasminnapi saṃbandhini bhavitumarhati /

original: saṃyogajo 'pi hi saṃyogo bhavadbhirabhyupeyate na kriyāja evetyarthaḥ /

asti tu cittam cetanam

original: tathādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca /

original: tatrāsya hetūpanibandho yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇādaya udapatsyanta /
analyzed: tatra asya hetu upanibandhaḥ yat idam avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ yāvajjāti pratyayam jarā maraṇa ādayaḥ udapatsyanta
tatra avidyāyāḥ na evam bhavati aham saṃskārān abhinirvartayāmi iti

original: saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayamavidyayā nirvartitā iti /

original: evaṃ yāvajjātyā api naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ jarāmaraṇādyabhinirvartayāmīti /

original: jarāmaraṇādīnāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirnirvartitā iti /
analyzed: jarā maraṇa ādīnām api nā evam bhavati vayam jāti ādibhiḥ nirvartitāḥ iti

original: atha ca satsvavidyādiṣu svayamacetaneṣu cetanāntarānadhiṣṭhiteṣvapi saṃskārādīnāmutpattiḥ,

idam pratītya prāpya idam utpadyate iti etāvat mātrasya dṛṣṭa tvāt cetanā adhiṣṭhānasya anupalabdheḥ
saḥ yam ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetu upanibandhaḥ
atha pratyaya upanibandhaḥ pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa vijñāna dhātūnām samavāyāt bhavati kāyaḥ

ap dhātuḥ snehayati kāyam
tejaḥ dhātuḥ kāyasya aśita pīte paripācayati
vāyu dhātuḥ kāyasya śvāsa ādi karoti
ākāśa dhātuḥ kāyasya antar suṣira bhāvam karoti

original: yastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati pañcavijñānakāryasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānaṃ,

original: yadā hyādhyātmikāḥ pṛthivyādidhātavo bhavantyavikalāstadā sarveṣāṃ samavāyādbhavati kāyasyotpattiḥ /

original: tatra pṛthivyādidhātūnāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ kāyasya kāṭhinyādi nirvartayāma iti /
analyzed: tatra pṛthivī ādi dhātūnām na evam bhavati vayam kāyasya kāṭhinya ādi nirvartayāmaḥ iti

original: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamebhiḥ pratyayairabhinirvartita iti /
analyzed: kāyasya api na evam bhavati jñānam aham ebhiḥ pratyayaiḥ abhinirvartitaḥ iti

saḥ yam pratītyasamutpādaḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt na anyathayitavyaḥ

original: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-- yat khalu hetūpanibandhaṃ kāryaṃ tadanyānapekṣaṃ hetumātrādhīnotpādatvādutpadyatāṃ nāma /

original: na caiko 'pitatkāraṇasamarthaṃ ityanya udāsata iti yuktam /

original: nahi te prekṣāvanto yenaisamālocayeyurasmāsu samartha eko 'pi kārye iti kṛtaṃ naḥ saṃnidhineti /

original: tāṃśca sarvananapekṣān pratītya kāryamapi na netpattumarhati /

tat na

original: bījakṣaṇo janayitavyaḥ so 'napekṣa eva bījakṣaṇaḥ svakāryopajanane evaṃ sarva eva
analyzed: bīja kṣaṇaḥ janayitavyaḥ saḥ napekṣaḥ eva bīja kṣaṇaḥ sva kārya upajanane evam sarvaḥ eva

original: kathañcitsārūpye vā visabhāge 'pyantataḥ sattayā tadastīti na saṃtānocchedaḥ /

tat anena abhisaṃdhinā āha
sarveṣu api saṃtāneṣu saṃtāninām avicchinnena hetu phala bhāvena saṃtāna vicchedasya asaṃbhavāt iti
na api bhāva gocarau saṃbhavataḥ pratisaṃkhyā pratisaṃkhyā nirodhau

original: atra tāvadutpannamātrāpravṛttasya bhāvasya na pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ saṃbhavati,
analyzed: atra tāvat utpanna mātra pravṛttasya bhāvasya na pratisaṃkhyā nirodhaḥ saṃbhavati
tasya puruṣa prayatna apekṣā abhāvāt iti asti eva dūṣaṇam
tathā api doṣa antaram ubhayasmin api nirodhaḥ brūte
na hi bhāvānām iti

original: yato niranvayo vināśo na saṃbhavatyato nirūpākhyo 'pi na saṃbhavati,
analyzed: yatas niranvayaḥ vināśaḥ na saṃbhavati atas nirūpākhyaḥ na saṃbhavati
tena eva anvayinā rūpeṇa bhāvasya naṣṭasya api upākhyeya tvāt
niranvaya vināśa abhāve hetum āha
sarvāsu api avasthāsu iti
yat yat anvayi rūpam tat tat paramārtha sadbhāvaḥ
avasthāḥ tu viśeṣa ākhyāḥ upajana apāya dharmāṇaḥ
tāsām sarva sāma nirvacanīya tayā svatas na paramārtha sattvam
anvayi eva tu rūpam tāsām tattvam

original: tasya ca sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvānna vināśa ityavasthāvato 'vināśānnāvasthānāṃ niranvayo vināśa iti /
analyzed: tasya ca sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt na vināśaḥ iti avasthāvataḥ vināśāt na avasthānām niranvayaḥ vināśaḥ iti
tāsām tattvasya anvayinaḥ sarvatra avicchedāt
syāt etat
mṛd piṇḍa mṛd ghaṭa mṛd kapāla ādiṣu sarvatra mṛd tattva pratyabhijñānāt bhavatu evam
tapta upala tala patita naṣṭasya tu udabindoḥ kim asti rūpam anvayi pratyabhijñāyamānam

original: yenāsya na niranvayo nāśaḥ syādityata āha--
analyzed: yena asya na niranvayaḥ nāśaḥ syāt iti atas āha
aspaṣṭa pratyabhijñānāsu api iti

original: atrāpi tattoyaṃ tejasā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalamambudatvāya nīyata ityanumeyaṃ,
analyzed: atrā api tat toyam tejasā mārtaṇḍa maṇḍalam ambuda tvāya nīyate iti anumeyam
mṛd ādīnām aviccheda darśanāt

original: śakyaṃ tatra vaktum'udambindau ca sindhau ca toyabhāvona bhidyate /
analyzed: śakyam tatra vaktum udambindau ca sindhau ca toya bhāvaḥ na bhidyate
vinaṣṭe tatas bindau asti tasya anvayaḥ mbudhau
tasmāt na kaścid api niranvayaḥ nāśaḥ iti siddham
ubhayathā ca doṣāt
parikaraḥ sāmagrī samyak jñānasya yama niyama ādiḥ śravaṇa manana ādiḥ ca
mārgāḥ kṣaṇika nairātmya ādi bhāvanāḥ
ati rohitam anyat
ākāśā u ca aviśeṣāt
etat vyācaṣṭe
yat ca teṣām iti
veda prāmāṇye vipratipannān api prati śabda guṇa anumeya tvam ākāśasya vaktavyam

original: tathāhi-- jātimattvena sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyebhyo vibhaktasya śabdasyāsparśatve sati bāhyaikendriyagrāhyatvena gandhādivadguṇatvamanumitam /
analyzed: tathā hi jātimat tvena sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyebhyaḥ vibhaktasya śabdasya asparśa tve sati bāhya eka indriya grāhya tvena gandha ādi vat guṇa tvam anumitam
na ayam ātma guṇaḥ bāhya indriya gocara tvāt
atas eva na manaḥ guṇaḥ
tad guṇānām apratyakṣa tvāt
na pṛthivī ādi guṇaḥ
tad guṇa gandha ādi sāhacarya anupalabdheḥ

original: tasmādguṇo bhūtvā gandhādivadasādhāraṇendriyagrāhyo yadravyamanumāpayati tadākāśaṃ pañcamaṃ bhūtaṃ vastviti /
analyzed: tasmāt guṇaḥ bhūtvā gandha ādi vat asādhāraṇa indriya grāhyaḥ yat dravyam anumāpayati tat ākāśam pañcamam bhūtam vastu iti
api ca āvaraṇa abhāvam ākāśam icchate iti
niṣedhya niṣedha adhikaraṇa nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇaḥ niṣedhaḥ na asati adhikaraṇa nirūpaṇe śakyaḥ nirūpayitum
tat ca āvaraṇa abhāva adhikaraṇam ākāśam vastu iti
ati rohita artham anyat
anusmṛteḥ ca
vibhajate
api vaināśikaḥ sarvasya vastunaḥ iti
yaḥ tu sati api etasmin upalabdhṛ smartroḥ anya tve samānāyām saṃtatau kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt

original: smṛtirupapatsyata iti manyamāno na parituṣyati taṃ prati pratyabhijñāsamājñātapratyakṣavirodhamāha--
analyzed: smṛtiḥ upapatsyate iti manyamānaḥ na parituṣyati tam prati pratyabhijñā samājñāta pratyakṣa virodham āha
api ca darśana smaraṇayoḥ kartari iti
tatas ham adrākṣīt iti pratīyāt
aham smarāmi anyaḥ tu adrākṣīt iti arthaḥ
pratyabhijñā pratyakṣa virodha prapañcaḥ tu uttaraḥ
ā janmanaḥ ā ca uttamāt ucchvāsāt
āmaraṇāt iti artha
na ca sādṛśya nibandhanam pratyabhijñānam
pūrva apara kṣaṇa darśinaḥ ekasya abhāve tad anupapatteḥ
śaṅkate
tema idam sadṛśam iti
ayam arthaḥ vikalpa pratyayaḥ yam
vikalpaḥ ca sva ākāram bāhya tayā adhyavasyati

original: na tu tattvataḥ pūrvāparau kṣaṇau tayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ vā gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: na tu tattvataḥ pūrva aparau kṣaṇau tayoḥ sādṛśyam vā gṛhṇāti
tat katham ekasya aneka darśinaḥ sthirasya prasaṅgaḥ iti
nirākaroti na
tena idam iti bhinna padārtha upādānāt iti

original: nānāpadārthasaṃbhinnavākyārthābhāsastāvadayaṃ vikalpaḥ prathate tatraite nānāpadārthā na prathanta iti bruvāṇaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ bādheta /
analyzed: nānā padārtha saṃbhinna vākya artha ābhāsaḥ tāvat ayam vikalpaḥ prathate tatra ete nānā padārthāḥ na prathante iti bruvāṇaḥ sva saṃvedanam bādheta
na ca ekasya jñānasya nānā ākāra tvam saṃbhavati
eka tva virodhāt
na ca tāvanti eva jñānāni iti yuktam

original: tathāsati pratyākāraṃ jñānānāṃ samāptesteṣāṃ ca parasparavārtājñānābhāvānnānetyeva na syāt /
analyzed: tathā asati pratyākāram jñānānām samāpteḥ teṣām ca paraspara vārttā jñāna abhāvāt nānā iti eva na syāt
tasmāt pūrva apara kṣaṇa tad sādṛśya gocara tvam jñānasya vaktavyam
na ca etat pūrva apara kṣaṇa avasthāyinam ekam jñātāram vinā iti kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅga prasaṅgaḥ

original: yadyucyeta astytasmin vikalpe tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti padadvayaprayogo na tviha tattedantāspadau padārthau tayośca sādṛśyamiti vivakṣitam,
analyzed: yadi ucyeta asti tasmin vikalpe tena idam sadṛśam iti pada dvaya prayogaḥ na tu iha padārthau tayoḥ ca sādṛśyam iti vivakṣitam
api tu evam ākāra tā jñānasya kalpitā iti tatra āha
yadā hi loka prasiddhaḥ padārthaḥ iti
tatra ekaḥ sva pakṣam sādhayati anyaḥ ca tad sādhanam dūṣayati

original: na caitatsarvamasati vikalpānāṃ bāhyālambanatve 'sati ca lokaprasiddhapadārthakatve bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: na ca etat sarvam asati vikalpānām bāhya ālambana tve sati ca loka prasiddha padārthaka tve bhavitum arhati

original: jñānākāratve hi vikalpapratibhāsināṃ nityatvānityatvādīnāmekārthaviṣayatvābhāvāt jñānānāṃ ca dharmiṇāṃ bhedānna virodhaḥ /
analyzed: jñāna ākāra tve hi vikalpa pratibhāsinām nitya tva anitya tva ādīnām ekārtha viṣaya tva abhāvāt jñānānām ca dharmiṇām bhedāt na virodhaḥ
na hi ātma nitya tvam buddhi anitya tvam ca bruvāṇau vipratipadyate

original: na cālaukikārthenānityaśabdenātmani vibhutvaṃ vivakṣitvānityaśabdaṃ prayuñjāno laukikārthaṃ nityaśabdamātmani prayuñjānena vipratipadyate /
analyzed: na ca alaukika arthena anitya śabdena ātmani vibhu tvam vivakṣitvā anitya śabdam prayuñjānaḥ laukika artham nitya śabdam ātmani prayuñjānena vipratipadyate

original: tasmādanena svapakṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhāpayiṣatā parapakṣasādhanaṃ ca nirācikīrṣatā vikalpānāṃ lokasiddhapadārthakatā bāhyalambanatā ca vaktavyā /
analyzed: tasmāt anena sva pakṣam pratitiṣṭhāpayiṣatā para pakṣa sādhanam ca nirācikīrṣatā vikalpānām loka siddha padārthaka tā bāhya lambana tā ca vaktavyā

original: yadyucyeta dvividho hi vikalpānāṃ viṣayo grāhyaścādhyavaseyaśca /
analyzed: yadi ucyeta dvividhaḥ hi vikalpānām viṣayaḥ grāhyaḥ ca adhyavaseyaḥ ca
tatra su ākāraḥ grāhyaḥ dhī avaseyaḥ tu bāhyaḥ

original: tathāca pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahalakṣaṇā vipratipattiḥ prasiddhapadārthakatvaṃ copapadyata ityata āha--
analyzed: tathā ca pakṣa pratipakṣa parigraha lakṣaṇā vipratipattiḥ prasiddha padārthaka tvam ca upapadyate iti atas āha
evam eva eṣa ṛthaḥ iti niścitam yat tat eva vaktavyam
tatas bahu pralāpi tvam ātmanaḥ kevalam prakhyāpayet
ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ kā iyam adhyavaseya tā bāhyasya
yadi grāhya tā na dvaividhyam
atha anyā sā ucyatām
nanu uktā taiḥ eva sva pratibhāse nartha irtha adhyavasāyena pravṛttiḥ iti
atha vikalpa ākārasya kaḥ yam adhyavasāyaḥ
kim karaṇam āho yojanam uta āropaḥ iti
na tāvat karaṇam
nahi anyat anyat kartu śakyam

original: nahi jātu sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśate /
analyzed: nahi jātu sahasram api śilpinaḥ ghaṭam paṭayitum īśate
na ca antaram bāhyena yojayitum

original: api ca tathāsati yukta iti pratyayaḥ syāt /
analyzed: api ca tathā asati yuktaḥ iti pratyayaḥ syāt
na ca asti
āropaḥ kim gṛhyamāṇe bāhye uta a gṛhyamāṇe

original: yadi gṛhyamāṇe tadā kiṃ vikalpenāho tatsamayajenāvikalpakena /
analyzed: yadi gṛhyamāṇe tadā kim vikalpena aho tad samaya jena avikalpakena
na tāvat vikalpaḥ bhilāpa saṃsarga yogya gocaraḥ śakya abhilāpa samayam sva lakṣaṇam deśa kāla ananugatam gocarayitum arhati
yathā āhuḥ aśakya samayaḥ hi ātmā sukha ādīnām ananya bhāka
teṣām atas sva saṃvittā na arbhi jalpa anuṣaṅgiṇī
iti

original: na ca tatsamayabhāvinā nirvikalpakena gṛhyamāṇe bāhye vikalpenāgṛhīte tatra vikalpaḥ svākāramāropayitumarhati. /
analyzed: na ca tad samaya bhāvinā nirvikalpakena gṛhyamāṇe bāhye vikalpena agṛhīte tatra vikalpaḥ sva ākāram āropayitum arhati

original: na hi rajatajñānāpratibhāsini purovartini vastuni rajatajñānena śakyaṃ rajatamāropayitum /
analyzed: na hi rajata jñāna apratibhāsini purovartini vastuni rajata jñānena śakyam rajatam āropayitum

original: agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye svākāra ityeva syānna bāhya iti /
analyzed: a gṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye su ākāraḥ iti eva syāt na bāhye iti
tathā ca na āropaṇam

original: api cāyaṃ vikalpaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ santaṃ vikalpaṃ kiṃ vastusantaṃ svākāraṃ gṛhītvā paścādbāhyamāropayati,
analyzed: api ca ayam vikalpaḥ sva saṃvedanam santam vikalpam kim vastu santam sva ākāram gṛhītvā paścāt bāhyam āropayati
atha yadā su ākāram gṛhṇāti tadā eva āropayati

original: na tāvat kṣaṇikatayā kramavirahiṇo jñānasya kramavartinī grahaṇāropaṇe kalpete /
analyzed: na tāvat kṣaṇika tayā krama virahiṇaḥ jñānasya krama vartinī grahaṇa āropaṇe kalpete
tasmāt yadā eva sva ākāram anartham gṛhṇāti tadā eva artham āropayati iti vaktavyam
na ca etat yujyate
sva ākāre hi sva saṃvedana pratyakṣa tayā ati viśadaḥ

original: bāhyaṃ cāropyamāṇamaviśadaṃ sattato 'nyadeva syānna tu svākāraḥ samāropitaḥ /
analyzed: bāhyam ca āropyamāṇam aviśadam sat tatas syāt na tu sva ākāraḥ samāropitaḥ
na ca bheda agraha mātreṇa samāropa abhidhānam
vaiśadya avaiśadya rūpa tayā bheda grahasya ukta tvāt
api ca agṛhyamāṇe ced bāhye bāhyāt sva lakṣaṇāt bheda agrahaṇena tad abhimukhī pravṛttiḥ

original: hanta tarhi trailokyata evānena na bhedo gṛhīta iti yatra kvacana pravartetāviśeṣāt /
analyzed: hanta tarhi trailokyataḥ eva anena na bhedaḥ gṛhītaḥ iti yatra kvacana pravarteta aviśeṣāt
etena jñāna ākārasya eva ālokasya api bāhya tva samāropaḥ pratyuktaḥ
tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam tatas bahu pralāpi tvam ātmanaḥ khyāpayet iti

original: api ca sādṛśyanibandhanaḥ saṃvyavahārastenedaṃ sadṛśamityevamākārabuddhinibandhano bhavenna tu tadevedamityākārabuddhinibandhana ityāha-- na
analyzed: api ca sādṛśya nibandhanaḥ saṃvyavahāraḥ tena idam sadṛśam iti evam ākāra buddhi nibandhanaḥ bhavet na tu tat eva idam iti ākāra buddhi nibandhanaḥ iti āha na
ca ayam sādṛśyāt saṃvyavahāraḥ iti

original: nanu jvālādiṣu sādṛśyādasatyāmapi sādṛśyabuddhau tadbhāvāvagamananibandhanaḥ saṃvyahāro dṛśyate yathā tatheheti bhaviṣyatīti pūrvāparitoṣeṇāha--

bhavet api kadacid bāhya vastuni iti

original: tathāhi -- vividhajanasaṃkīrṇagopureṇa puraṃ niviśamānaṃ narāntarebhya ātmanirdhāraṇāyāsādhāraṇaṃ cihnaṃ vidadhatamupahasanti pāśupataṃ pṛthagjanā  #
analyzed: tathā hi vividha jana saṃkīrṇa gopureṇa puram niviśamānam nara antarebhyaḥ ātma nirdhāraṇa āyāsa ādhāraṇam cihnam vidadhatam upahasanti pāśupatam pṛthagjanāḥ

nanu uktam na kṣaṇa bheda abhedābhyām śakti bheda abhedau
bhinnānām api kṣaṇānām eka sāmarthya upalabdheḥ

original: anyathaika eva kṣaṇe nīlajñānajananasāmarthyaṃ iti na bhūyo nīlajñānāni jāyeran. tatsamarthasyātītatvāt,

tat na

original: hanta tarhi nīlasaṃtānānāmapi mitho bhinnānāṃ naikamasti nīlākārādhānasāmarthyamiti saṃnidhāne 'pi nīlasaṃtānāntarasya na nīlajñānamupajāyeta
analyzed: hanta tarhi nīla saṃtānānām api mithas bhinnānām na ekam asti nīla ākāra ādhāna sāmarthyam iti saṃnidhāne pi nīla saṃtāna antarasya na nīla jñānam upajāyeta

original: tasmātsaṃtānāntarāṇāmiva kṣaṇāntarāṇāmapi svakāraṇabhedādhīnopajanānāṃ keṣāñcideva sāmarthyabhedaḥ keṣāñcinneti vaktavyam /

original: tathā caikālayajñānasaṃtānapatiteṣu kasyacideva jñānakṣaṇasya sa tādṛśaḥ sāmarthyātiśayo vāsanāparanāmā svapratyayāsāditaḥ /

original: yato nīlākāraṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ jāyate na pītākāram /

viruddha dharma saṃsargeṇa yujyate jñāna upādheḥ anāvṛta tvāt eva tathā api tad deśa tva a tad deśa tva kampa tva rakta arakta tva lakṣaṇaiḥ viruddha dharma saṃsargaiḥ asya

original: nānātvaṃ prasajyamānaṃ jñānākāratve 'pi na śakyaṃ śakreṇāpi vārayitum /

vyatireka avyatireka vṛtti vikalpau ca paramāṇoḥ aṃśavat tvam ca upapāditāni vaiśeṣika parīkṣāyām
tasmāt bāhya artha vat na jñāne pi sthaulya saṃbhavaḥ
na ca tāvat paramāṇu ābhāsam eka jñānam
ekasya nānā ātma tva anupapatteḥ
ākārāṇām vā jñāna tādātmyāt eka tva prasaṅgāt
na ca yāvantaḥ ākārāḥ tāvanti eva jñānāni

original: na ca tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī samastajñānākārasaṃkalanātmaka ekaḥ sthūlavikalpo vijṛmbhata iti sāṃpratam /

tasya api sa ākāra tayā sthaulya ayogāt

original: yathāha dharmakīrtiḥ- 'tasmānnārthe na ca jñāne sthūlābhāsastadātmanaḥ /

tasmāt bhavatā api jñāna ākāram sthaulyam samarthayamānena

asati arthe tad sārūpyasya tad vyavasthāyāḥ ca anupapatteḥ iti āha

original: yaśca sahopalambhaniyama uktaḥ śo 'pi vkalpaṃ na sahate /

original: yadi jñānārthayoḥ sāhityenopalambhastato viruddho heturnābhedaṃ sādhayitumarhati,

atha eka upalambha niyamaḥ
na eka tvasya a vācakaḥ saha śabdaḥ

original: api ca kimekatvenopalambha āho eka upālambho jñānārthayoḥ /

bahis upalabdheḥ ca viṣayasya
atha eka upalambha niyamaḥ tatra āha

original: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayo 'rupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityavagantavyam /

original: yathā hi sarvaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prabhārūpānuviddhaṃ buddhibodhyaṃ niyamena manujairupalabhyate,

kintu prabhā upāya tvāt niyamaḥ
evam iha api ātma sākṣika anubhava upāya tvāt arthasya eka upalambha niyamaḥ iti

original: api ca yatraikavijñānagocarau ghaṭapaṭau tatrārthabhedaṃ vijñānabhedaṃ cādyavasyanti pratipattāraḥ /
analyzed: api ca yatra eka vijñāna gocarau ghaṭa paṭau tatra artha bhedam vijñāna bhedam ca ādi avasyanti pratipattāraḥ
na ca etat ekātmye iti āha
tathā ghaṭa darśanam paṭa jñānam iti
tathā artha abhede pi vijñāna bheda darśanāt na vijñāna ātmaka tvam arthasya iti āha
tathā ghaṭa darśanam ghaṭa smaraṇam iti

original: api ca svarūpamātraparyavasitaṃ jñānaṃ jñānāntaravārtānabhijñamiti yayorbhedaste dve na gṛhīte iti bhedo 'pi tadgato na gṛhīta iti /

evam kṣaṇika śūnya anātma tva ādayaḥ api aneka pratijñā hetu dṛṣṭānta jñāna bheda sādhyāḥ

original: evaṃ svamasādhāraṇamanyato vyāvṛtaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya tadapi yadvyāvartate yataśca vyāvartate tadanekajñānasādhyam /

original: tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṃ 'vijñānagrahaṇamātra eva vijñānasākṣiṇaḥ pramātuḥ kūṭasthanityacaitanyasya grahaṇakāṅkṣānutpādāt' iti /

original: grāhyatvaṃ ca jñānasya na grāhakakriyājanitaphalaśālitayā yathā bāhyārthasya,

original: grāhyo 'pyarthaḥ pramātāraṃ prati satyāṃ saṃvidi prakaṭaḥ saṃvidapi prakaṭā /

original: syādetatṣa yatprakāśate tadanyena prakāśyate yathā jñānārthau tathā ca sākṣiti nāsti pratyayasākṣiṇorvaiṣamyamityata āha--

original: tathāhi-- asya sākṣiṇaḥ sadāsaṃdigdhāviparītasya nityasākṣātkāratānāgantukaprakāśatve ghaṭate /

original: tathāhi-- pramātā saṃdihāno 'pyasaṃdigdho viparyasyannapyaviparītaḥ parokṣamarthamutprekṣamāṇo 'pyaparokṣaḥ smarannapyanubhavikaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasya
analyzed: tathā hi pramātā saṃdihānaḥ u pi asaṃdigdhaḥ viparyasyan api aviparītaḥ parokṣam artham utprekṣamāṇaḥ u pi aparokṣaḥ smaran api anubhavikaḥ prāṇabhṛt mātrasya

anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ ca uktaḥ

ātma tvāt eva ātmanaḥ pratyagātmanaḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati-sopādānaṃ cetkāryaṃ tata ātmaivopānatvena śruterupādānāntarakalpanānupapatteriti /

astu ātma upādānam asya jagataḥ

na hi ātmā āgantukaḥ kasyacid upādāna antarasya upādeyaḥ

upapāditam etat yathā saṃśaya viparyāsa pārokṣya anāspada tvāt kadāpi na ātmā para adhīna prakāśaḥ
tad adhīna prakāśāḥ tu pramāṇa ādayaḥ

original: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /

analyzed: tatra eteṣām krama apekṣāyām ātmānam ca bhūtāni ca antarā samāmnānāt tena eva pāṭhena kramaḥ niyamyate
tasmāt pūrva utpatti krama bhaṅga prasaṅgaḥ

original: yata ātmanaḥ karaṇāni karaṇebhyaśca bhūtānīti pratīyate,
analyzed: yatas ātmanaḥ karaṇāni karaṇebhyaḥ ca bhūtāni iti pratīyate
tasmāt ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ iti bhajyate

original: annamayamiti ca mayaḍānandamaya itivat na vikārārtha iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-vibhaktatvāttāvanmanaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ
analyzed: anna mayam iti ca mayaṭ ānanda mayaḥ iti vat na vikāra arthaḥ iti prāpte bhidhīyate vibhakta tvāt tāvat manaḥ prabhṛtīnām

original: kāraṇāpekṣāyāmannamayaṃ mana ityādiliṅgaśravaṇādapekṣitārthakathanāya vikārārthatvameva mayaṭo yuktam,
analyzed: kāraṇa apekṣāyām anna mayam manaḥ ityādi liṅga śravaṇāt apekṣita artha kathanāya vikāra artha tvam eva mayaṭaḥ yuktam
itarathā tu anapekṣitam uktam bhavet
na ca tat api ghaṭate
na hi anna mayaḥ yajñaḥ iti vat anna prācuryam manasaḥ saṃbhavati

original: evaṃ codbhūtavikārā mana ādayo bhūtānāṃ parastādutpadyanta iti yuktam /
analyzed: evam ca udbhūta vikārāḥ manaḥ ādayaḥ bhūtānām parastāt utpadyante iti yuktam

atha tu abhautikāni iti
bhavatu ātmanaḥ eva karaṇānām utpattiḥ
na khalu etāvatā bhūtaiḥ ātmanaḥ na utpattavyam
tathā ca na ukta krama bhaṅga prasaṅgaḥ
viśiṣyate bhidyate
bhajyate iti yāvat

devadatta ādi nāmadheyam tāvat jīvātmanaḥ na śarīrasya
tad nāmne śarīrasya śrāddha di karaṇa anupapatteḥ

original: tanmṛto devadatto jāto devadatta iti vyapadeśasya mukhyatvaṃ manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
analyzed: tat mṛtaḥ devadattaḥ jātaḥ devadattaḥ iti vyapadeśasya mukhya tvam manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ

bhaktiḥ ca śarīrasya utpāda vināśau tatas tad saṃyogaḥ iti

original: ata eva smaranti 'evamenaḥ śamaṃ yāti bījagarbhasamudbhavam' iti /

original: ākāśāderiva tu mahāsargādau tadante cotpattivināśau jīvasya bhaviṣyata iti śaṅkāntaramapanetumidamārabhyate /

original: upādhīnā ca manomaya ityādīnāṃ śruterbhūyasīnaṃ ca nityatvājatvādigocarāṇāṃ śrutīnāṃ

original: aupādhikaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ nopādhyapagame saṃbhavatīti svābhāvikameva yujyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: aupādhikam hi kartṛ tvam na upādhi apagame saṃbhavati iti svābhāvikam eva yujyate iti arthaḥ

original: apica yatrāpi karaṇamasti tatrāpi kevalasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvaśravaṇātsvābhāvikameva yuktamityāha-
analyzed: api ca yatra api karaṇam asti tatra api kevalasya ātmanaḥ kartṛ tva śravaṇāt svābhāvikam eva yuktam iti āha
tathā upādāne pi iti
tat etat pariharati
na tāvat saṃdhye iti
upādhi apagamaḥ siddhaḥ ntaḥkaraṇasya upādheḥ saṃdhye pi avasthānāt iti arthaḥ

original: apica svapne yādṛśaṃ jñānaṃ tādṛśo vihāro 'pītyāha-
analyzed: apica svapne yādṛśam jñānam tādṛśaḥ
vihāraḥ pi ca tatra iti
tathā upādāne pi iti

original: yadyapi kartṛvibhaktiḥ kevale kartari śrūyate tathāpi karmakaraṇopadhānakṛtamasya kartṛtvaṃ na śuddhasya,
analyzed: yadi api kartṛ vibhaktiḥ kevale kartari śrūyate tathā api karma karaṇa upadhāna kṛtam asya kartṛ tvam na śuddhasya
nahi paraśu sahāyaḥ chettā kevalaḥ chettā bhavati

original: nanu yadi na kevalasya kartṛtvamapi tu karaṇādisahitasyaiva,
analyzed: nanu yadi na kevalasya kartṛ tvam api tu karaṇa ādi sahitasya eva
tathā sati karaṇa ādiṣu ati kartṛ vibhaktiḥ syāt
na ca etat asti iti āha
bhavati na lokaḥ iti

original: api ceyamupādānaśrutiḥ karaṇavyāpāroparamamātraparā na svātantryaparā kartṛvibhaktistu bhāktī /
analyzed: api ca iyam upādāna śrutiḥ karaṇa vyāpāra uparama mātra parā na svātantrya parā kartṛ vibhaktiḥ tu bhāktī
kūlam pipatiṣati iti vat abuddhi pūrvakasya karaṇa vyāpāra uparamasya dṛṣṭa tvāt iti āha
api ca asmin upādāne iti
yaḥ tu ayam vyapadeśaḥ eti yat tat uktam asmābhiḥ abhyuccaya mātram etam iti tat itas samutthitam
sarva kārakāṇām eva iti

original: viklidyanti taṇḍulā jvalanti kāṣṭhāni sthālīti hi svavyāpāre sarveṣāṃ,
analyzed: viklidyanti taṇḍulāḥ jvalanti kāṣṭhāni sthālī iti hi sva vyāpāre sarveṣām
kartṛ tvam

original: tatkiṃ buddhyādīnāṃ kartṛtvameva na karaṇatvamityata āha-

upalabdhi apekṣam tu eṣām karaṇa tvam

original: nanvevaṃ sati tasyāmevātmanaḥ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamastvityata āha-
analyzed: nanu evam sati tasyām eva ātmanaḥ svābhāvikam kartṛ tvam astu iti atas āha
na ca tasya aṃulabdhau api asya svābhāvika
kartṛ tvam asti kasmāt
nitya upalabdhi svarūpa tvāt ātmanaḥ

tat evam na asya upalabdhau sa vābhāvikam kartṛ tvam asti iti uktam

original: tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvāda iti tanna bhavatītyāha-

na api buddheḥ karaṇa tvam

original: kintu caitanyameva viṣayāvacchinnaṃ vṛttiriti copalabdhiriti cākhyāyate /
analyzed: kintu caitanyam eva viṣaya avacchinnam vṛttiḥ iti ca upalabdhiḥ iti ca ākhyāyate

original: tasya tu tattadviṣayāvacchede vṛttau buddhyadīnāṃ karaṇatvamātmanaśca tadupadhānenāhaṅkārapūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ yujyata iti //40 // 2.3.16.41.
