parāt tu tad śuteḥ

original: yadetajjīvānāmaupādhikaṃ kartṛtvaṃ tatpravartanālakṣaṇeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu neśvaramaparaṃ pravartakaṃ kalpayitumarhati,
analyzed: yat etat jīvānām aupādhikam kartṛ tvam tat pravartanā lakṣaṇeṣu rāga ādiṣu satsu nā īśvaram aparam pravartakam kalpayitum arhati
ati prasaṅgāt

original: naceśvaro dveṣapakṣapātarahito jīvān sādhvasādhuni karmaṇi pravartayitumarhati,
analyzed: na ca īśvaraḥ dveṣa pakṣapāta rahitaḥ jīvān sādhu asādhuni karmaṇi pravartayitum arhati
yena dharma adharma apekṣayā jagat vaicitryam āpadyeta

original: sa hi svatantraḥ kāruṇiko dharma eva jantūn pravartayennādharme /
analyzed: sa hi svatantraḥ kāruṇikaḥ dharme eva jantūn pravartayet na adharme

original: tataśca tatpreritā jantavaḥ sarve dhārmikā eveti sukhina eva syurna duḥkhunaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca tad preritāḥ jantavaḥ sarve dhārmikāḥ evā iti sukhinaḥ eva syuḥ na duḥkhunaḥ

original: svatantrāstu rāgādiprayuktāḥ pravartamānā dharmādharmaparcayavanto vaicitryamanubhavantīti yuktam /
analyzed: svatantrāḥ tu rāga ādi prayuktāḥ pravartamānāḥ dharma adharma parcayavantaḥ vaicitryam anubhavanti iti yuktam

original: evañca vidhiniṣedhayorarthavattvamitarathā tu sarvathā jīvā avastatantrā itīśvareṇaiva pravartyanta iti kṛtaṃ vidhiniṣedhābyām /
analyzed: evam ca vidhi niṣedhayoḥ arthavat tvam itarathā tu sarvathā jīvāḥ a vasta tantrāḥ iti īśvareṇa eva pravartyante iti kṛtam vidhi niṣedhābyām
nahi balavat anila salila ogha nudyamānam pratyupadeśaḥ ūrthavān

original: tasmāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati' ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ samastavidhiniṣedhaśrutivirodhāllokavirodhāccaiśvaryapraśaṃsāparatayā neyā iti prāpte  #
analyzed: tasmāt eṣa hi eva sādhu karma kārayati ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ samasta vidhi niṣedha śruti virodhāt loka virodhāt ca aiśvarya praśaṃsā para tayā neyāḥ iti prāpte
bhidhīyate

original: 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati' ityādayastāvcachutayaḥ sarvavyāpāreṣu jantūnāmīśvaratantratāmāhuḥ,
analyzed: eṣa hi eva sādhu karma kārayati ityādayaḥ tāvcat śutayaḥ sarva vyāpāreṣu jantūnām īśvara tantra tām āhuḥ
tat asati pratibandhake na praśaṃsā para tayā vyākhyātum ucitam
na ca śruti siddhasya kalpanīya tā

original: yena pravartakeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu tatkalpanā virudhyeta /
analyzed: yena pravartakeṣu rāga ādiṣu satsu tad kalpanā virudhyeta

original: na ceśvaratantratve dharma eva jantūnāṃ pravṛtteḥ sukhitvameva na vaicitryamiti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca īśvara tantra tve dharmaḥ eva jantūnām pravṛtteḥ sukhitvam eva na vaicitryam iti yuktam

original: yadyapyayamīśvaro vītarāgastathāpi pūrvapūrvajantukarmāpekṣaya jantūn dha4mādharmayoḥ pravartayan na dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ viṣamaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api ayam īśvaraḥ vīta rāgaḥ tathā api pūrva pūrva jantu karma apekṣaya jantūn pravartayan na dveṣa pakṣapātābhyām viṣamaḥ
na api nirghṛṇaḥ
na ca karma pracayasya ādiḥ asti anādi tvat saṃsārasya
na ca īśvara tantrasya kṛtam vidhi niṣedhābyām iti sāṃpratam

original: nahīśvaraḥ prabalatarapavana iva jantūn pravartayatyapi tu taccaitanyamanurudhyamāno rāgādyupahāramukhena /
analyzed: nahi īśvaraḥ prabalatara pavanaḥ iva jantūn pravartayati api tu tat caitanyam anurudhyamānaḥ rāga ādi upahāra mukhena
evam ca iṣṭa aniṣṭa prāpti parihāra arthinaḥ vidhi niṣedhau arthavantau bhavataḥ

original: tadanenābhisaṃdhinoktam-parāyatte 'pi hi kartṛtvaṃ karotyeva jīva iti /
analyzed: tat anena abhisaṃdhinā uktam parāyatte hi kartṛ tvam karoti eva jīvaḥ iti

original: tasmādvidhiniṣedhaśāstravirodhāllokasya sthūladarśitvāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu ka4ma kārayati' ityādiśruteḥ /

ajñaḥ jantuḥ anīśaḥ yam ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ
īśvara preritaḥ gacchet svargam vā śvabhram eva vā
iti smṛteḥ ca īśvara tantra āmām eva jantūnām kartṛ tvam
na tu svatantrā āmām iti siddham

original: īśvara eva vidhiniṣedhayosthāne niyujyeta yadvidhiniṣedhayoḥ phalaṃ tadīśvareṇa tatpratipāditadharmādharmanirapekṣeṇa kṛtamiti vidhiniṣedhayorānarthakyam
analyzed: īśvaraḥ eva vidhi niṣedhayoḥ thāne niyujyeta yat vidhi niṣedhayoḥ phalam tat īśvareṇa tad pratipādita dharma adharma nirapekṣeṇa kṛtam iti vidhi niṣedhayoḥ ānarthakyam
na kevalam ānarthakyam viparītam ca āpadyeta iti āha
tathā vihita kāriṇam iti
pūrva uktaḥ ca doṣaḥ kṛta nāśa akṛta abhyāgamaḥ prasajyeta
ati rohita artham anyat
aṃśaḥ nānā vyapadeśāt anyathā ca api dāśakitavādi tvam adhīyate eke
avāntara saṃgatim āha
jīva īśvarayoḥ iti
upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ
atra āpātataḥ vinigamanā hetoḥ abhāvāt aniyamaḥ niścayaḥ iti uktaḥ

īśitavya īśitṛ bhāvaḥ ca anveṣya anveṣṭṛ bāvaḥ ca jñeya jñātṛ bhāvaḥ ca niyamya niyantṛ bhāvaḥ ca ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ ca na jīva paramātmanoḥ abhede

original: na ca 'brahmadāśā brahmakitavāḥ' ityādyāśca śrutayo dāśā brahma kitavā brahmetyādipratipādanaparā jīvānāṃ brahmaṇo bhede 'vakalpyante /
analyzed: na ca brahma dāśāḥ brahma kitavāḥ ityādyāḥ ca śrutayaḥ dāśāḥ brahma kitavāḥ brahma ityādi pratipādana parāḥ jīvānām brahmaṇaḥ bhede

original: na caitābhirbhedābedapratipādanaparābhiḥ śrutibiḥ sākṣādaṃśatvapratipādakācca mantravarṇāt 'pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni' ityādeḥ,
analyzed: na ca etābhiḥ bheda abeda pratipādana parābhiḥ śrutibiḥ sākṣāt aṃśa tva pratipādakāt ca mantra varṇāt viśvā bhūtāni ityādeḥ
smṛteḥ ca mama eva aṃśaḥ ityādeḥ jīvānām īśvara aṃśa tva siddiḥ

original: niratiśayopādhisaṃpadā ca vibhūtiyogeneśvaraḥ svāṃśānāmapi nikṛṣṭopādhīnāmīṣṭa iti yujyate /
analyzed: niratiśaya upādhi saṃpadā ca vibhūti yogena īśvaraḥ sva aṃśānām api nikṛṣṭa upādhīnām īṣṭe iti yujyate
nahi tāvat anavayava īśvarasya jīvāḥ bhavitum arhanti aṃśāḥ

original: apica jīvānāṃ brahmāṃśatve tadgatā vedanā brahmaṇo bhavet /
analyzed: api ca jīvānām brahma aṃśa tve tad gatā vedanā brahmaṇaḥ bhavet
pāda ādi gatāḥ iva vedanāḥ devadattasya

original: tataśca brahmabhūyaṅgatasya samastajīvagatavedanānubhavaprasaṅga iti varaṃ saṃsāra eva mukteḥṣa tatra hi svagatavedanāmātrāmanubhavānna bhūri  #
analyzed: tatas ca brahma bhūyaṅgatasya samasta jīva gata vedanā anubhava prasaṅgaḥ iti varam saṃsāraḥ eva mukteḥ sa tatra hi svagata vedanā mātrām anubhavāt na bhūri
duḥkham anubhavati

original: muktastu sarvajīvavedanābhāgiti prayatnena muktiranarthabahulatayā parihartavyā syāditi /
analyzed: muktaḥ tu sarva jīva vedanā bhāj iti prayatnena muktiḥ anartha bahula tayā parihartavyā syāt iti
tathā bheda abhedayoḥ paraspara virodhinoḥ ekatra asaṃbhavāt na aṃśa tvam jīvānām

original: naca brahmaiva sadasantastu jīvā iti yuktaṃ,
analyzed: na ca brahma eva sat asantaḥ tu jīvāḥ iti yuktam
sukha duḥkha mukti saṃsāra vyavasthā bhāva prasaṅgāt anujñā parihāra abhāva prasaṅgāt ca
tasmāt jīvāḥ eva paramārtha santaḥ na brahma ekam advayam

original: advaitaśrutayastu jātideśakālābedanimittopacārāditi prāpte 'bhidhīyate-anadhigatārthāvabodhanāni pramāṇāni viśeṣataḥ śabdaḥ /
analyzed: advaita śrutayaḥ tu jāti deśa kāla a beda nimitta upacārāt iti prāpte bhidhīyate anadhigata artha avabodhanāni pramāṇāni viśeṣataḥ śabdaḥ
tatra bhedaḥ loka siddha tvāt na śabdena pratipādyaḥ
a bedaḥ tu anadhigata tvāt adhigata bheda anuvādena pratipādanam arhati

original: yena ca vākyamupakramyate madhye ca parāmṛśyate ante copasaṃhriyate tatraiva tasya tātparyam /
analyzed: yena ca vākyam upakramyate madhye ca parāmṛśyate ante ca upasaṃhriyate tatra eva tasya tātparyam
upaniṣadaḥ ca advaita upakrama tad parāmarśa tad upasaṃhārāḥ advaica parāḥ eva yujyante
na ca yad parāḥ tat aupacārikam yuktam

original: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvamapi prāgevopacaritatvamityuktam /
analyzed: abhyāse hi bhūyastvam arthasya bhavati na alpa tvam api prāk eva upacarita tvam iti uktam

original: tasmadvaite bāvike sthite jīvabhāvastasya brahmaṇo 'nādyanirvacanīyāvidyapadhānabhedādekasyaiva bimbasya darpaṇādyupādhibhedātpratibimbabhedāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt advaite bāvike sthite jīva bhāvaḥ tasya brahmaṇaḥ na ādi anirvacanīya avidyā apadhāna bhedāt ekasya eva bimbasya darpaṇa ādi upādhi bhedāt pratibimba bhedāḥ
evam ca anujñā parihārau laukika vaidikau sukha duḥkha mukti saṃsāra vyavasthā ca upapadyeta
na ca mokṣasya anartha bahula tā

original: yataḥ pratibimbānāmiva śyāmatāvadātatādirjīvānāmeva nānāvedanābhisaṃbandho brahmaṇastu bimbasyeva na tadabhisaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: yatas pratibimbānām iva śyāma tā avadāta tā ādiḥ jīvānām eva nānā vedanā abhisaṃbandhaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tu bimbasya iva na tad abhisaṃbandhaḥ

original: yathāca darpaṇāpanaye tatpratibimbaṃ bimbabhāve 'vatiṣṭhate na kṛpāṇe pratibimbatamapi /
analyzed: yathā ca darpaṇa apanaye tat pratibimbam bimba bhāve vatiṣṭhate na kṛpāṇe

original: evamavidyopadhānavigame jīve brahmabāveti siddhaṃ jīvo brahmāṃśa iva tattantratayā na tvaṃśa iti tātparyārthāḥ //43 // 2.3.17.44. // 44 //
analyzed: evam avidyā upadhāna vigame jīve brahma bāvā iti siddham jīvaḥ brahma aṃśaḥ iva tad tantra tayā na tu aṃśaḥ iti tātparyārthāḥ
saptadaśa saṃkhyā parimitaḥ rāśiḥ gaṇaḥ saptadaśakaḥ

original: tadyathā-buddhikarmendriyāṇi bāhyāni daśa buddhimanasī vṛttibhedamātreṇa bhinne apyekīkṛtyaikamantaḥ karamaṃ śarīraṃ pca viṣayā iti saptadaśako  #
analyzed: tat yathā buddhi karma indriyāṇi bāhyāni daśa buddhi manasī vṛtti bheda mātreṇa bhinne api ekīkṛtya ekam antar karamam śarīram pca viṣayāḥ iti
rāśiḥ
anujñā vidhiḥ abhimataḥ na tu pravṛtta pravartanā
apauruṣeye pravartayituḥ abhiprāya anurodha asaṃbhavāt
kratu arthāyām agnīṣomīya hiṃsāyām pravṛtta pravartana anupapatteḥ ca
puruṣa arthe niyama aṃśe pravṛtte
kaḥ punar deha saṃbandhaḥ iti

original: nahi kūṭasthanityasyātmanoparimāmino 'sti dehena saṃyogaḥ samavāyo vānyo vā kaścit saṃbandhaḥ sakaladharmātigatvādityabhisaṃdhiḥ /
analyzed: nahi kūṭastha nityasya ātmanā uparimāmino sti dehena saṃyogaḥ samavāyaḥ vā anyaḥ vā kaścid saṃbandhaḥ sakala dharma atiga tvāt iti abhisaṃdhiḥ
uttaram
deha ādiḥ ayam saṃghātaḥ ham eva iti ātmani viparīta pratyaya utpattiḥ

original: ayamarthaḥ-satyaṃ nāsti kaścidātmano dehādibhiḥ pāramārthikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ,
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ satyam na asti kaścid ātmanaḥ deha ādibhiḥ pāramārthikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ

original: kintu buddhyādijanitātmaviṣayā viparītā vṛttiḥ 'ahameva dehādisaṃghātaḥ' ityevaṃrūpā /
analyzed: kintu buddhi ādi janita ātma viṣayā viparītā vṛttiḥ aham eva deha ādi saṃghātaḥ iti evaṃrūpā
asyām deha ādi saṃghātaḥ ātma tādātmyena bhāsate

original: so 'yaṃ sāṃvṛttastādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho na pāramārthika ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ yam sāṃvṛttaḥ tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ na pāramārthikaḥ iti arthaḥ
gūḍha abhisaṃdhiḥ codayati
samyak darśinaḥ tarhi iti

codayati nanu atra vijñānam aṣṭamam iti
na vijānāti iti āhuḥ iti anena anukrāntam
pariharati na eṣa doṣaḥ iti
siddhāntam āha
hasta ādayaḥ tu apare saptabhyaḥ tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ utkrānti bhājaḥ vagamyante graha tva śruteḥ hasta ādīnām
evam khalu eṣām graha tva āmnānam upapadyeta
yadi āmukteḥ ātmānam badhnīyuḥ itarathā ṣāṭkośika śarīra vat eṣām graha tvam
atas eva ca smṛtiḥ eṣām mukti avadhi tām āha
puryaṣṭakena iti
tathā ātharvaṇa śrutiḥ api eṣām ekādaśānām utkrāntim abhivadati

original: tasmācchutyantarebhyaḥ smṛteśca sarvaśabdārthāsaṃkocācca sarveṣāmutkrameṇa sthite 'sminnaivaṃ yaduktaṃ saptaiveti,
analyzed: tasmāt śuti antarebhyaḥ smṛteḥ ca sarva śabda artha asaṃkocāt ca sarveṣām utkrameṇa sthite smin na evam yat uktam sapta eva iti
kintu pradarśana artham saptatva saṃkhyā iti siddham
aṇavaḥ ca
atra sāṃkhyānām āhaṅkārika tvāt indriyāṇām ahaṅkārasya ca jagnā maṇḍala vyāpi tvāt sarva gatāḥ prāṇāḥ

original: vṛttisteṣāṃ śarīradeśatayā prādeśikī tannibandhanā ca gatyāgatiśrutiriti manyante,
analyzed: vṛttiḥ teṣām śarīra deśa tayā prādeśikī tad nibandhanā ca gati āgati śrutiḥ iti manyante

original: tānpratyāha-aṇavaśca prāṇā anudbhūtarūpaspartā cāṇutvaṃ duradhigamatvānna tu paramāṇutvaṃ
analyzed: tān pratyāha aṇavaḥ ca prāṇāḥ anudbhūta rūpa spartā ca aṇu tvam duradhigama tvāt na tu paramāṇu tvam
deha vyāpi kārya anutpatti prasaṅgāt tāpa dūnasya śiśira hrada nimagnasya sarvāṅgīṇa śīta sparśa upalabdhiḥ asti iti uktam
etat uktam bhavati yadi sarva gatāni indriyāṇi bhaveyuḥ tatas

original: sarvagatatve 'pi dehāvacchinnānāmeva karaṇatvaṃ tena na vyavahitaviprakṛṣṭavastūpalambhaprasaṅga iti cet,
analyzed: sarvagata tve pi deha avacchinnānām eva karaṇa tvam tena na vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa vastu upalambha prasaṅgaḥ iti ced

original: hanta prāptāprāptāvivekena śarīrāvacchinnānāmeva teṣāṃ karaṇatvamindriyatvamiti na vyāpināmindriyabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: hanta prāpta aprāpta avivekena śarīra avacchinnānām eva teṣām karaṇa tvam indriya tvam iti na vyāpinām indriya bhāvaḥ

original: tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvādo nārthe 'smābhistadindriyamucyate bhavadbhistu vṛttiriti siddhamaṇavaḥ prāṇā iti / .7 // 2.4.4.8.
analyzed: tathā ca nāma mātre visaṃvādaḥ na arthe smābhiḥ tat indriyam ucyate bhavadbhiḥ tu vṛttiḥ iti siddham aṇavaḥ prāṇāḥ iti
śreṣṭhaḥ ca
na kevalam itare prāṇāḥ brahma vikārāḥ
śreṣṭhaḥ ca prāṇaḥ brahma vikāraḥ

original: 'nāsadāsīt' ityadhikṛtya pravṛtte brahmasūkte nāsadāsīye sargātprāgānīditi prāṇavyāpāraśravaṇādasati
analyzed: nāsat āsīt iti adhikṛtya pravṛtte brahmasūkte nāsadāsīye sargāt prāgānīt iti prāṇa vyāpāra śravaṇāt asati

original: ca vyāpārānupapatte prāṇasadbhāvājjyeṣṭhatvaśruteśca na brahmavikāraḥ prāṇa iti manvānasya
analyzed: ca vyāpāra anupapatte prāṇa sadbhāvāt jyeṣṭha tva śruteḥ ca na brahma vikāraḥ prāṇaḥ iti manvānasya
bahu śruti virodhe ca śrutyoḥ etayoḥ gatim a paśyataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ
rāddhāntaḥ tu bahu śruti virodhāt evānīt iti na prāṇa vyāpāra pratipādinī

original: kintu sṛṣṭikāraṇamānīt jīvati sma āsīditi yāvat /
analyzed: kintu sṛṣṭi kāraṇam ānīt jīvati smaḥ āsīt iti yāvat
tena tad sadbhāva pratipādana parā
jyeṣṭha tvam ca śrotra ādi apekṣam iti gamayitavyam
tasmāt bahu śruti anurodhāt mukhyasya api prāṇasya brahma vikāra tvam iti siddham
na vā āyu kriye pṛthak upadeśāt
saṃprati mukhya prāṇa svarūpam nirūpyate

original: atra hi 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ' iti śrutervāyureva prāṇa iti pratibāti /
analyzed: atra hi yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ iti śruteḥ vāyuḥ eva prāṇaḥ iti

original: athavā 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā' iti vāyorbhedena prāṇasya śravaṇādetadvirodhādvaraṃ tantrāntarīyameva prāṇasya
analyzed: athavā prāṇaḥ eva brahmaṇaḥ caturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā iti vāyoḥ bhedena prāṇasya śravaṇāt etad virodhāt varam tantra antarīyam eva prāṇasya

original: śrutī ca viruddhārthe kathañcinneṣyete iti sāmānyakaraṇavṛttireva prāṇo 'stu /
analyzed: śrutī ca viruddha arthe kathañcid na iṣyete iti sāmānya karaṇa vṛttiḥ eva prāṇaḥ u stu

original: na cātrāpi karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthakprāṇasyānukramaṇaśrutivirodho vṛttivṛttimatorbhedāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: na ca atra api karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthak prāṇasya anukramaṇa śruti virodhaḥ vṛtti vṛttimatoḥ bhedāt iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
siddhāntaḥ tu sāmānya indriya vṛttiḥ prāṇaḥ

original: sa hi militānāṃ vendriyāṇāṃ vṛttirbhavet pratyekaṃ vā /
analyzed: sa hi militānām vā indriyāṇām vṛttiḥ bhavet pratyekam vā
na tāvat militānām
eka dvi tri catur indriya abhāve tad abhāva prasabhaṅgāt
no khalu cūrṇa haridrā saṃyoga janma aruṇa guṇaḥ tayoḥ anyatara abhāve bhavitum arhati
na ca bahu viṣṭi sādhyam śibikā udvahanam dvi tri viṣṭi sādhyam
na ca tvac eka sādhyam
tathā sati sāmānya vṛtti tva anupapatteḥ

original: apica yatsaṃbhūya kārakāṇi niṣpādayanti tatpradhānavyāpārānuguṇāvāntaravyāpāreṇaiva yathā vayasāṃ prātisviko vyāpāraḥ pañjaracālanānuguṇaḥ
analyzed: api ca yat saṃbhūya kārakāṇi niṣpādayanti tad pradhāna vyāpāra anuguṇa avāntara vyāpāreṇa eva yathā vayasām prātisvikaḥ vyāpāraḥ pañjara cālana anuguṇaḥ

original: na cendriyāṇāṃ prāṇe pradhānavyāpāre janayitavye 'sti tādṛśaḥ kaścidavāntaravyāpārastadanuguṇaḥ /
analyzed: na ca indriyāṇām prāṇe pradhāna vyāpāre janayitavye sti tādṛśaḥ kaścid avāntara vyāpāraḥ tad anuguṇaḥ

original: ye ca rūpādipratyayā na te tadanuguṇāḥ,
analyzed: ye ca rūpa ādi pratyayāḥ na te tad anuguṇāḥ

original: tasmānnendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyavṛttiḥ prāṇastathā ca vṛttivṛttimatoḥ kathañcidbhedavivakṣayā na pṛthagupadeśo gamayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na indriyāṇām sāmānya vṛttiḥ prāṇaḥ tathā ca vṛtti vṛttimatoḥ kathañcid bheda vivakṣayā na pṛthak upadeśaḥ gamayitavyaḥ
tasmāt na kriyā
na api vāyu mātram prāṇaḥ

original: kintu vāyubheda evādhyātmāmāpannaḥ pañcavyūhaḥ prāṇa iti //9 // 2.4.5.10.
analyzed: kintu vāyu bhedaḥ eva adhyātma āmāpannaḥ pañca vyūhaḥ prāṇaḥ iti
syāt etat

original: yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvaṃ prati guṇabhūtatvājjīvasya ca śreṣṭhatvājjīvaḥ svatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi prādhānyāt śreṣṭhatvācca svatantraḥ prāpnoti
analyzed: yathā cakṣuḥ ādīnām jīvam prati guṇa bhūta tvāt jīvasya ca śreṣṭha tvāt jīvaḥ svatantraḥ evam prāṇaḥ u pi prādhānyāt śreṣṭha tvāt ca svatantraḥ prāpnoti

original: naca dvayoḥ svatantrayorekasmin śarīre ekavākyatvamupapadyata ityaparyāyaṃ viruddhānekadikkriyatayā deha unmathyeta /
analyzed: na ca dvayoḥ svatantrayoḥ ekasmin śarīre eka vākya tvam upapadyate iti aparyāyam viruddha aneka diś kriyatayā dehaḥ unmathyeta
iti prāpte ucyate
cakṣuḥ ādi vat tu tad saha śiṣṭi ādibhyaḥ

original: yadyapi cakṣurādyapekṣayā śreṣṭhatvaṃ prādhānyaṃ ca prāṇasya tathāpi saṃhatatvādacetanatvādbhautikatvāccakṣurādibiḥ
analyzed: yadi api cakṣuḥ ādi apekṣayā śreṣṭha tvam prādhānyam ca prāṇasya tathā api saṃhata tvāt acetana tvāt bhautika tvāt cakṣuḥ ādibiḥ

original: sahaśiṣṭatvāccaca puruṣārthatvāt puruṣaṃ prati pāratantryaṃ śayanāsanādivadbhavet /
analyzed: saha śiṣṭa tvāt ca ca puruṣa artha tvāt puruṣam prati pāratantryam śayana āsana ādi vat bhavet

original: tathāca yathā mantrītareṣu naiyogikeṣu pradhānamapi rājānamapekṣyāsvatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi cakṣurādiṣu pradhānamapi jīve 'svatantra iti //10
analyzed: tathā ca yathā mantrī itareṣu naiyogikeṣu pradhānam api rājānam apekṣya asvatantraḥ evam cakṣuḥ ādiṣu pradhānam api jīve svatantraḥ iti

original: syādetaccakṣurādibiḥ saha śāsanena karaṇaṃ cet prāṇaḥ /
analyzed: syāt etat cakṣuḥ ādibiḥ saha śāsanena karaṇam ced prāṇaḥ
evam sati cakṣuḥ ādi viṣaya rūpa ādi vat asya api viṣaya antaram
na ca tat śakyam vaktum
ekādaśa karaṇa gaṇana vyākopaḥ ca iti doṣam pariharati
akaraṇa tvāt ca na doṣaḥ tathā hi darśayati
na prāṇaḥ pariccheda dhāraṇa ādi karaṇam asmābhiḥ abhyupeyate yena asya viṣaya antaram anviṣyeta

original: ekādaśatvaṃ ca karaṇānāṃ vyākupyetāpi tu prāṇāntarāsaṃbhavi dehendriyavidhāraṇakāraṇaṃ prāṇaḥ /
analyzed: ekādaśa tvam ca karaṇānām vyākupyeta api tu prāṇa antara asaṃbhavi deha indriya vidhāraṇa kāraṇam prāṇaḥ

original: tacca śrutiprabandhena darśitaṃ na kevalaṃ śarīrendriyadhāraṇamasya kāryam //11 // 2.4.5.12.
analyzed: tat ca śruti prabandhena darśitam na kevalam śarīra indriya dhāraṇam asya kāryam  /
api ca
pañca vṛttiḥ manaḥ vat vyapadiśyate
viparyayaḥ mithyā jñānam a tad rūpa pratiṣṭham yathā maru marīcika ādiṣu salila ādi buddhayaḥ
a tad rūpa pratiṣṭha tā ca saṃśaye pi asti tasya eka apratiṣṭhānāt
atas saḥ pi saṃgṛhītaḥ
śabda jñāna anupātī vastu śūnyaḥ vikalpaḥ

original: yadyapi mithyājñāne 'pyasti vastuśūnyatā tathāpi na tasya vyavahārahetutāsti /
analyzed: yadi api mithyājñāne pi asti vastu śūnyatā tathā api na tasya vyavahāra hetu tā asti
asya tu paṇḍita rūpa vicāra asahasya api śabda jñāna māhātmyāt vyavahāra ahetu bhāvaḥ sti eva
puruṣasya caitanyam iti
na hi atra ṣaṣṭhī arthaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sti
tasya bheda adhiṣṭhāna tvāt
caitanyasya puruṣāt atyanta abhedāt

original: yadyapi cātrābhāvapratyayālambanā vṛttirneṣyate tathāpi vikṣepasaṃskāralakṣaṇā manovṛttirihāstyeveti sajñavamavadātam //12 // 2.4.6.13.
analyzed: yadi api ca atra abhāva pratyaya ālambanā vṛttiḥ na iṣyate tathā api vikṣepa saṃskāra lakṣaṇā manaḥ vṛttiḥ iha asti eva iti sajñavam avadātam  /
aṇuḥ ca
samāḥ tribhiḥ lokaiḥ iti vibhu tva śravaṇāt vibhuḥ prāṇaḥ
samaḥ ityādyāḥ tu śrutayaḥ vibhoḥ api avacchedāt bhāviṣyanti

original: yathā vibhuna ākāśasya kuṭakarakādyavacchedātkuṭādisāmyamiti prāpta āha-
analyzed: yathā vibhunaḥ ākāśasya kuṭa karaka ādi avacchedāt kuṭa ādi sāmyam iti prāptaḥ āha
aṇuḥ ca
utkrānti gati āgati śrutibhyaḥ ādhyātmikasya prāṇasya avacchinna tā na vibhu tvam
duradhigama tā mātreṇa ca śarīra vyāpinaḥ u pi aṇu tvam upacaryate na tu aṇu tvam iti uktam adhastāt

original: yattvasya vibhutvānmānaṃ tadādhidaivikena sūtrātmanā samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpeṇa na tvādhyātmikena rūpeṇa /
analyzed: yat tu asya vibhu tvāt mānam tat ādhidaivikena sūtra ātmanā samaṣṭi vyaṣṭi rūpeṇa na tu ādhyātmikena rūpeṇa

original: tadāśrayāśca 'samaḥ pluṣiṇā' ityevamādyāḥ śrutayo dehasāmyameva prāṇasyāhuḥ svarūpato na tu karakākāśavatparopādhikatayā kathañcinnatavyā iti
analyzed: tad āśrayāḥ ca samaḥ pluṣiṇā iti evamādyāḥ śrutayaḥ deha sāmyam eva prāṇasya āhuḥ svarūpataḥ na tu karaka ākāśa vat para upādhikatayā kathañcid natavyāḥ iti
jyotiḥ ādi adhiṣṭhānam tu tad āmananāt

original: yaddhi tatkāryaṃ kurvaddṛṣṭaṃ tatsvamahimnaiva karotityeṣa tāvadutsargaḥtha parādhiṣṭhānaṃ tu tasya balavatpramāṇāntaravaśāt. syādetat /
analyzed: yat hi tat kāryam kurvat dṛṣṭam tat sva mahimnā eva karoti iti eṣa tāvat utsargaḥ para adhiṣṭhānam tu tasya balavat pramāṇa antara vaśāt syāt etat
vāsi ādīnām takṣa ādi adhiṣṭhitānām acetanānām kārya kāri tva darśanāt acetana tvena undriyāṇām api adhiṣṭhātṛ devatā kalpanā iti ced na
jīva sthā eva adhiṣṭhātuḥ cetanasya vidyamāna tvāt

original: naca 'agnirvāgbhūtvavā mukhaṃ prāviśat' ityādiśrutibhyo devatānāmapyadhiṣṭhātṛtvamabhyupagantuṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na ca agniḥ vāc bhūtvā vā mukham prāviśat ityādi śrutibhyaḥ devatānām api adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam abhyupagantum yuktam
aneka adhiṣṭhāna abhyupagame hi teṣām eka abhiprāya niyama nimitta abhāvāt na kiñcid kāryam utpadyeta virodhāt

original: apica ya indriyāṇāmadhiṣṭhātā sa eva bhokteti devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvena svāmitvaṃ śarīra iti na jīvaḥ svāmī syādbhoktā ca /
analyzed: apica yaḥ indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātā saḥ eva bhoktā iti devatānām bhoktṛ tvena svāmi tvam śarīre iti na jīvaḥ svāmī syāt bhoktā ca

original: tasmādagnyādyupacāro vāgādiṣu prakāśakatvādinā kenacinnimittena gamayitatavyo natu svarūpeṇāgnyādidevatānāṃ mukhādyanupraveśa iti prāptam /
analyzed: tasmāt agni ādi upacāraḥ vāc ādiṣu prakāśaka tva ādinā kenacid nimittena na tu svarūpeṇa agni ādi devatānām mukha ādi anupraveśaḥ iti prāptam

original: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-nānāvidhāsu tāvacchutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca tatra tatra vāgādiṣvagnyādidevatādhiṣṭhānavagamyate /
analyzed: evam prāpte ucyate nānāvidhāsu tāvat śutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca tatra tatra vāc ādiṣu agni ādi devatā adhiṣṭhān avagamyate
na ca tat asatyām anupapattau kleśena vyākhyātum ucitam
na ca svarūpa upayoga bheda jñāna virahiṇaḥ jīvasya indriya adhiṣṭhātṛ tva saṃbhavaḥ

original: saṃbhavati tu devatānāmindriyādyārṣeṇa jñānena sākṣātkṛtavatīnāṃ tatsvarūpabhedatadupayogabhedavijñānam /
analyzed: saṃbhavati tu devatānām indriya ādi ārṣeṇa jñānena sākṣātkṛtavatīnām tad svarūpa bheda tad upayoga bheda vijñānam

original: tasmāttāstā eva devatāstattatkaraṇādhiṣṭhātrya iti yuktaṃ na tu jīvaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tāḥ tāḥ eva devatāḥ tad tad karaṇa adhiṣṭhātryaḥ iti yuktam na tu jīvaḥ
bhavatu vā tathā api adoṣaḥ

original: anekeṣāmadhiṣṭhātaṇāmekaḥ parameśvaro 'sti niyantāntaryāmī tadśādvipratipitsavo 'pi na vipratipattumarhanti /
analyzed: anekeṣām adhiṣṭhātaṇām ekaḥ parameśvaraḥ sti niyantā antaryāmī na vipratipattum arhanti
tathā ca ekavākya tayā na tad kārya utpatti pratyūhaḥ
na ca etāvatā devatānām atra śarīre bhoktṛ tvam

original: nahi yantā rathamadhitiṣṭhinnapi tatsādhyavijayāderbhoktāpi tu svāmyeva /
analyzed: nahi yantā ratham adhitiṣṭhit api tad sādhya vijaya ādeḥ bhoktā api tu svāmī eva

original: evaṃ devatā adhiṣṭhātryo 'pi na bhoktryastāsāṃ tāvnamātrasya śrutatvāt /
analyzed: evam devatāḥ adhiṣṭhātryaḥ u pi na bhoktryaḥ tāsām tāvna mātrasya śruta tvāt
bhoktā tu jīvaḥ eva

original: naca narādiśarīrocitaṃ duḥkhabahulamupabhogaṃ sukhamapyo devatā arhanti /
analyzed: na ca nara ādi śarīra ucitam duḥkha bahulam upabhogam sukham apyaḥ devatāḥ arhanti
tasmāt prāṇānām adhiṣṭhātryaḥ devatāḥ iti siddham
śeṣam atirohita artham
te indriyāṇi tad vyapadeśāt anyatra śreṣṭhāt
mā bhūt prāṇaḥ vṛttiḥ indriyā āmām

original: indriyāṇyevāsya jyeṣṭhasya ca prāṇasya vṛttayo bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: indriyāṇi eva asya jyeṣṭhasya ca prāṇasya vṛttayaḥ bhaviṣyanti
tad bhāva abhāva anuvidhāyi bhāva abhāva tvam indriyāṇām śruti anubhava siddham
tathā ca prāṇa śabdasya ekasya anya āṭyam aneka ārtvam na bhaviṣyati
vṛttīnām vṛttimataḥ tattva antara tva abhāvāt
tattva antara tve tu indriyāṇām
prāṇa śabdasya aneka artha tvam prasajyeta
indriyeṣu lākṣaṇika tvam vā
na ca mukhya saṃbhave lakṣaṇā yuktā ughanya tvāt

original: naca bhedena vyapadeśo bhedasādhanam 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' ityādirmanaso 'pīndriyebhyo 'sti bhedena vyapadeśa ityanindriyatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: na ca bhedena vyapadeśaḥ bheda sādhanam etasmāt jāyate prāṇaḥ ityādiḥ manasaḥ u pi indriyebhyaḥ sti bhedena vyapadeśaḥ iti anindriya tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: smṛtivaśāttu tasyendriyatve indriyāmāmapi prāṇādbhedena vyapadiṣṭānāmapyasti prāṇasvabhāvatve 'hanta asyaiva rūpamasāma' iti śrutiḥ /
analyzed: smṛti vaśāt tu tasya indriya tve indriya āmām api prāṇāt bhedena vyapadiṣṭānām api asti prāṇa svabhāva tve hanta asya eva rūpam asāmaḥ iti śrutiḥ

original: tasmādupapatteḥ śruteśca prāṇasyaiva vṛttasya ekādaśendriyāṇi na tattvāntarāṇīti prāptam /
analyzed: tasmāt upapatteḥ śruteḥ ca prāṇasya eva vṛttasya ekādaśa indriyāṇi na tattva antarāṇi iti prāptam
evam prāptaḥ ucyate mukhyāt prāṇāt tattva antarāṇi
tatra tatra bhedena vyapadeśāt
mṛtyu prāpta aprāpta tva lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma saṃsarga śruteḥ
artha kriyā bhedāt ca
deha dhāraṇam hi prāṇasya kriyā artha ālocana manane ca indriyāṇām
na ca tad bhāva abāva anuvidhānam tad vṛtti tām āvahati
dehena vyabhicārāt
prāṇa ādayaḥ hi deha anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinaḥ na ca deha ātmanaḥ
yā api ca prāṇa rūpa tām indriyāṇām abhidadhāti śrutiḥ

original: tatrāpi paurvāparyālocanāyāṃ bheda eva pratīyata ityuktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
analyzed: tatra api paurvāparya ālocanāyām bhedaḥ eva pratīyate iti uktam bhāṣyakṛtā

original: tasmādbahuśrutivirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca prāṇarūpatābhidhānamindriyāṇāṃ prāṇāyattatayā bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt bahu śruti virodhāt pūrva apara virodhāt ca prāṇa rūpatā abhidhānam indriyāṇām prāṇa āyatta tayā bhāktam gamayitavyam
manasaḥ tu indriya tve smṛteḥ avagate kkacid indriyebhyaḥ bhedena upādānam go balīvarda nyāyena
athavā indriyāṇām vartamāna mātra viṣaya tvāt manasaḥ tu traikālya gocara tvāt bhedena abhidhānam

original: naca prāṇe bhedavyapadeśabāhulyaṃ tathā netuṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na ca prāṇe bheda vyapadeśa bāhulyam tathā netum yuktam
prāṇa rūpa tā śruteḥ ca gatiḥ darśitā

original: tathā jyeṣṭhe prāṇaśabdasya mukhyatvādindriyeṣu tatastattvāntareṣu lākṣaṇikaḥ prāṇaśabda iti yuktam /
analyzed: tathā jyeṣṭhe prāṇa śabdasya mukhya tvāt indriyeṣu tatas tattva antareṣu lākṣaṇikaḥ prāṇa śabdaḥ iti yuktam
na ca mukhya tva anurodhena avagata bhedayoḥ aikyam yuktam

original: anye tu bhedaśabdādhyayāhārabhiyā bhedaśruteśceti paunaruktyabhiyā ca tacchabdasya cānantaroktaparamārthakatvādanyathā varṇayāñcakruḥ /
analyzed: anye tu bheda śabda adhyaya āhāra bhiyā bheda śruteḥ ca iti paunaruktya bhiyā ca tad śabdasya ca anantara ukta parama arthaka tvāt anyathā varṇayāñcakruḥ

original: kimekādaśaiva vāgādaya indriyāṇyāho prāṇo 'pīti viśaye indrasyātmano liṅgamindriyaṃ,
analyzed: kim ekādaśa eva vāc ādayaḥ indriyāṇi āho prāṇa u pi iti viśaye indrasya ātmanaḥ liṅgam indriyam

original: indraliṅgatā tu vyutpattimātranimittaṃ yathā gacchatīti gauriti /

idam ca asya deha adhiṣṭhāna tvam yat deha anugraha upaghātābhyām tad anugraha upaghātau

original: tasmādrūḍhervāgādaya evendriyāṇi na prāṇa iti siddham /

prāyaṇasya ca eka praghaṭṭakena sakala karma abhivyañjaka tvāt
na khalu abhivyakti nimittasya sādhāraṇye bhivyakti niyamaḥ yuktaḥ
phala dāna abhimukhīkaraṇam ca abhivyaktiḥ tasmāt samastam eva karma phalam upabhojita vat
sva phala virodhi ca karma
tasmāt śuteḥ upapatteḥ cam niranuśayānām eva caraṇāt ācārāt avarohaḥ na karmaṇaḥ
ācāra karmaṇī ca śruteḥ prasiddha bhede
yathākārī yathā cārī tathā bhavati iti

original: tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā ityācārameva yoninimittamupadiśati na tu karma /
analyzed: tathā ca ramaṇīya caraṇāḥ kapūya caraṇāḥ iti ācāram eva yoni nimittam upadiśati na tu karma

original: stāṃ vā karmaśīle dve apyaviśeṣeṇānuśayastathāpi yadyapyayamiṣṭāpūrtakārī svayaṃ
analyzed: stām vā karma śīle dve api aviśeṣeṇa anuśayaḥ tathā api yadi api ayam iṣṭāpūrta kārī svayam
niranuśaye bhukta bhoga tvāt tathā api pitṛ ādi gata anuśaya vaśāt tad vipākān jāti āyuḥ bhogan candra lokāt avaruhya anubhaviṣyati

original: smaryate hyanyasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtābhyāmanyasya tatsaṃbandhinastatphalabhāgitā-'patatyardhaśarīreṇa yasya bhāryā surāṃ pibet' ityādi /
analyzed: smaryate hi anyasya sukṛta duṣkṛtābhyām anyasya tad saṃbandhinaḥ tad phala bhāgi tā patati ardha śarīreṇa yasya bhāryā surām pibet ityādi
tathā śrāddha vaiśvānarīya iṣṭi ādeḥ pitā putra ādi gami phala śrutiḥ

original: tasmādyāvatsaṃpātamityupakramānurodhāt 'yat kiñceha karoti' iti ca śrutyantarānusārādramaṇīyacaraṇatvaṃ saṃbandhyantaragatamiṣṭāpūrtakāriṇi  #
analyzed: tasmāt yāvatsaṃpātam iti upakrama anurodhāt yat kiñca iha karoti iti ca śruti antara anusārāt ramaṇīya caraṇa tvam saṃbandhi antara gatam iṣṭāpūrta kāriṇi
bhāktam gamayitavyam

original: tathāca niranuśayānāmeva bhuktabhogānāmavaroha iti prāpta ucyate-yena karmakalāpena phalamupabhojitaṃ tasminnatīte 'pi sānuśayā eva candramaṇḍalādavarohanti
analyzed: tathā ca niranuśayānām eva bhukta bhogānām avarohaḥ iti prāptaḥ ucyate yena karma kalāpena phalam upabhojitam tasmin atīte sa anuśayāḥ eva candra maṇḍalāt avarohanti
kutas dṛṣṭa smṛtibhyām
pratyakṣa dṛṣṭā śrutiḥ dṛṣṭa śabda vācyā
smṛtiḥ ca upanyastā
athavā dṛṣṭa śabdena uccāvaca rūpaḥ bhogaḥ ucyate
ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ kapūya caraṇāḥ ramaṇīya caraṇāḥ iti avarohitām etat viśeṣaṇam
na ca sati mukhya artha saṃbhave saṃbandhi mātreṇa upacarita artha tvam nyāṭyam
na ca upakrama virodhāt śuti antara virodhāt ca mukhya artha saṃbhavaḥ iti sāṃpratam
datta phala iṣṭāpūrta karma apekṣayā api yāvat padasya yat kiñca iti padasya ca upapatteḥ

original: nahi 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt' iti yāvajjīvamahāravihārādisamaye 'pi homaṃ vidhatte nāpi madhyāhnādāvapi tu sāyaṃprātaḥkālāpekṣayā /
analyzed: nahi yāvajjīvam agnihotram juhuyāt iti yāvajjīvam ahāra vihāra ādi samaye homam vidhatte na api madhyāhna ādau api tu sāyam prātar kāla apekṣayā
sāyam prātar kāla vidhāna sāmarthyāt
kālasya ca anupādeya tayā anaṅgasya api nimitta anupraveśāt tatra evam iti ced na
iha api ramaṇīya caraṇāḥ ityādeḥ mukhya artha tva anurodhāt tad upapatteḥ
tat kim idānīm upasaṃhāra anurodhena upakramaḥ saṃkocayitavyaḥ
na iti ucyate
na hi asau upasaṃhāra anurodhe pi a saṃkucat vṛttiḥ upapattum arhati

original: nahi yāvantaḥ saṃpātā yāvatāṃ vā puṃsāṃ saṃpātāste sarve tatreṣṭādikāriṇā bhogena kṣayaṃ nīyante /
analyzed: nahi yāvantaḥ saṃpātāḥ yāvatām vā puṃsām saṃpātāḥ te sarve tatra iṣṭa ādi kāriṇā bhogena kṣayam nīyante
puruṣa antara āśrayāṇām karma āśayānām tad bhogena kṣaye tiprasaṅgāt
cira upabhuktānām ca karma āśayānām asatām candra maṇḍala upabhogena apanayanāt
tathā ca svayam saṃkucantī yāvat śutiḥ upasaṃhāra anurodha prāptam api saṃkocanam anumanyate
etena yat kiñca iha karoti iti api vyākhyātam

original: api ceṣṭāpūrtakārīha janmani kevalaṃ na tanmātramakārṣīdapi tu godohanenāpaḥ praṇayan paśuphalamapyapūrvaṃ samacaiṣīt /
analyzed: api ca iṣṭāpūrta kārī iha janmani kevalam na tad mātram akārṣīt api tu godohanena apaḥ praṇayan paśu phalam api apūrvam samacaiṣīt

original: evamaharniśaṃ ca vāṅmanaḥ śarīraceṣṭābhiḥ puṇyāpuṇyamihāmutropabhogyaṃ saṃcitavato na martyalokādibhogyaṃ candraloke bhagyaṃ bhavitumarhati
analyzed: evam aharniśam ca vāc manaḥ śarīra ceṣṭābhiḥ puṇya apuṇyam iha amutra upabhogyam saṃcitavataḥ na martya loka ādi bhogyam candra loke bhagyam bhavitum arhati

original: naca svaphalavirodhino 'nuśayasya ṛte prayāścittādātmajñānādvādattaphalasya dhvaṃsaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na ca sva phala virodhinaḥ nuśayasya ṛte prayāḥ cittāt ātma jñānāt vā ādatta phalasya dhvaṃsaḥ saṃbhavati
tasmāt tena anuśayena ayam anuśayavān parāvartate iti śliṣṭam
na ca eka bhavikaḥ karma āśayaḥ iti agre bhāṣyakṛt vakṣyati

original: anye tu sakalakarmakṣaye parāvṛttiśaṅkā nirbījeti manyamānā anyathādhikaraṇaṃ varṇayāñcakrurityāha-
analyzed: anye tu sakala karma kṣaye parāvṛtti śaṅkā nirbījā iti manyamānāḥ anyathā adhikaraṇam varṇayāñcakruḥ iti āha
kecid tāvat āhuti
anuśayaḥ tra datta phalasya karmaṇaḥ śeṣaḥ ucyate

original: tatredamiha vicāryate-kiṃ dattaphalānāmiṣṭāpūrtakarmaṇāmavaśeṣādihāvartante uta tānyupabhogena nirāvaśeṣaṃ kṣapayitvānupabhuktakarmaśādihāvartanta  #
analyzed: tatra idam iha vicāryate kim datta phalānām iṣṭāpūrta karmaṇām avaśeṣāt iha āvartante uta tāni upabhogena nirāvaśeṣam kṣapayitvā anupabhukta karma śāt iha āvartanta
iti

original: tatreṣṭādīnāṃ bhogena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvānniranuśayā evānupabhuktakarmavaśādāvartanta iti prāpta ucyate-sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
analyzed: tatra iṣṭa ādīnām bhogena sa mūla kāṣam kaṣita tvāt niranuśayāḥ eva anupabhukta karma vaśāt āvartante iti prāptaḥ ucyate sa anuśayāḥ eva āvartante iti
kutas dṛṣṭa anusārāt

original: yathā bhāṇḍasthe madhuni sarpiṣi vā kṣālite 'pi bhāṇḍalepakaṃ taccheṣaṃ madhu vā sarpirvā na kṣālayituṃ śakyamiti dṛṣṭamevaṃ tadanusārādetadapi  #
analyzed: yathā bhāṇḍa sthe madhuni sarpiṣi vā kṣālite bhāṇḍa lepakam tad śeṣam madhu vā sarpiḥ vā na kṣālayitum śakyam iti dṛṣṭam evam tad anusārāt etat api
pratipattavyam
na ca avaśeṣa mātrāt candra maṇḍale tiṣṭha āsan api sthātum pārayati

original: yathā sevako hāstikāśvīyapadātivrātaparivṛto mahārājaṃ sevamānaḥ kālavaśācchatrapādukāvaśeṣo
analyzed: yathā sevakaḥ hāstika aśvīya padāti vrāta parivṛtaḥ mahā rājam sevamānaḥ kāla vaśāt chatra pādukā avaśeṣaḥ

original: na sevitumarhatīti dṛṣṭaṃ tanmūlā ca laukikī smṛtiriti dṛṣṭasmṛtibhyāṃ sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
analyzed: na sevitum arhati iti dṛṣṭam tad mūlā ca laukikī smṛtiḥ iti dṛṣṭa smṛtibhyām sa anuśayāḥ eva āvartantaḥ iti
tadā idam dūṣayati
na ca etat iti
evakāre prayoktavye iva kāraḥ guḍajihvikayā prayuktaḥ
śabda eka gamya īrthe na sāmānyatodṛṣṭa anumāna avasaraḥ iti arthaḥ
śeṣam atirohita artham
pūrvapakṣa hetum anubhāṣate
yat api uktam prāyaṇam iti
dūṣayati
tat api anuśaya sadbhāva iti
ramaṇīya caraṇā kapūya caraṇā ityādikayā anuśaya pratipādana parayā śrutyā viruddham iti arthaḥ
apica ityādi

original: iha janmani hi paryāyeṇa sukhaduḥkhe bhujyamāne dṛśyete /
analyzed: iha janmani hi paryāyeṇa sukha duḥkhe bhujyamāne dṛśyete
yugapad ced eka praghaṭṭakena prāyaṇena sukha duḥkha phalāni karmāṇi vyajyeran
yugapad eva tad phalāni bhujyeran
tasmāt upabhoga paryāya darśanāt balīyasā durbalasya abhibhavaḥ kalpanīyaḥ
evam viruddha jāti nimitta upabhoga phaleṣu api karmasu draṣṭavyam

original: na cābhivyaktaṃ ca karma phalaṃ na datta iti ca saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na ca abhivyaktam ca karma phalam na datte iti ca saṃbhavati
phala upajana ābhimukhyam hi karmaṇām abhivyaktiḥ
api ca prāṇasya abhivyañjaka tve svarga rakata tiryagyoni gatānām jantūnām tasmin janmani
karmasu anadhikārāt na apūrva karma upajanaḥ pūrva kṛtasya krama āśyasya prāyaṇa abhivyakta tayā

original: phalopabhogena prakṣayānnāsti teṣāṃ karmāśya iti na te saṃsareyuḥ /
analyzed: phala upabhogena prakṣayāt na asti teṣām karma āśyaḥ iti na te saṃsareyuḥ
na ca mucyeran ātma jñāna abhāvāt iti kaṣṭām bata āliṣṭāḥ daśām
kiñca sva samavetam eva prāyam enā abhivyajyate pūrvam na para samavetam
yena pitṛ ādi gatena karmaṇā varteran iti
śeṣam sugamam
caraṇāt iti ced na upalakṣaṇa arthā iti kārṣṇājiniḥ

original: anena niranuśayā evāvarohantīti pūrvapakṣabījaṃ nigūḍhamuddhāṭya nirasyati /
analyzed: anena niranuśayāḥ eva avarohanti iti pūrvapakṣa bījam nigūḍham uddhāṭya nirasyati
yadi api akrodhaḥ sarva bhūteṣu karmaṇā manasā girā
anugrahaḥ ca jñānam ca śīlam etān viduḥ budhāḥ
iti smṛteḥ śīlam ācāraḥ nuśayāt bhinnaḥ tathā api ānuśaya aṅgatayā anuśaya upalakṣaṇa tvam kārṣṇājiniḥ ācāryaḥ mene
tathā ca ramaṇīya caraṇāḥ kapūya caraṇāḥ iti anena anuśaya upalakṣaṇāt siddham sa anuśayānām eva avarohaṇam iti
ānarthakyam iti ced na tad apekṣa tvāt

original: 'ācārahīnaṃ na punaranti vedāḥ' iti hi smṛtyā vedapadena vedārthamupalakṣayantyā vedārthānuṣṭhānaśeṣatvamācārasyoktaṃ na tu svatantra ācāraḥ  #
analyzed: ācāra hīnam na punar anti vedāḥ iti hi smṛtyā veda padena veda artham upalakṣayantyā veda artha anuṣṭhāna śeṣa tvam ācārasya uktam na tu svatantraḥ ācāraḥ
phalasya sādhanam
tena veda artha anuṣṭhāna upakāraka tayā ācārasya na ānarthakyam kratu arthasya
tat anena samidh ādi vat ācārasya kratu artha tvam uktam
saṃprati snāna ādi vat puruṣa artha tve puruṣa saṃskāra tve pi adoṣaḥ iti āha
puruṣa artha tve pi ācārasya iti
tat evam caraṇa śabdena ācāra vācinā sarvaḥ nuśayaḥ lakṣitaḥ iti uktam
bādariḥ tu mukhyaḥ eva caraṇa śabdaḥ karmaṇi iti āha
sukṛta duṣkṛte eva iti tu bādariḥ
brahmaṇa parivrājaka nyāyaḥ go balīvarda nyāyaḥ
śeṣam atirohita artham
aniṣṭa ādi kāriṇām api ca śrutam

original: 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti' iti kauṣītakināṃ samāmnānāt,
analyzed: ye vai ke ca asmāt lokāt prayanti candramasam eva te sarve gacchanti iti kauṣītakinām samāmnānāt
deha ārambhasya ca candra loka gamanam antareṇa anupapatteḥ pañcamyām āhutau iti āhiti saṃkhyā niyamāt

original: tathāhi-dyusomavṛṣṭyannaretaḥpariṇāmakrameṇa tā evāpo yoṣidagnau hutāḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantītyaviśeṣeṇa śrutam /
analyzed: tathā ahi dyu soma vṛṣṭi anna retaḥ pariṇāma krameṇa tāḥ eva apaḥ yoṣit agnau hutāḥ puruṣa vacasaḥ bhavanti iti aviśeṣeṇa śrutam
na ca etat manuṣya abhiprāyam
kapūya caraṇāḥ sva yonim iti amanuṣyasya api śravaṇāt
gamana āgamanāya ca deva yāna pitṛyāṇayoḥ eva mārgayoḥ āmnānāt
pathi antarasya aśruteḥ

original: 'jāyasva mriyasveti tṛtīyaṃ sthānam' iti ca sthānatvamātreṇāvagamātpathitvenāpratīteścandralokādavatīrṇānāmapi ca tatsthānatvasaṃbhavādasaṃpūreṇa
analyzed: jāyasva mriyasva iti tṛtīyam sthānam iti ca sthāna tva mātreṇa avagamāt pathi tvena apratīteḥ candra lokāt avatīrṇānām api ca tad sthāna tva saṃbhavāt asaṃpūreṇa

original: ananyamārgatayā ca tadbhogavirahiṇāmapi grāmaṃ gacchan vṛkṣamūlānyupasarpatītivatsaṃyamanādiṣu yamavaśyatāyai candralokagamanopapatteḥ,
analyzed: an anya mārga tayā ca tad bhoga virahiṇām api grāmam gacchan vṛkṣa mūlāni upasarpati iti vat saṃyamana ādiṣu yama vaśya tāyai candra loka gamana upapatteḥ
na katareṇa vacane iti asya asaṃpūraṇa pratipādana para tayā mārga dvaya niṣedha para tva abhāvāt
aniṣṭa ādi kāriṇām api candra loka gamane prāpte bhidhīyate satyam sthāna tayā avagatasya

original: na mārgatvaṃ tathāpi vettha yathāsau mārgo na saṃpūryate ityasya prativacanāvasare
analyzed: na mārga tvam tathā api vettha yathā asau mārgaḥ na saṃpūryate iti asya prativacana avasare
mārga dvaya niṣedha pūrvam tṛtīyam sthānam abhivadan asaṃpūraṇāya tat pratipakṣam ācakṣīta

original: yadi punastenaiva mārgeṇāgatya janmamaraṇaprabandhavat sthānamadhyāsīta naitattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: yadi punar tena eva mārgeṇa āgatya janma maraṇa prabandha vat sthānam adhyāsīta na etat tṛtīyam sthānam bhavet

original: nahīṣṭādikāriṇaścandramaṇḍalādavaruhya ramaṇīyaṃ ninditāṃ vā yoniṃ pratipadyamānāstṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ pratipadyante /
analyzed: nahi iṣṭa ādi kāriṇaḥ candra maṇḍalāt avaruhya ramaṇīyam ninditām vā yonim pratipadyamānāḥ tṛtīyam sthānam pratipadyante
tat kasya hetoḥ
pitṛyāṇena pathā avarohāt
tat yadi kṣudra jantavaḥ pi anena eva pathā avaroheyuḥ
na etat eṣām janma maraṇa prabandha vat tṛtīyam sthānam bhavet

original: tato 'vagacchāmaḥ saṃyamanaṃ sapta ca yātanābhūmīryamavaśatayā pratipadyamānā aniṣṭādikāriṇo na candramaṇḍalādavarohantīti /
analyzed: tatas vagacchāmaḥ saṃyamanam sapta ca yātanā bhūmīḥ yama vaśa tayā pratipadyamānāḥ aniṣṭa ādi kāriṇaḥ na candra maṇḍalāt avarohanti iti

original: tasmāt 'ye vai ke ca' itīṣṭādikāriviṣayaṃ na sarvaviṣayam /
analyzed: tasmāt ye vai ke ca iti iṣṭa ādi kāri viṣayam na sarva viṣayam
pañcamyām āhutau iti ca sva artha vidhāna param na punar a pañcamī āhuti pratiṣedha param api
vākya bheda prasaṅgāt
saṃyamane tu anubhūya iti sūtreṇa avaroha apādānatayā saṃyamanasya upādānāt candra maṇḍala apādāna niṣedhaḥ āñjasaḥ
tathā ca siddhāntasūtram eva
pūrvapakṣa sūtra tve tu śaṅkā antara adhyāhāreṇa kathañcid gamayitavyam
jīvajan jarāyu jam
saṃśoka jam saṃsveda jam
sābhāvya āpattiḥ upapatteḥ

original: yadyapi yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyumityato na tādātmyaṃ sphuṭamavagamyate tathāpi vāyurbhūtvetyādeḥ sphuṭataraṃ tādātmyāvagamādyathetamākāśamityetadapi  #
analyzed: yadi api yathetam ākāśam ākāśāt vāyum iti atas na tādātmyam sphuṭam avagamyate tathā api vāyuḥ bhūtvā ityādeḥ sphuṭataram tādātmya avagamāt yathetam ākāśam iti etat api
tādātmye eva avatiṣṭhate
na ca anyasya anya bhāva anupapattiḥ

original: manuṣyaśarīrasya nandikeśvarasya devadeharūpapariṇāmasmaraṇāddevadehasya ca nahuṣasya tiryaktvasmaraṇāt /
analyzed: manuṣya śarīrasya nandikeśvarasya deva deha rūpa pariṇāma smaraṇāt deva dehasya ca nahuṣasya tiryaktva smaraṇāt
tasmāt mukhya artha parityāgena na gauṇī vṛttiḥ āśrayaṇīyā

original: gauṇyāṃ ca vṛttau lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ prayukto guṇe lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavāt /
analyzed: gauṇyām ca vṛttau lakṣaṇā śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ guṇe lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavāt
yathā āhuḥ lakṣyamāṇa guṇaiḥ yogāt vṛtteḥ iṣṭā tu gauṇa tā iti
evam prāpte brūmaḥ sābhāvya āpattiḥ

original: samāno bhāvo rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te sabhāvāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyamiti yāvat /
analyzed: samānaḥ bhāvaḥ rūpam yeṣām te sabhāvāḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ sābhāvyam sārūpyam sādṛśyam iti yāvat
kutas
upapatteḥ

na hi anyasya anya bhāvaḥ mukhyaḥ upapadyate
yuktam etat yat deva śarīram ajagara bhāvena pariṇamate

original: yadi tu devājagaśarīre samasamaye syātāṃ na devaśarīramajagaraśarīraṃ śilpiśatenāpi kriyate /
analyzed: yadi tu deva ajaga śarīre sama samaye syātām na deva śarīram ajagara śarīram śilpi śatena api kriyate

original: nahi dadhipayasī samasamaye parasparātmanī śakye saṃpādayituṃ,

evam vāṭva ādiṣu api yojyam
tathā ca tad bhāvaḥ tad sādṛśyena aupacārikaḥ vyākhyeyaḥ

original: nanvākāśabhāvena saṃyogamātraṃ lakṣyatāṃ kiṃ sādṛśyenetyata āha-

original: ākāśasārūpyaṃ vāyudhūmādisaṃparko 'nuśayināmukta ihedānīṃ vrīhiyavā oṣādhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyanta iti śrūyate /

original: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimanuśayināṃ bhogādhiṣṭhānaṃ vrīhiyavādayaḥ sthāvarā bhavanti,

original: tatra manuṣyo jāyate devo jāyata ityādau prayoge janeḥ śarīraparigrahe prasiddhatvādatrāpi vrīhyādiśarīraparigraha eva janirmukhyārtha iti  #
analyzed: tatra manuṣyaḥ jāyate devaḥ jāyate ityādau prayoge janeḥ śarīra parigrahe prasiddha tvāt atra api vrīhi ādi śarīra parigrahaḥ eva janiḥ mukhya arthaḥ iti
vrīhi ādi śarīrāḥ eva anuśayinaḥ iti yuktam

original: naca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivat karmaviśeṣāsaṃkīrtanāmāttadabhāve vrīhyādīnāṃ śarīrabhāvābhāvātkṣetrajñānantarādhiṣṭhitānāmeva yatsaṃparkamātramiti  #
analyzed: na ca ramaṇīya caraṇāḥ kapūya caraṇāḥ iti vat karma viśeṣa a saṃkīrta nāmāt tad abhāve vrīhi ādīnām śarīra bhāva abhāvāt kṣetrajña an antara dhiṣṭhitānām eva yat saṃparka mātram iti
sāṃpratam
iṣṭa ādi kāriṇām iṣṭa ādi karma saṃkīrtanāt tad abhāve vrīhi ādīnām śarīra bhāva abhāvāt kṣetrajña antara dhiṣṭhitānām eva yat saṃparka mātram iti sāṃpratam
iṣṭa ādi kāriṇām iṣṭa ādi karma saṃkīrtanāt iṣṭa ādeḥ ca hiṃsā doṣa dūṣita tvena sāvadya phalatayā candra loka bhoga antaram sthāva śarīra bhogya duḥkha phalatvasya api upapatteḥ
na ca na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti sāmānya śāstrasya agnīṣomīya paśu hiṃsā viṣaya viśeṣa śāstreṇa bādhanam

original: sāmānyaśāstrasya hiṃsāmānyadvāreṇa viśeṣopasarpaṇaṃ vilambeneti sākṣādviśeṣaspṛśaḥ śāstracchīghratarapravṛttāddurbalatvāditi sāṃpratam /
analyzed: sāmānya śāstrasya hiṃsā āmānya dvāreṇa viśeṣa upasarpaṇam vilambena iti sākṣāt viśeṣa spṛśaḥ

original: nahi balavadityeva durbalaṃ bādhate kintu sati virodhe /
analyzed: nahi balavat iti eva durbalam bādhate kintu sati virodhe
na ca iha asti virodhaḥ
bhinna gocara cāri tvāt

original: 'agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhet ' iti hi kratuprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ kratvarthatāmasya gamayati na tvapanayati niṣedhāpāditāmasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutām
analyzed: agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhet iti hi kratu prakaraṇe samāmnātam kratu artha tām asya gamayati na tu apanayati niṣedha āpādi tām asya puruṣam prati anartha hetu tām

original: tenāstu niṣedhādasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutā vidheścha kratvarthatā ko virodhaḥ /

original: na kratostatra vaiguṇyaṃ yathā coditasiddhitaḥ' iti /

original: yadi ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivadvrīhyādiṣvanuśayavatāṃ kamaviśeṣaḥ kīrtyeta na caitadasti /

na ca iṣṭā ādeḥ karmaṇaḥ sthāva śarīra upabhogya duḥkha phala prasava hetu bhāvaḥ saṃbhavati

original: naca tadgataiyaiḥ paśuhiṃsāyā 'na hiṃsyāt' iti niṣedātkratvarthāyā api duḥkhaphalavatsaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: na ca tad gataiyaiḥ paśu hiṃsāyāḥ na hiṃsyāt iti niṣedāt kratu arthāyāḥ api duḥkha phalavat saṃbhavaḥ
puruṣa arthāyāḥ eva na hiṃsyāt iti pratiṣedhāt

original: tathāhi-na hiṃsyāditi niṣedhasya niṣedhyādhīnanirūpaṇatayā yadarthaṃ niṣedhyaṃ tadartha eva niṣedho vijñāyate /
analyzed: tathā hi na hiṃsyāt iti niṣedhasya niṣedhya adhīna nirūpaṇa tayā yad artham niṣedhyam tad arthaḥ eva niṣedhaḥ vijñāyate

original: na caitat 'nānṛtaṃ vadet' 'na tau paśau karoti' itivatkasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ yenānṛtatavadanavadasya niṣedhasya kratvarthate niṣedho  #
analyzed: na ca etat na anṛtam vadet na tau paśau karoti itivat kasyacid prakaraṇe samāmnātam yena anṛta ta vadana vadasya niṣedhasya niṣedhaḥ
pi kratu arthaḥ syāt

original: paśau niṣiddhayorājyabhāgayoḥ kratvarthatvena niṣedhasyāpi kratvarthatvaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: paśau niṣiddhayoḥ ājyabhāgayoḥ kratu artha tvena niṣedhasya api kratu artha tvam bhavet
evam hi sati ājya bhāra garitaiḥ api aṅga antaraiḥ ājyabhāga sādhyaḥ kratu upakāraḥ vijñāyate

vidhi vibhakti virodhāt prakṛti artha hiṃsā karma bhāvyat parityāgena puruṣa arthaḥ eva bhāvyaḥ vatiṣṭhate

original: kevalaṃ tasya rāgataḥ prāptatvāttadanuvādena nañarthaṃ vidhirupasaṃkrāmati,

original: tena puruṣārtho niṣedhya iti tadadhīnanirūpaṇo niṣedho 'pi puruṣārtho bhavati /

original: tathā cāyamarthaḥ saṃpadyate-yatpuruṣārthaṃ hananaṃ tanna kuryāditi /

original: kratvarthasyāpi na niṣedhe hiṃsāyāḥ kratūpakārakatvamapi kalpyate /

idam atra kūtam

original: na tāvat kṣīrasyeva dadhi rajatasya pariṇāmaḥ śuktiḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na tāvat kṣīrasya iva dadhi rajatasya pariṇāmaḥ śuktiḥ saṃbhavati

original: nahi jātvīśvaragṛhe cirasthitānyapi rajatabhājanāni śuktibhāvamanubhavanti dṛśyante /
analyzed: nahi jātu īśvara gṛhe cira sthitāni api rajata bhājanāni śukti bhāvam anubhavanti dṛśyante

original: na cetarasya rajatānubhavasamaye 'nyo 'nākulendriyo na tasya śuktibhāvamanubhavati pratyeti ca /
analyzed: na ca itarasya rajata anubhava samaye nyaḥ na ākula indriyaḥ na tasya śukti bhāvam anubhavati pratyeti ca
na ca ubhaya rūpam vastu
sāmagrī bhedāt tu kadācid asya toya bhāvaḥ nubhūyate kadācid marīcitā iti sāṃpratam

original: pāramārthike hāsya toyabhāve tatsādhyāmudānyopaśamalakṣaṇārthakriyāṃ kuryānmarīcisādhyāmapi rūpaprakāśalakṣaṇām /
analyzed: pāramārthike ha asya toya bhāve tad sādhyām udānya upaśama lakṣaṇa artha kriyām kuryāt marīci sādhyām api rūpa prakāśa lakṣaṇām
na marīcibhiḥ kasyacid tṛṣṇajaḥ udanyā upaśāmyati
na ca toyam eva dvividham udanya upaśamanam a tad upaśamanam iti yuktam

original: tadarthakriyākāritvavyāptaṃ toyatvaṃ mātrayāpi tāmakurvattoyameva na syāt /
analyzed: tad arthakriyā kāri tva vyāptam toya tvam mātrayā api tām akurvat toyam eva na syāt

original: apica toyapratyayasamīcīnatvāyāsya dvaividhyamabhyupeyate taccābhyupagame 'pi na seddhumarhati /
analyzed: apica toya pratyaya samīcīna tvāya asya dvaividhyam abhyupeyate tat ca abhyupagame na seddhum arhati

original: tathāhi-asamarthavidhāpāti toyametaditi manvāno na tṛṣṇayāpi marīcitoyamabhidhāvet yathā marīcīnanubhavan /
analyzed: tathā hi asamartha vidhā pāti toyam etat iti manvānaḥ na tṛṣṇayā api marīci toyam abhidhāvet yathā marīcīn anubhavan
atha aśaktam abhimanyamānaḥ bhidhāvati

original: kimaparāddhaṃ marīciṣu toyaviparyāsena sarvajanīnena yattamatilaṅghya viparyāsāntaraṃ kalpyate /
analyzed: kim aparāddham marīciṣu toya viparyāsena sarvajanīnena yat tam atilaṅghya viparyāsa antaram kalpyate
na ca kṣīra dadhi pratyaya vat ācārya mātula brāhmaṇa pratyaya vat vā toya marīci vijñāne samuccita avagāhinī sa sva anubhavāt paraspara viruddhayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāva avabhāsanāt

original: tatrāpi rajatajñānaṃ pūrvamutpannaṃ bādhyamuttaraṃ tu bādhakaṃ śuktijñānaṃ prāptipūrvakatvātpratiṣedhasya /
analyzed: tatra api rajata jñānam pūrvam utpannam bādhyam uttaram tu bādhakam śukti jñānam prāpti pūrvaka tvāt pratiṣedhasya

original: rajatajñānātprākprāpakābhāvena śukteraprāptāyāḥ pratiṣedhasaṃbhavātpūrvajñānaprāptaṃ tu rajataṃ śuktijñānamapabadhitumarhati /
analyzed: rajata jñānāt prāk prāpaka abhāvena śukteḥ aprāptāyāḥ pratiṣedha saṃbhavāt pūrva jñāna prāptam tu rajatam śukti jñānam apabadhitum arhati
tad apabādha ātmakam ca sva anubhavāt avasīyate
yathā āhuḥ āgāmi tvāt a bādhitvā param pūrvam hi jāyate
pūrvam punar a bādhitvā param na utpadyate kkacid

original: naca vartamānarajatāvabhāsi jñānaṃ bhaviṣyattāmasyāgocarayanna bhaviṣyatā svasamayavartinīṃ śuktiṃ gocarayatā pratyayena bādhyate,
analyzed: na ca vartamāna rajata avabhāsi jñānam bhaviṣyat tām asya a gocarayat na bhaviṣyatā sva samaya vartinīm śuktim gocarayatā pratyayena bādhyate
kāla bhedena virodha abhāvāt iti yuktam

original: mā nāmāsya jñāsītpratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyattāṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvi tvanumānamupakārabhāvahetumivāsati vināśapratyayopanipāte sthemānamākalayati /
analyzed: mā nāma asya jñāsīt pratyakṣam bhaviṣyat tām tad pṛṣṭha bhāvi tu anumānam upakāra bhāva hetum iva asati vināśa pratyaya upanipāte sthemānam ākalayati
asati vināśa pratyaya upanipāte rajatam idam sthiram rajata tvāt anubhūta pratyabhijñāta rajata vat

original: tathāca rajatagocaraṃ pratyakṣaṃ vastutaḥ sthirameva rajataṃ gocarayet /
analyzed: tathā ca rajata gocaram pratyakṣam vastutas sthiram eva rajatam gocarayet
tathā ca bhaviṣyat śuktikā jñāna kālam
rajatam vyāpnuyāt iti virodhāt śukti jñānena bādhyate
yathā ahar rajate gṛhyamāṇam hi cira sthāyi iti gṛhyate
bhaviṣyat śuktikā jñāna kālam vyāpnoti tena tat
iti
pratyakṣeṇa cira sthāyi iti gṛhyate iti kecid vyācakṣate
tat ayuktam

original: yadi cirasthāyitvaṃ yogyatā na sā pratyakṣagocaraḥ śakteratīndriyatvāt /
analyzed: yadi cira sthāyi tvam yogyatā na sā pratyakṣa gocaraḥ śakteḥ atīndriya tvāt
atha kāla antara vyāpi tvam
tat api ayuktam
kāla antareṇa bhaviṣyatā indriyasya saṃyoga ayogāt tad upahita sīmnaḥ vyāpi tvasya atīndriya tvāt
na ca pratyabhijñā pratyaya vat atra asti saṃskāraḥ yena āvartamānam api ākalayet

original: tasmādatyantābhyāsavaśena pratyakṣānantaraṃ śīgratarotpannavinaśyadavasthānumānasahitapratyakṣābhiprāyemeva cirasthāyīti gṛhyata iti mantavyam
analyzed: tasmāt atyanta abhyāsa vaśena pratyakṣa anantaram śīgratara utpanna vinaśyat avasthā anumāna sahita pratyakṣa abhiprāyem eva cira sthāyi iti gṛhyate iti mantavyam
atas eva etat sūkṣmataram kāla vyavadhānam a vivecayantaḥ saugatāḥ prāhuḥ
dvividhaḥ hi viṣayaḥ pratyakṣasya grāhyaḥ ca adhyavaseyaḥ ca
grāhya kṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ sva lakṣaṇaḥ dhyavaseyaḥ ca
grāhi akṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ slakṣaṇaḥ dhyavaseyaḥ ca saṃtānaḥ iti
etena svapna pratyayaḥ mithyātvena vyākhyātaḥ

original: yattu satyaṃ svapnadarśanamuktaṃ tatrāpyākhyātrā brāhmaṇāyanenākhyāte saṃvādābhāvāt /
analyzed: yat tu satyam svapna darśanam uktam tatra api ākhyātrā brāhmaṇāyanena ākhyāte saṃvāda abhāvāt
priyavratasya ākhyāta saṃvādaḥ tu kākatālīyaḥ na svapna jñānam pramāṇayitum arhati

original: tādṛśasyaiva bahulaṃ visaṃvādadarśadarśitaśca visaṃvādo bhāṣyakṛtā kātsnryenānabhivyaktiṃ vivṛṇvatā /
analyzed: tādṛśasya eva bahulam visaṃvāda darśa darśitaḥ ca visaṃvādaḥ bhāṣyakṛtā kātsnryena anabhivyaktim vivṛṇvatā
rajanyām suptaḥ iti

original: rajanīsamaye 'pi hi bhāratādvarṣāntare ketumālādau vāsaro bhavatīti bhārate varṣa ityuktam //3 // 3.2.1.4.
analyzed: rajanī samaye hi bhāratāt varṣa antare ketumāla ādau vāsaraḥ bhavati iti bhārate varṣaḥ iti uktam  /
sūcakaḥ ca hi śruteḥ ācakṣate ca tad vidaḥ
darśanam sūcakam tat ca sva rūpeṇa sat
asat tu dṛśyam
atas eva strī darśana sva rūpa sādhyāḥ carama dhātu visarga ādayaḥ jāgrat avasthāyām anuvartante
strī sādhyāḥ tu mālya vilepana danta kṣata ādayaḥ na anuvartante
na ca asmābhiḥ svapne prājña vyāpāraḥ iti

original: prājñavyāpāratvena pāramārthikatvānumānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa bādhakapratyayena virudhyamānaṃ nātmānaṃ labhata iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: prājña vyāpāra tvena pāramārthika tva anumānam pratyakṣeṇa bādhaka pratyayena virudhyamānam na ātmānam labhate iti bhāvaḥ
bandha mokṣayoḥ āntarālikam tṛtīyam aiśvaryam iti
parāmi dhyānāt tu tirohitam tatas hi asya bandha viparyayau
deha yogāt vā saḥ pi iti sūtra dvayam kṛta upapādanam asmābhiḥ prathama sūtre
nigada vyākhyātam ca etayoḥ bhāṣyam iti
tad abhāvaḥ nāḍīṣu tad śuteḥ ātmani ca

original: iha hi nāḍīpuritatparamātmāno jīvasya suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ sthānatvena śrūyante /
analyzed: iha hi nāḍī puri tad paramātmānaḥ jīvasya suṣupta avasthāyām sthāna tvena śrūyante
tatra kim eṣām sthānānām vikalpaḥ āhosvit samuccayaḥ
kim atas yadi evam
etat atas bhavati

original: yadā nāḍyo vā purītadvā suṣuptasthānaṃ tadā viparītagrahaṇanivṛttāvapi na jīvasya paramātmabhāva iti /
analyzed: yadā nāḍyaḥ vā purītat vā suṣupta sthānam tadā viparīta grahaṇa nivṛttau api na jīvasya paramātma bhāvaḥ iti

original: avidyānivṛttāvapi jīvasya paramātmabhāvāya kāraṇāntaramapekṣitavyaṃ tacca karmaiva na tu tattajñānaṃ viparītajñānanivṛttimātreṇa tasyopayogāt,
analyzed: avidyā nivṛttau api jīvasya paramātma bhāvāya kāraṇa antaram apekṣitavyam tat ca karma eva na tu viparīta jñāna nivṛtti mātreṇa tasya upayogāt
viparīta jñāna nivṛtteḥ ca vinā api tattva jñānam suṣuptau api saṃbhavāt
tatas ca karmaṇā eva apavargaḥ na jñānena
yathā āhuḥ karmaṇā eva tu saṃsiddhim āsthitāḥ janaka ādayaḥ iti

original: ata tu paramātmaiva nāḍīpurītasmṛtidvārā suṣuptisthānaṃ tato viparītajñānanivṛtterasti mātrayā paramātmabhāva upayogaḥ /
analyzed: tu paramātmā eva nāḍī purīta smṛti dvārā suṣupti sthānam tatas viparīta jñāna nivṛtteḥ asti mātrayā paramātma bhāvaḥ upayogaḥ

original: tayā hi tāvadeṣa jīvastadavasthāno bhavati kevalam /
analyzed: tayā hi tāvat eṣa jīvaḥ tad avasthānaḥ bhavati kevalam

original: tattvajñānābhāvena samūlakāṣamavidyāyā akāṣājjāgratsvapnalakṣaṇaṃ jīvasya vyutthānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tattva jñāna abhāvena sa mūlakāṣam avidyāyāḥ akāṣāt jāgrat svapna lakṣaṇam jīvasya vyutthānam bhavati
tasmāt prayojanavatī eṣā vicāraṇā iti
kim tau aprāptam

original: nāḍīpurītatparamātmasu sthāneṣu suṣuptasya jīvasya nilayaṃ prati vikalpaḥ /
analyzed: nāḍī purī tad paramātmasu sthāneṣu suṣuptasya jīvasya nilayam prati vikalpaḥ

original: yathā bahuṣu prāsādeṣveko narendraḥ kadācitkkacinnilīyate kadācitkkacidevameko jīvaḥ kadācinnāḍīṣu kadācitpurītati kadācidbrahmaṇīti /
analyzed: yathā bahuṣu prāsādeṣu ekaḥ narendraḥ kadācid kkacid nilīyate kadācid kkacid evam ekaḥ jīvaḥ kadācid nāḍīṣu kadācid purītati kadācid brahmaṇi iti

original: yathā nirapekṣā vrīhiyavāḥ kratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśaprakṛtitayā śrutā ekārthā vikalpyante,
analyzed: yathā nirapekṣāḥ vrīhi yavāḥ kratu sādhanībhūta puroḍāśa prakṛti tayā śrutāḥ eka arthāḥ vikalpyante

original: evaṃ saptamīśrutyā vāyatanaśrutyā vekanilayanārthāḥ parasparānapekṣā nāḍyadayo 'pi vikalpamarhanti /
analyzed: evam saptamī śrutyā vā āyatana śrutyā vā eka nilayana arthāḥ paraspara anapekṣāḥ nāḍī adayaḥ pi vikalpam arhanti

original: yatrāpi nāḍībhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śeta iti nāḍība3hmaṇorādhārayoḥ samuccayaśravaṇam /
analyzed: yatra api nāḍībhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śete iti samuccaya śravaṇam

original: prāṇaśabdaṃ ca brahma 'athāsmin prāṇe brahmaṇi sa jīva ekadhā bhavati' nnirapekṣayoravedhāratvam /
analyzed: prāṇa śabdam ca brahma atha asmin prāṇe brahmaṇi sa jīvaḥ ekadhā bhavati
iyān tu viśeṣaḥ
kadācid nāḍyaḥ eva ādhāraḥ kadācid nāḍībhiḥ saṃcaramāṇasya purītat eva

original: evaṃ tābhireva saṃcaramāṇasya kadācidbrahmaivādhāra iti siddhamādhāratve nāḍīpurītatparamātmanāmanapekṣatvam /
analyzed: evam tābhiḥ eva saṃcaramāṇasya kadācid brahmā eva ādhāraḥ iti siddham ādhāra tve nāḍī purī tad paramātmanām anapekṣa tvam
tathā ca vikalpaḥ vrīhi yava vat bṛhat rathantara vat vā iti prāptam

original: prāpte 'bhidhīyate-jīvaḥ samuccayenaivaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpena /
analyzed: prāpte bhidhīyate jīvaḥ samuccayena eva etāni nāḍī ādīni svāpāya upaiti na vikalpena
ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ nitya vat āmnātānām yat pākṣika tvam nāma tat gati antara abhāve kalpyate
yathā āhuḥ evam eṣaḥ ṣṭa doṣaḥ pi yat vrīhi yava vākyayoḥ

original: vikalpa āśritastatra gatiranyā na vidyate' iti /
analyzed: vikalpaḥ āśritaḥ tatra gatiḥ anyā na vidyate iti

original: prakṛtakratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśadravyaprakṛtitayā hi parasparānapekṣau vrīhiyavau vihitauśakrutaścaitau pratyekaṃ puroḍāśamabhinirvartayitum
analyzed: prakṛta kratu sādhanībhūta puroḍāśa dravya prakṛti tayā hi paraspara anapekṣau vrīhi yavau vihitau śakrutaḥ ca etau pratyekam puroḍāśam abhinirvartayitum

original: tatra yadi miśrābhyāṃ puroḍāśo 'bhinirvartyeta parasparānapekṣavrīhiyavavidhātṛṇī ubhe api śāstre bādhyeyātām /
analyzed: tatra yadi miśrābhyām puroḍāśaḥ bhinirvartyeta paraspara anapekṣa vrīhi yava vidhātṛṇī ubhe api śāstre bādhyeyātām
na ca etau prayoga vacanaḥ samuccatum arhati

original: sa hi yathā vihitānyaṅgānyabhisamīkṣya pravartamāno naitānyanyathayitaṃ śakroti /
analyzed: sa hi yathā vihitāni aṅgāni abhisamīkṣya pravartamānaḥ na etāni anyathayitam śakroti
miśraṇe ca anyathātvam eteṣām

original: na cāṅgānurodhena pradhānābhyāso 'gosave ubhe kuryāt' itivadyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na ca aṅga anurodhena pradhāna abhyāsaḥ gosave ubhe kuryāt iti vat yuktaḥ
a śrutaḥ hi atra pradhāna abhyāsaḥ ṅga anurodhena ca saḥ nyāyyaḥ

original: na cāṅgabhūtaindravāyavādigrahānurodhena yathā pradhānasya somayāgasyāvṛttirevamatrāpīti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca aṅga bhūta aindra vāyava ādi graha anurodhena yathā pradhānasya soma yāgasya āvṛttiḥ evam atra api iti yuktam
somena yajeta iti hi tatra apūrva yāga vidhiḥ
tatra ca daśa muṣṭi parimitasya soma dravyasya somam abhiṣuṇoti

original: 'somamabhiplāvayati' iti ca vākyāntarānulocanayā rasadvāreṇa yāgasādhanībhūtasyendravāyvādyuddeśena prādeśamātreṣūrdhvapātreṣu grahaṇāni pṛthakprakalpanāni  #
analyzed: somam abhiplāvayati iti ca vākya antara anulocanayā rasa dvāreṇa yāga sādhanībhūtasya indra vāyu ādi uddeśena prādeśa mātreṣu ūrdhva pātreṣu grahaṇāni pṛthak prakalpanāni
saṃskārāḥ vidhīyante
na tu soma yāga uddeśena indra vāyu ādayaḥ devatāḥ codyante
yena tāsām yāga niṣpatti lakṣaṇa eka artha tvena vikalpaḥ syāt
na ca prādeśa mātram ekaikam ūrdhva pātram daśa muṣṭi parimita soma rasa grahaṇāya kalpate
yena tulya ārta tayā grahaṇāni vikﾱperan

original: naca yāvanmātramekamūrdhvapātraṃ vyāpnoti tāvanmātraṃ gṛhītvā pariśaṣṭaṃ tyajyeteti yujyate /
analyzed: na ca yāvanmātram ekam ūrdhva pātram vyāpnoti tāvanmātram gṛhītvā pariśaṣṭam tyajyeta iti yujyate
daśa muṣṭi parimita upādānasya adṛṣṭārtha tva prasaṅgāt

original: evaṃ taddṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavedyadi tatsarvaṃ yāga upayujyeta /
analyzed: evam tat dṛṣṭārtham bhavet yadi tat sarvam yāge upayujyeta
na ca dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā nyāyyā

original: tasmātsakalasya somarasasya yāgaśeṣatvena saṃskārārhatvādekaikena ca grahamena sakalasya
analyzed: tasmāt sakalasya soma rasasya yāga śeṣa tvena saṃskāra arha tvāt ekaikena ca grahamena sakalasya
saṃskartṛm aśakya tvāt tad avayavasya ekena saṃskāre vayava antarasya grahaṇa antareṇa saṃskāra
iti kārya bhedāt grahaṇāni samuccīyeran

original: ata eva samuccayadarśanaṃ 'daśautānadhvaryuḥ prātaḥ savane grahan gṛhṇāti' iti /
analyzed: atas eva samuccaya darśanam daśautān adhvaryuḥ prātar savane grahan gṛhṇāti iti
samuccaye ca sati kramaḥ u pi upapadyate
āśvinaḥ daśamaḥ gṛhyate tṛtīyaḥ hūyate
tathā eva aindra vāyava agrān grahān gṛhṇāti iti

original: teṣāṃ ca samuccaye sati yāvadyaduddeśena gṛhītaṃ tāvattasyai devatāyai tyaktavyamityarthādyāgasyāvṛttyā bhavativyam /
analyzed: teṣām ca samuccaye sati yāvat yat uddeśena gṛhītam tāvat tasyai devatāyai tyaktavyam iti arthāt yāgasya āvṛttyā

original: yadi punaḥ pṛthakkṛtānyapyekīkṛtya kāñcana devatāmuddiśya tyajeran,
analyzed: yadi punar pṛthakkṛtāni api ekīkṛtya kāñcana devatām uddiśya tyajeran
pṛthakkaraṇāni ca devatā uddeśāḥ ca adṛṣṭa arthāḥ bhaveyuḥ
na ca dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā nyāyyā iti uktam
tasmāt tatra samuccayasya avaśyaṃbhāvityāt guṇa anurodhena api pradhāna abhyāsaḥ āsthīyate
iha tu abhyāsa kalpanā pramāṇa abhāvāt puroḍāśa dravyasya ca aniyamena prakṛti dravye yasmin kasmiṃścid prāpte
ekaikā paraspara anapekṣā vrīhi śrutiḥ yava śrutiḥ ca niyāmikā eka ārta tayā vikalpam arhataḥ
na tu nāḍī purī tad paramātmanām anyonya anapekṣaṇām eka nilayana artha saṃbhavaḥ yena vikalpaḥ bhavet
na hi eka vibhakti nirdeśa mātreṇa eka artha tā bhavati samuccitānām api eka vibhakti nirdeśa darśanāt
paryaṅke śete prasāde śete iti
tasmāt eka vibhakti nirdeśasya anaikāntika tvāt anyatas vinigamanā vaktavyā
sā ca uktā bhāṣyakṛtā
yatra api nirapekṣāḥ iva nāḍīḥ
supti sthāna tvena śrāvayati ityādinā
sāpekṣa śruti anurodhena nirapekṣa śrutiḥ netavyā iti arthaḥ

original: pāramārthikatve hyupādhijanitasya rūpasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmo bhavet /

nānātva pratipādana paryavasānāt

ca sākṣāt bhūyasībhiḥ śrutibhiḥ abheda pratipānāt ākāravat brahma viṣayāṇām ca kāsāṃcid śutīnām upāsanā para tvam asati

original: vāstavasya vā prapañcasya pravilayaḥ sarpiṣa ivāgnisaṃyogāt /

original: nahi vidhiśatenāpi vinā tattvāvabodhanaṃ pravartasvātmajñāna iti vā kuru prapañcapravilayaṃ veti pravartitaḥ śaknoti prapañcapravilayaṃ kartum
analyzed: nahi vidhi śatena api vinā tattva avabodhanam pravartasva ātma jñāne iti vā kuru prapañca pravilayam vā iti pravartitaḥ śaknoti prapañca pravilayam kartum

original: na cāsyātmajñānavidhiṃ vinā vedāntārthabrahmatattvāvabodho na bhavati /
analyzed: na ca asya ātma jñāna vidhim vinā vedānta artha brahma tattva avabodhaḥ na bhavati

original: maulikasya svādhyāyādhyayanavirodhereva vivakṣitārthatayā sakalasya vedarāśeḥ phalavadarthāvabodhanaparatāmāpādayato vidyamānatvāt /
analyzed: maulikasya svādhyāya adhyayana virodheḥ eva vivakṣita artha tayā sakalasya vedarāśeḥ phalavat artha avabodhana para tām āpādayataḥ vidyamāna tvāt
anyathā karma vidhi vākyāni api vidhi antaram apekṣeran iti
na ca cintā sākṣātkārayoḥ vidhiḥ iti tattvasamīkṣāyām asmābhiḥ upapāditam
vistareṇa ca ayam arthaḥ tatra eva prapañcitaḥ

original: tasmāt 'jartilayavāgvā juhuyāt' itivadvidhisarūpā ete 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavya' ityādayo na tu vidhaya iti /
analyzed: tasmāt jartila yavāgvā juhuyāt itivat vidhi sarūpāḥ ete ātmā vai are draṣṭavyaḥ ityādayaḥ na tu vidhayaḥ iti
tat idam uktam

original: draṣṭavyādiśabdā api tattvābhimudhīkaraṇapradhānā na tattvāvabodhavidhipradhānā iti /
analyzed: draṣṭavya ādi śabdāḥ api tattva abhimudhīkaraṇa pradhānāḥ na tattva avabodha vidhi pradhānāḥ iti

original: apica brahmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcamuktaṃ na tatra niyojyaḥ kaścitsaṃbhavati /
analyzed: api ca brahma tattvam niṣprapañca muktam na tatra niyojyaḥ kaścid saṃbhavati
jīvaḥ hi niyojyaḥ bhavet
sa ced prapañca pakṣe vartate kaḥ niyojyaḥ tasya ucchinna tvāt
atha brahma pakṣe tathā api aniyojyaḥ
brahmaṇaḥ niyojya tvāt
atha brahmaṇaḥ na anyaḥ pi avidyayā anyaḥ iva iti niyojyaḥ
tat ayuktam
brahma bhāvam pāramārthikam avagamayatā āgamena avidyāyāḥ nirasta tvāt
tasmāt niyojya abhāvāt api na niyogaḥ
tat idam uktam
jīvaḥ nāma prapañca pakṣasya eva iti
api ca jñāna vidha paratve tanmātrāt tu jñānasya anutpatteḥ tattva pratipādana paratvam abhyupagamanīyam
tatra varam tattva pratipādana paratvam evā astu tasya avaśya abhyupagantavya tvena ubhaya vādi siddhatvāt
evam ca kṛtam tattva jñāna vidhinā iti āha
jñeya abhimukhasya api iti
na ca tat śakyam vā api yuktam iti āha
na ca pramāṇa antareṇa iti

original: kiñcānyanniyoganiṣṭhatayaiva ca paryavasyatyāmnāye yadabhyupagataṃbhavadbhiḥ śāstraparyālocanayāniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ jīvasyeti tadetacchāstrāvirodhādapramāṇakam
analyzed: kiñca anyat niyoga niṣṭhatayā eva ca paryavasyati āmnāye yat abhyupagatam bhavadbhiḥ śāstra paryālocanayā a niyojya brahma ātmatvam jīvasya iti tat etat śāstra avirodhāt apramāṇakam

original: athaitacchāstramaniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ ca jīvasya pratipādayati jīvaṃ ca niyuktaṃ tato dvyarthaṃ ca viruddhārtha ca syādityāha-
analyzed: atha etat śāstram aniyojya brahma ātmatvam ca jīvasya pratipādayati jīvam ca niyuktam tatas dvi artham ca viruddha artha ca syāt iti āha
atha iti
darśa paurṇamāsa ādi vākyeṣu jīvasya aniyojyasya api vastutas dhyasta niyojya bhāvasya niyojya tā yuktā

original: nahi tadvākyaṃ tasya niyojyatāmāhāpi tu laukikapramāṇasiddhāṃ niyojyatāmāśritya darśapūrṇamāsau vidhatte /
analyzed: nahi tat vākyam tasya niyojya tām āha api tu laukika pramāṇa siddhām niyojya tām āśritya darśa pūrṇamāsau vidhatte

original: idaṃ tu niyojyatāmapanayati ca niyuṅkte ceti durghaṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: idam tu niyojya tām apanayati ca niyuṅkte ca iti durghaṭam iti bhāvaḥ
niyoga para tāyām ca iti

original: paurvāparyālocanayā vedāntānāṃ tattvaniṣṭhatā śrutā na śrutā niyoganiṣṭhatetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: paurvāparya ālocanayā vedāntānām tattva niṣṭha tā śrutā na śrutā niyoga niṣṭha tā iti arthaḥ

original: apica niyoganiṣṭhatve vākyasya darśapaurṇāmāsakarmaṇa ivāpūrvāvāntaravyāpārādātmajñānakarmaṇo 'pyapūrvāvāntaravyāpārādeva svargādiphalavanmokṣasyānandarūpaphalasya  #
analyzed: api ca niyoga niṣṭha tve vākyasya darśa paurṇāmāsa karmaṇaḥ iva apūrva avāntara vyāpārāt ātma jñāna karmaṇaḥ u pi apūrva avāntara vyāpārāt eva svarga ādi phala vat mokṣasya ānanda rūpa phalasya
siddhiḥ
tathā ca anitya tvam sa atiśaya tvam svarga vat bhavet iti āha
karma phala vat iti
apica brahma vākyeṣu iti
sa prapañca niṣprapañca upadeśeṣu hi sādhya anubandha bhedāt eka niyoga tvam asiddham
darśa porṇamāsa prayāja vākyeṣu tu yadi api anubandha bhedaḥ tathā api adhikāra aṃśasya sādhyasya bheda abhāvāt abhedaḥ iti

original: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato vravīti ca bhūyaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtā etāvat tvam hi pratiṣedhati tatas vravīti ca bhūyas
adhikaraṇa viṣayam āha dve vāva brahmaṇaḥ rūpe iti

original: dve eva brahmaṇo rūpe brahmaṇaḥ paramārthato 'rūpasyādhyāropite dve eva rūpe tābhyāṃ hi tadrūpyate /
analyzed: dve eva brahmaṇaḥ rūpe brahmaṇaḥ paramārthataḥ rūpasya adhyāropite dve eva rūpe tābhyām hi tat rūpyate
te darśayati
mūrte ca eva amūrte ca
samuccīyamāna avadhāraṇam

original: atra pṛthivyaptejāṃsi trīṇi bhūtāni brahmaṇo rūpaṃ mūrtaṃ mūrcchitāvayavamitaretarānupraviṣṭāvayavaṃ kaṭhinamiti yāvat /
analyzed: atra pṛthivī ap tejāṃsi trīṇi bhūtāni brahmaṇaḥ rūpam mūrtam mūrcchita avayavam itaretara anupraviṣṭa avayavam kaṭhinam iti yāvat
tasya eva viśeṣaṇa antarāṇi martyam maraṇa dharmakam
sthitam avyāpi
avacchinnam iti yāvat
sat anyebhyaḥ viśiṣyamāṇam asādhāraṇa dharmavat iti yāvat
gandha sneha uṣṇa tāḥ ca anyonya vyavaccheda hetavaḥ sādhāraṇāḥ dharmāḥ

original: tasyaitasya brahmarūpasya tejo 'bannasya caturviśeṣaṇasyaiṣa rasaḥ sāro ya eṣa savitā sapati /
analyzed: tasya etasya brahma rūpasya tejaḥ bannasya catur viśeṣaṇasya eṣa rasaḥ sāraḥ yaḥ eṣa savitā sapati
atha amūrtam vāyuḥ ca antarikṣam ca tat hi na kaṭhinam iti amūrtam etat amṛtam amaraṇa dharmakam
mūrtam hi mūrta antareṇa abhihanyamānam avayava viśleṣāt dhvaṃsate na tu tathābhāvaḥ saṃbhavati amūrtasya
etat yat ā iti gacchati vyāpnoti iti
etat tyam nitya parokṣam iti arthaḥ

original: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa gatasmin savitṛmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: tasya etasya amūrtasya amṛtasya etasya yataḥ etasya tyasya eṣa rasaḥ yaḥ eṣa gatasmin savitṛ maṇḍale puruṣaḥ

original: karaṇātmako hiraṇyagarbhaprāṇāhvayastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ sāro nityaparokṣatā ca sāmyamityadhidaivatam /
analyzed: karaṇa ātmakaḥ hiraṇyagarbha prāṇa āhvayaḥ tyasya hi eṣa rasaḥ sāraḥ nitya parokṣa tā ca sāmyam iti adhidaivatam
atha adhyātmam idam eva mūrtam yat anyat prāṇa antarākāśābhyām bhūta trayam rīḥ ārambhakam etat martyam etat sthitam etat sat tasya etasya

original: mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yaccakṣuḥ sato hyoṣa rasa iti /
analyzed: mūrtasya etasya martyasya etasya sthitasya etasya sataḥ eṣa rasaḥ yat cakṣuḥ sataḥ hi oṣa rasaḥ iti
atha amūrtam prāṇaḥ ca yaḥ ca ayam antarātman ākāśaḥ etat amṛtam etat yat etat tyam tasya etasya amūrtasya etasya amṛtasya etasya

original: yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇekṣan puruṣastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ /
analyzed: yatas etasya tyasya eṣa rasaḥ yaḥ yam dakṣiṇā īkṣan puruṣaḥ tyasya hi eṣa rasaḥ

original: liṅgasya hi karaṇātmakasya hiraṇyagarbhasya dakṣiṇamakṣyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śruteradhigatam /
analyzed: liṅgasya hi karaṇa ātmakasya hiraṇyagarbhasya dakṣiṇam akṣi adhiṣṭhānam śruteḥ adhigatam

original: tadevaṃ brahmaṇa aupādhikayormūrtāmūrtayorādhyātmikādhidaivikayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vibhāgo vyākhyātaḥ sattyacchabdavācyayoḥ /
analyzed: tat evam brahmaṇaḥ aupādhikayoḥ mūrta amūrtayoḥ ādhyātmika ādhidaivikayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena vibhāgaḥ vyākhyātaḥ sat tya c śabda vācyayoḥ

original: athedānīṃ tasya karaṇātmanaḥ puruṣasya liṅgasya rūpaṃ vaktavyam /
analyzed: atha idānīm tasya karaṇa ātmanaḥ puruṣasya liṅgasya rūpam vaktavyam
etat uktam vicitram rūpam liṅgasya iti

original: tadevaṃ niravaśeṣaṃ savāsanaṃ satyarūpamuktvā yattatsatyasya satyamuktaṃ brahma tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate /
analyzed: tat evam niravaśeṣam sa vāsanam satya rūpam uktvā yat tat satyasya satyam uktam brahma tad svarūpa avadhāraṇa artham idam ārabhyate

original: yataḥ satyasya rūpaṃ niḥśeṣamuktamato 'vaśiṣṭaṃ satyasya yatsatyaṃ tasyānantaraṃ taduktihetukaṃ svarūpaṃ vakyavyamityāha-
analyzed: yatas satyasya rūpam niḥśeṣam uktam atas satyasya yat satyam tasya anantaram tad ukti hetukam svarūpam vakyavyam iti āha
atha atas ādeśaḥ kathanam satya satyasya paramātmanaḥ tam āha
na iti na iti iti
etad artha kathana artham idam adhikaraṇam
nanu kim etāvat eva ādeśyam na aparam asti iti arthaḥ

original: atraivamarthenetinā yatsaṃnihitaṃ parāmṛṣṭaṃ tanniṣidhyate nañā saṃnihitaṃ ca mūrtāmūrtaṃ savāsanaṃ rūpadvayam /
analyzed: atra evam arthena itinā yat saṃnihitam parāmṛṣṭam tat niṣidhyate nañā saṃnihitam ca mūrta amūrtam sa vāsanam rūpa dvayam

original: tatredaṃ vicāryate-kiṃ rūpadvayaṃ savāsanaṃ brahma ca sarvameva ca pratiṣidhyate,
analyzed: tatra idam vicāryate kim rūpa dvayam sa vāsanam brahma ca sarvam eva ca pratiṣidhyate

original: uta brahmaivātha savāsanaṃ rūpadvayaṃ brahma tu pariśiṣyata iti /
analyzed: uta brahma eva atha sa vāsanam rūpa dvayam brahma tu pariśiṣyate iti

original: yadyapi teṣu teṣu vedāntapradeśeṣu brahmasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ tadasadbhāvajñānaṃ ca ninditam /
analyzed: yadi api teṣu teṣu vedānta pradeśeṣu brahma svarūpam pratipāditam tad asadbhāva jñānam ca ninditam

original: 'astītyevopalabdhavyaḥ' iti cāsya sattvamavadhāritaṃ tathāpi sadbodharūpaṃ tadbrahma savāsanamūrtāmūrtarūpasādhāraṇatayā ca sāmānyaṃ tasya  #
analyzed: asti iti eva upalabdhavyaḥ iti ca asya sattvam avadhāritam tathā api sat bodha rūpam tat brahma sa vāsana mūrta amūrta rūpa sādhāraṇa tayā ca sāmānyam tasya
ca ete viśeṣāḥ mūrta amūrta ādayaḥ
na ca tat tat viśeṣa niṣedhe sāmānyam avasthātum arhati nirviśeṣasya sāmānyasya ayogāt
yathā āhuḥ nirviśeṣam na sāmānyam bhavet śuśa viṣāṇa vat iti
tasmāt tad viśeṣa idhe tad sāmānyasya brahmaṇaḥ nava sthānāt sarvasya eva ayam niṣedhaḥ

original: ata eva nahyetasmāditi netyanyatparamastīti niṣedhāt paraṃ nāstīti sarvaniṣedhameva tattvamāha śrutiḥ /
analyzed: atas eva na hi etasmāt iti na iti anyat param asti iti niṣedhāt param na asti iti sarva niṣedham eva tattvam āha śrutiḥ
asti iti eva upalabdhavyaḥ iti ca upāsanā vidhāna vat na iyam
na tu astitvam eva asya tattvam
tad praśaṃsā artham ca asadbhāva jñāna nindā
yat ca anyatra brahma svarūpa pratipādanam tat api mūrta amūrta rūpa pratipādana vat niṣedha artham
ca tatra niṣedhaḥ yogya tvāt saṃbhansyate

original: yathāhuḥ-'yena yasyābhisaṃbandho dūrasthasyāpi tena saḥ' iti /
analyzed: yathā āhuḥ yena yasya abhisaṃbandhaḥ dūra sthasya api tena saḥ iti
tasmāt sarvasya eva aviśeṣeṇa niṣedhaḥ iti prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ
athavā pṛthivī ādi prapañcasya samastasya pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddha tvāt
brahmaṇaḥ tu vāc manasā agocara tayā sakala pramāṇa virahāt

original: katarasyāstu niṣedha iti viśaye prapañcapratiṣedhe samastapratyakṣādivyākopaprasaṅgāt,
analyzed: katarasyāḥ tu niṣedhaḥ iti viśaye prapañca pratiṣedhe samasta pratyakṣa ādi vyākopa prasaṅgāt

original: brahmapratiṣedho tvavyākopādbrahmaiva pratiṣedhena saṃbadhyate yogyatvānna prapañcastadvaiparītyāt,
analyzed: brahma pratiṣedhaḥ tu a vyākopāt brahma eva pratiṣedhena saṃbadhyate yogya tvāt na prapañcaḥ tad vaiparītyāt
vīpsā tu tad atyanta abhāva sūcanāya iti madhyamaḥ pakṣaḥ
tatra prathamam pakṣam nirākaroti
na tāvat ubhaya pratiṣedhaḥ upapadyate śūnyavāda prasaṅgāt iti

original: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-upādhayo hyamī pṛthivyādayo 'vidyākalpitā na tu śoṇakarkādaya iva viśeṣā aśvatvasya /
analyzed: ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ upādhayaḥ hi amī pṛthivī ādayaḥ vidyā kalpitāḥ na tu śoṇa karka ādayaḥ iva viśeṣāḥ aśva tvasya
na ca upādhi vigame pratītiḥ vā
nahi upa ādīnām darpaṇa maṇi kṛpāṇa ādīnām apagame mukhasya abhāvaḥ pratitiḥ vā
tasmāt upādhi niṣedhe na upahitasya śaśaviṣāṇāyamāna tā pratyayaḥ vā
na ca iti iti saṃnidhāna aviśeṣāt sarvasya pratiṣedhya tvam iti yuktam
nahi bhāvam an upāśritya pratiṣedhaḥ upapadyate
kiñcid ha kkacid niṣidhyate
na hi anāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ pratipattum
tat idam uktam

original: apariśiṣyamāṇe cānyasminya itaraḥ pratiṣeddhumārabhyate tasya pratiṣedbhumaśakyatvāttasyaiva paramārthatvāpatteḥ pratiṣādhānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: a pariśiṣyamāṇe ca anyasmin yaḥ itaraḥ pratiṣeddhum ārabhyate tasya pratiṣedbhum aśakya tvāt tasya eva paramārtha tva āpatteḥ pratiṣādha anupapattiḥ
madhyamam pakṣam pratikṣipati
na api brahma pratiṣedhaḥ upapadyate
yuktam yat naisargika avidyā prāptaḥ prapañcaḥ pratiṣidhyate prāpti pūrvaka tvāt pratiṣedhasya
brahma tu na avidyā siddham
na api pramāṇa antarāt
tasmāt śabdena prāptam pratiṣedhanīyam

original: tathāca yastasya śabdaḥ prāpakaḥ sa tatpara iti sa brahmaṇi pramāṇamiti kathamasya niṣedho 'pi pramāṇavān /
analyzed: tathā ca yaḥ tasya śabdaḥ prāpakaḥ sa tatparaḥ iti sa brahmaṇi pramāṇam iti katham asya pramāṇavān

original: naca paryudāsādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena vikalpaḥ vastuni siddhasvabhāve tadanupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na ca paryudāsa adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣa nyāyena vikalpaḥ vastuni siddha svabhāve tad anupapatteḥ
na ca avāk manasa gocaraḥ buddha avalokhitum śakyaḥ
aśakyaḥ ca katham niṣidhyate
prapañcaḥ tu anādya vidyā siddhaḥ nūdya brahmaṇi pratiṣidyate iti yuktam
tat imām anupapattim abhipretya uktam na api brahma pratiṣedhaḥ upapadyate iti
hetu antaram āha brahma te bravāṇi iti
upakrama virodhāt iti

original: upakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraparyālocanayā hi vedāntānāṃ sarveṣāmeva brahmaparatvamupapāditaṃ prathame 'dhyāye /
analyzed: upakrama parāmarśa upasaṃhāra paryālocanayā hi vedāntānām sarveṣām eva brahma para tvam upapāditam prathame dhyāye

original: na cāsatyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ dūratasthena pratiṣedhenaiṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na ca asatyām ākāṅkṣāyām dūratasthena pratiṣedhena eṣām saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati

original: yacca vāṅmanasātītatayā brahmaṇastatpratiṣedhasya na pramāṇāntaravirodha iti tatrāha-
analyzed: yat ca vāc manasā atīta tayā brahmaṇaḥ tad pratiṣedhasya na pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ iti tatra āha
vāc manasā atīta tvam api iti
pratipādayanti vedāntāḥ mahatā prayatnena brahma
na ca niṣedhasya tad pratipādanam
anupapatteḥ iti uktam adhastāt

original: idānīṃ tu niṣprayojanamityuktaṃ 'prakṣālanāddhi paṅkasya' iti nyāyāt /
analyzed: idānīm tu niṣprayojanam iti uktam prakṣālanāt hi paṅkasya iti nyāyāt

original: tasmādvedāntavācā manasi saṃnidhānādbrahmaṇo vāṅmanasātītatvaṃ nāñjasamapi tu pratipādanaprakriyopakrama eṣaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt vedānta vācā manasi saṃnidhānāt brahmaṇaḥ vāc manasā atīta tvam na añjasam api tu pratipādana prakriyā upakramaḥ eṣaḥ

original: yathā gavādayo viṣayāḥ sākṣācchṛṅgagrāhikayā pratipādyante pratiyante ca naivaṃ brahma /
analyzed: yathā gavā ādayaḥ viṣayāḥ sākṣāt śṛṅga grāhikayā pratipādyante pratiyante ca na evam brahma
yathā āhuḥ bheda prapañca vilaya dvāreṇa ca nirūpaṇam iti

original: nanu prakṛtapratiṣedhe brahmaṇo 'pi kasmānna pratiṣejha ityata āha-
analyzed: nanu prakṛta pratiṣedhe brahmaṇaḥ api kasmāt na pratiṣejhe iti atas āha
