original: na kevalaṃ śabdato vastutaśca puruṣaprayatnasya bhāvanāyāḥ sākṣāddhātvartha eva sādhyo na tu svargādistasya tadavyāpyatvāt /
analyzed: na kevalam śabdataḥ vastutas ca puruṣa prayatnasya bhāvanāyāḥ sākṣāt dhātvarthaḥ eva sādhyaḥ na tu svarga ādiḥ tasya tad avyāpya tvāt

original: svargādestu nāmapadābhidheyatayā siddharūpasyākhyātavācyaṃ sādhyaṃ dhātvarthe prati 'bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyate' iti nyāyātsādhanatayā guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ
analyzed: svarga ādeḥ tu nāma pada abhidheya tayā siddha rūpasya ākhyāta vācyam sādhyam dhātvarthe prati bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti nyāyāt sādhanatayā guṇa tvena abhisaṃbandhaḥ

original: tathāca pāramarṣe sūtram-'dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ' iti /
analyzed: tathā ca pāramarṣe sūtram dravyāṇām karma saṃyoge guṇa tvena abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti
tathā ca karmaṇaḥ yāga ādeḥ duḥkha tvena puruṣeṇa asamīhita tvāt

original: samīhitasya ca svargāderasādhyatvānna yāgādayaḥ puruṣasyopakurvanyanupakāriṇāṃ caiṣāṃ
analyzed: samīhitasya ca svarga ādeḥ asādhya tvāt na yāga ādayaḥ puruṣasya upakurvani anupakāriṇām ca eṣām

original: na puruṣa īṣṭe anīśānaśca na teṣu saṃbhavatyadhikārītyadhikārābhāvapratipāditānarthakyaparihārāya
analyzed: na puruṣaḥ īṣṭe anīśānaḥ ca na teṣu saṃbhavati adhikārī iti adhikāra abhāva pratipādita ānarthakya parihārāya
kṛtsnasya eva āmnāyasya nirmṛṣṭa nikhila duḥkha anuṣaṅga nitya sukha maya brahma jñāna para tvam
bheda prapañca vilayana dvāreṇa tathā hi sarvatra eva āmnāye kkacid kasyacid bhedasya
gamyate yathā svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti śarīra ātma bhāva praliyaḥ
iha khalu āpātataḥ deha atiriktaḥ āmuṣmika phala upabhoga samarthaḥ dhikārī gamyate

original: tatrādhikārasyoktena krameṇa nirākaraṇādasato 'pi pratīyamānasya vicārāsahasyopāyatāmātreṇāvasthānādanena vākyena dehātmabhāvapravīlayastatpareṇa  #
analyzed: tatra adhikārasya uktena krameṇa nirākaraṇāt asataḥ pi pratīyamānasya vicāra asahasya upāya tā mātreṇa avasthānāt anena vākyena deha ātma bhāva pravīlayaḥ tatpareṇa
kriyate
godohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet iti atra api āpātataḥ dhikṛta adhikāra avagamāt adhikāri bheda pravilayaḥ

original: niṣedhavākyāni ca sākṣādeva pravṛttiniṣedhena vidhivākyāni cānyāyi 'sāṃgrahaṇyā yajeta
analyzed: niṣedha vākyāni ca sākṣāt eva pravṛtti niṣedhena vidhi vākyāni ca anyāyi sāṃgrahaṇyā yajeta

original: grāmakāmaḥ' ityādīnā na sāṃgrahaṇyādipravṛttipāraṇyapi tūpāyāntaropadeśena saṃvādidṛṣṭopāyapratiṣedhārthāni /
analyzed: grāma kāmaḥ ityādīnām na sāṃgrahaṇī ādi pravṛtti pāraṇī api tu upāya antara upadeśena saṃvādi dṛṣṭa upāya pratiṣedha arthāni

original: yathā viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣava māsya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti /
analyzed: yathā viṣam bhuṅkṣava mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣva iti
tathā ca rāga ādi akṣipta pravṛtti ṣedhena śāstrasya śāstra tvam api upapadyate
rāga nibandhanām tu upāya upadeśa dvāreṇa pravṛttim anujānataḥ rāga saṃbardhanāt aśāstra tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: tanniṣedhena tu brahmaṇi praṇidhānamādadhacchāstraṃ śāstra bhavet /
analyzed: tad niṣedhena tu brahmaṇi praṇidhānam ādadhat śāstram śāstra bhavet
īśvarāt eva karma anapekṣāt vicitra phala utpattiḥ ita

original: kathaṃ tarhi vidhiḥ kimatra kathaṃ pravartanāmātratvādvidhestasya cādhikāramantareṇāpyupapatteḥ /
analyzed: katham tarhi vidhiḥ kim atra katham pravartanā mātra tvāt vidheḥ tasya ca adhikāram antareṇa api upapatteḥ

original: nahi yo yaḥ pravartayati sa sarvo 'dhikṛtamapekṣate /
analyzed: nahi yaḥ yaḥ pravartayati sa sarvaḥ dhi kṛtam apekṣate
pavana ādeḥ pravartakasya tad anapekṣa tvāt iti śaṅkām apācikīrṣar āha

original: tatra ca vidhiśruterviṣayabhāvopagamādyāgaḥ svargasyotpādaka iti gamyate /
analyzed: tatra ca vidhi śruteḥ viṣaya bhāva upagamāt yāgaḥ svargasya utpādakaḥ iti gamyate
anyathā hi an anuṣṭhātṛkaḥ yāgaḥ āpadyeta
ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ upadeśaḥ hi vidhiḥ
yathā uktam tasya jñānam upadeśaḥ iti
upadeśaḥ ca niyojya prayojane karmaṇi loka śāstrayoḥ prasiddhaḥ
tat yathā ārogya kāmaḥ jīrṇe bhuñjīta
eṣa su panthāḥ gacchatu bhavān anena iti
na tu ajña ādiḥ iva niyoktṛ prayojanaḥ tatra abhiprāyasya pravartaka tvāt
tasya ca apauruṣeye saṃbhavāt
asya ca upadeśasya niyojya prayojana vyāpāra viṣaya tvam anuṣṭhātṛ apekṣita anukūla vyāpāra gocara tvam asmābhiḥ upapāditam nyāyakaṇikāyām

original: tathāca 'svargakāmo yajeta' ityādiṣu svargakāmādeḥ samīhitopāyā gamyante yāgādayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca svarga kāmaḥ yajeta ityādiṣu svarga kāma ādeḥ samīhita upāyāḥ gamyante yāga ādayaḥ
itarathā tu na sādhayitāram anugaccheyuḥ
tat uktam ṛṣiṇā asādhakam tu tādarthyāt iti
anuṣṭhātṛ apekṣita upāya tā rahita pravartanā mātra artha tve yajeta ityādīnām asādhakam karma yāga ādi syāt
sādhayitāram na adhigacchet iti arthaḥ

original: na caite sākṣādbhāvanābhāvyā api kartrapekṣitasādhanatāvidhyupahitamaryādā bhāvanoddeśyā bhavitumarhanti,
analyzed: na ca ete sākṣāt bhāvanā bhāvyāḥ api kartṛ apekṣita sādhana tā vidhi upahita maryādāḥ bhāvanā uddeśyāḥ bhavitum arhanti
yena puṃsām anupakārakāḥ santaḥ na adhikāra bhājaḥ bhaveyuḥ
duḥkha tvena karmaṇām cetana samāhāna āspada tvāt
svarga ādīnām tu bhāvanā pūrva rūpa kāmanā upadhānāt ca
prīti ātmaka tvāt ca
nāma pada abhidheyānām api puruṣa viśeṣaṇānām api bhāvanā uddeśya tā lakṣaṇa bhāvya tva pratīteḥ
phala artha pravṛtta bhāvanā bhāvya tva lakṣaṇena ca yāga ādi sādhya tvena phala artha pravṛtta bhāvanā bhāvya tva rūpasya phala sādhya tvasya sama pradhāna tva abhāvena eka vākya samavāya saṃbhavāt
bhāvanā bhāvya tva mātrasya ca yāga ādi sādhya tvasya karaṇe pi avirodhāt
anyathā sarvatra tad ucchedāt
paraśu ādeḥ api chid ādiṣu tathā bhāvāt

original: phalasya sākṣādbhāvanāvyāpyatvavirahiṇo 'pi taduddeśyatayā sarvatra vyāpitayā vyavasthānātsvargasādhane yāgādau svargakāmāderadhikāra iti siddham
analyzed: phalasya tad uddeśya tayā sarvatra vyāpitayā vyavasthānāt svarga sādhane yāga ādau svarga kāma ādeḥ adhikāraḥ iti siddham

original: na cāprāptārthaviṣayāḥ sāṃgrahaṇyādiyāgavidhayaḥ parisaṃkhyāyakā niyāmakā vā bhavitumarhanti /
analyzed: na ca aprāpta artha viṣayāḥ sāṃgrahaṇī ādi yāga vidhayaḥ parisaṃkhyāyakāḥ niyāmakāḥ vā bhavitum arhanti

original: na cādhikārābhāve dehātmapravilayo vādhikāribhedapravilayo vā śakya upapādayitum /
analyzed: na ca adhikāra abhāve deha ātma pravilayaḥ vā adhikāri bheda pravilayaḥ vā śakyaḥ upapādayitum
āpātataḥ pratibhāne ca asya tad para tvam eva na artha āyāta para tvam

original: svarasataḥ pratīyamāner'the vākyasya tādarthye saṃbhavati na saṃpātāyātaparatvamucitam /
analyzed: svarasataḥ pratīyamāna irthe vākyasya tādarthye saṃbhavati na saṃpāta āyāta paratvam ucitam
na ca etāvatā śāstra vyāghātaḥ
tasya svarga ādi upāya aśane pi śāstra tva upapatteḥ
puruṣa śreyaḥ abhidhāyaka tvam hi śāstra tvam
tasmāt vidhi viṣaya bhāva upagamāt yāgaḥ svargasya utpādakaḥ iti siddham
karmaṇaḥ vā kācid avasthā iti
karmaṇaḥ vā antara vyāpāraḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati-karmaṇo hi phalaṃ prati yatsādhanatvaṃ śrutaṃ,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati karmaṇaḥ hi phalam prati yat sādhana tvam śrutam
tat nirvāhayitum tasya eva avāntara vyāpāraḥ bhavati

original: naca vyāpāravati satyeva vyāpāro nāsatīti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca vyāpāravati sati eva vyāpāraḥ na asati iti yuktam
asatsu api āgneya ādiṣu tad upatti apūrvāṇām parama apūrve janayitavye tad avāntaravyāpāra tvāt

original: asatyapi ca tailapānakarmaṇi tena puṣṭau kartavyāyāmantarā tailapariṇāmabhedānāṃ tadavāntaravyāpāratvāt /
analyzed: asati api ca taila pāna karmaṇi tena puṣṭau kartavyāyām antarā taila pariṇāma bhedānām tad avāntara vyāpāra tvāt

original: tasmātkarmakāryamapūrve karmaṇā phale kartavye tadavāntaravyāpāra iti yuktam /
analyzed: tasmāt karma kāryam apūrve karmaṇā phale kartavye tad avāntara vyāpāraḥ iti yuktam
yadā punar phala upajanana anyathā anupapattyā kiñcid kalpyate tadā
phalasya vā pūrvā avasthā
a vicitrasya kāraṇasya iti
yadi īśvarāt eva kevalāt iti śeṣaḥ
karmabhiḥ vā śubha aśubhaiḥ kārya dvaidha utpāde rāga ādimattva prasaṅgaḥ iti āśayaḥ
pūrvam tu bādarāyaṇaḥ hetu vyapadeśāt
dṛṣṭa anusāriṇī hi kalpanā yuktā nā anyathā

original: nahi jātu mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍādayaḥ kumbhakārādyanadhiṣṭhitāḥ kumbhādyārambhāya vibhavavanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: nahi jātu mṛd piṇḍa daṇḍa ādayaḥ kumbhakāra ādi anadhiṣṭhitāḥ kumbha ādi ārambhāya vibhavavantaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ
na ca vidyut pavana ādibhiḥ aprayatna pūrvaiḥ vyabhicāraḥ
teṣām api kalpanā āspada tayā vyabhicāra nidarśana tva anupapatteḥ

original: tasmādacetanaṃ karma vāpūrve vā na cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ svakārye pravartitumutsahate naca caitanyamātraṃ karmasvarūpasāmānyaviniyogādiviśeṣavijñānaśūnyamupayujyate,
analyzed: tasmāt acetanam karma vā apūrve vā na cetanā anadhiṣṭhitam svatantram sva kārye pravartitum utsahate na ca caitanya mātram karma svarūpa sāmānya viniyoga ādi viśeṣa vijñāna śūnyam upayujyate
yena tad rahita kṣetrajña mātra adhiṣṭhānena siddha sādhya tvam udbhāvyeta
tasmāt tat tat prāsāda aṭṭāla gopura toraṇa ādi upajana nidarśana sahasraiḥ su pariniścitam yathā

original: cetanādhiṣṭhānādacetanānāṃ kāryārambhakatvamiti tathā caitanyaṃ devatāyā asati bādhake
analyzed: cetanā adhiṣṭhānāt acetanānām kārya ārambhaka tvam iti tathā caitanyam devatāyāḥ asati bādhake

original: śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇaprasiddhaṃ na śakyaṃ pratiṣedhdhumityapi spaṣṭaṃ niraṭaṅki devatādhikaraṇe /
analyzed: śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa prasiddham na śakyam pratiṣedhdhum iti api spaṣṭam niraṭaṅki devatā adhikaraṇe
laukikaḥ ca īśvaraḥ dāna paricaraṇa praṇāma añjali karaṇa stuti mayībhiḥ ati śraddhā garbhābhiḥ bhaktibhiḥ ārādhitaḥ
prasannaḥ sva anurūpam ārādhakāya phalam prayacchati virodhataḥ ca apakriyābhiḥ virodhakāya āhitām iti api su prasiddham

original: tadiha kevalaṃ karma vāpūrvaṃ vā cetanānadhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ phalaṃ prasūta iti dṛṣṭaviruddham /
analyzed: tat iha kevalam karma vā apūrvam vā cetanā anadhiṣṭhitam acetanam phalam prasūte iti dṛṣṭa viruddham

original: yathā vinaṣṭaṃ karma na phalaṃ prasūta iti kalpyate dṛṣṭavirodhādevamihāpīti /
analyzed: yathā vinaṣṭam karma na phalam prasūte iti kalpyate dṛṣṭa virodhāt evam iha api iti

original: tathā devapūjācmako yāgo devatāṃ naprasādayan phalaṃ prasūta ityapi dṛṣṭaviruddham /
analyzed: tathā deva pūjā acmakaḥ yāgaḥ devatām na prasādayan phalam prasūtaḥ iti api dṛṣṭa viruddham
nahi rāja pūjā ātmakam ārādhanam rājānam a prasādya phalāya kalpate
tasmāt dṛṣṭa ānuguṇyāya yāga ādibhiḥ api devatā prasattiḥ utpādyate
tathā ca devatā prasādāt eva sthāyinaḥ phala utpatteḥ upapatteḥ kṛtam apūrveṇa
evam aśubhena api karmaṇā devatā virodhanam śruti smṛti prasiddham
tatas sthāyinaḥ niṣṭa phala prasavaḥ

original: naca śubhāśubhakāriṇāṃ tadanurūpaṃ phalaṃ prasuvānā devatā dveṣapakṣapātavatīti yujyate /
analyzed: na ca śubha aśubha kāriṇām tad anurūpam phalam prasuvānā devatā dveṣa pakṣapātavatī iti yujyate

original: nahi rājā sādhukāriṇamanugṛhṇannigṛhṇan vā pāpakāriṇaṃ bhavati dviṣṭo rakto vā tadvadalaukiko 'pīśvaraḥ /
analyzed: nahi rājā sādhu kāriṇam anugṛhṇan nigṛhṇan vā pāpa kāriṇam bhavati dviṣṭaḥ raktaḥ vā tadvat alaukikaḥ pi īśvaraḥ

original: yathā ca paramāpūrve kartavye utpattyapūrvāṇāmaṅgāpūrvāṇāṃ copayogaḥ /
analyzed: yathā ca parama apūrve kartavye utpatti apūrvāṇām aṅga apūrvāṇām ca upayogaḥ
evam pradhāna ārādhane ṅga ārādhanānām utpatti ārādhanānām ca upayogaḥ
svāmi ārādhane iva tad amātya tad praṇayi jana ārādhanānām iti sarve samānam anyatra abhiniveśāt

original: tasmāddṛṣṭāvirodhena devatārādhanāt phalaṃ na tvapūrvātkarmaṇo vā kevalādvirodhato hetuvyapadeśaśca śrautaḥ smārtaśca vyākhyātaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt dṛṣṭa avirodhena devatā ārādhanāt phalam na tu apūrvāt karmaṇaḥ vā kevalāt virodhataḥ hetu vyapadeśaḥ ca śrautaḥ smārtaḥ ca vyākhyātaḥ

original: ye punarantaryimivyāpārāyā phalotpādanāyā nityatvaṃ sarvasādhāraṇatvamiti manyamānā bhāṣyakārīyamadhikaraṇaṃ dūṣavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya  #
analyzed: ye punar antar yimi vyāpārāyāḥ phala utpādanāyāḥ nitya tvam sarva sādhāraṇa tvam iti manyamānāḥ bhāṣyakārīyam adhikaraṇam dūṣa vibhāge bhāmatyām tṛtīyasya adhyāyasya
dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
iti tṛtīya adhyāyasya tattvampadārtha pariśodhana ākhyaḥ dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
tṛtīya adhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
sarva vedānta pratyayam codanā ādi aviśeṣāt
pūrveṇa saṃgatim āha
vyākhyātam vijñeyasya brahmaṇaḥ iti
nirūpādhi brahma tattva gocaram vijñānam manvānaḥ ākṣipati
nanu vijñeyam brahma iti

original: sāvayavasya hyavayavānāṃ bhedāttadavayavaviśiṣṭabrahmagocarāṇi vijñānāni gocarabhedādbhidyerannityavayavā brahmaṇo nirākṛtāḥ pūrvāparādītyanena
analyzed: sa avayavasya hi avayavānām bhedāt tad avayava viśiṣṭa brahma gocarāṇi vijñānāni gocara bhedāt bhidyeran iti avayavāḥ brahmaṇaḥ nirākṛtāḥ pūrva apara ādi iti anena

original: naca nānāsvabhāvaṃ brahma yataḥ svabhāvabhedādbhinnāni jñānānītyuktam-
analyzed: na ca nānā svabhāvam brahma yatas svabhāva bhedāt bhinnāni jñānāni iti uktam
ekarasam iti
dhanaṅkaṭhinam
nanu ekam api aneka rūpam loke dṛṣṭam

original: yathā somaśarmaiko 'pyācāryo māyulapitā putro bhrātā bhartā jāmātā dvijottama ityanekarūpa ityata uktam-
analyzed: yathā somaśarmā ekaḥ pi ācāryaḥ māyula pitā putraḥ bhrātā bhartā jāmātā dvijottamaḥ iti aneka rūpaḥ iti atas uktam
eka rūpa tvāt ca

original: ekasmin gocare saṃbhavanti bahūni vijñānāni na tvanekākāraṇītyuktam-
analyzed: ekasmin gocare saṃbhavanti bahūni vijñānāni na tu aneka akāraṇī iti uktam
aneka rūpāṇi
rūpam ākāraḥ
samādhatte
ucyate saguṇā iti

original: tattadguṇopādhānabrahmaviṣayā upāsanāḥ prāṇādiviṣayāśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakamuktiphalā viṣayabhedādbhidyanta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad tad guṇa upādhāna brahma viṣayāḥ upāsanāḥ prāṇa ādi viṣayāḥ ca dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭaka mukti phalāḥ viṣaya bhedāt bhidyante iti arthaḥ
tatas upapannaḥ vimarśaḥ iti āha
teṣu eṣā cintā
pūrvapakṣam gṛhṇāti
tatra iti
nāmnaḥ tāvat iti
asti atha eṣa jyotiḥ etena sahasra dakṣiṇena yajeta iti
tatra saṃśayaḥ kim yajeta iti saṃnihita jyotiṣṭoma anuvādena sahasra dakṣiṇā lakṣaṇa guṇa vidhānam
uta etad guṇa viśiṣṭa karma antara vidhānam iti
kim tāvat prāptam

original: jyotiṣṭomasya prakrāntatvādyajeteti tadanuvādājjyotiriti prātipadikamātraṃ paṭhitvā etenetyanukṛṣya karmasāmānādhikaraṇyena karmanāmavyavasthāpanāt,
analyzed: jyotiṣṭomasya prakrānta tvāt yajeta iti tad anuvādāt jyotiḥ iti prātipadika mātram paṭhitvā etena iti anukṛṣya karma sāmānādhikaraṇyena karma nāma vyavasthāpanāt
karmaṇaḥ ca anuvādya tvena tad tantrasya nāmnaḥ pi tathā eva vyavasthāpanāt

original: jyotiḥśabdasya 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā' iti ca jyotiṣṭome yogadarśanāt nāmaikadeśena ca nāmopalakṣaṇasya lokasiddhatvādbhīmasenopalakṣaṇabhīmapadavat,
analyzed: jyotiḥ śabdasya vasante vasante jyotiṣā iti ca jyotiṣṭome yoga darśanāt nāma eka deśena ca nāma upalakṣaṇasya loka siddha tvāt bhīmasena upalakṣaṇa bhīma pada vat
athaśabdasya ca ānantarya arthasya asaṃbandhi tve nupapatteḥ
guṇa viśiṣṭa karma antara vidheḥ ca guṇa mātra vidhānasya lāghavāt
dvādaśa śata dakṣiṇāyāḥ ca utpatti aśiṣṭa tayā sama śiṣṭa tayā sahasra dakṣiṇayā saha vikalpa upapatteḥ

original: prakṛtasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya sahasradakṣiṇālakṣaṇaguṇavidhānārthamayamanuvādo na tu karmāntaramiti prāptam /
analyzed: prakṛtasya eva jyotiṣṭomasya sahasra dakṣiṇā lakṣaṇa guṇa vidhāna artham ayam anuvādaḥ na tu karma antaram iti prāptam

original: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavetpūrvasmin guṇavidhiryadi tadeva prakaraṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: evam prāptaḥ ucyate bhavet pūrvasmin guṇa vidhiḥ yadi tat eva prakaraṇam syāt
vicchinnam tu tat
tathā hi saṃnidhau api pūrva asaṃbaddha artham saṃjñā antaram pratīyamānam anyāyaḥ ca aneka artha tvam
iti nyāyāt utsargataḥ ṛtha antara artha tvāt pūrva buddhim vyavacchinatti apūrva buddhim ca
prasūtaḥ iti loka siddham

original: na jātu dehi devadattāya gāmatha devāya vājinamiti devaśabdāddevadattaṃ vājibhājamavasyanti laukikāḥ /
analyzed: na jātu dehi devadattāya gām atha devāya vājinam iti deva śabdāt devadattam vāji bhājam avasyanti laukikāḥ

original: tathā copariṣṭāt 'yajeta' iti śrūyamāṇamasaṃbaddhārthapadavyavāyāttatkarmabuddhimanādadhat tatra guṇavidhānamātrāsamarthaṃ karmāntarameva vidhatte
analyzed: tathā ca upariṣṭāt yajeta iti śrūyamāṇam asaṃbaddha artha pada vyavāyāt tad karma buddhim an ādadhat tatra guṇa vidhāna mātra asamartham karma antaram eva vidhatte

original: na caikatrānupapattyā lakṣaṇayā jyotiḥśabdo jyotiṣṭome pravṛtta ityasatyāmanupapattau lākṣaṇiko yuktaḥ /
analyzed: na ca ekatra anupapattyā lakṣaṇayā jyotiḥ śabdaḥ jyotiṣṭome pravṛttaḥ iti asatyām anupapattau lākṣaṇikaḥ yuktaḥ

original: nahi gāṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gāṅgāpadaṃ lākṣaṇikamiti mīno gāṅgāyāmityatrāpi lākṣaṇikaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: nahi gāṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ iti atra gāṅgā padam lākṣaṇikam iti mīnaḥ gāṅgāyām iti atra api lākṣaṇikam bhavati

original: bhede 'pi ca prathamaṃ saṃjñāntareṇollikhite yajiśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ karmanāmadheyatāmātratāmāvahati natu saṃjñāntaropajanitāṃ bhedadhiyamapanetumutsahate
analyzed: bhede pi ca prathamam saṃjñā antareṇa ullikhite yaji śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyam karma nāmadheya tā mātra tām āvahati na tu saṃjñā antara upajanitām bheda dhiyam apanetum utsahate
tathā ca atha śabdaḥ dhikāra arthaḥ prakaraṇa antara tām avadyotayati
eṣa śabdaḥ ca adhikriyamāṇa parāmarśakaḥ iti saḥ yam saṃjñā antarāt bhedaḥ iti

original: bhavatu saṃjñāntarātkarmabhedaḥ prastute tu kimāyātamityata āha-
analyzed: bhavatu saṃjñā antarāt karma bhedaḥ prastute tu kim āyātam iti atas āha
asti ca atra vedānta antara vihiteṣu iti

original: yathaiva kāṭhakādisamākhyā granthe prayujyanta evaṃ jñāne 'pi laukikāḥ /

original: na cāsti viśeṣo yato granthe mukhyāvijñāne gauṇī bhavet /

original: bhedakaṃ tadā kaiva kathā śākhāntarīye viprakṛṣṭatame 'tatpratīkabhūtasamākhyāntarābhidheye jñāta iti /
analyzed: bhedakam tadā kā eva kathā śākhā antarīye viprakṛṣṭatame tad pratīka bhūta samākhyā antara abhidheye jñātaḥ iti

original: tathā rūpabhedo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādakaḥ prasiddho yathā 'vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājinam' ityevamādiṣu /
analyzed: tathā rūpa bhedaḥ api karma bhedasya pratipādakaḥ prasiddhaḥ yathā vaiśvadevī āmikṣā vājibhyaḥ vājinam iti evamādiṣu

original: idamāmnayate-'tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā' iti /

atra hi dravya devatā saṃbandha anumitaḥ yāgaḥ vidhīyate

original: atredaṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ pūrvāsminneva karmaṇi vājinaṃ guṇo vidhīyate uta karmāntaraṃ dravyadevatāntaraviśiṣṭamapūrvaṃ vidhīyata iti /
analyzed: atra idam saṃdihyate kim pūrvāsmin eva karmaṇi vājinam guṇaḥ vidhīyate uta karmāntaram dravya devatā antara viśiṣṭam apūrvam vidhīyate iti
kim tāvat prāptam

original: dravyadevatāntaraviśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhau vidhigauravaprasaṅgāt karmāntarāpūrvāntarakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgācca na karmāntaravidhānamapi tu pūrvasminneva  #
analyzed: dravya devatā antara viśiṣṭa karmāntara vidhau vidhi gaurava prasaṅgāt karmāntara apūrva antara kalpanā gaurava prasaṅgāt ca na karmāntara vidhānam api tu pūrvasmin eva
karmaṇi vājina dravya vidhiḥ

original: na cotpattiśiṣṭamikṣāguṇāvarodhāttatra vājinamalabdhāvakāśaṃ karmāntaraṃ gocarayatīti yuktam /

original: ubhayorapi vākyayoḥ samasamayapravṛtterāmikṣāvājinayorutpattau samaṃ śiṣyamāṇatvena nāmikṣāyāḥ śiṣṭatvam /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ api vākyayoḥ sama samaya pravṛtteḥ āmikṣā vājinayoḥ utpattau samam śiṣyamāṇa tvena na āmikṣāyāḥ śiṣṭa tvam
tat katham anayā avaruddham karma na vājinam niviśet

original: na ca vaiśvadevītyatra śrauta āmikṣāsaṃbandho viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ yena vājinasaṃbandhādvākyagamyādbalavānbhavedubhayorapi padāntarāpekṣapratītitayā  #
analyzed: na ca vaiśvadevī iti atra śrautaḥ āmikṣā saṃbandhaḥ viśveṣām devānām yena vājina saṃbandhāt vākya gamyāt balavān bhavet ubhayoḥ api pada antara apekṣa pratītitayā
vākya gamya tva aviśeṣāt
na u khalu vaiśvadevī iti ukte āmikṣā pada an apekṣām āmikṣām adhyavasyāmaḥ

original: astu vā śrautatvaṃ tathāpi vājibhya iti padaṃ vājamannamāmikṣā tadeṣāmastīti vyutpattyā tatsaṃbandhino viśvāndevānupalakṣayati /
analyzed: astu vā śrauta tvam tathā api vājibhyaḥ iti padam vājam annam āmikṣā tat eṣām asti iti vyutpattyā tad saṃbandhinaḥ viśvān devān upalakṣayati
yadi api viśvadeva śabdāt vāji padam bhinnam

original: yena ca śabdena codanā tenaivoddeśe devatātvaṃ na śabdāntareṇānyathārthaikatvena sūryādityapadayoḥ sūryādityacarvorekadaivatyaprasaṅgāt,
analyzed: yena ca śabdena codanā tena eva uddeśe devatā tvam na śabda antareṇa anyathā artha ekatvena sūrya āditya padayoḥ sūrya āditya carvoḥ eka daivatya prasaṅgāt

original: tathāpi vājinnitīneḥ sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca sarvanāmārthatvāt,
analyzed: tathā api vājin iti ineḥ sarvanāma arthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca sarvanāma artha tvāt

original: viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ ca viśvadevāpadena saṃnidhāpanāttatpadapuraḥsarā evaite vājipadenopasthāpyā na tu sūryādityapadavatsvatantrāḥ /
analyzed: viśveṣām devānām ca viśvadevā padena saṃnidhāpanāt tad pada puraḥsarāḥ eva ete vāji padena upasthāpyāḥ na tu sūrya āditya pada vat svatantrāḥ

original: tathāca tadupalakṣaṇārthaṃ vājipadaṃ viśvadevopahitāmeva devatāmupalakṣayatīti na śabdāntarāddevatābhedaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca tad upalakṣaṇa artham vāji padam viśvadeva upahitām eva devatām upalakṣayati iti na śabda antarāt devatā bhedaḥ

original: tataścāmikṣāsaṃbandhopajīvanena viśvebhyo vājinaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ nāmikṣayā bādhyate
analyzed: tatas ca āmikṣā saṃbandha upajīvanena viśvebhyaḥ vājinam vidhīyamānam na āmikṣayā bādhyate

original: kintu tayā saha samuccīyata iti na karmāntaramapi tu vākyābhyāṃ dravyayuktamekaṃ
analyzed: kintu tayā saha samuccīyate iti na karma antaram api tu vākyābhyām dravya yuktam ekam

original: karma vidhīyata iti prāpta ucyate-syādetadevaṃ yadi vaiśvadevīti taddhitaśrutyāmikṣā nocyeta /

original: taddhitasya tvasyeti sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca viśeṣyasya sarvanāmārthatvāttatraiva taddhitasyāpi vṛttirnatu viśveṣu deveṣaṣu
analyzed: taddhitasya tvasya iti sarvanāma arthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca viśeṣyasya sarvanāma artha tvāt tatra eva taddhitasya api vṛttiḥ na tu viśveṣu deva iṣaṣu
na tad saṃbandhe
nā api tad saṃbandhi mātre

original: nanvevaṃ sati kasmādvaiśvadevīśabdamātrādeva nāmikṣāṃ pratīmaḥ kimiti cāmikṣāpadamapekṣāmahe /
analyzed: nanu evam sati kasmāt vaiśvadevī śabda mātrāt eva na āmikṣām pratīmaḥ kim iti ca āmikṣā padam apekṣāmahe
taddhita antasya padasya abhidhāna aparyavasānāt na pratīmaḥ tad paryavasānāya ca apekṣamahe
avasita abhidhānam hi padam samartham artha dhiyam ādhātum

original: idaṃ tu saṃnihitaviśeṣābhidhāyi tatsaṃnidhimapekṣamāṇaṃ saṃnidhāpakamāmikṣāpadamapekṣata iti kuta āmikṣāpadānapekṣa āmikṣāpratyayaprasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: idam tu saṃnihita viśeṣa abhidhāyi tat saṃnidhim apekṣamāṇam saṃnidhāpakam āmikṣā padam apekṣate iti kutas āmikṣā pada anapekṣaḥ āmikṣā pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ
kutas vā tatra anapekṣā

original: ataśca satyāmapi padāntarāpekṣāyāṃ yatpadaṃ padāntarāpekṣamabhidhatte tatpramāṇabhūtaprathamabhāvipadāvagamyatvācchrautaṃ balīyaśca /
analyzed: atas ca satyām api pada antara apekṣāyām yat padam pada antara apekṣam abhidhatte tat pramāṇa bhūta prathama bhāvi pada avagamya tvāt śrautam balīyaḥ ca
yat tu paryavasita abhidhāna pada abhihita padārtha vagama gamyam tat tat carama pratīti vākya gamyam
durbalam ca iti taddhita śruti avagata āmikṣā lakṣaṇa guṇa avarodhāt pūrva karma asaṃyogi vājina dravyam

original: sasaṃbandhi pūrvasmādbhinatti vājipadaṃ kathañcidyaugikaṃ sāpekṣāvṛtti viśvadevaśabdāṃ
analyzed: sa saṃbandhi pūrvasmāt bhinatti vāji padam kathañcid yaugikam sa apekṣā vṛtti viśva deva śabdām
devatām vaiśvadevī padāt āmikṣā dravyam pratyupasarjanībhūtām avagatām upalakṣayiṣyati
prakṛtam hi sarvanāma pada gocaraḥ
pradhānam ca prakṛtam ucyate na upasarjanam

original: prāmāṇike ca vidhikalpanāgaurave abhyupetavye eva pramāṇasya tattvaviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: prāmāṇike ca vidhi kalpanā gaurave abhyupetavye eva pramāṇasya tattva viṣaya tvāt

original: tasmādyatheha pūrvakarmāsaṃbhavino guṇātkarmabheda evamihāpi pañcāgnividyāyāḥ ṣaḍagnividyā bhinnā,
analyzed: tasmāt yathā iha pūrva karma asaṃbhavinaḥ guṇāt karma bhedaḥ evam iha api pañcāgni vidyāyāḥ ṣaḍagni vidyā bhinnā
evam prāṇa saṃvādeṣu una adhika bhāvena vidyā bedaḥ iti
tathā dharma viśeṣaḥ u pi karma bhedasya pratipādakaḥ iti
tathā ahi kārīri vākyāni adhīyānāḥ taittirīyāḥ bhūmau bhojanam ācaranti na ācaranti anye
tathā agnim adhīyānāḥ kecid upādhyāyasya uda kumbham āharanti na āharanti anye
tathā aśvamedha dhīyānāḥ kecid aśvasya ghāsam ānayanti na ānayanti anye
kecid ti anye
kecid tu ācaranti anyam eva dharmam

original: naca tānyeva karmāṇi bhūmibhojanādijanitamupakāramākāṅkṣanti nākāṅkṣanti ceti yujyate /

original: ca dhātubhedamantareṇa bhedānupapatteḥ 'samidho yajati' iti prathamabhāvinā vākyena

na tu ayam eṣām prayojakaḥ kramaḥ
paraspara apekṣāṇām eka vākya tve hi prayojakaḥ syāt

original: tena prāthamyābhāvāt prāptamityeva nāstīti kasya ko 'nuvādaḥ /

original: guṇaśravaṇe hi guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhāne vidhigauravabhiyā guṇamātravidhānalāghavāya karmānuvādapekṣāyāṃ viparivṛtterupakāraḥ /

original: yathā 'dadhnā juheti' iti dadhividhipare vākye viparivṛttyapekṣāyām 'agnihotraṃ juheti' iti vihitasya homasya viparīvartamānasyānuvādaḥ /

original: agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā ca kiṃvacanavihitakiṅkarmānuvādena kasya guṇavidhitvamiti na vinigamyate /

original: tatra saṃdehaḥ-kiṃ kālārādhe yāgāntaramidaṃ codyata uta teṣveva karmasu prakṛteṣu kālāparādhe nimitte devatāpanaya iti /
analyzed: tatra saṃdehaḥ kim kāla ārādhe yāga antaram idam codyate uta teṣu eva karmasu prakṛteṣu kāla aparādhe nimitte devatā apanayaḥ iti

original: eṣa tāvadatra viṣayaḥ-amāvāsyāyāmeva darśakarmārthaṃ vedikriyāgnipraṇayanakriyā vratādiśca yajamānasaṃskāraḥ /
analyzed: eṣa tāvat atra viṣayaḥ amāvāsyāyām eva darśa karma artham vedi kriyā agni praṇayana kriyā vrata ādiḥ ca yajamāna saṃskāraḥ
dadhi arthaḥ ca dohaḥ
pratipadi ca darśa karma pravṛttiḥ iti anuṣṭhāna kramaḥ tāttvikaḥ

original: yasya tu yajamānasya kutaścidbhamanibandhanāccaturdaśyāmevāmāvāsyābuddhau pravṛttaprayogasya candramā abhyudīyate tatredaṃ śrūyate-'yasya havirniruptam'  #
analyzed: yasya tu yajamānasya kutaścid bhama nibandhanāt caturdaśyām eva amāvāsyā buddhau pravṛtta prayogasya candramāḥ abhyudīyate tatra idam śrūyate yasya haviḥ niruptam
iti

original: tena yajamānenābhyuditenāmāvāsyāyāmeva nimittādhikāraṃ parisamāpya purastadahareva vedyuddharaṇādikarma kṛtvā pratipadi darśaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ
analyzed: tena yajamānena abhyuditena amāvāsyāyām eva nimitta adhikāram parisamāpya puras tat ahar eva vedi uddharaṇa ādi karma kṛtvā pratipadi darśaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ

original: tatrābhāyudaye kiṃ naimittikamidaṃ karmāntaraṃ darśāccodyata uta tasminneva darśakarmaṇi pūrvadevatāpanayanena devanāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti /
analyzed: tatra ābhā yudaye kim naimittikam idam karma antaram darśāt codyate uta tasmin eva darśa karmaṇi pūrvadevatā apanayanena devanā antaram vidhīyate iti
tatra haviḥ bhāga mātra śravaṇāt caru vidhāna sāmarthyāt ca karma antaram

original: yadi hi pūrvadevatābhyo havīṃṣi vibhajediti śrūyate tatastānyeva havīṃṣi devatāntareṇa
analyzed: yadi hi pūrva devatābhyaḥ havīṃṣi vibhajet iti śrūyate tatas tāni eva havīṃṣi devatā antareṇa

original: yujyamānāni na karmāntaraṃ gamayitumarhanti kintu prakṛtameva karma taddhaviṣkamapanītapūrtadevatākaṃ
analyzed: yujyamānāni na karma antaram gamayitum arhanti kintu prakṛtam eva karma tat haviṣkam apanīta pūrta devatākam
devatā antara yuktam syāt

original: atra punastredhā taṇḍulān vibhajediti haviṣa eva madhyamādikrameṇa vibhāgaśravaṇādanapanītā
analyzed: atra punar tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajet iti haviṣaḥ eva madhyama ādi krameṇa vibhāga śravaṇāt anapanītā

original: haviṣi pūrvadevatā iti pūrvadavatāvaruddhe haviṣi devatāntaramalabdhāvakāśaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ
analyzed: haviṣi pūrva devatāḥ iti pūrva davatā avaruddhe haviṣi devatā antaram alabdha avakāśam śrūyamāṇam
karma antaram eva gocarayet

original: apica prāpte pūrvasmin karmaṇi dadhnastaṇḍulānāṃ cendrādidevatā saṃbandhaśca vidhātavyaḥ /
analyzed: api ca prāpte pūrvasmin karmaṇi dadhnaḥ taṇḍulānām ca indra ādi devatā saṃbandhaḥ ca vidhātavyaḥ

original: carutvaṃ cātra vihitaṃ nāstīti tadapiva vidhātavyam /
analyzed: caru tvam ca atra vihitam na asti iti tat api vai vidhātavyam
tathā prāpte karmaṇi aneka guṇa vidhānāt vākyam bhidyeta

original: karmāntaraṃ tvapūrvaṃ śakyamekenaiva prayatnenānekaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ vidhātumiti nimitte karmāntarameva vidhīyate /
analyzed: karmāntaram tu apūrvam śakyam ekena eva prayatnena aneka guṇa viśiṣṭam vidhātum iti nimitte karmāntaram eva vidhīyate

original: darśastu lupyate kālāparādhāditi prāpta ucyate-na karmāntaram /
analyzed: darśaḥ tu lupyate kāla aparādhāt iti prāptaḥ ucyate na karmāntaram
pūrva davatātaḥ haviṣaḥ vibhāga pūrvam nimitte devatā antara vidhānāt
caru arthasya ca artha prāpteḥ

original: bhavedetadevaṃ yadā tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajediti taṇḍulānāṃ tredhā vibhāgavidhānaparametadvākyaṃ
analyzed: bhavet etat evam yadā tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajet iti taṇḍulānām tredhā vibhāga vidhāna param etat vākyam

original: syādapi tu vākyāntaraprāptaṃ taṇḍulānāṃ tredhātvamanūdya vibhajedityetāvadvidhatte
analyzed: syāt api tu vākya antara prāptam taṇḍulānām tredhātvam anūdya vibhajet iti etāvat vidhatte

original: tatra vākyānyapanīte pūrvavat devatāsaṃbandhe haviṣastasminneva karmaṇyapratyūhaṃ
analyzed: tatra vākyāni apanīte pūrvavat devatā saṃbandhe haviṣaḥ tasmin eva karmaṇi apratyūham
devatā antara saṃbandham vidhātum śaknuvanti

original: tathāca dravyamukhena prakṛtamukhapratyabhijñānāt devatāntarasaṃbandhe 'pi na karmāntarakalpanābhavitumarhati /
analyzed: tathā ca dravya mukhena prakṛta mukha pratyabhijñānāt devatā antara saṃbandhe na karma antara kalpanā bhavitum arhati

original: tataśca samāpte 'pi naimittikādhikārasiddhyarthaṃ tānyeva punaḥ karmāṇyanuṣṭheyāni /
analyzed: tatas ca samāpte naimittika adhikāra siddhi artham tāni eva punar karmāṇi anuṣṭheyāni
na ca dadhani carum iti caru saptamī arthayoḥ vidhānam tayoḥ api artha prāpta tvāt

original: prakṛte hi karmaṇi taṇḍulapeṣaṇaprathanaṃ puroḍāśapākādi dadhipayasī ca prāptāni
analyzed: prakṛte hi karmaṇi taṇḍula peṣaṇa prathanam puroḍāśa pāka ādi dadhi payasī ca prāptāni

original: tatrābhyudayanimitte dadhiyuktānāṃ payoyuktānāṃ ca taṇḍulānāṃ vibhajediti vākyena
analyzed: tatra abhyudaya nimitte dadhi yuktānām payaḥ yuktānām ca taṇḍulānām vibhajet iti vākyena

original: pūrvadevatāpanayaṃ kṛtvā ye madhyamā ityādibhirvākyairdevatāntarasaṃbandhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: pūrva devatā apanayam kṛtvā ye madhyamāḥ ityādibhiḥ vākyaiḥ devatā antara saṃbandhaḥ kṛtaḥ
na ca prabhūta adhi payaḥ saṃsaktaiḥ alpaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ puroḍāśa kriyā saṃbhavati

original: iti puroḍāśanivṛttau tadarthasya prathanasyāpi nivṛttiranivṛttastu pāko 'pavādābhāvāttathā cārthaprāptaścodyate /
analyzed: iti puroḍāśa nivṛttau tad arthasya prathanasya api nivṛttiḥ anivṛttaḥ tu pāka upavāda abhāvāt tathā ca artha prāptaḥ codyate
bhavatu vā aneka vākya kalpanam
prakṛta adhikāra avagama balāt asya api nyāyya tvāt iti

original: tasmāttadevedaṃ karma na tu karmāntaramiti siddham /

paśu kāma vākye tu apūrva karma vidhiḥ abhyudaya vākya sārūpye pi

original: 'ṣṭhākapālaṃ nirvapedye madhyamāstān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye kṣodiṣṭhāstanindrāya
analyzed: ṣṭhākapālam nirvapet ye madhyamāḥ tān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum ye kṣodiṣṭhāḥ tan indrāya

original: atra hi amāvāsyāmiṣṭveti samāpte yāge paśukāmeṣṭividhānaṃ nātra pūrvasya karmaṇo 'nanuvṛtteryāgāntaravidhiriti yuktam /
analyzed: atra hi amāvāsyām iṣṭvā iti samāpte yāge paśu kāma iṣṭi vidhānam na atra pūrvasya karmaṇaḥ nanu vṛtteḥ yāga antara vidhiḥ iti yuktam

original: parasmāt paro varācca varīyāniti parovarīyānudgīthaḥ paramātmarūpaḥ saṃpannaḥ /

original: paramātmadṛṣṭimudgīthe bhavayitum 'ākāśo hyevaibhyo bhūtebhyo jyāyān' ityākāśaśabdena paramātmānaṃ nirdiśati //7 // 3.3.3.8.

original: evaṃ pratimāyāṃ vāsudevabuddhirnāmni ca brahmabuddhistathoṅkāga udgīthabuddhivyapadeśāviti /

original: pratyanuvākaṃ pratyṛcamupakrame ca samāptau cokāraḥ sardavedavyāpīti kiṅgato 'yamoṅkārastattadāpyādiguṇaviśiṣṭastasmai
analyzed: pratyanuvākam pratyṛcam upakrame ca samāptau ca ukāraḥ sarda veda vyāpī iti kiṅgataḥ yama oṅkāraḥ tad tad āpya ādi guṇa viśiṣṭaḥ tasmai
tasmai kāma avāpti ādi phalāya upāsya tvena adhikriyate iti apekṣāyām udgītha padena iti viśiṣyate
udgītha padena ukāra ādi avayava ghaṭita sāma bhakti bheda abhidhāyinā samudāyasya avayava bhāva anupapatteḥ tad saṃbandha vayavaḥ oṃkāraḥ lakṣyate
na punar oṅkāreṇa avayavinaḥ udgīthasya lakṣaṇā
oṃkārasya eva upariṣṭāt tu tad tad guṇa viśiṣṭasya tad tad phala viśiṣṭasya ca upavyākhyāsyamāna tvāt

original: dṛṣṭaśca samudāyaśabdo 'vayave lakṣaṇayā yathā grāmo dagdhaḥ paṭo dagdha iti tadekadeśadāhe /

adhyāse tu lakṣaṇā phala kalpanā ca
tathā hi āpti ādi guṇaka praṇava upāsanāt idam udgītha tā upāsanam praṇavasya anyat
na ca atra api ādi upāsaneṣu iva phalam śrūyate

api ca gauṇyāḥ vṛtteḥ lakṣaṇā vṛttiḥ balīyasī lāghavāt

original: lakṣaṇāyā hi lakṣaṇīyaparatvaṃ padasya tasyaiva vākyārthāntarbhāvāt /
analyzed: lakṣaṇāyāḥ hi lakṣaṇīya para tvam padasya tasya eva vākya artha antarbhāvāt

original: yathā gāṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa iti lakṣyamāṇasya tīrasya vākyārthe 'ntarbhāvo 'dhikaraṇatayā /
analyzed: yathā gāṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ iti lakṣyamāṇasya tīrasya vākya arthe ntarbhāvaḥ dhikaraṇa tayā

original: gaurvāhīka ityatra tu gosaṃbandhitīṣṭhanmūtrapurīṣādilakṣaṇayā na tatparatvaṃ gośabdasya /

apitu tad kakṣa adhyavasita tad guṇa yukta vāhīka paratvam iti gauṇyāḥ vṛtteḥ durbala tvam tat idam uktam lakṣaṇāyām api tu iti
gauṇī api vṛttiḥ lakṣaṇā avayava tvāt lakṣaṇā uktā

āmikṣā padam hi rūpeṇa āmikṣāyām pravartate

original: evaṃ hi vijñānāndayorapi sphuṭataraḥ pravṛttinimittabhedaḥ satyapi brahmaṇyaikārthye /

original: saṃnidhānābhāvānna kauṣītakiprāṇasaṃvādavākye prāṇasya vasiṣṭhatvādibhirguṇairupāsyatvamapi tu jyeṣṭhatreṣṭhatvamātreṇeti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /

original: siddhāntastu-satyaṃ saṃnihitaṃ parāmṛśati evaṅkāro na tu śabdopāttamātraṃ saṃnihitam /
analyzed: siddhāntaḥ tu satyam saṃnihitam parāmṛśati evaṅkāraḥ na tu śabda upātta mātram saṃnihitam

original: kintu yacchabdābhihitārthanāntarīyakatayā prāptaṃ tadapi hi buddhau saṃnihitaṃ saṃnihitameva /

original: yathā 'yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati' ityavyabhicāritakratusamanvayayā juhvopasthāpitaḥ kratuḥ /

original: saṃnidhānātprakṛtaparāmarśinaivaṅkāreṇa parāmarśo yukta iti siddhaṃ kauṣītakibrāhmaṇagatena
analyzed: saṃnidhānāt prakṛta parāmarśinā evaṅkāreṇa parāmarśaḥ yuktaḥ iti siddham kauṣītaki brāhmaṇa gatena
tāvat evaṅkāreṇa śakyate parāmraṣṭum
tathā api abhyupetya api brūmaḥ iti āśayavatā bhāṣyakṛtā uktam

śruta hāniḥ iti

original: kevalasya śrutasya hāniritarasahitasya cākṣutasya kalpanā na cetyarthaḥ /

ati rohitam anyat

original: nahi brahmaṇo dharmiṇaḥ sattve kaścidviśeṣa iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /

original: vidheyastu puruṣaprayatnatantraḥ puruṣaprayatnaśca yatra yāvadguṇaviśiṣṭe brahmaṇi coditaḥ sa tāvatyevāvatiṣṭhate nāvihitamapi guṇaṃ cotarīkartumarhati

original: tasmādānandavijñānādayo brahmatattvātmatayoktā yatra yatra brahma śrūyate tatra tatrānuktā api labhyante /

kim atra sarveṣām eva artha ādīnām paratvam
āho puruṣasya eva tad pratipādana artham ca itareṣām paratva pratipādanam

original: tatra pratyekamarthādiparatvapratipādanaśruteḥ śrūyamāṇatattatparatve ca saṃbhavati na tattadatikarme sarveṣāmekaparatvādhyavasānaṃ nyāṭyam
analyzed: tatra pratyekam artha ādi paratva pratipādana śruteḥ śrūyamāṇa tad tad paratve ca saṃbhavati na sarveṣām eka paratva adhyavasānam nyāṭyam
na ca prayojana abhāvāt asaṃbhavaḥ
sarveṣām eva pratyekam paratva abhidhānasya ādhyāna prayojana tvāt
tad tad ādhyānānām ca prayojanavat tva smṛteḥ
tathā hi smṛtiḥ daśa manvantarāṇi iha tiṣṭhanti indriya cintakāḥ
bhautikāḥ tu śatam pūrṇam sahasram tu ābhimānikāḥ
bauddhāḥ daśa sahasrāṇi tiṣṭhanti vigata jvarāḥ
pūrṇam śata sahasram tu tiṣṭhanti anyakta cintakāḥ

original: puruṣaṃ nirguṇaṃ prāpya kālasaṃkhyā na vidyate /
analyzed: puruṣam nirguṇam prāpya kāla saṃkhyā na vidyate
iti
prāmāṇikasya vākya bhedasya abhyupeya tvāt pratyekam teṣām artha ādīnām paratva parāṇi etāni

original: vākyānīti prāptaya ucyate-indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā ityeṣa tāvatsaṃdarbho vastutattvapratipādanaparaḥ
analyzed: vākyāni iti prāptaye ucyate indriyebhyaḥ parāḥ hi arthāḥ iti eṣa tāvat saṃdarbhaḥ vastu tattva pratipādana paraḥ
pratīyate na a dhyāna vidhi paraḥ
tad aśruteḥ

original: tadatra yatpratyasya sākṣātprayojanavattvaṃ dṛśyate tatpratyayaparatvaṃ sarveṣām /

dṛṣṭam ca viṣṇoḥ parama pada jñānasya nikhila anartha saṃsāra kāraṇa avidyā upaśamaḥ
tattva jñāna udayasya tatra tatra darśanāt
artha ādi para tva pratyayasya tu na dṛṣṭam asti prayojanam
na ca dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā
na ca parama puruṣa artha hetu para tve saṃbhavati avāntara puruṣa artha tā ucitā

api ca para pratiṣedhena iti

ātma śabdāt ca

original: puruṣaśabdavācyasya cātmanaḥ svayaṃ śrutyaiva duradhigamatvāvadhāraṇādvastutaśca duradhigamatvādarthādīnāṃ ca sugamatvāttatparatvamevārthādiparatvābhidhānasyetyarthaḥ
analyzed: puruṣa śabda vācyasya ca ātmanaḥ svayam śrutyā eva duradhigama tva avadhāraṇāt vastutas ca duradhigama tvāt artha ādīnām ca sugama tvāt tad paratvam eva artha ādi paratva abhidhānasya iti arthaḥ
śruteḥ āśaya atiśaḥ iva āśaya atiśayaḥ
tad tātparya tā iti yāvat
kiñca śruti antara apekṣita abhidhānāt api evam eva

original: arthādiparatve tu svarūpeṇa vivakṣite nāpekṣitaṃ śrutirācaṣṭe ityāha-
analyzed: artha ādi paratve tu svarūpeṇa vivakṣite na apekṣitam śrutiḥ ācaṣṭe iti āha
api ca saḥ dhvanaḥ pāram āpnoti iti
ātma gṛhītiḥ itaravat uttarāt
śruti smṛtyoḥ hi loka sṛṣṭiḥ parameśvara dhiṣṭhitā parameśvara hiraṇyagarbha kartṛkā upalabdhā
sā iyam iha mahābhūta sargam an abhidhāya prāthamikī loka sṛṣṭiḥ upalabhyamānā avāntareśvara kāryā
prāk utpatteḥ ātma ekatva avadhāraṇam ca avāntareśvara saṃbandhi tayā gamayati
pārameśvara sargasya mahābhūta ākāśa ādi tvāt asya ca tad vaiparītyāt
asti hi tasya eva ekasya vikāra antara apekṣayā agna tvam asti ca īkṣaṇam
api ca etasmin naitareyake pūrvasmin prakaraṇe prajāpati kartṛkā eva loka sṛṣṭiḥ uktā
tad anusārāt api etat eva vijñāyate

original: apica tābhyo gāmānayadityādayaśca vyavahāraḥ śrutyoktā viśeṣavatsvātmaparamātmaṣu prasiddhāḥ /
analyzed: apica tābhyaḥ gām ānayat ityādayaḥ ca vyavahāraḥ śrutyā uktāḥ viśeṣavat sva ātma paramātmaṣu prasiddhāḥ
tatas u pi avāntareśvaraḥ eva vijñāyate

original: ātmaśabdaprayogaścātrāpi dṛṣṭastasmādaparātmābhilāpo 'yamiti prāpta ucyati-paramātmano gṛhītiriha yathā itareṣu sṛṣṭiśravaṇeṣu 'etasmādātmana  #
analyzed: ātma śabda prayogaḥ ca atra api dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt apara ātma abhilāpaḥ yam iti prāptaḥ ucyati paramātmanaḥ gṛhītiḥ iha yathā itareṣu sṛṣṭi śravaṇeṣu etasmāt ātmanaḥ
ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ ityādiṣu
tasmāt uttarāt sa aikṣata iti īkṣaṇa pūrvaka sraṣṭṛ tva śravaṇāt ātmā iti avadhāraṇāt ca

original: etadabhisaṃhitam-mukhyaṃ tāvat sargātprākkevalatvamātmapadatvaṃ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ ca parameśvarasyātra bhavataḥ /
analyzed: etat abhisaṃhitam mukhyam tāvat sargāt prāk kevala tvam ātma pada tvam sraṣṭṛ tvam ca parameśvarasya atra bhavataḥ

original: ākāśapūrvikāyāṃ vastuto brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭau yathā kkacittejaḥpūrvakasṛṣṭyabhidhānaṃ na virudhyate 'etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' iti darśanāt
analyzed: ākāśa pūrvikāyām vastutas brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭau yathā kkacid tejaḥ pūrvaka sṛṣṭi abhidhānam na virudhyate etasmāt ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ iti darśanāt

original: ākāśaṃ vāyuṃ sṛṣṭveti hi tatra pūrayitavyamevahāpi mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭveti kalpanīyam /
analyzed: ākāśam vāyum sṛṣṭvā iti hi tatra pūrayitavyam evahā api mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭvā iti kalpanīyam

original: sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena jñānasya śrutisidvyarthamaśrutopalabdhau yatnavatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ śrute mahābhūtāditve sargasya śaithilyamādaraṇīyam

original: apica svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇo vedarāśiradhyayanavidhyāpāditaprayojanavadarthamabhidadhāno yathā yathā prayojanādhikyamāpnoti tathā tathānumanyatetarām
analyzed: apica svādhyāya vidhi adhīna grahaṇaḥ vedarāśiḥ adhyayana vidhi āpādita prayojanavat artham abhidadhānaḥ yathā yathā prayojana ādhikyam āpnoti tathā tathā anumanyatetarām
yathā ca asya brahma gocara tve paramapuruṣa artha aupayika tvam na evam anya gocara tve
tat idam uktam
yaḥ pi ayam vyāpāra viśeṣa anugamaḥ iti

original: naca lokasargo 'pi hiraṇyagarbhavyāpāro 'pi tu tadanupraviṣṭasya paramātmana ityatraivoktam /

original: yatra tu puruṣavidhādiśravaṇaṃ tasya bhavettvanyaparatvaṃ gatyantarābhāvāditi sarvamavadātam /

sat upakramasya saṃdarbhasya ātma upakramasya ca kim aikārthyam āhosvit artha bhedaḥ

original: tatra sacchabdasyāviśeṣeṇātmani cānātmani ca pravṛtternātmārthatvaṃ kintu samastavastvanugatasattāsāmānyārthatvaṃ tathā copakramabhedādbhinnārthatvam

original: tadvijñānena ca sarvavijñānaṃ mahāsāmānyasya sattāyāḥ samastavastuvistāravyāpitvādityevaṃ

original: yathā hi śvādimaryādasyānnasyāttumaśakyatvādannadṛṣṭiścodyate evamihāpyapāṃ paridhānāsaṃbhavāddṛṣṭireva codyata ityannadṛṣṭividhisāhacaryādgamyate

original: aśabdatvaṃ ca yadyapi dṛṣṭyabhyavahārayostulyaṃ tathāpi dṛṣṭiḥ śābdadṛśyanāntarīyakatayā sākṣācchabdena kriyamāṇopalabhyate /

original: kiñca chāndogyānāṃ vājasaneyināṃ cācamane prāyeṇācāmantīti vartamānāpadeśaḥ evaṃ yatrāpi vidhivibhaktistatrāpi jartilayavāgvavā vā juhuyāditivadvidhitvamavivakṣitam

manyante iti tvad prāptārtha tvāt samidhaḥ yajati ityādi vat vidhiḥ eva iti āha api ca ācāmanti iti
śeṣam atirohita artham
samānaḥ evam ca abhedāt
iha abhyāsa adhikaraṇa nyāyena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
dvayoḥ vidyā vidhyoḥ eka śākhā gatayoḥ agṛhmamāṇa viśeṣa tayā kasya kaḥ nuvādaḥ iti viniścaya abhāvāt ajñāta jñāpanā pravṛtta pravartanā rūpasya
ca vidhi tvasya svarasa siddheḥ ubhayatra upasana abhedaḥ
na ca guṇa antara vidhānāya ekatra anuvādaḥ ubhayatra api guṇa antara vidhāna upalabdheḥ vinigamana a hetu abhāvāt samāna guṇa anabhidhāna prasaṅgāt ca

original: tasmātsamidho yajatītyādivadabhyāsādupāsanābheda iti prāpta ucyate-aikakarmyamekatvena pratyabhijñānāt /

original: tatra bhūyāṃso guṇā yasya karmaṇo vidhīyante tatra tasya pradhānasya vidhiritaratra tu tadanuvādena katipayaguṇavidhiḥ /

original: yathā yatra chatracāmarapatākāhāstikāścīyaśaktikayāṣṭīkadhānuṣkakārpāṇikaprāsikapadātipracayastatrāsti rājeti gamyate na tu katipayagajavājipadātibhāji  #
