prayoga āviṣṭam hi kartṛ tvam
tat ca prayoga bhede katham ekam
tasmāt samāna kartṛka tvāt eka prayoga tvam vājapeya bṛhaspatisavayoḥ dhātvartha antara saṃbandhāt ca

original: naca guṇapradhānabhāvamantareṇaikaprayogatā saṃbandhaśca tatrāpi vājapeyasya prakaraṇe samāmnānādvājapeyaḥ pradhānam /
analyzed: na ca guṇa pradhāna bhāvam antareṇa eka prayoga tā saṃbandhaḥ ca tatra api vājapeyasya prakaraṇe samāmnānāt vājapeyaḥ pradhānam
aṅgam bṛhaspatisavaḥ
na ca darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeta iti atra aṅga pradhāna bhāva prasaṅgaḥ

original: nahyetadvacanaṃ kasyaciddarśapūrṇamāsamya somasya vā prakaraṇe samāmnātam /
analyzed: na hi etat vacanam kasyacid darśapūrṇamāsamya somasya vā prakaraṇe samāmnātam

original: tathāca dvayoḥ sādhikāratayā agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ prati vinigamanābhāvenādhiṣṭhānamātravivakṣayā lākṣaṇikaṃ samānakartṛkatvamityadoṣaḥ
analyzed: tathā ca dvayoḥ sādhikāra tayā agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tayā guṇa pradhāna bhāvam prati vinigamana abhāvena adhiṣṭhāna mātra vivakṣayā lākṣaṇikam samāna kartṛkatvam iti adoṣaḥ
yadi tu kasyāñcid śākhyāyām ārabhya adhītam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā iti
tathā api an ārabhya adhītasya eva ārabhya adhīte pratyabhijñānam iti yuktam

original: tathā sati dvayorapi pṛthagadhikāratayā pratītaṃ samapradhānatvamatyaktaṃ bhaveditarathā tu guṇapradhānabhāvena tattyāgo bhavet /
analyzed: tathā sati dvayoḥ api pṛthak adhikāra tayā pratītam sama pradhāna tvam atyaktam bhavet itarathā tu guṇa pradhāna bhāvena tad tyāgaḥ bhavet
tasmāt kāla arthaḥ yam saṃyogaḥ iti siddham
siddhāntam upakramate
evam prāptaḥ iti
hṛdayam pravidhya iti ayam mantraḥ svarasataḥ tāvat ābhicārika karma samavetam sakalaiḥ eva
padaiḥ artham abhidadhat upalabhyate tat asya abhidhāna sāmarthya lakṣaṇam liṅgam vākya prakaraṇābhyām
kramāt balīyobhyām api balavat kim aṅga punar kramāt
tasmāt liṅgena saṃnidhim apodya ābhicārika karma śeṣa tvam eva āpādyate
yadi api ca upāsanāsu hṛdaya pada mātrasya samaveta artha tvam
tathā api tad itareṣām sarveṣām eva padānām asamaveta artha tvam

original: ābhicārike tu karmaṇi sarveṣāmarthasamavāya iti kimekapadasamavetārthatā kariṣyati /
analyzed: ābhicārike tu karmaṇi sarveṣām artha samavāyaḥ iti kim eka pada samaveta artha tā kariṣyati
na ca saṃnidhi upagṛhīyāsu upāsanāsu mantram avasthāpayati iti yuktam
hṛdaya padasya abhicāre pi samaveta arthasya itara pada eka vākya tā āpannasya vākya pramāṇa sahitasya ābhicārikāt karmaṇaḥ

original: saṃnidhinācālayitumaśakyatvādevaṃ 'deva savitaḥ prasuva yajñam' ityāderapi yajñaprasavaliṅgasya
analyzed: saṃnidhinā ācālayitum aśakya tvāt evam deva savitar prasuva yajñam ityādeḥ api yajña prasava liṅgasya

original: yajñaṅgatve siddhe jaghanyo vidyāsaṃnidhiḥ kiṃ kariṣyati /
analyzed: yajñaṅga tve siddhe jaghanyaḥ vidyā saṃnidhiḥ kim kariṣyati
evam anyeṣām api śvetāśvaḥ iti evamādīnām keṣāñcid liṅgena keṣāñcid śutyā
keṣāñcid pramāṇa antareṇa prakaraṇena iti
kasmāt punar saṃnidhiḥ liṅga ādibhiḥ vādhyate iti atas āha
durbalaḥ hi saṃnidhiḥ iti
prathama tantra gataḥ ṛthaḥ smāryate

original: tatra tu śrutiliṅgayoḥ samavāye samānaviṣayatvalakṣaṇe virodhe kiṃ balīya iti cintā /
analyzed: tatra tu śruti liṅgayoḥ samavāye samāna viṣaya tva lakṣaṇe virodhe kim balīyaḥ iti cintā

original: atrodāharaṇam-astyaindrī ṛk 'kadācanastarīrasi nendra' ityādikā śrutirviniyokī 'aindrayā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate' iti /
analyzed: atra udāharaṇam asti aindrī ṛc na indraḥ iti ādikā śrutiḥ viniyokī aindrayā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti
atra hi sāmarthya lakṣaṇāt liṅgāt indre viniyogaḥ pratibhāti

original: śruteśca gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāto gārhapatyasya śeṣitvaṃ aindriyeti catṛtīyāśruteraindyā ṛcaḥ śeṣatvamavagamyate /
analyzed: śruteḥ ca gārhapatyam iti dvitīyātaḥ gārhapatyasya śeṣi tvam aindriyā iti ca tṛtīyā śruteḥ aindyāḥ ṛcaḥ śeṣa tvam avagamyate

original: yadyapi gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāśruterāgneyīmṛcaṃ prati gārhapatyasya śeṣitvenopapatteḥ /
analyzed: yadi api gārhapatyam iti dvitīyā śruteḥ āgneyīm ṛcam prati gārhapatyasya śeṣi tvena upapatteḥ

original: yadyapi caindrayeti ca tṛtīyāśruteraindrayā indraṃ prati śeṣatvanopapatteravirodhaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api ca aindrayā iti ca tṛtīyā śruteḥ aindrayā indram prati śeṣa tvanā upapatteḥ avirodhaḥ

original: padāntarasaṃbandhe tu vākyasyaiva liṅgena virodho na tu śruteḥ /
analyzed: pada antara saṃbandhe tu vākyasya eva liṅgena virodhaḥ na tu śruteḥ
tatra ca viparītam balābalam
tathā api śruti vākyayoḥ rūpataḥ vyāpāra bhedāt adoṣaḥ

original: dvitīyātṛtīyāśrutī hi kārakavibhaktitayā kriyāṃ prati prakṛtyarthasya karmakaraṇabhāvamavagamayata iti viniyojike /
analyzed: dvitīyā tṛtīyā śrutī hi kāraka vibhakti tayā kriyām prati prakṛti arthasya karma karaṇa bhāvam avagamayataḥ iti viniyojike

original: kriyāṃ prati hi karmaṇaḥ śeṣitvaṃ karaṇasya ca śeṣatvamiti hi viniyogaḥ /
analyzed: kriyām prati hi karmaṇaḥ śeṣi tvam karaṇasya ca śeṣa tvam iti hi viniyogaḥ

original: padāntarānapekṣe ca kriyāṃ prati śeṣaśeṣitve śrutimātrātpratiyete iti śraute /
analyzed: pada antara anapekṣe ca kriyām prati śeṣa śeṣi tve śruti mātrāt pratiyete iti śraute
saḥ yam sāmānya avagataḥ viniyogaḥ pada antara vaśāt viśeṣe vasthāpyate
saḥ yam viśiṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ vākya gocaraḥ
śeṣa śeṣi bhāvaḥ tu śrautaḥ

original: tasmādvākyalabhyaṃ viśiṣamapekṣya śrautaḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāvo liṅgena virudhyata iti śrutiliṅgavirodhe
analyzed: tasmāt vākya labhyam viśiṣam apekṣya śrautaḥ śeṣa śeṣi bhāvaḥ liṅgena virudhyate iti śruti liṅga virodhe

original: kiṃ liṅgānuguṇena gārhatvamiti dvitīyāśrutiḥ saptamyarthe vyākhyāyatāṃ gārhapatyasamīpe
analyzed: kim liṅga anuguṇena gārhatvam iti dvitīyā śrutiḥ saptamī arthe vyākhyāyatām gārhapatya samīpe
aindrayā indraḥ upastheyaḥ iti
āho śruti anuguṇa tayā liṅgam vyākhyayatām

original: prabhavati hi svocitāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gārhapatya itīndra indarteraiśvaryavacanatvāditi /
analyzed: prabhavati hi sva ucitāyām kriyāyām gārhapatyaḥ iti indraḥ inda ṛteḥ aiśvarya vacana tvāt iti
kim tāvat prāptam śruteḥ liṅgam balīyaḥ iti

original: no khalu yatrāsamarthaṃ tacchutisahasreṇāpi tatra viniyoktuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: no khalu yatra asamartham tat śuti sahasreṇa api tatra viniyoktum śakyate
yathā agninā siñcet pāthasā dahet iti
tasmāt sāmarthyam purodhāya śrutyā viniyoktavyam

original: taccāsyā ṛcaḥ pramāṇāntarataḥ śabdataśca indre pratīyate /
analyzed: tat ca asyāḥ ṛcaḥ pramāṇa antarataḥ śabdataḥ ca indre pratīyate
tathā hi vidita pada tad arthaḥ kadācana iti ṛcaḥ spaṣṭam indram avagacchati
śabdāt ca aindrayā iti atas

original: tasmāddārudahanasyeva dahanasya saliladahane viniyogo gārhapatye viniyoga aindrayāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt dāru dahanasya iva dahanasya salila dahane viniyogaḥ gārhapatye viniyogaḥ aindrayāḥ
na ca śruti anurodhāt jaghanyām āsthāyāḥ vṛttim sāmarthya kalpanā iti sāmpratam
samarthyasya pūrva bhāvi tayā tad anurodhena eva śruti vyavasthāpanāt

original: tasmādaindrayendra eva gārhapatyasamīpa upasthātavya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-'liṅgajñānaṃ purodhāya na śrutervinayoktṛtā /
analyzed: tasmāt aindrayā indraḥ eva gārhapatya samīpe upasthātavyaḥ iti prāpte bhidhīyate liṅga jñānam purodhāya na śruteḥ vinaya uktṛ tā
śruti jñānam purodhāya liṅgam tu viniyojakam

original: yadi hi sāmarthyamavagamya śruterviniyogamavadhārayetpramātā tataḥ śruterviniyogaṃ prati liṅgajñānāpekṣatvāddurbalatvaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: yadi hi sāmarthyam avagamya śruteḥ viniyogam avadhārayet pramātā tatas śruteḥ viniyogam prati liṅga jñāna apekṣa tvāt durbala tvam bhavet
na tu etat asti
śrutiḥ viniyogāya samarthyam apekṣate na apekṣate sāmarthya vijñānam

original: avagate tu tato viniyoge nāsamarthasya sa iti tannirvāhāya sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate /
analyzed: avagate tu tatas viniyoge na asamarthasya saḥ iti tad nirvāhāya sāmarthyam kalpyate
tad śuti viniyogāt pūrvam asti sāmarthyam
na tu pūrvam agamyate

original: viniyoge tu siddhe tadanyathānupapattyā paścātpratīyata iti śrutiviniyogātparācīnā sāmarthyapratītistadanurodhenāvasthāpanīyā /
analyzed: viniyoge tu siddhe tad anyathā anupapattyā paścāt pratīyate iti śruti viniyogāt parācīnā sāmarthya pratītiḥ tad anurodhena avasthāpanīyā

original: liṅgaṃ tu na svato viniyojakamapi tu viniyokīṃ kalpyitvā śrutim /
analyzed: liṅgam tu na svatas viniyojakam api tu śrutim

original: tathāhi-na svarasato liṅgādanenendra upasthātavya iti pratīyate,
analyzed: tathā hi na svarasataḥ liṅgāt anena indraḥ upasthātavyaḥ iti pratīyate

original: kintvīdṛgindra iti tasya tu prakaraṇāmnānasāmartyāt sāmānyataḥ prakaraṇāpatitaidamarthyasya
analyzed: kintu īdṛś indraḥ iti tasya tu prakaraṇa āmnāna sāmartyāt sāmānyatas prakaraṇa āpatita aidamarthyasya
tad anyathā anupapattyā viniyoga kalpanāyām api śrautāt viniyogāt kalpanīyasya viniyogasya artha viprakarṣāt śutiḥ eva
kalpayitum ucitāḥ na tu tad arthaḥ viniyogaḥ
nahi śrutam anupapannam śākyam arthena upapādayitum

original: nahi trayo 'tra brahmaṇāḥ kaṭhakauṇḍinyāviti vākyaṃ pramāṇāntaropasthāpitena māṭhareṇopapādayanti,
analyzed: nahi kaṭha kauṇḍinyau iti vākyam pramāṇa antara upasthāpitena māṭhareṇa upapādayanti
upapādayataḥ vā na upahasanti
śabdāḥ
māṭharaḥ ca iti tu śrāvayantam anumanyante
tasmāt śuta artha samutthāna anupapattiḥ śrutena eva artha antareṇa upapādanīyā
na artha antara mātreṇa pramāṇa antara upanītena iti loka siddham
na ca loka siddhasya niyoga anuyogau yujyete śabda artha jñāna upāya bhūta loka virodhāt
tasmāt viniyojikā śrutiḥ kalpanīyā
tathā ca yāvat liṅgāt viniyojikām śrutim kalpayitum prakānta vyāpāraḥ tāvat pratyakṣayā

original: śrutyā gārhapatye viniyogaḥ siddha iti nivṛttākāṅkṣaṃ prakaramamiti kasyānupapattyā
analyzed: śrutyā gārhapatye viniyogaḥ siddhaḥ iti nivṛtta ākāṅkṣam prakaramam iti kasya anupapattyā
liṅgam viniyokīm śrutim upakalpyet
mantra samāmnānasya pratyakṣayā eva viniyoga śrutyā upapādita tvāt
yathā āhuḥ yāvat ajñāta saṃdigdham jñeyam

original: pramite tu pramātṛṇāṃ pramautsukyaṃ vihanyate' iti /
analyzed: pramite tu pramātṛṇām pramā autsukyam vihanyate iti

original: tasmātpratītaśrautaviniyogopapattyai mantrasya sāmarthye tadanuguṇatvena nīyamānaṃ prathamāṃ vṛttimajahajjaghanyayāpi neyamiti siddham /
analyzed: tasmāt pratīta śrauta viniyoga upapattyai mantrasya sāmarthye tad anuguṇa tvena nīyamānam prathamām vṛttim ajahat jaghanyayā api neyam iti siddham

original: liṅgavākyayoriha virodho yathā-'syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suśeṣaṃ kalpyāmi /
analyzed: liṅga vākyayoḥ iha virodhaḥ yathā asya ūnam te sadanam kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā su śeṣam kalpyāmi

original: tasminsīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamānaḥ' iti /
analyzed: tasmin sīda amṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇām medha sumanasyamānaḥ iti

original: kimayaṃ kṛtsna eva mantraḥ sadanakaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca prayoktavya uta kalpyāmyanta upastaraṇe tasmintsīdetyevamādistu puroḍāśāsādana iti
analyzed: kim ayam kṛtsnaḥ eva mantraḥ sadana karaṇe puroḍāśa āsādane ca prayoktavyaḥ uta kalpyāmi ante upastaraṇe tasmin sīda iti evamādiḥ tu puroḍāśa āsādane iti

original: yadi vākyaṃ balīyaḥ kṛtsnau mantra ubhayatra,
analyzed: yadi vākyam balīyaḥ kṛtsnau mantraḥ ubhayatra

original: suśevaṃ kalpyāmītyetadapekṣo hi tasminsīdetyādiḥ pūrveṇaikavākyatāmupaiti yatkalpayāmi tasmintsīdeti /
analyzed: su śevam hi tasmin sīda ityādiḥ pūrveṇa ekavākyatām upaiti yat kalpayāmi tasmin sīda iti

original: atha liṅgaṃ balīyastataḥ kalpyāmyantaḥ sadanakaraṇe tatprakāśane hi tatsamartham /
analyzed: atha liṅgam balīyaḥ tatas kalpyāmi antar sadana karaṇe tad prakāśane hi tat samartham
tasmin sīda iti puroḍāśa āsādane tatra hi tat samartham iti
kim tāvat prāptam

original: liṅgādvākyaṃ balīya ityubhayatra kṛtsnasya viniyoga iti /
analyzed: liṅgāt vākyam balīyaḥ iti ubhayatra kṛtsnasya viniyogaḥ iti

original: iha hi yattatpadasamabhivyāhāreṇa vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvādekavākyatāyāṃ siddhāyāṃ tadanurodhena paścāttadabhidhānasāmārthyaṃ kalpanīyam /
analyzed: iha hi yat tad pada samabhivyāhāreṇa vibhajyamāna sākāṅkṣa tvāt ekavākya tāyām siddhāyām tad anurodhena paścāt tad abhidhāna sāmārthyam kalpanīyam

original: yathā devasyatvetimantre 'gnye nirvapāmīti padayoḥ samavetārthatvena tadekavākyatayā padāntarāṇāṃ tatparatvena tatra sāmarthyakalpanā /
analyzed: yathā devasya tvā iti mantre gnye nirvapāmi iti padayoḥ samaveta artha tvena tad ekavākya tayā pada antarāṇām tad paratvena tatra sāmarthya kalpanā

original: tadevaṃ pratītaikavākyatānirvāhāya tadanuguṇatayā sāmarthyaṃ kḷptaṃ sanna tadvyāpādayitumarhati,
analyzed: tat evam pratīta ekavākya tā nirvāhāya tad anuguṇa tayā sāmarthyam kḷptam sat na tat vyāpādayitum arhati

original: api tu viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ mantraḥ prayoktavya iti prāptam /
analyzed: api tu viniyojikām śrutim mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ iti prāptam
evam prāpte ucyate bhavet etat evam yadi eka vākyatā avagama pūrvam sāmarthya avadhāraṇam api

original: tu avadhṛtasāmarthyānāṃ padānāṃ praśliṣṭapāṭhitānāṃ sāmarthyavaśena prayojanaikatvenekavākyatvāvadhāraṇam /
analyzed: tu avadhṛta sāmarthyānām padānām praśliṣṭa pāṭhitānām sāmarthya vaśena prayojana ekatvena ika vākya tva avadhāraṇam

original: yavanti padāni pradhānamekamarthamavagamayituṃ samarthāni vibhāge sākāṅkṣāṇi tānyekaṃ vākyam /
analyzed: yavanti padāni pradhānam ekam artham avagamayitum samarthāni vibhāge sākāṅkṣāṇi tāni ekam vākyam
anuṣṭheyaḥ ca arthaḥ mantreṣu prakāśyamānaḥ pradhānam
sadana karaṇa puroḍāśa āsādane ca anuṣṭheya tayā pradhāne

original: tayośca sadanakaraṇaṃ kalpayāmyanto mantraḥ samarthaḥ prakāśayituṃ puroḍāśāsādanaṃ ca tasminsīdetyādiḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ ca sadana karaṇam kalpayāmi antaḥ mantraḥ samarthaḥ prakāśayitum puroḍāśa āsādanam ca tasmin sīda ityādiḥ

original: tataśca yāvadekavākyatāvaśena sāmarthyamanumīyate tāvatpratītaṃ sāmarthyamekaikasya bhāgasyaikaikasminnarthe viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ kalpayati /
analyzed: tatas ca yāvat eka vākya tā vaśena sāmarthyam anumīyate tāvat pratītam sāmarthyam ekaikasya bhāgasya ekaikasmin arthe viniyojikām śrutim kalpayati

original: tathāca śrutyaivaikaikasya bhāgasyaikatra viniyoge sati prakaraṇapāṭhopapattau na
analyzed: tathā ca śrutyā eva ekaikasya bhāgasya ekatra viniyoge sati prakaraṇa pāṭha upapattau na

original: vākyakalpitaṃ liṅgaṃ viniyojikāṃ śrutimaparāṃ kalpayitumarhatītyekavākyatābuddhirutpannāpyābhāsībhavati liṅgena bādhanāt /
analyzed: vākya kalpitam liṅgam viniyojikām śrutim aparām kalpayitum arhati iti ekavākya tā buddhiḥ utpannā api ābhāsībhavati liṅgena bādhanāt

original: yatra tu virodhakaṃ liṅgaṃ nāsti tatra samavetārthaikadvitripadaikavākyatā padāntarāṇāmapi sāmarthyaṃ kalpayatīti bhavati vākyasya viniyojakatvam
analyzed: yatra tu virodhakam liṅgam nā asti tatra samaveta artha eka dvi tri pada eka vākyatā pada antarāṇām api sāmarthyam kalpayati iti bhavati vākyasya viniyojaka tvam
yathā atra eva syonam te ityādīnām
tasmāt vākyāt liṅgam balīyaḥ siddham
vākya prakaraṇayoḥ virodha udāharaṇam

original: atra ca padānāṃ parasparāpekṣāvaśātkasmiṃścidviśiṣṭa ekasminnarthe paryavasitānāṃ vākyatvaṃ,
analyzed: atra ca padānām paraspara apekṣā vaśāt kasmiṃścid viśiṣṭe ekasmin arthe paryavasitānām vākya tvam

original: labdhavākyabhāvanāṃ ca punaḥ kāryāntarāpekṣāvaśena vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇam /
analyzed: labdha vākya bhāvanām ca punar kārya antara apekṣā vaśena vākya antareṇa saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇam

original: kartavyāyāḥ khalu phalabhāvanāyā labdhadhātvarthakaraṇāyā itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyā vacanaṃ prakaraṇamācakṣate vṛddhāḥ /
analyzed: kartavyāyāḥ khalu phala bhāvanāyāḥ labdha dhātvartha karaṇāyāḥ itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣāyāḥ vacanam prakaraṇam ācakṣate vṛddhāḥ
yathā darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti
etat hi vacanam prakaraṇam

original: tadetasmin svapadagaṇena kiyatyapyarthe paryavasite karaṇopakāralakṣaṇakāryāntarāpekṣāyāṃ 'samidho yajati' ityādivākyāntarasaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: tat etasmin sva pada gaṇena kiyati api arthe paryavasite karaṇa upakāra lakṣaṇa kārya antara apekṣāyām samidhaḥ yajati ityādi vākya antara saṃbandhaḥ

original: samidādibhāvanā hi svavidhyupahitāḥ puruṣe hitaṃ bhāvyapekṣamāṇā viśvajitryāyena vānuṣaṅgato vārthavādato vā phalāntarāpratilambhena darśapūrṇamāsabhāvanāṃ  #
analyzed: samidh ādi bhāvanāḥ hi sva vidhi upahitāḥ puruṣe hitam bhāvi apekṣamāṇāḥ viśvaji tryāyena vā anuṣaṅgataḥ vā arthavādataḥ vā phala antara apratilambhena darśa pūrṇamāsa bhāvanām
nirvārayitum īśate

original: tasmāttadakāṅkṣāyāmupanipatitānyetāni vākyāni svakāryāpekṣāṇi tadapekṣitakaraṇopakāralakṣaṇaṃ kāryamasādya nirvaṇvanti ca nirvārayanti ca pradhānam
analyzed: tasmāt tad akāṅkṣāyām upanipatitāni etāni vākyāni sva kārya apekṣāṇi tad apekṣita karaṇa upakāra lakṣaṇam kāryam asādya nirvaṇvanti ca nirvārayanti ca pradhānam
saḥ yam anayoḥ naṣṭa aśva dagdha ratha vat saṃyogaḥ
tat evam lakṣaṇayoḥ vākya prakaraṇayoḥ virodha udāharaṇam sūktavāka nigadaḥ
tatra hi paurṇamāsī devatāḥ amāvasyā devatāḥ samāmnātāḥ

original: taśca na mitha ekavākyatāṃ gantumarhantīti liṅgena paurṇamāsīyāgādindrāgnīśabda utkraṣṭavyaḥ amāvāsyāyāṃ ca samavetārtatvātprayoktavyaḥ /
analyzed: taḥ ca na mithas ekavākya tām gantum arhanti iti liṅgena paurṇamāsī yāgāt indra agnī śabdaḥ utkraṣṭavyaḥ amāvāsyāyām ca samaveta ārta tvāt prayoktavyaḥ

original: athedānīṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ yadindrāgnipadaikavākyatayā pratīyate 'avivṛdhethāṃ maho jyāyo 'kātām' iti tannotākraṣṭavyamutendrāgniśabdābhyāṃ sahotkraṣṭavyamiti
analyzed: atha idānīm saṃdihyate kim yat indra agni pada eka vākya tayā pratīyate avivṛdhethām mahaḥ jyāyo kātām iti tat na uta ākraṣṭavyam uta indra agni śabdābhyām saha utkraṣṭavyam iti

original: tatra yadi prakaraṇaṃ balīyastato 'panītadevatāko 'pi śeṣaḥ prayoktavyo 'tha vākyaṃ tato tatra devatāśabdastatraiva prayoktavyaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yadi prakaraṇam balīyaḥ tatas upanīta devatākaḥ śeṣaḥ prayoktavyaḥ vākyam tatas tatra devatā śabdaḥ tatra eva prayoktavyaḥ
kim tāvat prāptam apanīta devatākaḥ śeṣaḥ prayoktavyaḥ prakaraṇasya eva aṅga saṃbandha pratipādaka tvāt
phalavatī hi bāvanā pradhāna itikartavya tā tvam āpādayati
tad upajīvanena śruti ādīnām viśeṣa saṃbandha āpādaka tvāt
atas pradhāna bhāvanā vacana lakṣaṇa prakaraṇa virodhe tad upajīvi vākyam bādhyate iti prāptam

original: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi viniyojyasvarūpasāmarthyamanapekṣya prakaramaṃ viniyojayet /
analyzed: evam prāptaḥ ucyate bhavet etat evam yadi viniyojya sva rūpa sāmarthyam an apekṣya prakaramam viniyojayet

original: api tu viniyogāya tadapekṣaye 'nyathā pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrasya dvadaśopasattāyāśca notkarṣaḥ syāt /
analyzed: api tu viniyogāya tad apekṣaye nyathā pūṣa ādi anumantraṇa mantrasya dvadaśa upasattāyāḥ ca na utkarṣaḥ syāt

original: tadrūpālocanāyāṃ ca tadyadeva śīghraṃ pratīyate tattadvalavadviprakṛṣṭaṃ tu durbalam /
analyzed: tad rūpa ālocanāyām ca tat yat eva śīghram pratīyate tat tat valavat viprakṛṣṭam tu durbalam

original: tatra yadi tadrūpaṃ śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vānyatra viniyuktaṃ tataḥ prakaramaṃ bhaṅktvotkṛṣyate,
analyzed: tatra yadi tad rūpam śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vā anyatra viniyuktam tatas prakaramam bhaṅktvā utkṛṣyate
piriśiṣṭaiḥ tu prakaraṇasya itikartavya tā apekṣā puryate

original: atha svasya śīghrapravṛttaṃ śrutyādi nāsti tataḥ prakaramaṃ viniyojakam /
analyzed: atha svasya śīghra pravṛttam śruti ādi na asti tatas prakaramam viniyojakam
yathā samidh ādeḥ
tat iha prakaraṇāt vākyasya
prakaraṇe hi svārtha pūrṇānām vākyanām upakārya upakāraka ākāṅkṣā mātram dṛśyate
vākye tu padānām pratyakṣa saṃbandhaḥ
tatas ca saha prasthitayoḥ vākya prakaraṇayoḥ yāvat prakaraṇena eka vākya tā kalpyate tāvat vākyena abhidhāna sāmarthyam

original: yāvaditaratra vākyena sāmarthyaṃ tāvaditaratra sāmarthyena śrutistāvadiha śrutyā
analyzed: yāvat itaratra vākyena sāmarthyam tāvat itaratra sāmarthyena śrutiḥ tāvat iha śrutyā

original: viniyogastāvatā ca vicchinnāyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrutyanumāne vihate prakaraṇenāntarā kalpitaṃ
analyzed: viniyogaḥ tāvatā ca vicchinnāyām ākāṅkṣāyām śruti anumāne vihate prakaraṇena antarā kalpitam
vilīyante iti vākya balīyaḥ tvāt tad devatā śeṣaṇām apakarṣaḥ eva iti siddham
krama prakaraṇa virodha udāharaṇam
rājasūya prakaraṇe pradhānasya eva abhiṣecanīyasya saṃnidhau śaunaḥśepa upākhyāna ādi āmnātam
tat kim samastasya rājasūyasya aṅgam utibhiṣecanīyasya
yadi prakaramam balīyaḥ tatas samastasya rājasūyasya
atha kramaḥ tatas bhiṣecanīyasya eva iti
kim tāvat prāptam
nākāhkṣā mātram hi saṃbandha hatuḥ

original: gāmānaya prasādaṃ paśyeti gāmityasya kriyāmātrāpekṣiṇaḥ paśyetyanenāpi saṃbandhasaṃbhavādvinigamanābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: gām ānaya prasādam paśya iti gām iti asya kriyā mātra apekṣiṇaḥ paśya iti anena api saṃbandha saṃbhavāt vinigamana abhāva prasaṅgāt
tasmāt saṃnidhānam saṃbandha kāraṇam
tathā ca anayā iti ananā eva gām iti asya saṃbandhaḥ vinigamyate
na ca saṃnidhānam api saṃbandha kāraṇam

original: ayameti putro rājñaḥ puruṣo 'pasāryatāmityatra rājña ityasya putrapuruṣapadasaṃnidhānāviśeṣānmā bhūdavinigamanā /
analyzed: ayam eti putraḥ rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ upasāryatām iti atra rājñaḥ iti asya putra puruṣa pada saṃnidhāna aviśeṣāt mā bhūt avinigamanā
tasmāt ākāṅkṣā niścaya hetuḥ vaktavyā

original: atra putraśabdasya saṃbandhivacanatayā samutthitākāṅkṣasyāntike yadupanipatitaṃ saṃbandhyantarākāṅkṣaṃ
analyzed: atra putra śabdasya saṃbandhi vacana tayā samutthita ākāṅkṣasya antike yat upanipatitam saṃbandhi antara ākāṅkṣam

original: padaṃ tasya tenaivākāṅkṣāparipūrteḥ puruṣapadena puruṣarūpamātrābhidhāyinā svatantreṇaiva
analyzed: padam tasya tena eva ākāṅkṣā paripūrteḥ puruṣa padena puruṣa rūpa mātra abhidhāyinā svatantreṇa eva
na saṃbandhaḥ kintu pareṇa apasāryatām iti anena apasaraṇīya apekṣeṇa iti
sati api saṃnidhāne ākāṅkṣā bhāvāt asaṃbandhaḥ
tathā ca ābhāṇakaḥ taptam taptena saṃbadhyate iti

original: tathā cākāṅkṣitamapi na yāvatsaṃnidhāpyate tāvanna saṃbadhyate /
analyzed: tathā ca ākāṅkṣitam api na yāvat saṃnidhāpyate tāvat na saṃbadhyate

original: tathā saṃnihitamapi yāvannākāṅkṣyate na tāvatsaṃbadhyata iti dvayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ prati
analyzed: tathā saṃnihitam api yāvat na ākāṅkṣyate na tāvat saṃbadhyate iti dvayoḥ saṃbandham prati
samāna bala tvāt krama prakaraṇayoḥ samuccaya asaṃbhavāt ca vikalpena rājasūya abhiṣecanīyayoḥ viniyogaḥ
śaunaḥśepa upākhyāna ādīnām iti prāptam

original: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-rājasūyake kathaṃbhāvāpekṣā hi pavitrādārabhya kṣatrasya dhṛtiṃ yāvadanuvartate /
analyzed: evam prāptaḥ ucyate rājasūyake kathaṃbhāva apekṣā hi pavitrāt ārabhya kṣatrasya dhṛtim yāvat anuvartate
tathā ca avicchinne kathaṃbhāve yat pradhānasya paṭhyate

original: anirjñātaphalaṃ karma tasya prakaraṇāṅgatā ' iti nyāyādrājasūyāṅgatā śaunaḥśopopākhyānādīnām /
analyzed: a nirjñāta phalam karma tasya prakaraṇa aṅga tā iti nyāyāt rājasūya aṅga tā śaunaḥśopa upākhyāna ādīnām

original: abhiṣecanīyasya tu svavākyopāttapadārthanirākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhipāṭhenākāṅkṣotthāpanīyā yāvattāvatsiddhākāṅkṣeṇa rājasūyenaikavākyatā kalpyate
analyzed: abhiṣecanīyasya tu sva vākya upātta padārtha nirākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhi pāṭhena ākāṅkṣā utthāpanīyā yāvat tāvat siddha ākāṅkṣeṇa rājasūyena ekavākya tā kalpyate

original: yāvaccābhiṣecanīyaikavākyatayā liṅgaṃ kalpyate tāvatkḷptaliṅgaṃ viniyokrīṃ śrutiṃ
analyzed: yāvat ca abhiṣecanīya eka vākya tayā liṅgam kalpyate tāvat kḷpta liṅgam viniyokrīm śrutim

original: kalpyati yāvadvākyakalpitena liṅgena śrutiritaratra kalpte tāvatkḷptayā śrutyā viniyoge
analyzed: kalpyati yāvat vākya kalpitena liṅgena śrutiḥ itaratra kalpte tāvat kḷptayā śrutyā viniyoge
sati prakaraṇa pāṭha upapattau saṃnidhāna parikalpitam antarā vilīyate
pramāṇa abhāve pratibhā tvāt
prakaraṇinaḥ ca rājasūyasya buddhi sāṃniśyena tad saṃnidheḥ a kalpanīya tvāt

original: tasmātprakaraṇavirodhe kramasya bādha eva naca vikalpo durbalatvāditi siddham //
analyzed: tasmāt prakaraṇa virodhe kramasya bādhaḥ eva na ca vikalpaḥ durbala tvāt iti siddham

original: kramasamākhyayorvirodhodāharaṇam-pauroḍāśika iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sānnāṭyakrame ca śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya karmaṇa iti śundhanārtho mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ,
analyzed: krama samākhyayoḥ virodha udāharaṇam pauroḍāśikaḥ iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sānnāṭya krame ca śundhadhvam daivyāya karmaṇe iti śundhana arthaḥ mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ

original: tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ samākhyānasya balīyastvātpuroḍāśapātrāṇāṃ śundhena viniyoktavyaḥ,
analyzed: tatra saṃdihyate kim samākhyānasya balīyaḥ tvāt puroḍāśa pātrāṇām śundhena viniyoktavyaḥ
āho sān nāṭya pātrāṇām śundhena kramaḥ balīyān iti
kim tāvat prāptam

original: samākhyānāṃ balīya iti pauroḍāśikaśabdena hi puroḍāśasaṃbandhīnītyucyante tānyadhikṛtya pravṛttaṃ kāṇḍaṃ pauroḍāśikam /
analyzed: samākhyānām balīyaḥ iti pauroḍāśika śabdena hi puroḍāśa saṃbandhīni iti ucyante tāni adhikṛtya pravṛttam kāṇḍam pauroḍāśikam

original: tataśca yāvatkrameṇa prakaraṇādyanumānaparamparayā saṃbandhaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ yāvatsamākhyayā
analyzed: tatas ca yāvat krameṇa prakaraṇa ādi anumāna paramparayā saṃbandhaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ yāvat samākhyayā

original: śrutyaiva sākṣādeva sa pratipādita iti arthaviprakarṣeṇa kramātsamākhyaiva balīyasīti
analyzed: śrutyā eva sākṣāt eva sa pratipāditaḥ iti artha viprakarṣeṇa kramāt samākhyā eva balīyasī iti

original: puroḍāśapātraśundhena mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ na sānnāṭyapātraśundhana iti prāptam /
analyzed: puroḍāśa pātra śundhena mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ na sānnāṭya pātra śundhane iti prāptam
evam prāpte bhidhīyate samākhyānāt kramaḥ balavān artha viprakarṣāt iti

original: tathāhi-samākhyā na tāvatsaṃbandhasya vācikā kintu pauroḍāśaviśiṣṭaṃ kāṇḍamāha /
analyzed: tathā hi samākhyā na tāvat saṃbandhasya vācikā kintu pauroḍāśa viśiṣṭam kāṇḍam āha

original: tadviśiṣṭatvānyathānupapattyā tava saṃbandhaḥ kāṇḍasyānumīyate na tu sākṣānmantrabedasya /
analyzed: tad viśiṣṭa tva anyathā anupapattyā tava saṃbandhaḥ kāṇḍasya anumīyate na tu sākṣāt mantrabedasya
tad dhāreṇa ca tad madhya pātinaḥ mantra bedasya api tad anumānam

original: na cāsau saṃbandho 'pi śrutyaiva śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: na ca asau śrutyā eva śeṣa śeṣi bhāvaḥ pratīyate
api tu saṃbandha mātram
tasmāt śati sādṛśyam asya dūra apetam iti krameṇa na asya spardhā ucitā
tatra api ca sāmānyatas darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇa āpādita aidamarthyasya śaunaḥśepa upākhyāna ādi vat cārāt upakāraka tayā prakṛta mātra saṃbandha anupapattiḥ
mantrasya prayoga samaveta artha smāraṇena sāmavāyikā aṅga tvāt
tathā ca yam kañcid prakṛta prayoga gatam artham prakāśayataḥ sya prakaraṇa aṅga tvam aviruddham iti

original: viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ sānnāṭyakramaḥ sānnāṭyaṃ prati prakaraṇādyanumānadvāreṇa viniyogaṃ
analyzed: viśeṣa apekṣāyām sān nāṭya kramaḥ sān nāṭyam prati prakaraṇa ādi anumāna dvāreṇa viniyogam
kalpayitum utsahate na tu samākhyānam
tasya durbala tvāt

original: tathāhi-samākhyā saṃbandhanibandhanā sati tatsidhyarthaṃ saṃnidhimupakalpayati yāvattādvaidikena pratyakṣadṛṣṭena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate
analyzed: tathā hi samākhyā saṃbandha nibandhanā sati tad sidhi artham saṃnidhim upakalpayati yāvat tādvaidikena pratyakṣa dṛṣṭena saṃnidhānena ākāṅkṣā kalpyate

original: yāvacca kḷptena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate tāvaditaratra kḷptayākāṅkṣayaikavākyatā tāvaditaratraikavākyatayā kḷptayopakārasāmarthyam /
analyzed: yāvat ca kḷptena saṃnidhānena ākāṅkṣā kalpyate tāvat itaratra kḷptayā ākāṅkṣayā ekavākya tā tāvat itaratra ekavākya tayā kḷptayā upakāra sāmarthyam
yāvat ca atra eka vākya tayā upakāra sāmarthyam tāvat itaratra liṅgena viniyojikā śrutiḥ

original: yāvadatra liṅgena viniyojikā śrutistāvaditaratra kḷptayā śrutyā viniyoga iti tāvataiva
analyzed: yāvat atra liṅgena viniyojikā śrutiḥ tāvat itaratra kḷptayā śrutyā viniyogaḥ iti tāvatā eva

original: prakaraṇapāṭhopapatteḥ sarvaṃ samākhyānakalpitaṃ vicchinnamūlatvāttūyamānaśasyamiva nirbījaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: prakaraṇa pāṭha upapatteḥ sarvam samākhyāna kalpitam vicchinna mūla tvāt tūyamāna śasyam iva nirbījam bhavati
puroḍāśa abhidhāyakra mantra ā bāhulyāt kāṇḍasya pauroḍāśika samākhyā iti mantavyam
eka dvi tri catuṣpañca vastu anta raya kāritam
śruti artham prati vaiṣamyam liṅga ādīnām pratīyate
iti artha viprakarṣaḥ uktaḥ

original: tatrāpi ca 'bādhikaiva śrutirnityaṃ samākhyā bādhyate sadā /
analyzed: tatra api ca bādhikā eva śrutiḥ nityam samākhyā bādhyate sadā
madhyamānām tu bādhya tvam bādhaka tvam apekṣayā
iti viśeṣaḥ uktaḥ vṛddhaiḥ

original: tadvayaṃ vistarādbibhyato 'pi prathamatantrānabhijñānukampayā nidhrā vistare patitāḥ sma ityuparamyate /
analyzed: tat vayam vistarāt bibhyataḥ pi prathama tantra anabhijñā anukampayā nidhrāḥ vistare patitāḥ smaḥ iti uparamyate

original: tasmādyathānujñāpanānujñayoḥ prajñātakramayorupahūta upahūyasvetyevaṃ mantravāmnātau deśasāmānyāttathaivāṅgatayā prāpnutaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā anujñāpana anujñayoḥ prajñāta kramayoḥ upahūtaḥ upahūyasva iti evam mantra vā āmnātau deśa sāmānyāt tathā eva aṅga tayā prāpnutaḥ

original: upahūta iti liṅgato 'nujñāmantro nānujñāpane upahūyasveti ca liṅgato 'nujñāpano ca mantro nānujñāyām /
analyzed: upahūtaḥ iti liṅgataḥ nujñā mantraḥ na anujñāpane upahūyasva iti ca liṅgataḥ ca mantraḥ na anujñāyām

original: tadiha liṅgena kramaṃ bādhitvā viparītaṃ śeṣatvamāpādyate /
analyzed: tat iha liṅgena kramam bādhitvā viparītam śeṣa tvam āpādyate

original: yāvaddhi sthānena prakaraṇamutpādyaikavākyatvaṃ kalpyate tāvalliṅgena śrutiṃ kalpayitvā sādhito viniyoga iti akalpitaliṅgaśruteḥ kramasya bādhaḥ
analyzed: yāvat hi sthānena prakaraṇam utpādya eka vākya tvam kalpyate tāvat liṅgena śrutim kalpayitvā sādhitaḥ viniyogaḥ iti a kalpita liṅga śruteḥ kramasya bādhaḥ

original: tadvidihāpi viniyoge pratyekāntaritena liṅgena caturantaritasya vidyākramasya bādha iti /
analyzed: tad vid iha api viniyoge pratyeka antaritena liṅgena catur antaritasya vidyā kramasya bādhaḥ iti

original: yadyapi prathamatantra evāyamartha upapāditastathāpi virodhe tadupapādanamiha tvavirodhaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api prathama tantre eva ayam arthaḥ upapāditaḥ tathā api virodhe tad upapādanam iha tu avirodhaḥ
nahi liṅgena ābhicārika karma saṃbandhaḥ vidyā saṃbandhena krama kṛtena virudhyate
na ca viniyukta viniyoga lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ bṛhaspatisave pi tad prasaṅgāt

original: athaiva pratītivirodho naca vastuvirodhaḥ sa vidyāyāṃ viniyoge 'pi tulyaḥ /
analyzed: athā eva pratīti virodhaḥ na ca vastu virodhaḥ sa vidyāyām viniyoge tulyaḥ
tasmāt avirodhāt vedhā mantrasya upāsana aṅga tvam iti asti abhyadhikā śahkā
tatra ucyate na hi liṅga virodhena krama bādhaḥ abhidhīyate
kintu liṅga paricchinne na kramaḥ kalpanā kṣamaḥ
prakaraṇa pāṭha upapattyā hi śruti liṅga tva ākya prakaraṇaiḥ a viniyuktaḥ krameṇa prakaraṇa vākya liṅga śruti kalpanā prāmālikayā viniyujyate
tadā viniyuktasya prakaraṇa pāṭha ānarthakya prasaṅgāt

original: upapādite tu śrutyādibiḥ prakaraṇapāṭhe kṣīṇatvādarthāpatteḥ kramo na svocitāṃ pramāmutpādayitumarhati pramityābhāvāditi /
analyzed: upapādite tu śruti ādibiḥ prakaraṇa pāṭhe kṣīṇa tvāt arthāpatteḥ kramaḥ na svocitām pramām utpādayitum arhati pramityā abhāvāt iti
bṛhaspatisavasya tu ktvā śrutiḥ eva dhātu saṃbandha adhikārakāt samāna kartṛka tāyām vihitā

original: saṃyogapṛthaktvena viniyuktamapi viniyojayantī na śakyā śrutyantareṇa niroddhuṃ svapramāmiti vaiṣamyam /
analyzed: saṃyoga pṛthaktvena viniyuktam api viniyojayantī na śakyā śruti antareṇa niroddhum sva pramām iti vaiṣamyam
tat idam uktam
vājapeye tu bṛhaspatisavasya spaṣṭam viniyoga antaram iti
api ca ekaḥ yam pravargyaḥ iti

original: tulyabalatayā bṛhaspatisamasya tulyatāśaṅkāpākaraṇadvāreṇa samuccayo na tu pṛthaguktitayā parasparāpekṣatvāditi /
analyzed: tulya bala tayā bṛhaspati samasya tulya tā śaṅkā apākaraṇa dvāreṇa samuccayaḥ na tu pṛthak ukti tayā paraspara apekṣa tvāt iti
saṃnidhi pāṭham upapādayati
araṇya ādi vacanavān iti
hānau tu upāyana śabda śeṣa tvāt kuśācchanda stuti upagāna vat tat uktam

original: yatra hānopāyane śrūyete tatrāvivādaḥ saṃnipāte yatrāpyupāyanamātraśravaṇaṃ tatrāpi nāntarīyakatayā hānamākṣiptamityasti saṃnipātaḥ /
analyzed: yatra hāna upāyane śrūyete tatra avivādaḥ saṃnipāte yatra api upāyana mātra śravaṇam tatra api nāntarīyaka tayā hānam ākṣiptam iti asti saṃnipātaḥ

original: yatra tu hānamātraṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ śrutaṃ na śrūyate upāyanaṃ,
analyzed: yatra tu hāna mātram sukṛta duṣkṛtayoḥ śrutam na śrūyate upāyanam
tatra kim upāyanam upādānam saṃnipatet na vā iti saṃśayaḥ
atra pūrvapakṣam gṛhṇāti
asaṃnipāte iti
syāt etat
yathā śrūyamāṇam ekatra śākhāyām upāsana aṅgam tasmin eva upāsane śākhā antare śrūyamāṇam upasaṃhriyate
evam śākhā antara śrutam upāyanam upasaṃhariṣyate iti atas āha
vidyā antara gocara tvāt ca iti
eka tve hi upāsana karmaṇām anyatra utānām api anyatra samavāyaḥ ghaṭate
na tu iha upāsanānām eka tvam
sa guṇa nirguṇa tvena bhedāt iti arthaḥ

original: nanu yathopāyanaṃ śrutaṃ hānamupasthāpayatyevaṃ hānamapi upāyanamityata āha-
analyzed: nanu yathā upāyanam śrutam hānam upasthāpayati evam hānam api upāyanam iti atas āha
api ca ātma kartṛkam iti

original: grahaṇaṃ hi na svāmino 'pagamamantareṇa bhavatīti grahaṇādapagamasiddhiravaśyaṃbhāvinī /
analyzed: grahaṇam hi na svāminā upagamam antareṇa bhavati iti grahaṇāt apagama siddhiḥ avaśyaṃbhāvinī

original: apagamastvasatyapyanyena grahaṇe dṛṣṭo yathā prāyaścittenāpagatirenasa iti /
analyzed: apagamaḥ tu asati api anyena grahaṇe dṛṣṭaḥ yathā prāyaścittena apagatiḥ enasaḥ iti
kartṛ bheda kathanam tu etat upodbala artham na punar avaśyaṃbhāvasya prayojakam upāyanena anaikāntyāt iti
siddhāntam upakramate
asyām prāptau iti

original: ayamasyārthaḥ-karmāntare vihitaṃ hi na karmāntara upasaṃhriyate pramāṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: ayam asya arthaḥ karmāntare vihitam hi na karmāntare upasaṃhriyate pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: yatpunarna vidhīyate kintu stutyarthaṃ siddhatayā saṃkīrtyate tadasati bādhake devatādhikaraṇanyāyena śabdataḥ pratīyamānaṃ parityaktumaśakyam
analyzed: yat punar na vidhīyate kintu stuti artham siddhatayā saṃkīrtyate tat asati bādhake devatā adhikaraṇa nyāyena śabdataḥ pratīyamānam parityaktum aśakyam

original: tathāca vidhūtayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayornirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmaśvaromādivatkiṃ bhavatvityākāṅkṣāyāṃ na tāvatprāyaścitteneva tadvilayasaṃbhavastathā  #
analyzed: tathā ca vidhūtayoḥ sukṛta duṣkṛtayoḥ nirguṇāyām vidyāyām aśva roma ādi vat kim bhavatu iti ākāṅkṣāyām na tāvat prāyaścittena iva tad vilaya saṃbhavaḥ tathā
satyaśva romarāhu dṛṣṭānta anupapatteḥ
na jātu aśva romarāhu mukhayoḥ vilayanam asti
api tu aśva candrābhyām vibhāgaḥ
na ca naṣṭe vidhūnana pramocana artha saṃbhavaḥ

original: tasmādarthavādasyāpekṣāyāṃ śabdasaṃnidhikṛto 'pi viśeṣa upāyanaṃ buddhau saṃnidhāpayituṃ śakrotyapekṣāṃ pūrayitumiti /
analyzed: tasmāt arthavādasya apekṣāyām viśeṣaḥ upāyanam buddhau saṃnidhāpayitum śakroti apekṣām pūrayitum iti
nirguṇā api vidyā hāna upāyanābhyām stotavyā
stuti prakarṣaḥ tu prayojanam na pramāṇam
aprakarṣe pi stuti upapatteḥ
na ca arthavāda antara apekṣā arthavāda antarāṇām na dṛṣṭā
na ca taiḥ na pūraṇam iti āha
prasiddhā ca iti
vidyā stuti artha tvāt ca asya upāyana vādasya iti

original: yadyapyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyasya phalaṃ prayacchataḥ,
analyzed: yadi api anyadīye api sukṛta duṣkṛte anyasya phalam prayacchataḥ

original: yathā putrasya śrāddhakarma pitustṛptiṃ yathā ca piturvaiśvānarīyeṣṭiḥ putrasya /
analyzed: yathā putrasya śrāddha karma pituḥ tṛptim yathā ca pituḥ vaiśvānarīyā iṣṭiḥ putrasya
nāryāḥ ca surā pānam bhartuḥ narakam

original: tathāpyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte sākṣādanyasminna saṃbhavata ityāśayena śaṅkā /
analyzed: tathā api anyadīye api sukṛta duṣkṛte sākṣāt anyasmin na saṃbhavataḥ iti āśayena śaṅkā
phalatas prāptyā stutiḥ iti parihāraḥ
guṇa upasaṃhāra vivakṣāyām iti api na svarūpataḥ sukṛta duṣkṛta saṃcāra abhiprāyam
nanu vidyā guṇa upasaṃhāra adhikāre kaḥ yama kāṇḍe stuti artha vicāraḥ iti śaṅkām upasaṃhāran apākaroti
tasmāt guṇa upasaṃhāra vicāra prasaṅgena iti
vidyā guṇa upasaṃhāra prasaṅgataḥ stuti guṇa upasaṃhāraḥ vicāritaḥ

original: prayojanaṃ copāsake sauhārdamācaritavyaṃ na svasauhārdamiti chanda evācchanda ācchādanādācchabdo bhavati /
analyzed: prayojanam ca upāsake sauhārdam ācaritavyam na sva sauhārdam iti chandaḥ eva a chandaḥ ācchādanāt ācchabdaḥ bhavati
yathā eva ca aviśeṣa upagānam iti
ṛtvijaḥ upagāyanti iti aviśeṣeṇa upagānam ṛtvijām
bhāllavinaḥ tu viśeṣeṇa na adhvarī upagāyati iti
tat etasmāt bhāllavinām vākyam ṛtvijaḥ upagāyanti iti etat śeṣam vijñāyate
etat uktam bhavati adhvaryu varjitāḥ ṛtvijaḥ upagāyanti iti
kasmāt punar evam vyākhyāyate
nanu svatantrāṇi eva santu vākyāni iti atas āha
śruti antara kṛtam iti
aṣṭa doṣa vikalpa prasaṅga bhayena vākya antarasya vākya antara śeṣa tvam atrabhavataḥ jaimineḥ api saṃmatam iti āha
tat uktam dvādaśalakṣaṇyām

original: 'api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyāṭyatvādvikalpasya vidhīnāmekadeśaḥ syāt' ityetadeva sūtramarthadvāreṇa paṭhati-
analyzed: api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syāt anyāṭya tvāt vikalpasya vidhīnām eka deśaḥ syāt iti etat eva sūtram artha dvāreṇa paṭhati

original: api tu vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥsyātsa cānyāṭya iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: api tu vākya śeṣa tvāt itara paryudāsaḥ syāt pratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syāt sa ca anyāṭyaḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: evaṃ kila śrūyate-'eṣa vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryajñe yajñe 'nvāyatta' iti /
analyzed: evam kila śrūyate eṣa vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiḥ yajñe yajñe nu āyattaḥ iti
tatas na āyuyājeṣu yeyajāmaham karoti iti
tat atra an ārabhya kañcid yajñam yajñeṣu yeyajāmaha karaṇam upadiṣṭam
tat upadiśya ca āmnātam na anuyājeṣu iti

original: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ vidhipratiṣedhayorvikalpa uta paryudāso 'nuyājavarjiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /
analyzed: tatra saṃśayaḥ kim vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ vikalpaḥ uta paryudāsaḥ nuyāja varjiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavyaḥ iti
mā bhūt artha prāptasya śāstrīyeṇa niṣedhe vikalpaḥ

original: dṛṣṭaṃ hi tādātvikīmasya sundaratāṃ gamayati nāyatau doṣavattāṃ niṣedhati /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam hi tādātvikīm asya sundara tām gamayati na āyatau doṣavat tām niṣedhati
tasya tatra audāsīnyāt

original: niṣedhaśāstraṃ tu tādātvikaṃ saundaryamabādhamānameva pravṛttyunmukhaṃ naraṃ nivārayadāyatyāmasya duḥkhaphalatvamavagamayati /
analyzed: niṣedha śāstram tu tādātvikam saundaryam abādhamānam eva pravṛtti unmukham naram nivārayat āyatyām asya duḥkha phala tvam avagamayati
yathā āha akartavyaḥ duḥkha phalaḥ iti

original: tato gārataḥ pravṛttamapyāyatyāṃ duḥkhato vibhyataṃ puruṣaṃ śaknoti nivārayitumiti balīyayān śāstrīyaḥ pratiṣedho gārataḥ pravṛtteriti na tayā  #
analyzed: tatas gārataḥ pravṛttam api āyatyām duḥkhataḥ puruṣam śaknoti nivārayitum iti balīyayān śāstrīyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ gārataḥ pravṛtteḥ iti na tayā  /
vikalpam arhati
śāstrīyau tu vidhi niṣedhau tulya bala tayā
tatra hi vidhi darśanāt pradhānasya upakāra bhūyaḥ tvam kalpyate
niṣedha darśanāt ca vaiguṇye pi phala siddhiḥ avagamyate
tathā āha arthaprāpta vat iti ced na tulya tvāt ubhayam śabda lakṣaṇam iti

original: naca vācyaṃ yāvadyajatiṣu yeyajāmahakaraṇaṃ yāvadyajatisāmānyadvāreṇānuyājaṃ yajativiśeṣamupasarpati
analyzed: na ca vācyam yāvat yajatiṣu yeyajāmaha karaṇam yāvat yajati sāmānya dvāreṇa anuyājam yajati viśeṣam upasarpati

original: tāvadanuyājagatena niṣedhena tanniṣiddhamiti śīghrapravṛtteḥ sāmānyaśāstradviśeṣaniṣedho balavāniti /
analyzed: tāvat anuyāja gatena niṣedhena tat niṣiddham iti śīghra pravṛtteḥ sāmānya śāstra dvi śeṣa niṣedhaḥ balavān iti

original: yato bhavatvevaṃvidhiṣu brāhmaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
analyzed: yatas bhavatu evaṃvidhiṣu brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadhi dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti

original: tatra takradhaprāptyai tadvidhimapekṣate pravartitumiha tu prāptapūrvakatvāpratiṣedhasya yeyajāmahasya cānyato 'prāptestanniṣedhena niṣedhaprāptyai  #
analyzed: tatra takradha prāptyai tad vidhim apekṣate pravartitum iha tu prāpta pūrvaka tva a pratiṣedhasya yeyajāmahasya ca anyatas prāpteḥ tad niṣedhena niṣedha prāptyai
tad vidhiḥ apekṣaṇīyaḥ

original: naca sāpekṣatayā niṣedhādvidhireva balīyānityatulyaśiṣṭatayā na vikalpaḥ kintu niṣedhasyaiva bādhanamiti sāṃprataṃ,
analyzed: na ca sāpekṣa tayā niṣedhāt vidhiḥ eva balīyān iti a tulya śiṣṭa tayā na vikalpaḥ kintu niṣedhasya eva bādhanam iti sāṃpratam
tathā sati niṣedha śāstram pramatta gītam syāt
na ca yat yuktam tulyam hi sāṃpradāyikam
na ca na tau paśau karoti itivat arthavāda tā
a sa mevatā artha tvāt
paśau hi na ājyabhāgau staḥ iti upapadyate
na ca atra tathā yeyajāmahā bhāvaḥ
yajatiṣu yeyajāmaha vidhānāt
anuyājānām ca tad bhāvāt
na ca paryudāsaḥ tadā an anuyājeṣu iti
kātyāyana matena niyama prasakteḥ
tasmāt vihita pratiṣiddha tayā vikalpaḥ iti prāptam
evam prāptaḥ ucyate uktam ṣoḍaśi grahaṇayoḥ vikalpaḥ iti
nahi tatra anyā gatiḥ asti

original: tenādoṣaduṣṭo 'pi vikalpa āsthīyate pakṣe 'pi prāmāṇyānmā bhūtpramatagītateti /
analyzed: tena a doṣa duṣṭaḥ api vikalpaḥ āsthīyate pakṣe pi prāmāṇyāt mā bhūt pramata gīta tā iti
iha tu paryudāsena api upapattau saṃbhavantyām anyāṭyam vikalpa āśraṇam ayuktam

original: evaṃ hi tadā nañaḥ saṃbandho 'nanuyājeṣu yajatiṣvanuyājavartiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /
analyzed: evam hi tadā nañaḥ saṃbandhaḥ nanuyājeṣu yajatiṣu anuyāja vartiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavyaḥ iti
kim atas yat yavam
etat atas bhavatinā anuyājeṣu iti etat vākyam aparipūrṇam sākāṅkṣam pūrva vākya ekadeśena
yat etat yeyajām ahaṅkaroti iti etat na anuyājeṣu yāvat uktam syāt anuyāja varjitaḥ ūṣu iti
tāvat uktam bhavati na anuyājeṣu iti
tathā ca yajita viśeṣaṇa artha tvāt an anuyāja vidhiḥ eva ayam iti pratiṣedha abhāvāt na vikalpaḥ
na ca abhiyuktatara pāṇini virodhe kātyāyanasya asadvādi tvam nitya samāsa vādinaḥ saṃbhavati
sa hi vibhāṣā adhikāre samāsam śāsti
tasmāt anuyāja varjiteṣu yeyajāmaha vidhānam iti siddham
varṇaka antaram āha
athavā etāsu iti

original: yathā hi sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoramūrtayoḥ kalpanaṃ nāñjasaṃ sūrtyanuvidhāyitvātkampasya /
analyzed: yathā hi sukṛta duṣkṛtayoḥ amūrtayoḥ kalpanam na añjasam sūrti anuvidhāyi tvāt kampasya
tathā anyadīyayoḥ anyatra saṃcāraḥ pi anupapannaḥ mūrta tvāt eva

original: tasmādyatra vidhūnanamātraṃ śrutaṃ tatra kampanena varaṃ svakāryarambhāccālanamātrameva lakṣyatāṃ na tu tato 'pagatyānyatra saṃcāraḥ kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāt
analyzed: tasmāt yatra vidhūnana mātram śrutam tatra kampanena varam sva kārya rambhāt cālana mātram eva lakṣyatām na tu saṃcāraḥ kalpanā gaurava prasaṅgāt

original: tasmātsvakāryārambhāccālanaṃ vidhūnanamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-yatra tāvadupāyanaśrutistatrāvaśyaṃ tyāgo vidhūnanaṃ vaktavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt sva kārya ārambhāt cālanam vidhūnanam iti prāpte bhidhīyate yatra tāvat upāyana śrutiḥ tatra avaśyam tyāgaḥ vidhūnanam vaktavyam

original: kkacidapi codvidhūnanaṃ tyāge vartate tathā satyanyatrāpi tatraiva vartitumarhati /
analyzed: kkacid api ca udvidhūnanam tyāge vartate tathā sati anyatra api tatra eva vartitum arhati

original: evaṃ hi na varteta yadi vidhūnanamiha mukhyaṃ labhyeta /
analyzed: evam hi na varteta yadi vidhūnanam iha mukhyam labhyeta
na ca etat asti
tatra api sva kāryāt cālanasya lakṣyamāṇa tvāt
na ca prāmāṇikam kalpanā gauravam loha gandhi tām ācarati
api ca aneka artha tvāt hātatūnām tyāge vidhūyate mukhyagā iva bhaviṣyati
prācuryeṇa tyāge pi loke prayoga darśanāt
vinigamana hetoḥ abhāvāt
gaṇakārasya ca upalakṣaṇa tvena api artha nirdeśasya tatra darśanāt
tasmāt hāna arthaḥ eva atra iti yuktam  /
sāṃparāye tartavya abhāvāt tathā hi anye
nanu pāṭha kramāt ardha pathe sukṛta duṣkṛta taraṇe pratīyete
vidyā sāmarthyāt ca prāk eva avagamyete
tathā śāṭhyāyaninām tāṇḍinām ca śruteḥ
śruti arthau ca pāṭha kramāt balīyāṃsau
agnihotram juhoti yavāgūm pacati iti atra yathā
tasmāt pūrvapakṣa abhāvāt anārabhyam etat
atra ucyate
na etat pāṭha krama mātram api tu śrutiḥ tat sukṛta duṣkṛte vidhūnute iti

original: taditi hi sarvanāma tasmādarthe sannihitaparāmarśakaṃ tasya hetubhāvamāha /
analyzed: tat iti hi sarvanāma tasmāt arthe sannihita parāmarśakam tasya hetu bhāvam āha
sannihitam ca yat anantaram śrutam
tat ca ardha patha varti virajā nadī manaḥ bhigamanam iti ardha pathaḥ eva sukṛta duṣkṛta tyāgaḥ
na ca śruti antara virodhaḥ
ardha pathe pi pāpa vidhūnane brahma loka saṃbhavāt prāc kāla tā upapatteḥ
evam śāṭhyāyaninām api avirodhaḥ

original: nahi tatra jīvanniti vā jīvata iti vā śrutam /
analyzed: nahi tatra jīvan iti vā jīvataḥ iti vā śrutam
tathā ca ardha pathaḥ eva sukṛta duṣkṛta vimokaḥ

original: evañca na paryaṅkavidyātastatprakṣaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: evam ca na paryaṅka vidyātaḥ tad prakṣayaḥ iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: rāddhāntastu vidyāsāmarthyavidhūtakalmaṣasya jñānavata uttareṇa pathā gacchato brahmaprāptirna cāprakṣīṇakalmaṣasyottaramārgagamanaṃ saṃbhavati
analyzed: rāddhāntaḥ tu vidyā sāmarthya vidhūta kalmaṣasya jñānavataḥ uttareṇa pathā gacchataḥ brahma prāptiḥ na ca aprakṣīṇa kalmaṣasya uttara mārga gamanam saṃbhavati
yathā yavāgū pākāt pra agni agnihotram
yama niyama ādi anuṣṭhāna sahitāyāḥ vidyāyāḥ uttareṇa mārgeṇa paryaṅka stha brahma prāpti upāya tva śravaṇāt
a prakṣīṇa pāpmanaḥ ca tad anupapatteḥ

original: vidyaiva tādṛśī kalmaṣaṃ kṣapayati kṣapitakalmaṣaṃ cottaramārgaṃ prāpayatīti kathamardhapathe kalmaṣayaḥ /
analyzed: vidyā eva tādṛśī kalmaṣam kṣapayati kṣapita kalmaṣam ca uttara mārgam prāpayati iti katham ardha pathe kalmaṣayaḥ
tasmāt pāṭha krama bādhena artha kramaḥ nusartavyaḥ
nanu na pāṭha krama mātram atra
tat iti sarvanāma śrutyā saṃnihita parāmarśāt iti uktam
tat ayuktam
buddhi saṃnidhāna mātram atra upayujyate na anyat
tat ca anantarasya iva vidyā prakaraṇāt vidyāyāḥ api iti samānā śrutiḥ ubhayatra api iti
artha pāṭhau pariśiṣyete tatra ca arthaḥ balīyān iti
na ca tāṇḍya ādi śruti avirodhaḥ pūrvapakṣe

original: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūyeti hi svatantrasya puruṣasya vyāpāraṃ brūte,
analyzed: aśvaḥ iva romāṇi vidhūya iti hi svatantrasya puruṣasya vyāpāram brūte
na ca paretasya asti svātantryam
tasmāt tad virodhaḥ
chandataḥ ubhaya avirodhāt
kebhyaḥ cit padebhyaḥ idam sūtram

original: nanu yathā paretasyottareṇa pathā brahmaprāptirbhavatīti vidyāphalamevaṃ tasyaivārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtahānirapi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkāpadāni tebhya  #
analyzed: nanu yathā paretasya uttareṇa pathā brahma prāptiḥ bhavati iti vidyā phalam evam tasya eva ardha pathe sukṛta duṣkṛta hāniḥ api bhaviṣyati iti śaṅkā padāni
uttaram idam sūtram
yat vyācaṣṭe
yadi ca dehāt apasṛptasya iti
vidyā phalam api brahma prāptiḥ na aparetasya bhavitum arhati śaṅkā padebhyaḥ
yathā āhuḥ na a janitvā tatra gacchanti iti

original: sukṛtaduṣkṛtaprakṣayastu satyapi naraśarīre saṃbhavatīti samarthasya hetoryamaniyamādisahitāyā vidyāyāḥ karyakṣayāyogādyukto jīvata eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣaya  #
analyzed: sukṛta duṣkṛta prakṣayaḥ tu sati api nara śarīre saṃbhavati iti samarthasya hetoḥ yama niyama ādi sahitāyāḥ vidyāyāḥ jīvataḥ eva sukṛta duṣkṛta kṣaya
iti siddham
chandataḥ sva chandataḥ sva icchayā iti yāvat
sva icchayā anuṣṭhānam yama niyama ādi sahitāyāḥ vidyāyāḥ
tasya jīvataḥ puruṣasya syāt na mṛtasya
tad pūrvakam ca sukṛta duṣkṛta hānam syāt jīvataḥ eva
samarthasya kṣepa ayogāt

original: evaṃ kāraṇānantaraṃ kāryotpāde sati nimittanaimittakayostadbhāvasyopapattistāṇḍiśāṭhyāyaniśrutyośca saṃgatiritarathā svātantryābhāvenāsaṃgatiruktā  #
analyzed: evam kāraṇa anantaram kārya utpāde sati nimitta naimittakayoḥ tad bhāvasya upapattiḥ tāṇḍi śāṭhyāyani śrutyoḥ ca saṃgatiḥ itarathā svātantrya abhāvena asaṃgatiḥ uktā
syāt
tat anena ubhaya virodhaḥ vyākhyataḥ

original: ye tu parasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte kathaṃ paratra saṃkrāmata iti śaṅkottaratayā sūtraṃ vyācakhyuḥ /
analyzed: ye tu parasya viduṣaḥ sukṛta duṣkṛte katham paratra saṃkrāmataḥ iti śaṅkā uttaratayā sūtram vyācakhyuḥ
chandataḥ saṃkalpate iti śruti smṛtyoḥ avirodhāt eva
na tu atra āgama gamya ṛthe svātantryeṇa yuktiḥ niveśanīyete
teṣām adhikaraṇa śarīra anupraveśe saṃbhavati artha antara upavarṇanam asaṅgatam eva iti
gateḥ arthavat tvam ubhayathā anyathā hi virodhaḥ
yathā hāni saṃnidhau upāyanam anyatra śrutam iti

original: tatrāpi kevalā hāniḥ śrūyate tatrāpi upāyanamupasthāpayatyevaṃ tatsannidhāveva devayānaḥ
analyzed: tatra api kevalā hāniḥ śrūyate tatra api upāyanam upasthāpayati evam tad sannidhau eva deva yānaḥ

original: panthāḥ śruta iti yatrāpi sukṛtaduṣkṛtahāniḥ kevalā śrutā tatrāpi devayānaṃ panthānamupasthāpayitumarhati /
analyzed: panthāḥ śrutaḥ iti yatra api sukṛta duṣkṛta hāniḥ kevalā śrutā tatra api deva yānam panthānam upasthāpayitum arhati
na ca nirañjanaḥ paramam sāmyam upaiti iti anena virodhaḥ
deva yānena pathā brahma loka prāptau nirañjanasya parama sāmya upapatteḥ

original: tasmāddhānimātre devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃbadhyata iti prāptam /
analyzed: tasmāt hāni mātre deva yānaḥ panthāḥ saṃbadhyate iti prāptam

original: evaṃ prāptam ucyate-vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūyanirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaitīti hi viduṣo vidhūtapuṇyapāpasya vidyayā kṣemaprāptimāha /
analyzed: evam prāptam ucyate vidvān puṇya pāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramam sāmyam upaiti iti hi viduṣaḥ vidhūta puṇya pāpasya vidyayā kṣema prāptim āha
kṣemaḥ yāthātmya jñāna lakṣaṇayā vidyāyāḥ vinivartanīyaḥ
na asau deśa viśeṣam apekṣate

original: nahi jātu rajjau sarpabhramanivṛttaye samutpannaṃ rajjutattavajñānaṃ deśaviśeṣamapekṣate /
analyzed: nahi jātu rajjau sarpa bhrama nivṛttaye samutpannam rajju tattava jñānam deśa viśeṣam apekṣate
vidyā utpādasya eva sva virodhya vidyā nivṛtti rūpa tvāt
na ca vidyā utpādāyāḥ brahma loka prāptiḥ apekṣaṇīyā
yama niyama ādi viśuddha sattvasya iha eva śravaṇa ādibhiḥ vidyā utpādāt

original: yadi paramārabdhakāryakarmakṣapaṇāya śarīrapātāvadhyapekṣeti na devayānenāstīhārtha iti śrutidṛṣṭavirodhānnāpekṣitavya iti /
analyzed: yadi parama ārabdha kārya karma kṣapaṇāya śarīrapātau adhi apekṣā iti na deva yānena asti iha arthaḥ iti śruti dṛṣṭa virodhāt na apekṣitavyaḥ iti

original: asti tu paryaṅkavidyāyāṃ tasmārtha ityuktaṃ dvitīyena sūtreṇeti /
analyzed: asti tu paryaṅka vidyāyām tasmāt arthaḥ iti uktam dvitīyena sūtreṇa iti

original: ye tu yadi puṇyamapi nivartate kimarthā tarhi gatarityāśaṅkya sūtramavatārayanti /
analyzed: ye tu yadi puṇyam api nivartate kimarthā tarhi gataḥ iti āśaṅkya sūtram avatārayanti
gateḥ arthavat tvam ubhayathā duṣkṛta nivṛttyā sukṛta nivṛttyā ca

original: yadi punaḥ puṇyamanuvarteta brahmalokagatasyāpīha puṇyaphalopabhogāyavṛttiḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi punar puṇyam anuvarteta brahma loka gatasya api iha puṇya phala upabhogāya vṛttiḥ syāt
tathā ca etena pratipādyamāna āgati anāvṛtti śruti virodhaḥ

original: tasmādduṣkṛtasyeva sukṛtasyāpi prakṣaya iti taiḥ punaranāśaṅkanīyamevāśaṅkitam /
analyzed: tasmāt duṣkṛtasya iva sukṛtasya api prakṣayaḥ iti taiḥ punar anāśaṅkanīyam eva āśaṅkitam

original: vidyākṣiptāyāṃ hi gatau keyamāśaṅkā yadi kṣīṇasukṛtaḥ kimarthamayaṃ yātīti /
analyzed: vidyā ākṣiptāyām hi gatau kā iyam āśaṅkā yadi kṣīṇa sukṛtaḥ kimartham ayam yāti iti
na hi eṣā sukṛta nibandhanā gatiḥ api tu vidyā nibandhanā
tasmāt vṛddha uktam eva upavarṇanam sādhu iti
aniyamaḥ sarvāsām avirodhaḥ śabda anumānābhyām
prakaraṇam hi dharmāṇām niyāmakam

original: yadi tu tannādriyate tato darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādidharmāḥ saṃkīryeran /
analyzed: yadi tu tat na ādriyate tatas darśa pūrṇamāsa jyotiṣṭoma ādi dharmāḥ saṃkīryeran

original: naca teṣāṃ vikṛtiṣu sauryādiṣu dvādaśāhādiṣu codakataḥ prāptiḥ /
analyzed: na ca teṣām vikṛtiṣu saurya ādiṣu dvādaśa aha ādiṣu ca udakataḥ prāptiḥ
sarvatra aupadeśika tvāt
na ca darvi homasya a prakṛti vikārasya adharmaka tvam
na ca sarva dharma yuktam karma kiñcid api śakyam anuṣṭhātum

original: na caivaṃ sati śrutyādoya'pi viniyojakāsteṣāmapi hi prakaraṇena sāmānyasaṃbandhe sati viniyojakatvāt /
analyzed: na ca evam sati śruti ādau api viniyojakāḥ teṣām api hi prakaraṇena sāmānya saṃbandhe sati viniyojaka tvāt

original: yatrāpi vināprakaraṇaṃ śrutyādibhyo viniyogo 'vagamyate tatrāpi tannirvāhāya prakaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kalpanīyatvāt /
analyzed: yatra api vinā prakaraṇam śruti ādibhyaḥ viniyogaḥ tatra api tad nirvāhāya prakaraṇasya avaśyam kalpanīya tvāt
tasmāt prakaraṇam viniyogāya tad niyamāya ca avaśya abhyupetavyam anyathā śruti ādīnām aprāmāṇya prasakteḥ

original: tasmādyāsvevopāsanāsu devayānaḥ pitṛyāṇo vā panthā āmnātastāsveva na tūpāsanāntareṣu tadanāmnānāt /
analyzed: tasmāt yāsu eva upāsanāsu deva yānaḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ vā panthāḥ āmnātaḥ tāsu eva na tu upāsana antareṣu tad anāmnānāt

original: naca 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' iti sāmānyavacanātsarvavidyāsu tatpathaprāptiḥ /
analyzed: na ca ye ca ime raṇye śraddhā tapaḥ iti upāsate iti sāmānya vacanāt sarva vidyāsu tad patha prāptiḥ
śraddhā tapaḥ parāyaṇānām eva tatra tad patha prāptiḥ śrūyate
na tu vidyā parāyaṇānām

original: apicaivaṃ satyekasyāṃ vidyāyāṃ mārgopadeśaḥ sarvāsu vidyāsvityekatraiva mārgopadeśaḥ kartavyo na vidyāntare /
analyzed: apica evam sati ekasyām vidyāyām mārga upadeśaḥ sarvāsu vidyāsu iti ekatra eva mārga upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ na vidyā antare
vidyā antare ca śrūyate
tasmāt na sarva upāsanāsu pathiprāptiḥ iti prāptam

original: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' iti na śraddhātapomātrasya
analyzed: evam prāpte ucyate ye ca ime raṇye śraddhā tapaḥ iti upāsate iti na śraddhā tapaḥ mātrasya

original: pathiprāptimāhāpi tu vidyayā tadārohāntītyatra nāvidvāṃsastapasvina iti kevalasya
analyzed: pathiprāptim āha api tu vidyayā tat ārohānti iti atra na a vidvāṃsaḥ tapasvinaḥ iti kevalasya
tapasaḥ śraddhāyāḥ ca tad prāpti pratiṣedhāt vidyā sahite śraddhā tapasī tad prāpi upāya tayā
vadan vidyā antarīlānām api pañcāgni vidyā vidbhiḥ samāna mārga tām darśayati

original: tathānyatrāpi pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'bhidhīyate-'ya evametādvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' iti /
analyzed: tathā anyatra api pañcāgni vidyā adhikāre bhidhīyate ye evam etān viduḥ ye ca amī araṇye śraddhām satyam upāsate iti
satya śabdasya brahmaṇi eva anapekṣa pravṛtti tvāt
tat eva hi satyam anyasya mithyātvena kathañcid āpekṣika satya tvāt
pañca agni vidām ca ittham vid tayā eva upātta tvāt
vidyā sāhacaryāt ca vidyā antara parāyaṇānām eva idam upādānam nyāṭyam
mārga dvaya bhraṣṭānām ca adhas gati śravaṇāt
tatra api ca yogya tayā deva yānasya eva iha adhvanaḥ bhisaṃbandhaḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati-bhavetprakaraṇaṃ niyāmakaṃ yadyaniyamapratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ śrautaṃ smārtaṃ vā na syādasti tu tattasya ca prakaraṇādbalīyastvam
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati bhavet prakaraṇam niyāmakam yadi aniyama pratipādakam vākyam śrautam smārtam vā na syāt asti tu tat tasya ca prakaraṇāt balīyaḥ tvam

original: tasmādaniyamo vidyāntareṣvapi saguṇeṣu devayānaḥ panthā asakṛnmārgopadeśasya ca prayojanaṃ varṇitaṃ bāṣyakṛteti //31 // 3.3.19.32.
analyzed: tasmāt aniyamaḥ vidyā antareṣu api saguṇeṣu deva yānaḥ panthāḥ asakṛt mārga upadeśasya ca prayojanam varṇitam bāṣyakṛtā iti
yāvadadhikāram avasthiti gadhikārikāṇām

original: saguṇānāṃ vidyāyāṃ cintāṃ kṛtvā nirguṇāyāṃ cintayati /
analyzed: sa guṇānām vidyāyām cintām kṛtvā nirguṇāyām cintayati
nirguṇāyām vidyāyām na apavargaḥ palam bhavitum arhati
śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu viduṣām api apāntara tamaḥ prabhṛtīnām tad tad deha parigraha parityāgau śrūyete
tad apavarga phala tve na upapadyate
apavṛktasya tad anupapatteḥ
upapattau vā tad lakṣaṇa ayogāt
apunar āvṛttiḥ hi tat lakṣaṇam
tena satyām api vidyāyām tad anupapatteḥ na mokṣaḥ
phalam vidyāyām vibhūtayaḥ tu tāḥ tāḥ tasyāḥ phalam
apunarāvṛtti śrutiḥ punar tad praśaṃsā arthā iti manyate

original: naca 'tāvadevāsya ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' iti śruterviduṣo dehapātāvadhipratīkṣāvadvasiṣṭhādīnāmapi prārabdhakarmaphalopabhogapratīkṣeti  #
analyzed: na ca tāvat eva asya ciram yāvat na vimokṣye saṃpatsye iti śruteḥ viduṣaḥ dehapāta avadhi pratīkṣā vat vasiṣṭha ādīnām api prārabdha karma phala upabhoga pratīkṣā iti
sāṃpratam

original: yena hi karmaṇā vasiṣṭhādīnāmārabdhaṃ śarīraṃ tatpratīkṣā syāt /
analyzed: yena hi karmaṇā vasiṣṭha ādīnām ārabdham śarīram tad pratīkṣā syāt
tathā ca na śarīra antaram te gṛhṇīyuḥ
na ca tāvat eva ciram iti etat api ārjavena ghaṭate
samartha hetu saṃnidhau kṣepa ayogāt
tasmāt etat api vidyā stutyā eva gamayitavyam
tasmāt na apavargaḥ vidyā phalam
tathā ca apavarga ākṣepeṇa pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
atra ca pākṣikam mokṣa hetu tvam iti āpātataḥ
ahetu tvam vetu tu pūrvapakṣa tattvam
adhikāram samāpya ete pratiśanti param padam

original: nirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmapavargalakṣaṇaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na stutimātratayā vyākhyāyamucitam /
analyzed: nirguṇāyām vidyāyām apavarga lakṣaṇam śrūyamāṇam na stuti mātra tayā vyākhyāyam ucitam
paurvāparya paryālocane bhūyasīnām śrutīnām atra eva tātparya avadhāraṇāt
na ca yatra tātparyam tat anyathayitum yuktam

original: uktaṃ hi 'na vidyau paraḥ śabdārtha' iti /
analyzed: uktam hi na vidyau paraḥ śabda arthaḥ iti

original: naca viduṣamapāntaramaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ tattaddehasaṃtārātsatyāmapi brahmavidyāyāmanirmokṣānna brahmavidyā mokṣasya heturiti sāmpratam /
analyzed: na ca viduṣam apānta ramaḥ prabhṛtīnām tad tad deha saṃtārāt satyām api brahmavidyāyām anirmokṣāt na brahmavidyā mokṣasya hetuḥ iti sāmpratam

original: hetorapi sati pratibandhe kāryānupajano na hetubhāvamapakāroti /
analyzed: hetoḥ api sati pratibandhe kārya anupajanaḥ na hetu bhāvam apakāroti

original: nahi vṛntaphalasaṃyogapratibaddhaṃ gurutvaṃ na patanamajījanaditi pratibandhāpagame tatkurvanna taddhetuḥ /
analyzed: nahi vṛnta phala saṃyoga pratibaddham guru tvam na patanam ajījanat iti pratibandha apagame tat kurvan na tad hetuḥ

original: naca na setupratibandhānāmapāṃ nimnadeśānabhisarpaṇamiti setubhede na nimnamabhisarpanti /
analyzed: na ca na setu pratibandhānām apām nimna deśān abhisarpaṇam iti setu bhede na nimnam abhisarpanti

original: tadvadihāpi vidyākarmārādhanāvarjiteśvaravihitādhikārapadapratibaddhā brahmavidyā yadyapi na muktiṃ dattavatī tathāpi tatparisamāptau pratibandhavigame  #
analyzed: tadvat iha api vidyā karma ārādhana āvarjita īśvara vihita adhikāra pada pratibaddhā brahma vidyā yadi api na muktim dattavatī tathā api tad parisamāptau pratibandha vigame
dāsyati

original: yathā hi prārabdhavipākasya karmaṇaḥ prakṣayaṃ pratīkṣamāṇaścaramadehasamutpannabrahmasākṣātkāro 'pi dhriyate 'tha tatprakṣayānmokṣaṃ prāpnoti
analyzed: yathā hi prārabdha vipākasya karmaṇaḥ prakṣayam pratīkṣamāṇaḥ carama deha samutpanna brahma sākṣātkāraḥ pi dhriyate tad prakṣayāt mokṣam prāpnoti
evam prārabdha adhikāra lakṣaṇa phala vidyā karmā puruṣaḥ vasiṣṭha ādiḥ vidvān api tad kṣayam
pratīkṣamāṇaḥ yuj utkrameṇa vā tad tad deha parigraha parityāgau kurvan muktaḥ pi anābhoga ātmikayā
prakhyayā sāṃsārika ava viharati
tat idam uktam
sukṛta pravṛttam eva hi te karma āśayam adhikāra phala dānāya iti
prārabdha vipākāni tu karmāṇi varjayitvā vyapagatāni jñānena eva ativāhitāni
na ca ete jāti smarāḥ iti

original: yo hi paravaśo dehaṃ parityājyate dehāntaraṃ ca nītaḥ pūrvajanmānubhūtasya smarati sa janmavāñjātismarca /
analyzed: yaḥ hi para vaśaḥ deham parityājyate deha antaram ca nītaḥ pūrva janma anubhūtasya smarati sa janmavān jātismarca

original: gṛhādiva gṛhāntare svecchayā kāyāntaraṃ saṃcaramāṇo na jātismara ākhyāyataṃ /
analyzed: gṛhāt iva gṛha antare sva icchayā kāya antaram saṃcaramāṇaḥ na jātismaraḥ
vyudya vivādam kṛtvā
vyatirekam āha
yadi hi upayukte sukṛt pravṛtte prārabdha vipāke
karmaṇi karma antaram a prārabdha vipākam iti
sya idam a tat
vidyayā avidyā ādi kleśa nivṛttau na avaśyam niḥśeṣasya karma āśayasya nivṛtti nara nādi bhava paraspara āhitasya aniyata vipāka kālasya asaṅkhyeya tvāt karma śayasya iti atas
na ca avidyā ādi kleśa dāhe sati ite

original: nahisamāne vināśahetau kasyacidvināśo nāparasyeti śakyaṃ vaditum /
analyzed: na hi samāne vināśa hetau kasyacid vināśaḥ na aparasya iti śakyam vaditum
tat kim idānīm pravṛtta phalam iti karma vinaśyet
tathā ca na viduṣaḥ vasiṣṭha ādeḥ dehadhāraṇā iti atas āha
pravṛtta phalasya tu karmaṇaḥ iti

original: tasya tāvadeva ciramiti śrutiprāmāṇādanāgataphalameva karma kṣīyate na pravṛttaphalamityavagamyate /
analyzed: tasya tāvat eva ciram iti śruti prāmāṇāt anāgata phalam eva karma kṣīyate na pravṛtta phalam iti avagamyate

original: apica nādhikāravayāṃ sarveṣāmṛṣīṇāmātmatattvajñānaṃ tenāvyāpako 'pyayaṃ parvapakṣa ityāha-
analyzed: apica na adhikāra vayām sarveṣām ṛṣīṇām ātma tattva jñānam tena a vyāpakaḥ pi ayam parvapakṣaḥ iti āha
jñāna antareṣu ca iti
tat kim teṣām anirmokṣaḥ eva na iti āha
te paścāt aiśvarya kṣaye iti
nirviṇṇa aviraktāḥ
pratisaṃcaraḥ pralayaḥ

original: apica svargādāvanubhavapathamanārohati śabdaikasamadhigamye vicikitsā syādapi mandadhiyāmāmuṣmikaphalatvaṃ prati /
analyzed: api ca svarga ādau anubhava patham an ārohati śabda eka samadhigamye vicikitsā syāt api manda dhiyām āmuṣmika phala tvam prati

original: yathā cārthavādaḥ-'ko hi tadveda yadamuṣmiṃlloke 'sti vā na veti' /

advaita jñāna phala tve mokṣasya anubhava siddhe na asti iti āha

original: advaitatattvasākṣātkāro hi avidyāsamāropitaṃ prapañcaṃ samūlaghātaṃ nighnandhoraṃ saṃsārāṅgaparitāpamupaśamayati puruṣasyetyanuvādapi sphuṭamupapatidraḍhimnaśca  #

śrutiḥ darśitā
tat ca anubhavāt vāmadeva ādīnām siddham

original: nanu tattvamasi vartasa iti vākyaṃ kathamanubhavameva dyotayatītyata āha-

aṅ ṛ a viṣayāṇām

original: ānandādayaḥ pradhānasyetyatrāyamartho yadyapi bhāvarūpeṣu viśeṣaṇeṣu siddhastantryāyatayā ca niṣedharūpeṣviti siddha eva /
analyzed: ānanda ādayaḥ pradhānasya iti atra ayam arthaḥ yadi api bhāva rūpeṣu viśeṣaṇeṣu siddhaḥ tantrya yatayā ca niṣedha rūpeṣu iti siddhaḥ eva
tathā api tasya eva eṣa prapañcaḥ vagantavyaḥ
nidarśanam
jāmadagnye hīnaḥ iti

original: yadyapi śābare dattottaramatrodāharaṇāntaraṃ tathāpi tulyanyāyatayaidapi śakyamudāhartumityudāharaṇāntaraṃ darśitam /

original: tatra śābaramudāharaṇamastyādhānaṃ yajurvedavihitam-'ya evaṃ vidvānagnimādhatta' iti /
analyzed: tatra śābaram udāharaṇam asti ādhānam yajurveda vihitam yaḥ evam vidvān agnim ādhatte iti

original: tadaṅgatvena yajurveda eva 'ya evaṃ vidvānvāravantīyaṃ gāyati ya evaṃ vidvānyajñāyajñīyaṃ gāyati ya evaṃ vidvānvāmadevyaṃ gāyati' iti vihitam
analyzed: tad aṅga tvena yajurvedaḥ eva yaḥ evam vidvān vāravantīyam gāyati yaḥ evam vidvān yajñāyajñīyam gāyati yaḥ evam vidvān vāmadevyam gāyati iti vihitam
etāni ca sāmāni sāmavedeṣu utpannāni
tatra idam saṃdihyate kim etāni yatra utpadyante svareṇa ādhāne

original: prayoktavyānyatha yanna viniyujyante tatratyenopāṃśutvena svareṇa 'uccaiḥ sāmnopāṃśu yajuṣā iti śruteḥ /
analyzed: prayoktavyāni atha yat na viniyujyante tatratyena upāṃśu tvena svareṇa uccais sāmnā upāṃśu yajuṣā iti śruteḥ
kim tāt prāptam

original: utpattividhinaivāpekṣitopāyatvātmanā vihitatvādaṅganāṃ tasyaiva prāthamyāttannibandhana evoccaiḥsvare prāpta ucyate-guṇamukhyavyatikrame tadarthatvānmukhyena  #
analyzed: utpatti vidhinā eva apekṣita upāya tva ātmanā vihita tvāt aṅganām tasya eva prāthamyāt tad nibandhanaḥ evā uccais svare prāpte ucyate guṇa mukhya vyatikrame tad artha tvāt mukhyena
veda saṃyogaḥ
ayam arthaḥ utpatti vidhiḥ guṇaḥ viniyoga vidhiḥ tu pradhānam
tat anayoḥ vyātikrame virodhe utpatti vidhi ālocanena uccaiḥṣṭvam viniyoga vidhi ālocanena

original: copāṃśutvaṃ so 'yaṃ virodho vyatikramastasminvayatikrame mukhyena pradhānena niyujyamānatvarūpeṇa
analyzed: ca upāṃśu tvam saḥ yam virodhaḥ vyatikramaḥ tasmin vai ayatikrame mukhyena pradhānena niyujyamāna tva rūpeṇa
tasya vāravantīya ādeḥ veda saṃyogaḥ grāhyaḥ na utpadyamāna tvena guṇena
kutas viniyujyamāna tvasya mukhya tvena utpadyamāna tvasya guṇa tvena tad artha tvāt viniyujyamāna artha tvāt utpadyamāna tvasya
etat uktam bhavati yadi api utpatti vidhau api cātūrūpyam asti vidhi tvasya aviśeṣāt
tad mātra nāntarīyaka tvāt ca cātapa rūpyasya
tathā api vākyānām aidaṃparyam bhidyate

original: ekasyaiva vidherutpattiviniyogādhikāraprayogarūpeṣu caturṣu madhye kiñcideva rūpaṃ kenacidvākyenollikhyate yadanyato 'prāptam /
analyzed: ekasya eva vidheḥ utpatti viniyoga adhikāra prayoga rūpeṣu caturṣu madhye kiñcid eva rūpam kenacid vākyena ullikhyate yat anyatas prāptam

original: tatra yadyapi sāmavede sāmāni vihitāni tathāpi tadvākyānāṃ tadutpattimātraparatā viniyogasya yājurvaidikaireva vākyai prāptatvāt /
analyzed: tatra yadi api sāmavede sāmāni vihitāni tathā api tad vākyānām tad utpatti mātra para tā viniyogasya yājurvaidikaiḥ eva vākyaiḥ prāpta tvāt
tathā ca utpatti vākyebhyaḥ samīhita artha apratilambhāt viniyoga vākyebhyaḥ ca tad avagateḥ tad arthāni eva utpatti vākyāni

original: bhavantīti tatra yena vākyena viniyujyante tasyaiva svarasya sādhanatvaṃsaṃsparśino
analyzed: bhavanti iti tatra yena vākyena viniyujyante tasya eva svarasya sādhana tvam saṃsparśinaḥ
grahaṇam na tu rūpa mātra sparśinaḥ iti
bhāṣya kārīyam api udāharaṇam evam eva yojayitavyam

original: udrātṛvedotpannānāṃ mantraṇāmudgātrā prayoge prāpte adhvaryupradānake 'pi puroḍāśe viniyuktatvātpradhānānurodhenādhvaryuṇaiva teṣāṃ prayogo  #
analyzed: udrātṛ veda utpannānām mantraṇām udgātrā prayoge prāpte adhvaryu pradānake pi puroḍāśe viniyukta tvāt pradhāna anurodhena adhvaryuṇā eva teṣām prayogaḥ

evam iha api iti
iyat āmananāt

anyatra bhokroḥ eva iti vedya bhedāt vidyā bhedaḥ iti

tulya bala tva abhāvāt

original: prakaraṇasya ca tato balīyasā vākyena bādhanāt /
analyzed: prakaraṇasya ca tatas balīyasā vākyena bādhanāt

original: tasmādvedyabhedādvidyābheda iti prāpta ucyate-dvāsuparṇatyatra ṛtaṃ pibantāvityatra ca dvitvasaṃkhyotpattau pratīyate tena samānatautsargikī
analyzed: tasmāt vedya bhedāt vidyā bhedaḥ iti prāptaḥ ucyate id vāsuparṇa iti atra ṛtam pibantau iti atra ca dvi tva saṃkhyā utpattau pratīyate tena samāna tā autsargikī

original: pibantāviti dvayoḥ pibantā yā sā bādhanīyā,
analyzed: pibantau iti dvayoḥ yā sā bādhanīyā

original: sā copakramopasaṃhārānurodhena na dvayorapi tu chatrinyāyena lākṣāṇikī vyākhyeyā /
analyzed: sā ca upakrama upasaṃhāra anurodhena na dvayoḥ api tu chatri nyāyena lākṣāṇikī vyākhyeyā

original: yena hyupakramyate yena copasaṃsthite tadanurodhena madhyaṃ jñeyam /
analyzed: yena hi upakramyate yena ca upasaṃsthite tad anurodhena madhyam jñeyam

original: yathā jāmitvadoṣasaṃkīrtanopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre ca saṃdarbhe madhyapātino
analyzed: yathā jāmi tva doṣa saṃkīrtana upakrame tad pratisamādhāna upasaṃhāre ca saṃdarbhe
viṣṇu rūpa aṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ jāmi tvāya ityādayaḥ pṛthak vidhi tvam alabhamānāḥ vidhi tvam a vivakṣitvā arthavādatayā

tathā iha api tad anurodhena pibat apibat samūha param lakṣaṇīyam pibantau iti anena
tathā ca vedyā bhedāt vidyā bhedaḥ iti

original: apica triṣvapyeteṣu vedāntaṣu prakaraṇatraye 'pi paurvāparyaparyālocanayā paramātmavidyaivāvagamyate /

yadi evam katham tarhi jīva upādānam astu iti atas āha

original: nāsyāṃ jīvaḥ pratipādyate kintu paramātmano 'bhedaṃ jīvasya darśayitumasāvanūdyate /

antarā bhūta grāmavat sva ātmanaḥ

original: kauṣītakeyakaholacākrāyaṇoṣastapraśnopakramayorvidyornaitarantaṇāmnātayoḥ kimasti bhedo na veti viśaye bheda eveti bhrūmaḥ /

kutas yadi api ubhayatra praśna uttarayoḥ abhedaḥ pratīyate

original: na caikasyaiva tāṇḍināṃ navakṛtva upadeśe 'pi yathā bhedo na bhavati 'sa ātmā tattvamati śvetaketo' ityatra tathehāpyabheda iti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca ekasya eva tāṇḍinām nava kṛtvas upadeśe yathā bhedaḥ na bhavati saḥ ātmā tattvam ati śvetaketo iti atra tathā iha api abhedaḥ iti yuktam
bhūyas eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatu

original: iti hi tatra śrūyate tenābhedo yujyate /
analyzed: iti hi tatra śrūyate tena abhedaḥ yujyate

original: tena yadyapīha vedyābhedo 'vagamyate tathāpyekatra tasyaivāśanāyādimātrātyayopādherupāsanādekatra ca kāryakaraṇavirahopādherupāsanādvidyābheda  #
analyzed: tena yadi api iha vedya abhedaḥ vagamyate tathā api ekatra tasya eva aśanāya ādi mātra atyaya upādheḥ upāsanāt ekatra ca kārya karaṇa viraha upādheḥ upāsanāt vidyā bheda

etat atas bhavati vidheḥ aprāpta prāpaṇa artha tvāt prāptau anupapattiḥ

original: vastusvarūpaṃ tu punaḥpunarucyamānamapi na doṣamāvahati śatakṛtvo 'pi hi pathyaṃ vadantyāptāḥ /

viśeṣataḥ tu vedaḥ pitṛbhyām api abhyarhitaḥ
na ca sarvathā paunaruktyam
ekatra aśanāya ādi atyayāt anyatra ca kārya kāraṇa pravilayāt

original: ubhābhyāmapi vidyābhyāṃ bhinna ātmā pratipādyate iti yo manyate pūrvapakṣaikadeśī taṃ prati sarvāntaratvavirodho darśitaḥ //35 // 3.3.22.36.
analyzed: ubhābhyām api vidyābhyām bhinnaḥ ātmā pratipādyate iti yaḥ manyate pūrvapakṣa eka deśī tam prati sarva antara tva virodhaḥ darśitaḥ  /
anyathā bheda anupapattiḥ iti ced nā upadeśa antara vat iti
asya tu pūrvapakṣa tattva abhiprāyaḥ darśitaḥ
sugamam anyat  /
vyatihāraḥ hi itaravat
utkṛṣṭasya nikṛṣṭa rūpa āpatteḥ na ubhayatra ubhaya rūpa anucintanam
api tu nikṛṣṭe jīve utkṛṣṭa rūpa abheda cintanam

original: evaṃ hi nikṛṣṭa utkṛṣṭo bhavatīti prāptam /
analyzed: evam hi nikṛṣṭaḥ utkṛṣṭaḥ bhavati iti prāptam
evam prāptaḥ ucyate itaretara anuvādena itaretara rūpa vidhānāt ubhayatra abhaya cintanam vidhīyate

yathā tat tvam asi iti atra
tasmāt ubhaya rūpam ubhayatra ādhyānāya upadiśyate

original: nanvevamutkṛṣṭasya nikṛṣṭaprasaṅga ityuktaṃ tatkimidānīṃ saguṇe brahmaṇyupāsyamāne 'sya vastuto nirguṇasya nikṛṣṭatā bhavati /
analyzed: nanu evam utkṛṣṭasya nikṛṣṭa prasaṅgaḥ iti uktam tat kim idānīm saguṇe brahmaṇi upāsyamāne vastutas nirguṇasya nikṛṣṭa tā bhavati

original: kasmaicitphalāya tathā dhyānamātraṃ vidhīyatena tvasya nikṛṣṭatāmāpādayatīti cedihāpi vyatihārānucintanamātramupadiśyate phalāya na ti nikṛṣṭatā  #
analyzed: kasmaicid phalāya tathā dhyāna mātram vidhīyate ena tu asya nikṛṣṭa tām āpādayati iti ced iha api vyatihāra anucintana mātram upadiśyate phalāya na nikṛṣṭa tā
bhavati utkṛṣṭasya
anvācaya śiṣṭam tu tādātmya dārḍhyam bhavat na upekṣāmahe
satya kāma ādi guṇa upadeśā eva tad guṇa īśvara siddhiḥ iti siddham ubhayatra ubhaya ātma tva adhyanam iti
sā eva hi satya ādayaḥ

original: tadvai tadetadeva tadāsa satyameva sa yo haitanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ
analyzed: tat vai tat etat eva tat āsa satyam eva sa yaḥ ha etat mahat yakṣam prathama jam veda satyam

original: brahmeti jayatīmāṃllokāñjita ityasāvasadya evametanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ
analyzed: brahma iti jayati imān lokān jitaḥ iti asau asadyaḥ evam etat mahat yakṣam prathama jam veda satyam
brahma iti satyam hi eva brahma

original: pūrvoktasya hṛdayākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ satyamityupāsanamena saṃdarbheṇa vidhīyate /
analyzed: pūrva uktasya hṛdaya ākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ satyam iti upāsanam ena saṃdarbheṇa vidhīyate
tat iti hṛdaya ākhyam brahma ekena tadā parāmṛśati
etat eva iti vakṣyamāṇam prakāra antaram asya parāmṛśati
āsa babhūva
kim tat iti atas āha satyam eva
sat ca mūrtam tyad ca amūrtam ca sat tyam
tad upāsakasya phalam āha sa yaḥ ha etam iti
yaḥ prathama jam yakṣam pūjyam veda
katham veda iti atas āha satyam brahma iti iti
sa jayati imān lokān

original: kiñca jito vaśīkṛta inuśabda itthaṃśabdasyārthe vartate /
analyzed: kiñca jitaḥ vaśīkṛtaḥ inu śabdaḥ itthaṃśabdasya arthe vartate
vijetavya tvena buddhi saṃnihitam śatrum parāmṛśati asau iti
asat bhavet naśyet
uktam artha nigamayati yaḥ evam etat iti

atas tad upāsanāt satyaḥ iti arthaḥ
tat yat tat satyam kim atau
atra api tad padābhyām rūpa prakāraiḥ parāmṛṣṭau

original: kasmiṃnnālambane tadupāsanīyamityata uttaram-sa ādityo ya eṣa ityādinā tasyopaniṣadaharahamiti /
analyzed: kasmin ālambane tat upāsanīyam iti atas uttaram saḥ ādityaḥ yaḥ eṣaḥ ityādinā tasya upaniṣad ahar aham iti

original: hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ca ya evaṃ vedetyantena /
analyzed: hanti pāpmānam jahāti ca yaḥ evam veda ityantena
upaniṣad rahasyam nāma
tasya nirvacanam hanti pāpmānam jahāti ca iti
hanteḥ jahāteḥ vā rūpam etat
tathā ca nirvacanam kurvan phalam pāpa hānim āha iti
tam imam viṣayam āha bhāṣyakāraḥ
yaḥ vai ha etam iti
sa nāma akṣara upāsanām iti

original: tathāca śrutiḥ-'tadetadakṣaraṃ satyamiti sa ityekamakṣaraṃ tītyekamakṣaraṃ yamityekamakṣaraṃ
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ tat etat akṣaram satyam iti saḥ iti ekam akṣaram ti iti ekam akṣaram yam iti ekam akṣaram

original: prathamottame akṣare satyaṃ madhyato 'nṛtaṃ tadetadanṛmubhayataḥ satyena parigṛhītaṃ
analyzed: prathama uttame akṣare satyam madhyatas tat etat anṛm ubhayatas satyena parigṛhītam
satya bhūyam eva bhavati na evaṃvidvāṃsam anṛtam hinasti iti
tītīkāra anubandhaḥ uccāraṇa arthaḥ
niranubandhaḥ takāraḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: atra hi prathamottame akṣare satyaṃ mṛtyurūpābhāvāt /
analyzed: atra hi prathama uttame akṣare satyam mṛtyu rūpa abhāvāt
madhyatas madhye nṛtam anṛtam hi mṛtyuḥ
mṛtyu anṛtayoḥ takāra sāmyāt
tat etat anṛtam mṛtyu rūpam ubhayatas satyena parigṛhītam
antar bhāvitam satya rūpābhyām
atas kiñcitkaram tat satya bhūyam eva satya bāhulyam eva bhavati
śeṣam atirohita artham
sā iyam satya vidyāyāḥ sa nāmā akṣaya upāsana tā

original: yadyapi tadyatsatyamiti prakṛtānukarṣeṇābedaḥ pratīyate tathāpi phalabhedena bhedaḥ
analyzed: yadi api tat yat satyam iti prakṛta anukarṣeṇa a bedaḥ pratīyate tathā api phala bhedena bhedaḥ
sādhya bhedena iva nitya kāmya diṣayoḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta yāvajjīvam

original: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti śāstrayoḥ satyapyanubandhābhede bheda iti prāpte pratyucyate-ekaiveyaṃ
analyzed: darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti śāstrayoḥ sati api anubandha abhede bhedaḥ iti prāpte pratyucyate ekā eva iyam
vidyā tat satyam iti prakṛta parāmarśāt abhedena pratyabhijñānāt
na ca phala bhedaḥ

original: tasyopaniṣadaharahamiti tasyaiva yadaṅgāntaraṃ rahasyanāmnopāsanaṃ tatpraśaṃsārthor'thavādo 'yaṃ na phalavidhiḥ /
analyzed: tasya upaniṣad ahar aham iti tasya eva yat aṅga antaram rahasya nāmnā upāsanam tad praśaṃsā arthaḥ ūrthavādaḥ yam na phala vidhiḥ
yadi punar vidyā vidhau adhikāra śravaṇa abhāvāt tad kalpanāyām ārthavādikam phalam kalpyeta
tatas jātā iṣṭau iva agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tayā saṃvalita adhikāra kalpanā tatas ca samasta artha vādika phala yuktam ekam eva upāsanam iti siddham
parakīyam vyākhyānam upanyasyati
kecid punar iti
vājasaneyakam api akṣi āditya viṣayam chāndogyam api iti upāsya abhedāt abhedaḥ

original: tataśca vājasaneyoktānāṃ satyādīnāmupasaṃhāra ityatrārthe saiva hi satyādaya iti sūtraṃ vyākhyātaṃ tadetaddūṣayati-
analyzed: tatas ca vājasaneya uktānām satya ādīnām upasaṃhāraḥ iti atra arthe sā eva hi satya ādayaḥ iti sūtram vyākhyātam tat etat dūṣayati
tat na sādhu iti
jyotiṣṭoma karma saṃbandhinī iyam udgītha vyapāśrayā iti
anubandha abhede pi sādhya bhedāt bhedaḥ iti vidyā bhedāt anupasaṃhāraḥ iti
kāma ādi itaratra tatra ca āyatana ādibhyaḥ
chāndogya vājasaneya vidyayoḥ yadi api sa guṇa nirguṇa tvena bhedaḥ

original: tathāhi chāndogye-'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajanti etāṃśca satyānkāmān' ityātmavatkāmānāmapi vedyatvaṃ śrūyate /
analyzed: tathā hi chāndogye atha ye iha ātmānam anuvidya vrajanti etān ca satyān kāmān iti ātma vat kāmānām api vedya tvam śrūyate

original: vājasaneye tu nirguṇameva paraṃ brahmopadiśyate 'vimokṣāya brūhi' iti tathāpi tayoḥ parasparaguṇopasaṃhāraḥ /
analyzed: vājasaneye tu nirguṇam eva param brahma upadiśyate vimokṣāya brūhi iti tathā api tayoḥ paraspara guṇa upasaṃhāraḥ
nirguṇāyām tāvat vidyāyām brahma stuti artham eva saguṇa vidyā saṃbandhi guṇa upasaṃhāraḥ saṃbhavī
saguṇāyām ca yadi api ādhyānāya na vaśitva ādi guṇa upasaṃhāra saṃbhavaḥ

original: nahi nirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmādhāyātavyatvenaite coditā yenātrādhyeyatvena saṃbadhyerannapi tu satyakāmādiguṇanāntarīyakatvenaiteṣāṃ prāptirityupasaṃhāra  #
analyzed: nahi nirguṇāyām vidyāyām ādhā āyātavya tvena ete coditāḥ yena atra adhyeya tvena saṃbadhyeran api tu satya kāma ādi guṇa nāntarīyaka tvena eteṣām prāptiḥ iti upasaṃhāra
ucyate

original: evaṃ vyavasthita eṣa saṃkṣepo 'dhikaraṇārthasya-sāmyabāhulye 'pyekatrākāśādhāratvasyāparatra cākāśatādātmyasya śravaṇādbhede vidyayorna parasparaguṇopasaṃhāra  #
analyzed: evam vyavasthitaḥ eṣa saṃkṣepaḥ dhikaraṇa arthasya sāmya bāhulye pi ekatra ākāśa ādhāra tvasya aparatra ca ākāśa tādātmyasya śravaṇāt bhede vidyayoḥ na paraspara guṇa upasaṃhāra
iti pūrvapakṣaḥ

original: rāddhāntastu sarvasāmyamevobhayatrāpyātmopadeśādākāśaśabdenaikatrātmokto 'nyatra ca daharākāśādhāraḥ sa evokta iti sarvasāmyādbrahmaṇyubhayatrāpi  #
analyzed: rāddhāntaḥ tu sarva sāmyam eva ubhayatra api ātma upadeśāt ākāśa śabdena ekatra ātmā uktaḥ nyatra ca daharākāśa ādhāraḥ saḥ eva uktaḥ iti sarva sāmyāt brahmaṇi ubhayatra api
sarva guṇa upasaṃhāraḥ
sa guṇa nirguṇa tvena tu vidyā bhede guṇa upasaṃhāra vyavasthā darśitā
tasmāt sarvam avadātam  /
ā t āra da lopaḥ
asti vaiśvānara vidyāyām tad upāsakasya atithibhyaḥ pūrva bhojanam

original: tena yadyapīyamupāsanāgocarā na cintā sākṣāttathāpi tatsaṃbaddhaprathamabhojanasaṃbandhādasti saṃgatiḥ /
analyzed: tena yadi api iyam upāsanā gocarā na cintā sākṣāt tathā api tad saṃbaddha prathama bhojana saṃbandhāt asti saṃgatiḥ
vicāra gocaram darśayati
chāndogye vaiśvānara vidyām prakṛtyā iti
vicāra prayojakam saṃdeham āha
kim bhojana lope iti
atra pūrvapakṣa abhāvena saṃśayam ākṣipati
tat yat bhaktam iti bhakta āgamana saṃyoga śravaṇāt iti

original: uktaṃ khalvetatprathama eva tantre 'padakarmāprayojakaṃ nayanasya parārthatvāt' ityanena /
analyzed: uktam khalu etat prathame eva tantre pada karma aprayojakam nayanasya parārtha tvāt iti anena
yathā soma kraya artha ānīyamāna ekahāyanī saptama pada pāṃśu grahaṇam aprayojakam na punar ekahāyanyāḥ nayanam prayojayati
tat kasya hetoḥ
soma krayeṇa tad nayanasya prayukta tvāt tad upajīvi tvāt saptama pada pāṃśu grahaṇasya iti

original: tathehāpi bhojanārthabhaktāgamanasaṃyogātprāṇāhuterbhojanābhāve bhaktaṃ pratyaprayojakatvamiti nāsti pūrvapakṣa ityapūrvapakṣamidamadhikaraṇamityarthaḥ
analyzed: tathā iha api bhojana artha bhakta āgamana saṃyogāt prāṇa āhuteḥ bhojana abhāve bhaktam prati aprayojaka tvam iti na asti pūrvapakṣaḥ iti apūrvapakṣam idam adhikaraṇam iti arthaḥ
pūrvapakṣam ākṣipya samādhatte
evam prāpte
na lupyeta iti tāvat āha
