pṛcchati
kasmāt
uttaram ādarāt
tat eva sphorayati
tathā hi iti
jābālāḥ hi śrāvayanti pūrvaḥ tithibhyaḥ śrīyāt iti
aśrīyāt iti ca prāṇa agnihotra pradhānam vacaḥ
yathā hi śrudhitāḥ bālāḥ mātaram paryupāsate

original: evaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyagnihotramupāsate' iti vacanādagnihotrasyātithīnbhūtāni pratyupajīvyatvena śravaṇāttadekavākyatayehāpi pūrvo 'tithibhyo  #
analyzed: evam sarvāṇi bhūtāni agnihotram upāsate iti vacanāt agnihotrasya atithīn bhūtāni pratyupajīvya tvena śravaṇāt tad ekavākyatayā iha api
śrīyāt iti prāṇa āhuti pradhānam lakṣyate

original: tadevaṃ sati 'yathāha vai svayamahutvāgnihotraṃ parasya juhuyādityevaṃ tat' ityatithibhojanasya prāthamyaṃ ninditvā
analyzed: tat evam sati yathā āha vai svayam a hutvā agnihotram parasya juhuyāt iti evam tat iti atithi bhojanasya prāthamyam ninditvā

original: svāmibhojanaṃsvāminaḥ prāṇāgnihotraṃ prathamaṃ prāpayantī prāṇāgnihotrādaraṃ karoti /
analyzed: svāmi bhojanam svāminaḥ prāṇa agnihotram prathamam prāpayantī prāṇa agnihotra ādaram karoti

original: nanvātithitāmeṣā śrutiḥ prāṇahutiṃ kintu svāmibhojanapakṣa eva nābhojane 'pītyata āha-
analyzed: nanu ātithi tām eṣā śrutiḥ prāṇa hutim kintu svāmi bhojana pakṣe eva na abhojane pi iti atas āha

original: yā hi na prāthamyalopaṃ sahate natarāṃ sā prāthamyavato 'gnihotrasya lopaṃ saheteti manyate /
analyzed: yā hi na prāthamya lopam sahate natarām sā prāthamyavataḥ gnihotrasya lopam saheta iti manyate

original: īdṛśaḥ khalvayamādaraḥ prāṇāgnihotrasya dharmiṇaḥ prāthamyadharmalopamapi na sahate śrutistadāsyāḥ kaiva kathā dharmilopaṃ sahata ityarthaḥ
analyzed: īdṛśaḥ khalu ayam ādaraḥ prāṇa agnihotrasya dharmiṇaḥ prāthamya dharma lopam api na sahate śrutiḥ tadā asyāḥ kā eva kathā dharmi lopam sahate iti arthaḥ
pūrvapakṣa ākṣepam anubhāṣya dūṣayati
nanu bhojana arthāḥ iti
yathā hi kauṇḍapāyi nāmayana gate agnihotre prakaraṇa antarāt naiyamika agnihotrāt bhinne
dravya devatā rūpa dharma antara rahita tayā tad ākāṅkṣe sādhya sādṛśyena naiyamika agnihotra samāna nāma tayā
tad dharma atideśena rūpa dharma antara prāptiḥ evam prāṇa agnihotre pi naiyamika agnihotra gata payaḥ prabhṛti prāptau
bhojana āgata bhakta dravya tā vidhīyate
na ca etāvatā bhojanasya prayojaka tvam
uktam etat yathā bhojana kāla atikramāt prāṇa agnihotrasya na bhojana prayukta tvam iti
na ca eka deśa dravya tayā uttara ardhāt sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati iti vat aprayojaka tvam eka deśa dravya sādhanasya api prayojaka tvāt

original: yathā jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayantīti patnīsaṃyājānāṃ jāghanyekadeśadravyajuṣāṃ jāghanīprayojakatvam /
analyzed: yathā jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayanti iti patnīsaṃyājānām jāghanī eka deśa dravya juṣām jāghanī prayojaka tvam

original: sa hi nāmāprayojako bhavati yasya prayojakagrahaṇamantareṇārtho na jñāyate /
analyzed: sa hi nāma aprayojakaḥ bhavati yasya prayojaka grahaṇam antareṇa arthaḥ na jñāyate
yathā na prayojaka puroḍāśa grahaṇam antareṇa uttara ardham jñātum śakyam
śakyam tu jāghanī vat bhaktam jñātum

original: tasmādyathā jāghanyantareṇāpi paśūpādānaṃ paraprayuktaśūpajīvanaṃ vā khaṇḍaśo māṃsavikrayiṇo muṇḍādivadākṛtirūpādīyate /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā jāghanī antareṇa api paśu upādānam para prayukta śūpa jīvanam vā khaṇḍaśas māṃsa vikrayiṇaḥ muṇḍa ādi vat ākṛtiḥ upādīyate
evam bhaktam api śakyam upādātum

original: tasmānna bhojanasya lope prāṇāgnihotralopa iti manyate pūrvapakṣī /
analyzed: tasmāt na bhojanasya lope prāṇa agnihotra lopaḥ iti manyate pūrvapakṣī
adbhiḥ iti tu pratinidhi upādānam āvaśyaka tva sūcana artham bhāṣyakārasya
upasthite taḥ tad vacanāt

original: taddhomīyamiti hi vacana kimapi saṃnihitadravyaṃ home viniyuṅkte tadaḥ sarvanāmnaḥ
analyzed: tat homīyam iti hi kim api saṃnihita dravyam home viniyuṅkte tadaḥ sarvanāmnaḥ
saṃnihita avagamam antareṇa abhidhāna aparyavasānāt tat anena sva abhidhāna paryavasānāya tat yat bhaktam
prathamam āgacchet iti saṃnihitam apekṣya nirvartitavyam

original: tacca saṃnihitaṃ bhaktaṃ bhojanārthamityuttarārdhātsviṣṭakṛte samavadyatītivanna bhaktaṃ vāpo vā dravyāntaraṃ vā prayoktumarhati /
analyzed: tat ca saṃnihitam bhaktam bhojana artham iti uttara ardhāt sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati itivat na bhaktam vā apaḥ vā dravya antaram vā prayoktum arhati

original: jāghanyāstvavayavabhedasya nāgnīṣomīyapaśvadhīnaṃ nirūpaṇaṃ svatantrasyāpi tasya sūnāsthasya darśanāttasmādastyetasya jāghanīto viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: jāghanyāḥ tu avayava bhedasya na agnīṣomīya paśu adhīnam nirūpaṇam svatantrasya api tasya sūnā sthasya darśanāt tasmāt asti etasya jāghanītaḥ viśeṣaḥ
yat ca uktam ca udaka prāpta dravya bādhayā bhakta dravya vidhānam iti
tat ayuktam

original: vidhyuddeśagatasyāgnihotranāmnastathābhāvādārthavādikasya tu siddhaṃ kiñcitsādṛśyamupādāya stāvakatvenopapatterna tadbhāvaṃ vidhātumarhatītyāha-
analyzed: vidhi uddeśa gatasya agnihotra nāmnaḥ tathā bhāvāt ārthavādikasya tu siddham kiñcid sādṛśyam upādāya stāvaka tvena upapatteḥ na tad bhāvam vidhātum arhati iti āha
na ca atra prākṛta agnihotra dharma prāptiḥ iti

original: api cāgnihotrasya codakato dharmaprāptāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ bahutaraṃ prāptaṃ bādhyate /
analyzed: api ca agnihotrasya codakataḥ dharma prāptau abhyupagamyamānāyām bahutaram prāptam bādhyate
na ca saṃbhave bādha nicayaḥ nyāpyaḥ
kṛṣṇala carau khalu agatyā prāpta bādhaḥ bhyupeyate iti āha tad dharma prāptau ca abhyupagamyamānāyām iti
codaka abhāvam upodbalayati
atas eva ca iha api iti
yatas eva uktena krameṇa atideśa abhāvaḥ te eva sāṃpādika tvam agnihotra aṅgānām
tad prāptau tu sāṃpādika tvam na upapadyeta
kāminyām kila kuca vadana ādi asatā cakravāka nalina ādi rūpeṇa saṃpādyate

original: na tu nadyāṃ cakravākādaya eva cakravākādinā saṃpādyante /
analyzed: na tu nadyām cakravāka ādayaḥ eva cakravāka ādinā saṃpādyante
atas pi avagacchāmaḥ na ca udaka prāptiḥ iti
yat tu ādara darśanam iti tat bhojana pakṣe prāthamya vidhāna artham

original: yasminpakṣe dharmānavalopastasmindharmiṇo 'pi na tvetāvatā dharminityatā sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yasmin pakṣe dharma anavalopaḥ tasmin dharmiṇaḥ na tu etāvatā dharmi nitya tā sidhyati iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanvatithibhojanottarakālatā svāmibhojanasya vihiteti kathamasau bādhyata ityata āha-
analyzed: nanu atithi bhojana uttara kāla tā svāmi bhojanasya vihitā iti katham asau bādhyate iti atas āha
na asti vacanasya atibhāraḥ
sāmānya śāstra bādhāyām viśeṣa śāstrasya atibhāraḥ na asti iti arthaḥ
tad nirdhāraṇa aniyamaḥ tad dṛṣṭeḥ pṛthak dhī apratibandhaḥ phalam

original: yathaiva 'yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇoti' ityetadanārabhyādhītamavyabhicāritakratusaṃbandhaṃ
analyzed: yathā eva yasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati na sa pāpam ślokam śṛṇoti iti etat an ārabhya adhītam avyabhicārita kratu saṃbandham
juhū dvārā kratu prayoga vacana gṛhītam kratatu artham sat phala anapekṣam siddha vartamāna apadeśa pratītam
na rātri satra vat phala tayā svīkaroti iti
evam avyabhicārita karma saṃbandha udgītha gatam upāsanam karma prayoga vacana gṛhītam na siddha vartamāna apadeśa avagata samasta kāma vāpaka tva lakṣaṇa phala kalpanāya alam
parārtha tvāt
tathā ca pāramartha tvāt

original: tathāca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram-'dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvātphalaśrutirarthavādaḥ syāt' iti /
analyzed: tathā ca pāramarṣam sūtram dravya saṃskāra karmasu para artha tvāt phala śrutiḥ artha vādaḥ syāt iti

original: evañca sati kratau parṇatāniyamavadupāsanāniyama iti prāpte ucyate-yuktaṃ parṇatāyāṃ phalaśruterarthavādamātratvam /
analyzed: evam ca sati kratau parṇa tā niyama vat upāsana aniyamaḥ iti prāpte ucyate yuktam parṇa tāyām phala śruteḥ arthavāda mātra tvam
nahi parṇa tā anāśrayā yāga ādi vat phala saṃbandham anubhavitum arhati
a vyāpāra rūpa tvāt
vyāpārasya eva ca phalavat tvāt
yathā āhuḥ utpattimataḥ phala darśanāt iti

original: nāpi svādiratāyāmiva prakṛtakratusaṃbaddho yūpa āśrayastadāśrayaḥ prakṛto 'sti anārabhyādhītatvātparṇatāyāḥ /
analyzed: na api svādira tāyām iva prakṛta kratu saṃbaddhaḥ yūpaḥ āśrayaḥ tad āśrayaḥ sti an ārabhya adhīta tvāt parṇa tāyāḥ
tasmāt vākyena eva juhū saṃbandha dlāreṇa parṇa tāyāḥ kratuḥ āśrayaḥ jñāpanīyaḥ

original: na cātatparaṃ vākyaṃ jñāpayitumarhatīti tatra vākyatātparyamavaśyāśrayaṇīyam /
analyzed: na ca atatparam vākyam jñāpayitum arhati iti tatra vākya tātparyam avaśya āśrayaṇīyam

original: tathāca tatparaṃ sanna parṇatāyāḥ phalasaṃbandhamapi gamayitumarhati /
analyzed: tathā ca tat param sat na parṇa tāyāḥ phala saṃbandham api gamayitum arhati
vākya bheda prasaṅgāt

original: upāsanānāṃ tu vyāpārātmatvena svata eva phalasaṃbandhopapatteḥ udgīthādyāśrayaṇaṃ phale vidhānaṃ na virudhyate viśiṣṭavidhānāt /
analyzed: upāsanānām tu vyāpāra ātma tvena svatas eva phala saṃbandha upapatteḥ udgītha ādi āśrayaṇam phale vidhānam na virudhyate viśiṣṭa vidhānāt
phalāya khalu udgītha sādhanakam upāsanam vidhīyamānam na vākya bhedam āvahati
nanu karma aṅga udgītha saṃskāraḥ upāsanam prokṣaṇa ādi vā dvitīyā śruteḥ udgītham iti
tathā ca añjana ādiṣu iva saṃskāreṣu phala śruteḥ arthavāda tvam
mā evam
na hi atra udgīthasya upāsanam kintu tad avayavasya oṅkārasya iti uktam adhastāt
na ca oṅkāraḥ karma aṅgam api tu karma aṅga udgītha avayavaḥ
na ca anupayogam īpsitam
tasmāt saktūn juhoti iti vat viniyoga bhaṅgena uṅkāra sādhānāt upāsanāt phalam iti saṃbandhaḥ

original: tasmādyathā kratvāśrayāṇyapi godohanādīni phalasaṃyogādanityāni evamudgīthādyupāsanānīti draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt yathā kratu āśrayāṇi api godohana ādīni phala saṃyogāt anityāni evam udgītha ādi upāsanāni iti draṣṭavyam
śeṣam uktam bhāṣye
na ca idam phala śravaṇam arthavāda mātram iti
arthavāda mātra tve tyanta parokṣā vṛttiḥ yathā na tathā phala para tve
na tu vartamāna apadeśāt sākṣāt phala pratītiḥ
atas eva prayāja ādiṣu na arthavādāt vartamāna apadeśāt phala kalpanā

original: phalaparatve tvasya na śakyaṃ prayājādīnāṃ pārārthyenāphalatvaṃ vaktumiti //42 // 3.3.28.43.
analyzed: phala paratve tu asya na śakyam prayāja ādīnām pārārthyena aphalatvam vaktum iti
pradāna vat eva tat uktam

original: tattacchutyarthālocanayā vāyuprāṇayoḥ svarūpābhede siddhe tadadhīnanirūpaṇatayā tadviṣayopāsanāpyabhinnā na cādhyātmādhidaivaguṇabhedādbhedaḥ
analyzed: tad tad śuti artha ālocanayā vāyu prāṇayoḥ svarūpa abhede siddhe tad adhīna nirūpaṇa tayā tad viṣaya upāsanā api abhinnā na ca adhyātma adhidaiva guṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ
na hi guṇa bhede guṇavataḥ bhedaḥ
na hi agnihotram juhoti iti utpannasya agnihotrasya taṇḍula ādi guṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ bhavati
utpadyamāna karma saṃyuktaḥ hi guṇa bhedaḥ karmaṇaḥ bhedakaḥ
yathā āmikṣā vājina saṃyuktayoḥ karmaṇoḥ
na utpanna karma saṃyuktaḥ
adhyātma adhidaiva upadeśeṣu ca utpanna upāsanā saṃyogaḥ
tathā upakrama upasaṃhāra ālocanayā vidyā eka tva viniścayāt ekā eva sakṛt pravṛttiḥ iti pūrvapakṣaḥ
rāddhāntaḥ tu satyam vidyā eka tvam tathā api guṇa bhedāt pravṛtti bhedaḥ
sāyam prātar kāla guṇa bhedāt yathā ekasmin api agnihotre pravṛtti bhedaḥ evam iha api adhyātma adhidaiva guṇa bhedāt upāsanasya ekasya api pravṛtti bhedaḥ iti siddham
ādhyāna arthaḥ
hi ayam adhyātma adhidaiva vibhāga upadeśaḥ iti
agnihotrasya iva adhyānasya kṛte tadhi taṇḍula ādi vat ayam pṛthak upadeśaḥ
etena vrata upadeśaḥ iti
etena tattva abhedena
eva kāraḥ ca vāc ādi vrata nirākaraṇa arthaḥ

original: nanvetasyai devatāyai iti devatāmātraṃ śrūyate na tu vāyustatkathaṃ vāyuprāptimāhetyata āha-
analyzed: nanu etasyai devatāyai iti devatā mātram śrūyate na tu vāyuḥ tat katham vāyu prāptim āha iti atas āha
devatā iti atra vāyuḥ iti

original: vāyuḥ khalvagnyādīnsaṃvṛṇuta ityagnyādīnapekṣyānavacchinno 'gnyādayastutenaivāvacchinnā iti saṃvargaguṇatayā vāyuranavacchinnā devatā /
analyzed: vāyuḥ khalu agni ādīn saṃvṛṇute iti agni ādīn apekṣya anavacchinnaḥ gni ādayaḥ tu tena eva avacchinnāḥ iti saṃvarga guṇa tayā vāyuḥ anavacchinnā devatā
sarveṣām abhigamayan iti

original: militānāṃ śravaṇāviśeṣādindrasya devatāyā abhedātrayāṇāmapi puroḍāśānāṃ sahapradānāśaṅkāyāmutpattivākya
analyzed: militānām śravaṇa aviśeṣāt indrasya devatāyāḥ abhedāt trayāṇām api puroḍāśānām saha pradāna āśaṅkāyām utpatti vākya
eva rāja adhirāja sva rāja guṇa bhedāt yājyā anuvākyā vyatyāsa vidhānāt ca yathānyāsam eva devatā pṛthaktvāt pradāna pṛthaktvam bhavati
saha pradāne hi vyatyāsa vidhānam anupapannam
kramavati pradāne vyatyāsa vidhiḥ arthavān
tathāvidhasya eva kramasya vivakṣita tvāt
sugamam anyat  /
liṅga bhūyaḥ tvāt tat hi balīyaḥ tat api
iha siddhāntena upakramasya pūrvapakṣayitvā siddhāntayati

original: tatra yadyapi bhūyāṃsi santi liṅgāni manaścidādīnāṃ svātantryasūcakāni tathāpi na tāni svātantryeṇa svātantryaṃ prati prāpakāṇi /
analyzed: tatra yadi api bhūyāṃsi santi liṅgāni manaḥ cit ādīnām svātantrya sūcakāni tathā api na tāni svātantryeṇa svātantryam prati prāpakāṇi
pramāṇa prāpitam tu svātantryam upodbalayanti
na ca atra asti svātantrya prāpakam pramāṇam

original: na cedaṃ sāmarthyalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ yenāsya svātantryeṇa prāpakaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: na ca idam sāmarthya lakṣaṇam liṅgam yena asya svātantryeṇa prāpakam bhavet
tat hi sāmarthyam ā abhidhānasya vā arthasya vā syāt
tathā pūṣa ādi anumantraṇa mantrasya pūṣa anumantraṇe

original: yathā vā 'paśunā yajeta' ityekatvasaṃkhyāyā arthasya saṃkhyeyāvacchetasāmarthyam /
analyzed: yathā vā paśunā yajeta iti eka tva saṃkhyāyāḥ arthasya saṃkhyeya avaccheta sāmarthyam
na ced anamanyasya artha darśana lakṣaṇam liṅgam tathā
stuti artha tvena asya vidhi uddeśena ekavākyatayā vidhi paratvāt

original: tasmādasati sāmarthyalakṣaṇe viroddhari prakaraṇapratyūhaṃ manaścidādīnāṃ kriyāśeṣatāmavagamayati /
analyzed: tasmāt asati sāmarthya lakṣaṇe viroddhari prakaraṇa pratyūham manaḥ cit ādīnām kriyā śeṣa tām avagamayati

original: naca te haite vidyācita evetyavadhāraṇaśrutiḥ kriyānupraveśaṃ vārayati /
analyzed: na ca te ha ete vidyā citaḥ eva iti avadhāraṇa śrutiḥ kriyā anupraveśam vārayati

original: yena śrutivirodhe sati na prakaraṇaṃ bhavet,
analyzed: yena śruti virodhe sati na prakaraṇam bhavet
bāhya sādhana tā apākaraṇa ārtha tvāt avadhāraṇasya

original: naca vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavantīti puruṣasaṃbandhamāpādayadvākyaṃ prakaraṇamapabādhitumarhati /
analyzed: na ca vidyayā ha eva ete evaṃvidaḥ citāḥ bhavanti iti puruṣa saṃbandham āpādayat vākyam prakaraṇam apabādhitum arhati
anya artha darśanam khalu etat api
na ca tat svātantryeṇa prāpakam iti uktam

original: tasmāttadapi na prakaraṇavirodhāyālamiti sāṃpādikā apyete agnayaḥ prakaraṇātkriyānupraveśina eva mānasavat /
analyzed: tasmāt tat api na prakaraṇa virodhāya alam iti sāṃpādikāḥ api ete agnayaḥ prakaraṇāt kriyā anupraveśinaḥ eva mānasa vat

original: dvādaśāhe tu śrūyate-'anayā tvā pātreṇa samudraṃ rasayā prājāpatyaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhṇāmi' iti /
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe tu śrūyate anayā tvā pātreṇa samudram rasayā prājāpatyam manaḥ graham gṛhṇāmi iti

original: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ mānasaṃ dvādaśāhā daharantamuta tanmadhyapātino daśamasyāhnāṅgamiti /
analyzed: tatra saṃśayaḥ kim mānasam dvādaśa ahāḥ dahar antam uta tad madhya pātinaḥ daśamasya ahnā aṅgam iti

original: tatra vāgvai dvādaśāho mano mānasamiti mānasasya dvādaśāhādbhedena vyapadeśādvāṅmanasabhedavadbhedaḥ /
analyzed: tatra vāc vai dvādaśa ahaḥ manaḥ mānasam iti mānasasya dvādaśa ahāt bhedena vyapadeśāt vāc manasa bheda vat bhedaḥ

original: nirdhūtāni dvādaśāhasya gatarasāni chandāṃsi tāni mānasenaivāpyāyantīti ca dvādaśāhasya
analyzed: nirdhūtāni dvādaśa ahasya gata rasāni chandāṃsi tāni mānasena eva āpyāyanti iti ca dvādaśa ahasya

original: mānasena stūyamānatvādbhede ca sati stutistutyabhāvasyopapatterdvādaśāhādaharantaraṃ na tadaṅgaṃ,
analyzed: mānasena stūyamāna tvāt bhede ca sati stuti stutya bhāvasya upapatteḥ dvādaśa ahāt ahar antaram na tat aṅgam

original: patnīsaṃyājāntatvāccāhnāṃ patnīḥ saṃyājya mānasāya prasarpantīti ca mānasasya patnīsaṃyājasya parastācchuteḥ /
analyzed: patnīsaṃyāja anta tvāt ca ahnām patnīḥ saṃyājya mānasāya prasarpanti iti ca mānasasya patnīsaṃyājasya parastāt śuteḥ
trayodaśa ahe pi avayujya dvādaśa saṃkhyā samavāyāt kathañcid jaghanyayā api vṛttyā dvādaśa aha saṃjñā virodha abhāvāt iti

original: prāpte 'bhidhīyate-pramāṇāntareṇa hi trayodaśatve 'hnāṃ siddhe dvādaśāha iti jaghanyayā vṛttyonnīyeta /
analyzed: prāpte bhidhīyate pramāṇa antareṇa hi trayodaśa tve hnām siddhe dvādaśa ahaḥ iti jaghanyayā vṛttyā unnīyeta
na tu asti tādṛśam pramāṇa antaram
na ca vyapadeśa bhedaḥ hara antara tvam kalpayitum arhati
aṅga aṅgi bhedena api tad upapatteḥ
atas eva ca stutya stāvaka bhāvasya api upapattiḥ
devadattasya iva dīrghaiḥ keśaiḥ

original: patnīsaṃyājāntatā tu yadyapyautsargikī tathāpi daśamasyāhno viśeṣavacanānmānasāni grahaṇāsādanahavanādīni patnīsaṃyājātparāñci bhaviṣyanti
analyzed: patnīsaṃyāja anta tā tu yadi api autsargikī tathā api daśamasya ahnaḥ viśeṣa vacanāt mānasāni grahaṇa āsādana havana ādīni patnīsaṃyājāt parāñci bhaviṣyanti
kim iva hi na kuryāt vacanam iti

original: eṣa vai daśamasyāhno visargo yanmānasamiti vacanāddaśamāharaṅgatā gamyate /
analyzed: eṣa vai daśamasya ahnaḥ visargaḥ yat mānasam iti vacanāt daśama ahar aṅga tā gamyate

original: visargo 'nto 'ntavato dharmo na svatantra iti daśame 'hani mānasāya pramarpantīti daśamasyāhna ādhāratvanirdeśācca tadaṅgaṃ mānasaṃ nāharantaramiti  #
analyzed: visargaḥ ntaḥ ntavataḥ dharmaḥ na svatantraḥ iti daśame hani mānasāya pramarpanti iti daśamasya ahnaḥ ādhāra tva nirdeśāt ca tad aṅgam mānasam na āhar antaram iti
siddham
tat iha dvādaśa aha saṃbandhinaḥ daśamasya ahnaḥ ṅgam mānasa mitim dharma mīmāṃsā sūtra kṛtā uktam
daśa rātra gasya api daśamasya ahnaḥ ṅgam iti bhagavan bhāṣyakāraḥ
śruti antara balena āha
yathā daśarātrasya daśame hani avivākyaḥ iti
avivākyaḥ iti daśamasya ahnaḥ nāma
atideśāt ca

original: nahi sāṃpādikānāmagnīnāmiṣṭakāsu citenāgninā kiñcidasti sādṛśyamanyatra kriyānupraveśāt /
analyzed: nahi sāṃpādikānām agnīnām iṣṭakāsu citena agninā kiñcid asti sādṛśyam anyatra kriyā anupraveśāt
tasmāt api na svatantraḥ iti prāpte bhidhīyate
vidyā eva tu nirdhāraṇāt

original: mā bhūdanyeṣāṃ śrutavidhyuddeśānāmanyārthadarśanānāmaprāptaprāpakatvameteṣu tvaśrutavidhāyuddeśeṣu 'vacanāni tvapūrvatvāt' iti nyāyādvidhirunnetavyaḥ
analyzed: mā bhūt anyeṣām śruta vidhi uddeśānām anya artha darśanānām aprāpta prāpaka tvam eteṣu tu aśruta vidhāyuddeśeṣu vacanāni tu apūrva tvāt iti nyāyāt vidhiḥ unnetavyaḥ

original: tathā caitebhyo yādṛśor'thaḥ pratīyate tadanurūpa eva sa bhavati /
analyzed: tathā ca etebhyaḥ yādṛśaḥ ṛthaḥ pratīyate tad anurūpaḥ eva sa bhavati

original: pratīyate caitebhyo manaścidādīnāṃ sāntatyaṃ cāvadhāraṇaṃ ca phalabhedasamanvayaśca puruṣasaṃbandhaśca /
analyzed: pratīyate ca etebhyaḥ manaḥ cit ādīnām sāntatyam ca avadhāraṇam ca phala bheda samanvayaḥ ca puruṣa saṃbandhaḥ ca

original: na cāsya godohanādivatkratvarthāśritatvaṃ yena puruṣārthasya karmapāratantryaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: na ca asya godohana ādi vat kratu artha āśrita tvam yena puruṣa arthasya karma pāratantryam bhavet
na ca vidyā citaḥ eva iti avadhāraṇam bāhya sādhana apākaraṇa artham
svabhāvataḥ eva vidyāyāḥ bāhya anupekṣa tva siddheḥ
tasmāt pariśeṣāt mānasa graha vat kriyā anupraveśa śaṅkā apākaraṇa artham avadhāraṇam
na ca evam artha tve saṃbhavati
dyotaka tva mātreṇa nipāta śrutiḥ pīḍanīyā
tasmāt śuti liṅga vākyāni prakaraṇam apodya svātantryam manaḥ cit ādīnām avagamayanti iti siddham
anubandha atideśa śruti ādibhyaḥ evam eva vijñeyam
te ca bhāṣye eva sphucāḥ

original: yaduktaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇā kratvaṅgatve pūrveṇeṣṭakācitena manaścidādīnāṃ vikalpa iti /
analyzed: yat uktam pūrvapakṣiṇā kratu aṅga tve pūrveṇa iṣṭakā citena manaḥ cit ādīnām vikalpaḥ iti
dūṣayati na ca sati eva kriyā saṃbandhaḥ iti

original: apica pūrvāparayorbhāgayorvidyāprādhānyadarśanāttanmadhyapātino 'pi tatsāmānyādvidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate na karmāṅgatvamityāha sūtreṇa-
analyzed: apica pūrva aparayoḥ bhāgayoḥ vidyā prādhānya darśanāt tad madhyapātinaḥ tad sāmānyāt vidyā pradhāna tvam eva lakṣyate na karma aṅga tvam iti āha sūtreṇa
pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyam bhūyaḥ tvāt tu anubandhaḥ
sphuṭam asya bhāṣyam

original: asti rājasūyaḥ 'rājā svārājyakāmo rājasūyena yajeta' iti /
analyzed: asti rājasūyaḥ rājā svārājya kāmaḥ rājasūyena yajeta iti
tam prakṛtyā āmananti aveṣṭim nāma iṣṭim
āgneyaḥ u ṣṭākapālaḥ hiraṇyam dakṣiṇā iti evamādi tām prakṛtyā ādhīyate

original: yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutiṃ hutvābhighārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ yadi rājanya aindramiti /
analyzed: yadi brāhmaṇaḥ yajeta bārhaspatyam madhye nidhāya āhutim hutvā abhighārayet yadi vaiśyaḥ vaiśvadevam yadi rājanyaḥ aindram iti

original: tatra saṃdihyate-kiṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ prāptānāṃ nimittārthena śravaṇamuta brāhmaṇādīnāmayaṃ yāgo vidhīyata iti /
analyzed: tatra saṃdihyate kim brāhmaṇa ādīnām prāptānām nimitta arthena śravaṇam uta brāhmaṇa ādīnām ayam yāgaḥ vidhīyate iti

original: tatra yadi prajāpālanakaṇṭakoddharaṇādi karma rājyaṃ tasya kartā rājeti rājaśabdasyārthastato rājā rājasūyena yajeteti rājyasya kartū rājasūye  #
analyzed: tatra yadi prajā pālana kaṇṭaka uddharaṇa ādi karma rājyam tasya kartā rājā iti rāja śabdasya arthaḥ tatas rājā rājasūyena yajeta iti rājyasya kartuḥ rājasūye
dhikāraḥ

original: tasmātsaṃbhavantyaviśiṣeṇa brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyā rājyasya kartāra iti siddhaṃ sarva evaite rājasūye prāptā iti 'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta' ityevamādayo  #
analyzed: tasmāt saṃbhavanti aviśiṣeṇa brāhmaṇa kṣatriya vaiśyāḥ rājyasya kartāraḥ iti siddham sarve eva ete rājasūye prāptāḥ iti yadi brāhmaṇaḥ yajeta iti evamādayaḥ
nimitta arthāḥ śrutayaḥ

original: atha tu rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti rājakartṛyogāttatkarma rājyaṃ tataḥ ko rājetyapekṣāyāmāryeṣu
analyzed: atha tu rājñaḥ karma rājyam iti rāja kartṛ yogāt tat karma rājyam tatas kaḥ rājā iti apekṣāyām āryeṣu
tad prasiddheḥ abhāvāt pika nema tāmarasa ādi śabda artha avadhāraṇāya mleccha prasiddhiḥ iva andhrāṇām

original: kṣatriyajātau rājaśabdaprasiddhistadavadhāraṇakāraṇamiti kṣatriya eva rājeti na brāhmaṇavaiśyayoḥ
analyzed: kṣatriya jātau rāja śabda prasiddhiḥ tad avadhāraṇa kāraṇam iti kṣatriyaḥ eva rājā iti na brāhmaṇa vaiśyayoḥ

original: prāptiriti rājasūyaprakaraṇaṃ bhittvā brāhmaṇādikartṛkāṇi pṛthageva karmāṇi prāpyanta
analyzed: prāptiḥ iti rājasūya prakaraṇam bhittvā brāhmaṇa ādi kartṛkāṇi pṛthak eva karmāṇi prāpyanta
iti na naimittikāni
tatra kim tāvat prāptam
naimittikāni iti
rājyasya kartā rājā iti āryāṇām āndhrāṇām ca avivādaḥ

original: tathāhi-brāhmaṇādiṣu prajāpālanakartṛṣu kanakadaṇḍātapatraśvetacāmarādilāñchaneṣu rājapadamāndhrāścāryāścāvivādaṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante /
analyzed: tathā hi brāhmaṇa ādiṣu prajā pālana kartṛṣu kanaka daṇḍa ātapatra śveta cāmara ādi lāñchaneṣu rāja padam āndhrāḥ ca āryāḥ ca avivādam prayuñjānāḥ dṛśyante
tena a vipratipatṛ vipratipattau api ārya āndhra prayogayoḥ yava varāha vat ārya prasiddheḥ āndhra prasiddhitaḥ balīyasī tvāt
balavat ārya prasiddhi virodhe tu a tad mūlāyāḥ pāṇinīya prasiddheḥ virodhe tu anapekṣam
syāt iti nyāyena bādhanāt tad anuguṇa tayā vā kathañcid na sva nakula ādi vat anvākhyānā mātra para tayā

original: nīyamānatvādrajyasya kartā rājeti siddhe nimittārthāḥ śrutayaḥ /
analyzed: nīyamāna tvāt rajyasya kartā rājā iti siddhe nimitta arthāḥ śrutayaḥ
tathā ca yadi śabdaḥ pya añjasaḥ syāt iti prāptam

original: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-'rūpato na viśeṣo 'sti hyāryamlecchaprayogayoḥ /
analyzed: evam prāptaḥ ucyate rūpataḥ na viśeṣaḥ sti hi ārya mleccha prayogayoḥ
vaidikāt vākya śeṣāt tu viśeṣaḥ tatra darśitaḥ

original: tadiha rājaśabdasya karmayogādvā kartari prayogaḥ kartṛprayogādvā karmaṇīti viśaye
analyzed: tat iha rāja śabdasya karma yogāt vā kartari prayogaḥ kartṛ prayogāt vā karmaṇi iti viśaye
vaidika vākya śeṣa vat abhiyuktatarasya atrabhavataḥ pāṇineḥ smṛteḥ nirṇāyate prasiddhiḥ āndhraṇām anādiḥ ādimatī
cāryāṇām prasiddhiḥ go gāvī ādi śabda vat
na ca saṃbhāvita ādimat bhāvā prasiddhiḥ pāṇi nimsṛtim apodyāna ādi prasiddhim ādimatīm kartum at sahate
gāvi ādi śabda prasiddheḥ anādi tvena gavādi pada prasiddheḥ api ādimat tva āpatteḥ
tasmāt pāṇinīya smṛti anumata andhra prasiddhi balīyaḥ tvena kṣatriya tva jātau rāja śabde mukhye

original: tatkartaryatajjātau rājaśabdo gauṇa iti kṣatriyasyaivākārādrājasūye tatprakaraṇamapodyāveṣṭerutkarṣaḥ /

atas eva āhuḥ yadi śabda parityāgaḥ ruci adhyahāra kalpanā iti

original: na jātu dadhisamānādhikaraṇāni madhurādīni kuṇḍasyaikādhikaraṇyamanubhavanti sitaṃ madhuraṃ kuṇḍamiti /

original: nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyo jāyate kuto bhavānanumānādīnāmaprāmāṇyamavadhāritavāniti /
analyzed: na apratyakṣam pramāṇam iti bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ jāyate kutas bhavān anumāna ādīnām aprāmāṇyam avadhāritavān iti
pratyakṣam hi liṅga ādi rūpa mātra grāhi na aprāmāṇyam eṣām viniścetum arhati
nahi dhūma jñānam iva eṣām indriya artha sannikarṣāt aprāmāṇya jñānam udetum arhati
kintu deśa kāla avasthā rūpa bhedena
na ca etāvān pratyakṣasya vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavati
yathā āhuḥ nahi idam iyataḥ vyāpārān kartum samartham saṃnihita viṣaya balena utpatteḥ avicāraka tvāt iti
tasmāt asmin an icchatā api pramāṇa antaram abhyupeyam
api ca pratipannam pumāṃsam apahāya apratipanna saṃdigdhāḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ pratipādyante
na ca eṣām itthaṃbhāvaḥ bhavat pratyakṣa gocaraḥ
na khalu ete gaura tva ādi vat pratyakṣa gocarāḥ kintu vacana ceṣṭā ādi liṅga anumeyāḥ

original: naca liṅgaṃ pramāṇaṃ yata ete sidhyanti /
analyzed: na ca liṅgam pramāṇam yatas ete sidhyanti

original: na puṃsāmitthaṃbhāvamavijñāya yaṃ kañcana puruṣaṃ pratipipātayiṣato 'navadheyavacanasya prekṣāvattā nāma /
analyzed: na puṃsām itthaṃbhāvam a vijñāya yam kañcana puruṣam pratipipātayiṣataḥ navadheya vacanasya prekṣāvat tā nāma

original: apica paśavo 'pi hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthinaḥ komalaśaṣpaśyāmalāyāṃ bhuvi pravartante /

pariharanti ca āśyāna tṛṇa kaṇṭaka ākīrṇām
nāstikaḥ tu paśoḥ api paśuḥ iṣṭa niṣṭa sādhanam avidvān
na khalu asmin umāna gocara pravṛtti nivṛtti gocare pratyakṣam prabhavati
na ca para pratyāyanāya śabdam prayuñjīta śābdasya arthasya apratyakṣa tvāt

original: tadeva mā nāma bhūnnāstikasya janmāntaramasminneva janmanyupasthito 'sya mūkatvapravṛttinivṛttiviraharūpo mahānnarakaḥ /

iti
viśiṣṭa artha pratyāyana pratyukta tvāt padānām samabhivyāhārasya
anyathā tad anupapatteḥ

original: naca svārthamasmārayitvā viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanaṃ padānāmiti viśiṣṭārthaprayuktaṃ svārthasmāraṇaṃ na svaprayojakamapavādhitumutsahate /
analyzed: na ca sva artham a smārayitvā viśiṣṭa artha pratyāyanam padānām iti viśiṣṭa artha prayuktam sva artha smāraṇam na sva prayojakam apavādhitum utsahate

original: mā ca vādhiprayojakābhāvena svārthasmāraṇamapīti yuktamaviśeṣapravṛttāyā api śruterekasminneva viśeṣe avasthāpanam /
analyzed: mā ca vādhi prayojaka abhāvena sva artha smāraṇam api iti yuktam aviśeṣa pravṛttāyāḥ api śruteḥ ekasmin eva viśeṣe avasthāpanam
iha tu udrītha śruteḥ aviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭa artha pratyāyaka tvāt
saṃkoce pramāṇam kiñcid na asti
na ca saṃnidhi mātram apabādhitum arhati
śruti sāmānya dvāreṇa ca sarva viśeṣa gāminyāḥ śruteḥ ekasmin avasthānam pīḍā eva
tasmāt sarva udrītha viṣayāḥ pratyayāḥ iti
mantra ādi vat vā avirodhaḥ
viruddham iti naḥ saṃpratyayaḥ yat pramāṇena na upalabhyate
upalabdham ca mantra ādiṣu śākhā antarīya iṣi śākhā antarīya karma saṃbandhi tvam
tadvat iha api iti darśanāt avirodhaḥ
etat ca darśitam bhāṣyeṇa sugamena iti
bhūmnaḥ kratu vat jyāyaḥ tvam tathā hi darśayati
vaiśvānara vidyāyām chāndogye kim vyasta upāsanam samasta upāsanam eva iti

original: tatra divameva bhagavo rājanniti hovāceti pratyakamupāsanaśruteḥ pratyekaṃ ca phalavattvāmnānātsamastopāsane ca phalavattvaśruterubhayathāpyupāsanam
analyzed: tatra divam eva bhagavaḥ rājan iti ha uvāca iti pratyakam upāsana śruteḥ pratyekam ca phalavat tva āmnānāt samasta upāsane ca phalavat tva śruteḥ ubhayathā api upāsanam

original: naca yathā vaiśvānarīyeṣṭau yadaṣṭākapālo bhavatītyādīnāmavayujyavādānāṃ pratyekaṃ
analyzed: na ca yathā vaiśvānarīya iṣṭau yat aṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati ityādīnām avayujya vādānām pratyekam
phala śravaṇe pi arthavāda mātra tvam vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet iti asya eva
tu phalavat tvam evam atrā api bhavitum arhati
tatra hi dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet iti
vidhi bhakti śrutiḥ yat aṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati ityādiṣu vartamāna apadeśaḥ
na ca vacanāni tu apūrva tvāt iti vidhi kalpanā
avayujya vādena stutya api upapatteḥ

original: iha tu samaste vyaste ca vartamānāpadeśasyāviśeṣādagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣaśatayā ubhayatrāpi vidhikalpanāyāḥ phalakalpanāyāśca bhedāt /
analyzed: iha tu samaste vyaste ca vartamāna apadeśasya aviśeṣāt agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa śatayā ubhayatra api vidhi kalpanāyāḥ phala kalpanāyāḥ ca bhedāt
nindāyāḥ ca samasta upāsana ārambhe vyasta upāsane pi upapatteḥ

original: śyāmo vāśvāhutimabhyavaharatītivadubhayavidhamupāsanamiti prāpta ucyate-samastopāsanasyaiva jyāyastvaṃ na vyastopāsanasya /
analyzed: śyāmaḥ vā aśva āhutim abhyavaharati iti vat ubhayavidham upāsanam iti prāptaḥ ucyate samasta upāsanasya eva jyāyaḥ tvam na vyasta upāsanasya
yadi api vartamāna apadeśa tvam ubhayatra api aviśiṣṭam tathā api paurvāparya ālocanayā samasta upāsana paratvasya avagamaḥ
yad param hi vākyam tat asya arthaḥ
tathā hi prācīnaśāla prabhṛtayaḥ vaiśvānara vidyā nirmayāya aśvapatim kaikeyam ājagmiḥ
te ca tad tad eka deśa upāsanam upanyastavantaḥ
tatra kaikeyaḥ tad tad upāsana nindā pūrvam tad nivāraṇena samasta upāsanam

original: tathā caikavākyatālābhāya vākyabhedaparihārāya ca samastopāsanaparataiva saṃdarbhasya lakṣyate /
analyzed: tathā ca eka vākya tā lābhāya vākya bheda parihārāya ca samasta upāsana para tā eva saṃdarbhasya lakṣyate
tasmāt bahu phala saṃkīrtanam
pradhāna stavanāya
samasta upānasya eva tu phalavat tvam iti siddham
eka deśi vyākhyānam upanyasya dūṣayati
kecid tu atra iti
saṃbhavati akavākya tve vākya bhedasya anyāpya tvāt na īdṛśam sūtra vyākhyānam samañja
nānā śabda ādi bhedāt
siddham kṛtvā vidyā bhedam adhastanam vicāra jātam abhinirvartitam

original: saṃprati tu sarvāsāmīśvaragocarāṇāṃ vidyānāṃ kimabhedo bhedo vā,
analyzed: saṃprati tu sarvāsām īśvara gocarāṇām vidyānām kim abhedaḥ bhedaḥ vā
evam prāṇa ādi gocarāsu iti vicārayitavyam

original: nanu yathā pratyayābhidheyāyā apūrvabhāvanāyā ājānato bhedabhāve 'pi dhātvarthena nirūpyamāṇatvāttasya ca yāgāderbhedātprakṛtyarthayāgādidhātvarthānubandhabhedādbhedaḥ
analyzed: nanu yathā pratyaya abhidheyāyāḥ apūrva bhāvanāyāḥ ājānataḥ bheda bhāve dhātvarthena nirūpyamāṇa tvāt tasya ca yāga ādeḥ bhedāt prakṛti artha yāga ādi dhātvartha anubandha bhedāt bhedaḥ
tad anuraktāyāḥ eva tasyāḥ pratīyamāna tvāt

original: evaṃ vidyānāmapi rūpato vedyasyeśvarasyābhede 'pi tattatsatyasaṃkalpatvādiguṇopadhānabhedādvidyābheda iti nāstyabhedāśaṅkā /
analyzed: evam vidyānām api rūpataḥ vedyasya īśvarasya abhede tat tat satya saṃkalpa tva ādi guṇa upadhāna bhedāt vidyā bhedaḥ iti nā asti abheda āśaṅkā
ucyate yuktam anubandha bhedāt kārya rūpāṇām apūrva bhāvanānām bhedaḥ iti

original: iha brahmaṇaḥ siddharūpatvājguṇānāmapi satyasaṃkalpatvādīnāṃ tadāśrayāṇāṃ siddhatayā sarvatrābhedo vidyāsu /
analyzed: iha brahmaṇaḥ siddha rūpa tvāt guṇānām api satya saṃkalpa tva ādīnām tad āśrayāṇām siddha tayā sarvatra abhedaḥ vidyāsu
nahi viśāla vakṣāḥ cakora īkṣaṇaḥ kṣatriya yuvā duśrya vana dharmā iti ekatra upadiṣṭaḥ nyatra

original: siṃhāsyo vṛṣaskandhaḥ evopadiśyamānaścakorekṣaṇatvādyapajahāti na khalu pratyupadeśaṃ vastu bhidyate /
analyzed: siṃha āsyaḥ vṛṣa skandhaḥ eva upadiśyamānaḥ cakora īkṣaṇa tva ādi apajahāti na khalu pratyupadeśam vastu bhidyate
tasya sarvatra tādavasthyāt
atādavasthye vā tat eva na bhavet
nahi vastu vikalpyate iti
tasmāt vedya abhedāt vidyānām bhedaḥ iti prāptam

original: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi vastuniṣṭānyupāsanavākyāni kintu tadviṣayāmupāsanābhāvanāṃ vidadhati /
analyzed: evam prāptaḥ ucyate bhavet etat evam yadi vastu niṣṭāni upāsana vākyāni kintu tad viṣayām upāsanā bhāvanām vidadhati
sā ca kārya rūpā

original: yadyapi copāsanābhāvanā upāsanādhīnanirūpaṇopāsanaṃ copāsyādhīnanirūpaṇamupāsyaṃ ceśvarādi vyavasthitarūpam,
analyzed: yadi api ca upāsanā bhāvanā upāsana adhīna nirūpaṇa upāsanam ca upāsya adhīna nirūpaṇam upāsyam ca īśvara ādi vyavasthita rūpam
tathā api upāsana viṣayībhāvaḥ sya kadācid kasyācid kenacid rūpeṇa iti apariniṣṭhitaḥ eva

original: yathaikaḥ strīkāyaḥ kenacidbhakṣyatayā kenacidupagantavyatayā kenacidapatyatayā kenacinmātṛtayā kenacidupekṣaṇīyatayā viṣayīkriyamāṇaḥ puruṣecchātantraḥ
analyzed: yathā ekaḥ strī kāyaḥ kenacid bhakṣya tayā kenacid upagantavya tayā kenacid apatya tayā kenacid mātṛ tayā kenacid upekṣaṇīya tayā viṣayīkriyamāṇaḥ puruṣa icchā tantraḥ
evam iha api upāsanāni puruṣa icchā tantra tayā vidheya tām na atikrāmanti
na ca tad tad guṇa tayā upāsanāni guṇa bhedāt na bhidyante
na ca agnihotram iva upasanām vidhāya dadhi taṇḍula ādi guṇavat iha satya saṃkalpa tva ādi guṇa vidhiḥ yena eka śāstra tvam syāt
api tu utpattau eva upāsanānām tad tad guṇa viśiṣṭānām avagamāt
tatra agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tayā sarvāsām bedaḥ tulyaḥ
na ca samasta śākhā vihita sarva guṇa upasaṃhāraḥ śakya anuṣṭhānaḥ tasmāt bedaḥ
na ca asmin pakṣe sāmānā santaḥ satya kāma ādayaḥ eti
kecid khalu guṇāḥ kāsucid vidyāsu samānāḥ tena eka vidyā tve āvartayitavyāḥ
ekatra ukta tvāt

original: vidyābhede tu na paunaruktyamekasyāṃ vidyāyāmuktā vidyāntare noktā iti vidyāntarasyāpi tadguṇatvāya vaktavyā anuktānāmaprāpteriti //58 // 3.3.34.59.
analyzed: vidyā bhede tu na paunaruktyam ekasyām vidyāyām uktāḥ vidyā antare na uktāḥ iti vidyā antarasya api tad guṇa tvāya vaktavyāḥ anuktānām aprāpteḥ iti
vikalpaḥ viśiṣṭa phala tvāt

original: agnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādiṣu pṛthagadhikārāṇāmapi succayo dṛṣṭo niyamavāṃsteṣāṃ nityatvādupāsanāstu kāmyatayā na nityāstasmānnāsāṃ samuccayaniyamaḥ
analyzed: agnihotra darśa pūrṇamāsa ādiṣu pṛthak adhikārāṇām api su cayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ niyamavān teṣām nitya tvāt upāsanāḥ tu kāmya tayā na nityāḥ tasmāt na āsām samuccaya niyamaḥ

original: tena samānaphalānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādīnāmiva na niyamavānvikalpaḥ phabhūmārthinaḥ samuccayasyāpi saṃbhavāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: tena samāna phalānām darśa pūrṇamāsa jyotiṣṭoma ādīnām iva na niyamavān vikalpaḥ samuccayasya api saṃbhavāt iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
upāsanānām amūṣām upāsya sākṣātkaraṇa sādhya tvāt phala bhedasya ekena upāsanena upāsya sākṣātkaraṇe tatas eva phala prakilābhe tu kṛtam upāsana antareṇa
na ca sākṣāt karaṇasya atiśaya saṃbhavasya upāya sahasraiḥ api tādavasthyāt tad mātra sādhya tvāt ca phala avāpteḥ

original: upāsanāntarābhyāse ca cittaikāgratāvyāghātena kasya cidupāsanāniṣpatteriha vikalpa eva niyamavāniti rāddhāntaḥ //59 // 3.3.35.60.
analyzed: upāsana antara abhyāse ca citta ekāgra tā vyāghātena kasya cit upāsana aniṣpatteḥ iha vikalpaḥ eva niyamavān iti rāddhāntaḥ  /
kāmyāḥ tu yathākāmam samuccīyeran na vā pūrva hetu abhāvāt

original: yāsūpāsanāsu vinopāsyasākṣātkāraṇamadṛṣṭenaiva kāmyasādhanaṃ tāsāṃ kāmyadarśapaurṇamāsādivatpuruṣecchāvaśena vikalpasamuccayāviti sāmpratam
analyzed: yāsu upāsanāsu vinā upāsya sākṣātkāraṇam adṛṣṭena eva kāmya sādhanam tāsām kāmya darśa paurṇamāsa ādi vat puruṣa icchā vaśena vikalpa samuccayau iti sāmpratam
aṅgeṣu yathā āśraya bhāvaḥ
tad nirdhāraṇa aniyamaḥ tad dṛṣṭeḥ pṛthagdhī apratibandhaḥ phalam iti atra upasanāsu phala śruteḥ
parṇamayī nyāyena arthavāda tayā upāsanānām kratu artha tvena samuccaya niyamam āśaṅkya puruṣa artha tayā eka prayoga vacana grahaṇa abhāve
samuccaya niyamaḥ nirastaḥ

original: iha tu satyapi puruṣārthatve kasmānnaikaprayogavacanagrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti pūrvoktamarthamākṣipan pratyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: iha tu sati api puruṣa artha tve kasmāt na eka prayoga vacana grahaṇam bhavati iti pūrva uktam artham ākṣipan pratyavatiṣṭhate

original: yadyapi hi kāmyā etā upāsanāstathāpi na svatantrā bhavitumarhanti /
analyzed: yadi api hi kāmyāḥ etāḥ upāsanāḥ tathā api na svatantrāḥ bhavitum arhanti

original: tathā sati hi kratvarthānāśritatayā kratuprayogādbahirapyamūṣāṃ prayogaḥ prasajyate /
analyzed: tathā sati hi kratu artha anāśrita tayā kratu prayogāt bahis api amūṣām prayogaḥ prasajyate
na ca prayujyante tat kasya hotoḥ
kratu artha āśritānām eva tāsām tad tad phala uddeśena vidhānāt iti

original: evaṃ cāśrayatantratvādāśritānāṃ prayogavacanenāśrayāṇāṃ samuccayaniyamenāśritānāmapi samuccayaniyamo yukta itarathā tadāśritatvānupapatteḥ
analyzed: evam ca āśraya tantra tvāt āśritānām prayoga vacanena āśrayāṇām samuccaya niyamena āśritānām api samuccaya niyamaḥ yuktaḥ itarathā tad āśrita tva anupapatteḥ

original: sa ca prayogavacana upāsanāḥ samuccitanvaṃstattatphalakāmanānāmavaśyaṃbhāvamākṣipati tadabhāve tāsāṃ samuccayaniyamābhāvāditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ  #
analyzed: sa ca prayoga vacane upāsanāḥ samuccitanvan tad tad phala kāmanānām avaśyaṃbhāvam ākṣipati tad abhāve tāsām samuccaya niyama abhāvāt iti manvānasya pūrvaḥ
pakṣaḥ
rāddhāntaḥ tu yathā vihita uddiṣṭa padārtha anurodhī prayoga vacanaḥ na padārtha svabhāvān anyathayitum arhati
kintu tad avirodhena avatiṣṭhate
tatra kratu arthānām nitya vat āmnānāt tathābhāvasya na saṃbhavāt niyamena etān samuccinotu
kāma avabaddhāḥ tu upāsanāḥ kāmānam anitya tvāt na samuccayena niyantum arhati

original: nahi kāmā vidhīyate yena samuccīyerannapi tūddiśyante /
analyzed: na hi kāmāḥ vidhīyate yena samuccīyeran api tu uddiśyante
māna antara anusārī ca uddeśaḥ na tad virodhena uddeśyam anyathayatī
tathā sati uddeśa anupapatteḥ
tasmāt kāmānām anitya tvāt tad avabaddhānām upāsanānām api anitya tvam

original: nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāt satyapi tadāśrayāṇāṃ nityatve idameva cāśrayatantratvamāśritānāṃ yadāśraye satyeva vṛttirnāsatīti /
analyzed: nitya anitya saṃyoga virodhāt sati api tad āśrayāṇām nitya tve idam eva ca āśraya tantra tvam āśritānām yat āśraye satī eva vṛttiḥ na asati iti

original: na tu tatra vṛttireva nāvṛttiriti tadidamuktam-āśrayatantrāṇyapi hīti //61 // 3.3.36.62. // 62 // 3.3.36.63.
analyzed: na tu tatra vṛttiḥ eva na avṛttiḥ iti tat idam uktam āśraya tantrāṇi api hi iti
samāhārāt
hotṛṣadanāt ha eva api durudgītham anusamāharati iti
apiḥ bhinna kamaḥ diḥ udgītham api iti

original: vedāntarohitapraṇavodgīthaikatvapratyayasāmarthyāddhotṛkarmaṇaḥ śaṃsanādudrātā pratisamādadhāti kiṃ tadityata āha durudrīthamapi vedāntarodite  #
analyzed: veda anta rohita praṇava udgītha ekatva pratyaya sāmarthyāt hotṛ karmaṇaḥ śaṃsanāt udrātā pratisamādadhāti kim tat iti atas āha durudrītham api veda antara udite

evam bruvan veda antara uditasya pratyasya ityādi yojanīyam
guṇa sādhāraṇya śruteḥ ca
asya sūtrasya anvaya mukhena vyatireka mukhena ca vyākhyā
śeṣam atirohita artham

original: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3 //
analyzed: iti śrī vācaspatimiśra viracite śārīraka bhagavat pāda bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām tṛtīya adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
tṛtīya adhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ
puruṣa arthaḥ u tas śabdāt iti bādarāyaṇaḥ
sthitam kṛtvā upaniṣadām apavarga ākhya puruṣa artha sādhana ātma jñāna para tvam upāsanānām ca tat tat puruṣa artha sādhana tvam adhastanam vicāra jātam abhinirvartitam

original: samprati tu kimaupaniṣadātmatattvajñānamapavargasādhanatayā puruṣārthamāho kratuprayogāpekṣitakartṛpratipādakatayā kratvarthamiti mīmāṃsāmahe
analyzed: samprati tu kim aupaniṣada ātma tattva jñānam apavarga sādhanatayā puruṣa artham āho kratu prayoga apekṣita kartṛ pratipādaka tayā kratu artham iti mīmāṃsāmahe

original: yadā ca kratvarthaṃ tadā yāvanmātraṃ kratuprayogavidhināpekṣitaṃ kartṛtvamāmuṣmikaphalopabhoktṛtvaṃ
analyzed: yadā ca kratu artham tadā yāvanmātram kratu prayoga vidhinā apekṣitam kartṛ tvam āmuṣmika phala upabhoktṛ tvam

original: ca na caitadanityatve ghaṭate kṛtavipraṇāśākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgādato nityatvamapi,
analyzed: ca na ca etat anitya tve ghaṭate kṛta vipraṇāśa akṛta abhyāgama prasaṅgāt atas nitya tvam api
tāvat mātram upaniṣatsu vivakṣitam
itas viparītam ca na upaniṣad arthaḥ syāt
yathā śuddha tva ādi

original: yadyapi jīvānuvādena tasya brahmatvapratipādanaparatvamupaniṣadāmiti mahatā prabandhena
analyzed: yadi api jīva anuvādena tasya brahmatva pratipādana paratvam upaniṣadām iti mahatā prabandhena

original: tatra tatra pratipāditaṃ tathāpyatra keṣāñcitpūrvapakṣaśahkābījānāṃ nirākaraṇe tadeva
analyzed: tatra tatra pratipāditam tathā api atra keṣāñcid pūrvapakṣa śahkā bījānām nirākaraṇe tat eva
sthūṇa nikhanana nyāyena niścalīkriyate iti asti vicāra prayojanam
tatra yadi api prokṣaṇa ādi vat ātma jñānam na kañcid kratum ārabhya adhītam

original: yadyapi ca kartṛmātraṃ nāvyabhicāritakratusaṃbandhaṃ kartṛmātrasya laukikeṣvapi karmasu
analyzed: yadi api ca kartṛ mātram na avyabhicārita kratu saṃbandham kartṛ mātrasya laukikeṣu api karmasu
darśana ādyena parṇa tā ādi vat an ārabhya adhītam api avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandha jihū dvāreṇa

original: vākyenaiva kratvarthamāpadyate tathāpi yādṛśa ātmā kartāmuṣmikasvargādiphalabhogabhāgī
analyzed: vākyena eva kratu artham āpadyate tathā api yādṛśaḥ ātmā kartā āmuṣmika svarga ādi phala bhoga bhāgī

original: dehādyatirikte vedāntaiḥ pratipādyate na tādṛśasyāsti laukikeṣu karmasūpayogaḥ /
analyzed: deha ādi atirikte vedāntaiḥ pratipādyate na tādṛśasya asti laukikeṣu karmasu upayogaḥ
teṣām aihika phalānām śarīra anatiriktena api yādṛśa tādṛśena kartṛ aupapatteḥ

original: āmuṣmikaphalānāṃ tu vaidikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tamantareṇāsaṃbhavāttatsaṃbandha evāyamaupaniṣadaḥ

iti phala śrutiḥ arthavādaḥ

original: priyādisūcitasya ca saṃsāriṇa evātmano draṣṭavyatvena pratijñāpanādapahatapāpmatvādi tu tadviśeṣaṇaṃ tasyaiva stutyartham /

na tu tad para tvam upaniṣadām

original: yathā devadattayajñadattau mandaprajñāvabhūtāṃ saṃprati tayoryajñādattastu śāstrābhyāsātpaṭuprajño vartate iti tathehāpi ya evābrahmasaṃsthāḥ

original: tathāca brahmasaṃstha iti yaugikaṃ padaṃ prakṛtaviṣayaṃ bhaviṣyati /

original: yadi hyatrāgnotyupadiśyeta tato yathā pratītā tathoddiśyate /

original: iha tu āgnīdhropasthāne sā vidheyatvena viniyujyate /

tāvatā ca śāstra upapatteḥ na aprakṛtānām api grahaṇa saṃbhavaḥ
na ca yātayāma tayā na viniyogaḥ
vācaḥ te ime sarveṣām eva mantrāṇām viniyogāt anyatra api aviniyoga prasaṅgāt

original: tathehāpi prakṛtā evāśramā buddhiviparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante nānuktaḥ parivrāḍeveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: tathā iha api prakṛtāḥ eva āśramāḥ buddhi viparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante na anuktaḥ parivrāj eva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
rāddhāntam upakramate
tat ayuktam
nahi satyām gatau vānaprastha viśeṣena iti
yathā upakrāntam tathā eva parisamāpanam ucitam

original: yatsaṃkhyākāśca ye prasiddhāste tatsaṃkhyākā eva kīrtyante iti cocitam /
analyzed: yad saṃkhyākāḥ ca ye prasiddhāḥ te tad saṃkhyākāḥ eva kīrtyante iti ca ucitam
na tu satyām gatau utsargasya apavādaḥ yujyate

original: aśādhāraṇenaikaikena lakṣaṇenaikeka āśramo vaktumupakrānta iti tathaiva samāpanamucitam /
analyzed: aśā dhāraṇena ekaikena lakṣaṇena ekekaḥ āśramaḥ vaktum upakrāntaḥ iti tathā eva samāpanam ucitam
na tu sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇābhyām upakrama samāptī śrliṣyete

original: naca tapo nāma nāsādhāraṇaṃ vānaprasthānāmityata āha-
analyzed: na ca tapaḥ nāma na asādhāraṇam vānaprasthānām iti atas āha
tapaḥ ca asādhāraṇaḥ iti

original: na khalu parākādibhiḥ kāyakleśapradhāno yathā vānaprasthastathā bhikṣuḥ satyapyaṣṭagrāsādiniyame /
analyzed: na khalu parāka ādibhiḥ kāya kleśa pradhānaḥ yathā vānaprasthaḥ tathā bhikṣuḥ sati api aṣṭa grāsa ādi niyame

original: naca śaucasantoṣaśamādayastapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānāṃ tapaḥprasiddherasiddheḥ /
analyzed: na ca śauca santoṣa śama ādayaḥ tapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānām tapaḥ prasiddheḥ asiddheḥ

original: ata eva vṛddhāstapaso bhedena śaucādīnācakṣate-'śaucasantoṣatapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni niyamāḥ' iti /
analyzed: atas eva vṛddhāḥ tapasaḥ bhedena śauca ādīn ācakṣate śauca santoṣa tapaḥ svādhyāya īśvara praṇidhānāni niyamāḥ iti
siddha saṃkhyā bhedeṣu ca saṃkhyā antara abhidhānam aśliṣṭam iti āha
catuṣṭvena ca iti
api ca bheda vyapadeśaḥ

original: traya eta iti kiṃ bhikṣurapi parāmṛśyate kintvā bhikṣuvarjaṃ traya eva /
analyzed: trayaḥ ete iti kim bhikṣuḥ api parāmṛśyate kintu ā bhikṣu varjam trayaḥ eva

original: na tāvantraya iti bhikṣusaṃgrahe tadvarjanamete traya ityatra vartuṃ śakyam /
analyzed: na tāvantrayaḥ iti bhikṣu saṃgrahe tad varjanam ete trayaḥ iti atra vartum śakyam

original: eva iti prakṛtānāṃ sākalyena parāmarśādbhikṣusaṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇyalokatvamabrahmasaṃsthātvābhāvādbhikṣoḥ /
analyzed: eva iti prakṛtānām sākalyena parāmarśāt bhikṣu saṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇya loka tvam a brahma saṃsthā tva abhāvāt bhikṣoḥ

original: tena tasya brahmasaṃsthasya sadā puṇyalokatvamamṛtatvaṃ ceti virodhaḥ /
analyzed: tena tasya brahma saṃsthasya sadā puṇya loka tvam amṛta tvam ca iti virodhaḥ
triṣu ca brahma saṃstha pade yadā iti saṃbandhanīyam
bhikṣau ca sadā iti vaiṣamyam
tat idam uktam
pṛthaktve ca iti
pūrvapakṣa ābhāsam smārayati
katham punar brahma saṃstha śabdaḥ yogāt iti
tat nirākaroti
atra ucyate iti
ayam abhisaṃdhiḥ

original: satyaṃ yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛtasaṃbhave na tadatipattyāprakṛte vartitumarhati /
analyzed: satyam yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛta saṃbhave na tad atipattyā aprakṛte vartitum arhati

original: asati tu saṃbhave mā bhūtpramādapāṭha ityaprakṛte vartayitavyaḥ,
analyzed: asati tu saṃbhave mā bhūt pramāda pāṭhaḥ iti aprakṛte vartayitavyaḥ
darśitaḥ ca atra asaṃbhavaḥ dhastāt iti

original: eṣa hi brahmasaṃsthatālakṣaṇo dharmo bhikṣorasādhāraṇa āśramāntarāṇi tatsaṃsthānyatatsaṃsthāni ca bhikṣustatsaṃstha ityeva /
analyzed: eṣa hi brahma saṃstha tā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ bhikṣoḥ asādhāraṇaḥ āśrama antarāṇi tad saṃsthāni a tad saṃsthāni ca bhikṣuḥ tad saṃsthaḥ iti eva

original: tatsaṃsthatā hi svābhāvaṃ vyavacchindantī virodhādyastatsaṃstha eva tatrāñjasī nānyatra /
analyzed: tad saṃstha tā hi svābhāvam vyavacchindantī virodhāt yaḥ tad saṃsthaḥ eva tatra añjasī na anyatra
śama dama ādiḥ tu tadīyaḥ iti
sva aṅgam avyavadhāyakam iti arthaḥ
brahma saṃstha tvam asādhāraṇam parivrājaka dharmam śrutiḥ ādarśayati iti āha
tathā ca nyāsaḥ iti brahma iti

original: sarvasaṅgaparityāgo hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kuta ityata āha-
analyzed: sarva saṅga parityāgaḥ hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kutas iti atas āha
brahmā hi paraḥ
atas paras brahma iti
kim apekṣya paraḥ saṃnyāsaḥ iti atas āha

original: tāni vā etānyavarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa evātyarecayaditi /
analyzed: tāni vai etāni avarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāse eva atyarecayat iti
etat uktam bhavati brahma para tayā sarva īṣaṇā parityāga lakṣaṇaḥ nyāsaḥ brahma iti

original: tathā cedṛśaṃ nyāsalakṣaṇaṃ brahmasaṃsthatvaṃ bhikṣorevāsādhāraṇaṃ netareṣāmāśramiṇām /
analyzed: tathā ca īdṛśam nyāsa lakṣaṇam brahma saṃstha tvam bhikṣoḥ eva asādhāraṇam na itareṣām āśramiṇām

original: brahmajñānasya śabdajanitasya yaḥ paripākaḥ sākṣātkāro 'pavargasādhanaṃ tadaṅgatayā parivrājyaṃ vihitam /
analyzed: brahma jñānasya śabda janitasya yaḥ paripākaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ upavarga sādhanam tad aṅga tayā parivrājyam vihitam
na tu anadhikṛtam prati iti arthaḥ
stuti mātram upādānāt iti ced na apūrva tvāt
yadi atra saṃnidhāne upāsanā vidhiḥ na asti tatas vidhi vyabhicārita tad vidhi saṃbandhena udgīthena upasthāpitaḥ

original: sa eṣa rasānāṃ rasatama ityādinā padasaṃdarbheṇaikavākyabhāvamupagataḥ stūyate /
analyzed: saḥ eṣa rasānām rasatamaḥ ityādinā pada saṃdarbheṇa eka vākya bhāvam upagataḥ stūyate
nahi samabhivyāhṛtaiḥ eva eka vākya tā bhavati iti kaścid niyama hetuḥ asti
anuṣaṅga atideśa labdhaiḥ api vidhi asamabhivyāhṛtaiḥ arthavādaiḥ ekavākya tā abhyupagamāt
yadi tu udgītham upāsīta sāma upāsīta ityādi vidhi samabhivyāhāraḥ śrutaḥ tathā api tasya eva
vidheḥ stutiḥ na tu upāsanā viṣaya samarpaṇa paraḥ om iti etat akṣaram udgītham iti anena eva upāsanā viṣaya samarpaṇāt iti
prāpte bhidhīyate enad tāvat dūra sthena karma vidhi vākyena eka vākya tā asaṃbhavaḥ
pratīta samabhivyāhṛtānām vidhinā eka vākya tayā stuti artha tvam arthavādānām rakta paṭa nyāyena bhavati
na tu stutyā vinā kācid anupapattiḥ vidheḥ
yathā āhuḥ asti tu tat iti atireke parihāraḥ iti
atas eva vidheḥ apekṣā bhāvāt pravartana ātmakasya anuṣaṅga atideśa ādibhiḥ arthavāda prāpti abhidhānam asamañjasam
nahi kartṛ apekṣita upāyām avagatāyām prāśastya pratyayasya asti kaścid upayogaḥ
tasmāt dūra sthasya karma vidheḥ stutau ānarthakyam

original: tenaikavākyatānupapatteḥ saṃnihitasya tūpāsanāvidheḥ kiṃ viṣayasamarpaṇenopayujyatāmuta stutyeti viśaye viṣayasamarpaṇena yathārthavattvaṃ  #
analyzed: tena eka vākya tā anupapatteḥ saṃnihitasya tu upāsanā vidheḥ kim viṣaya samarpaṇena upayujyatām uta stutyā iti viśaye viṣaya samarpaṇena yathā arthavat tvam
na evam stutyāḥ bahis aṅga tvāt
agatyā hi sā
tasmāt upāsana arthāḥ iti siddham
kuryāt kriyeta kartavyam bhavet syāt iti pañcamam
etat syāt sarva vedeṣu niyatam vidhi lakṣaṇam
bhāvanāyāḥ khalu kartṛ samīhita anukūla tvam vidhiḥ niṣedhaḥ ca kartuḥ ahita anukūla tvam
yathā āhuḥ kartavyaḥ ca kartavyaḥ duḥkha phalo kartavyaḥ duḥkha phalaḥ iti
etat ca asmābhiḥ upapāditam nyāyakaṇikāyām
kriyā ca bhāvanā tad vacanāḥ ca karoti ādayaḥ
yathā āhuḥ kama bhvastayaḥ kriyā sāmānya vacanāḥ iti
atas eva kṛ bhvastīn udāhṛtavān

original: sāmānyoktau tadviśeṣāḥ pacedityādayo 'pi gamyanta iti tatra kuryādityākṣiptakartṛkā bhāvanā /
analyzed: sāmānya uktau tad viśeṣāḥ pacet ityādayaḥ pi gamyante iti tatra kuryāt iti ākṣipta kartṛkā bhāvanā
kriyeta iti ākṣipta karmikā bhāvanā
kartavyam iti tu karma bhūta dravya upasarjana bhāvanā

original: evaṃ daṇḍī bhaveddaṇḍinā bhavitavyaṃ daṇḍinā bhūyetetyekadhātvarthaviṣayā vidhyupahitā bhāvanā udāhāryāḥ /
analyzed: evam daṇḍī bhavet daṇḍinā bhavitavyam daṇḍinā bhūyeta iti eka dhātvartha viṣayāḥ vidhi upahitāḥ bhāvanāḥ udāhāryāḥ
bhavatiḥ ca eṣa janmani

original: yathā kulālavyāpārādghaṭo bhavati bījādaṅkuro bhavatīti prayuñjate /
analyzed: yathā kulāla vyāpārāt ghaṭaḥ bhavati bījāt aṅkuraḥ bhavati iti prayuñjate
na ca bījāt aṅkuraḥ sti iti prayuñjate
tasmāt asti sattāyām na janmani iti
pāriplava arthāḥ iti ced na viśeṣita tvāt

original: yadyapi upaniṣadākhyānāni vidyāsaṃnidhau śrutāni tathāpi 'sarvāṇyākhyānāni pāriplave' iti sarvaśrutyā niḥśeṣārthatayā durbalasya saṃnidherbādhitatvātpariplavārthānyevākhyānāni
analyzed: yadi api upaniṣad ākhyānāni vidyā saṃnidhau śrutāni tathā api sarvāṇi ākhyānāni pāriplave iti sarva śrutyā niḥśeṣa artha tayā durbalasya saṃnidheḥ bādhita tvāt pariplava arthāni eva ākhyānāni

original: naca sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāditi viniyoge 'pi dāśatayīnāṃ prātisvikaviniyogāttatra
analyzed: na ca sarvāḥ dāśatayīḥ anubrūyāt iti viniyoge dāśatayīnām prātisvika viniyogāt tatra

original: tatra karmaṇi yathā viniyogo na virudhyate tathehāpi satyapi pāriplave viniyege saṃnidhānādvidyāṅgatvamapi
analyzed: tatra karmaṇi yathā viniyogaḥ na virudhyate tathā iha api sati api pāriplave viniyege saṃnidhānāt vidyā aṅga tvam api
bhaviṣyati iti vācyam

original: dāśatayīṣu prātisvikānāṃ viniyogānāṃ samudāyaviniyogasya ca tulyabalatvādiha tu saṃnidhānāt śruterbalīyastvāt /
analyzed: dāśatayīṣu prātisvikānām viniyogānām samudāya viniyogasya ca tulya bala tvāt iha tu saṃnidhānāt śruteḥ balīyaḥ tvāt
tasmāt pāriplava arthāni eva ākhyānāni iti prāptaḥ ucyate na eṣām ākhyānānām pāriplave viniyogaḥ

original: kintu pāriplavamācakṣītetyupakramya yānyāmnātāni manurvaivasvato rājetyādīni teṣāmeva tatra viniyogaḥ,
analyzed: kintu pāriplavam ācakṣīta iti upakramya yāni āmnātāni manuḥ vaivasvataḥ rājā ityādīni teṣām eva tatra viniyogaḥ
tāni eva hi pāriplavena viśeṣitāni
itarathā pāriplave sarvāṇi ākhyānāni iti etāvatā eva gata tvāt pariplavam ācakṣīta iti anarthakam syāt
ākhyāna viśeṣaṇa tve tu artha vat
tasmāt viśeṣāṇā anurodhāt sarva śabdaḥ tad apekṣaḥ na tu aśeṣa vacanaḥ

original: yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatra nimintrātāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabdaḥ /
analyzed: yathā sarve brāhmaṇāḥ bhojayitavyāḥ iti atra sarva śabdaḥ

original: tathā copaniṣadākhyānānāṃ vidyāsaṃnidhirapratidvandīṃ vidyaikavākyatāṃ so 'rodīdityādīnāmiva vidhyekavākyatvaṃ gamayatīti siddham /
analyzed: tathā ca upaniṣad ākhyānānām vidyā saṃnidhiḥ a pratidvandīm vidyā ekavākyatām saḥ rodīt ityādīnām iva vidhi ekavākya tvam gamayati iti siddham

original: pratipattisaukaryāccetyupākhyānena hi bālā apyavadhīyante yathā tantropākhyāyikayeti //23 // 3.4.4.24. // 24 // 3.4.5.25.
analyzed: pratipatti saukaryāt ca iti upākhyānena hi bālāḥ api avadhīyante yathā tantra upākhyāyikayā iti
atas eva ca agni indhana ādi anapekṣā

original: vidyāyāḥ kratvarthatve sati tathā kratūpakaraṇāya svakāryāya kraturapekṣitaḥ /
analyzed: vidyāyāḥ kratu artha tve sati tathā kratu upakaraṇāya sva kāryāya kratuḥ apekṣitaḥ
tad abhāve kasya upakāraḥ vidyayā iti

original: yadā tu puruṣārthā tadā nānayā kraturapekṣitaḥ svakārye nirapekṣāyā eva tasyāḥ sāmarthyāt /
analyzed: yadā tu puruṣa arthā tadā na anayā kratuḥ apekṣitaḥ sva kārye nirapekṣāyāḥ eva tasyāḥ sāmarthyāt
agni indhāna ādinā ca āśrama karmāṇi upalakṣyante tat āha
agni indhana ādī vi āśrama karmāṇi vidyayā sva artha siddhau na apekṣitavyāni iti
sva artha siddhau na apekṣitavyāni na tu sva siddhau iti
etat ca adhikam upariṣṭāt vakṣyate
tad vivakṣayā ca etat prayojanam pūrvatanasya adhikaraṇasya uktam
adhika vivakṣyā iti yat uktam tat adhikam āha
sarva apekṣā ca yajña ādi śruteḥ aśva vat

original: yathā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣyante āśramakarmāṇi evamutpattāvapi nāpekṣyeranniti śaṅkā syāt /
analyzed: yathā sva artha siddhau na apekṣyante āśrama karmāṇi evam utpattau api na apekṣyeran iti śaṅkā syāt
na ca vividiṣanti yajñena ityādi virodhaḥ
na hi eṣa vidhiḥ api tu vartamāna apadeśaḥ
sa ca stutyā api upapadyate
api ca catasraḥ pratipattayaḥ brahmaṇi
prathamā tāvat upaniṣad vākya śravaṇa mātrāt bhavati yām kila ācakṣate śravaṇam iti
dvitīyā mīmāṃsā sahitā
mananam iti
tṛtīyā cintā
santati mayī yām ācakṣate nididhyāsanam iti

original: caturthī sākṣātkāravatī vṛttirūpā nāntarīyakaṃ hi tasyāḥ kaivalyamiti /
analyzed: caturthī sākṣātkāravatī vṛtti rūpā nāntarīyakam hi tasyāḥ kaivalyam iti

original: tatrādye tāvatpratipatti viditapadatadarthasya viditavākyagatigocaranyāyasya ca puṃsa upapadyete eveti na tatra karmāpekṣā /
analyzed: tatra ādye tāvat pratipatti vidita pada tad arthasya vidita vākya gati gocara nyāyasya ca puṃsaḥ upapadyete eva iti na tatra karma apekṣā

original: te eva ca cintāmayīṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratipattiṃ prasuvāte iti na tatrāpi karmāpekṣā /
analyzed: te eva ca cintā mayīm tṛtīyam pratipattim prasuvāte iti na tatra api karma apekṣā

original: sā cādaranairantaryadīrghakālasevitā sākṣātkāravatīmādhatta eva pratipattiṃ caturthīmiti na tatrāpyasti karmāpekṣā /
analyzed: sā ca ādara nairantarya dīrgha kāla sevitā sākṣātkāravatīm ādhatte eva pratipattim caturthīm iti na tatra api asti karma apekṣā

original: tannāntarīyakaṃ ca kaivalyamiti na tasyāpi karmāpekṣā /
analyzed: tad nāntarīyakam ca kaivalyam iti na tasya api karma apekṣā

original: tadevaṃ pramāṇataśca prameyata utpattau ca kārye ca na jñānasya karmāpekṣeti bījaṃ śaṅkāyām /
analyzed: tat evam pramāṇataḥ ca prameyataḥ utpattau ca kārye ca na jñānasya karma apekṣā iti bījam śaṅkāyām

original: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-utpattau jñānasya karmāpekṣā vidyate vividiṣotpādadvārā 'vividiṣanti yajñena' iti śruteḥ /
analyzed: evam prāptaḥ ucyate utpattau jñānasya karma apekṣā vidyate vividiṣā utpāda dvārā vividiṣanti yajñena iti śruteḥ
na ca idam vartamāna apadeśa tvāt stuti mātram apūrva tvāt arthasya

original: yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti parṇamayatāvidhirapūrvatvānna tvayaṃ vartamānāpadeśaḥ,
analyzed: yathā yasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati iti parṇa maya tā vidhiḥ apūrva tvāt na tu ayam vartamāna apadeśaḥ
anuvāda anupapatteḥ
tasmāt utpattau vidyayā śama ādi vat karmāṇi apekṣyante
tatra api evaṃvid iti vidyā sva rūpa saṃyogāt antaraṅgāṇi vidyā utpāde śama ādīni
bahis aṅgāṇi karmāṇi vividiṣā saṃyogāt
tathā hi āśrama vihita nitya karma anuṣṭhānāt dharma samutpādaḥ tatas pāpmā vilīyate

original: sa hi tattvato 'nityāśuciduḥ-khānātmani saṃsāre sati nityaśucimukhātmalakṣaṇena vibhrameṇa malinayati cittasattvamadharmanibandhanatvādvibhramāṇām
analyzed: sa hi tattvataḥ nitya aśuci duḥkha anātmani saṃsāre sati nitya śuci mukha ātma lakṣaṇena vibhrameṇa malinayati citta sattvam adharma nibandhana tvāt vibhramāṇām

original: ataḥ pāpmanaḥ prakṣaye pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya tāttvikīmanityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhaṃ viniścineti
analyzed: atas pāpmanaḥ prakṣaye pratyakṣa upapatti dvāra apāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣa upapattibhyām saṃsārasya tāttvikīm anitya aśuci duḥkha rūpa tām apratyūham viniścina iti
tatas smin anabhirati saṃjñam vairāgyam upajāyate
tatas tad jihāsā asya upāvartate

original: tato hānopāyaṃ prayeṣate paryeṣamāṇaścātmatattvajñānamasyopāya iti śāstradācāryavacanāccopaśrutya tajjijñāsata iti vividiṣopahāramukhenātmajñānotpattāvasti  #
analyzed: tatas hāna upāyam prayeṣate paryeṣamāṇaḥ ca ātma tattva jñānam asya upāyaḥ iti śāstrat ācārya vacanāt ca upaśrutya tat jijñāsate iti vividiṣā upahāra mukhena ātma jñāna utpattau asti
karmāṇam upayogaḥ

original: vividiṣuḥ khalu yukta ekāgratayā śravaṇamanane kartumutsahate /
analyzed: vividiṣuḥ khalu yuktaḥ ekāgra tayā śravaṇa manane kartum utsahate
tatas sya tat tvam asi iti vākyat nirvicikitsam jñānam utpadyate
na ca nirvicikitsam tattvam asi iti vākya artham avadhārayataḥ karmaṇi adhikāraḥ sti

original: yena bhāvanāyāṃ vā bhāvanākārye vā sākṣātkāre karmaṇāmupayogaḥ /
analyzed: yena bhāvanāyām vā bhāvanā kārye vā sākṣātkāre karmaṇām upayogaḥ
etena vṛtti rūra pa sākṣātkāra kārye pavarge karmaṇām upayogaḥ dūra nirastaḥ veditavyaḥ
tasmāt yathā eva śama dama ādayaḥ yāvajjīvam anuvartante evam āśrama karma api iti asamīkṣita ābhādhānam
viduṣaḥ tatra anadhikārāt iti uktam

original: dṛṣṭārtheṣu tu karmasu pratiṣiddhavarjamanadhikāre 'pyasaktasya svārasikī pravṛttirupapadyata eva /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa artheṣu tu karmasu pratiṣiddha varjam anadhikāre pi asaktasya svārasikī pravṛttiḥ upapadyate eva
nahi tatra anvaya vyatireka samadhigamanīya phale sti vidhi apekṣā

original: ataśca 'bhrāntyā cellaukikaṃ karma vaidikaṃ ca tathāstu te' iti pralāpaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca bhrāntyā ced laukikam karma vaidikam ca tathā astu te iti pralāpaḥ
śama dama ādīnām tu vidyā utpādāya upāttānām upariṣṭāt avasthā svābhāvyāt anapekṣitānām api anuvṛttiḥ

original: upapāditaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra ite neha punaḥ pratyāpyate /
analyzed: upapāditam ca etat asmābhiḥ prathama sūtre ite na iha punar pratyāpyate

original: tasmādvividiṣotpādadvārāśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyotpattāvupayogo na vidyākārya iti siddham /
analyzed: tasmāt vividiṣā utpāda dvāra āśrama karmaṇām vidyā utpattau upayogaḥ na vidyā kārye iti siddham
śeṣam atirohita artham
sarva anna anumatiḥ ca prāṇātyaye tad darśanāt
prāṇa saṃvāde sarva indriyāṇām śrūyate

original: eṣa kila vicāraviṣayaḥ-sarvāṇi khalu vāgādīnyavajitya prāṇo mukhya uvācaitāni kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tāni hocuḥ /
analyzed: eṣa kila vicāra viṣayaḥ sarvāṇi khalu vāc ādīni avajitya prāṇaḥ mukhyaḥ uvāca etāni kim me nnam bhaviṣyati iti tāni ha ūcuḥ

original: yadidaṃ loke 'nnamā ca śvabhya ā ca śakunibhyaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ yadannaṃ tattavānnamiti /
analyzed: yat idam loke nnam ā ca śvabhyaḥ ā ca śakunibhyaḥ sarva prāṇinām yat annam tat tava annam iti

original: tadanena saṃdarbheṇa prāṇasya sarvamannamityanucintanaṃ vidhāyāha śrutiḥ-'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' iti /
analyzed: tat anena saṃdarbheṇa prāṇasya sarvam annam iti anucintanam vidhāya āha śrutiḥ na ha vai evaṃvidi kiñcana anannam bhavati iti
sarvam prāṇasya annam iti evaṃvidi na kiñcid anannam bhavati iti

original: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimetatsarvānnābhyanujñānaṃ śamādivadetadvidyāṅgatayā vidhīyata uta stutyarthaṃ saṃkīrtyata iti /
analyzed: tatra saṃśayaḥ kim etat sarvānna abhyanujñānam śama ādi vat etat vidyā aṅgatayā vidhīyate uta stuti artham saṃkīrtyate iti

original: tatra yadyapi bhavatīti vartamānāpadeśānna vidhiḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: tatra yadi api bhavati iti vartamāna apadeśāt na vidhiḥ pratīyate

original: tathāpi yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti vartamānāpadeśādapi palāśamayītvavidhipratipattiḥ pañcamalakārāpattyā tathehāpi pravṛttiviśeṣakaratālābhe  #
analyzed: tathā api yathā yasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati iti vartamāna apadeśāt api palāśa mayī tva vidhi pratipattiḥ pañcama lakāra āpattyā tathā iha api pravṛtti viśeṣa kara tā alābhe
vidhi pratipattiḥ

original: stutau hi arthavādamātraṃ na tathārthavadyathā vidhau /
analyzed: stutau hi arthavāda mātram na tathā arthavat yathā vidhau

original: bhakṣyābhakṣyaśāstraṃ ca sāmānyataḥ pravṛttamanena viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhyate /
analyzed: bhakṣya abhakṣya śāstram ca sāmānyatas pravṛttam anena viśeṣa śāstreṇa bādhyate

original: gamyāgamyavivekaśāstramiva sāmānyataḥ pravṛttaṃ vāmadevavidyāṅgabhūtasamastantryaparihāraśāstreṇa viśeṣaviṣayeṇeti prāpta ucyate-aśakteḥ kalpanīyatvācchāstrāntaravirodhataḥ
analyzed: gamya agamya viveka śāstram iva sāmānyatas pravṛttam vāmadeva vidyā aṅga bhūta sama stantrya parihāra śāstreṇa viśeṣa viṣayeṇa iti prāptaḥ ucyate aśakteḥ kalpanīya tvāt śāstra antara virodhataḥ
prāṇasya annam idam sarvam iti cintana saṃstavaḥ

original: na tāvatkauleyakamaryādamannaṃ manuṣyajātinā yugapatparyāyeṇa vā śakyamattum /
analyzed: na tāvat kauleyaka maryādam annam manuṣya jātinā yugapad paryāyeṇa vā śakyam attum
ibhaka rabhaka ādīnām annasya śamī karīra kaṇṭaka vaṭa kāṣṭha ādeḥ ekasya api aśakya adana tvāt

original: na cātra liṅ iva sphuṭatarā vidhipratipattirasti /
analyzed: na ca atra liṅ iva sphuṭatarā vidhi pratipattiḥ asti
na ca kalpanīyaḥ vidhiḥ apūrva tva abhāvāt
stutyā api ca tad upapatteḥ

original: naca satyāṃ gatau sāmānyataḥ pravṛttasya śāstrasya viṣayasaṃkoco yuktaḥ /
analyzed: na ca satyām gatau sāmānyatas pravṛttasya śāstrasya viṣaya saṃkocaḥ yuktaḥ
tasmāt sarvam prāṇasya annam iti anucintana vidhāna stutiḥ iti sāmpratam
śakya tve ca pravṛtti viśeṣa kara tā upayujyate na aśakya vidhāna tve

original: prāṇātyasya iti cāvadhāraṇaparaṃ prāṇātyaya eva sarvānnatvam /
analyzed: prāṇa atyasya iti ca avadhāraṇa param prāṇa atyaye eva sarva anna tvam

original: tatropākhyānācca sphuṭataravidhismṛteśca surāvarjaṃ vidvāṃsamavidvāṃsaṃ prati vidhānāt /
analyzed: tatra upākhyānāt ca sphuṭatara vidhi smṛteḥ ca surā varjam vidvāṃsam a vidvāṃsam prati vidhānāt
na tu anyatra iti
ibhyena hastipakena
sa āmi svāditān ardha bhakṣitān
sa hi cākrāyaṇaḥ hastipaka ucchiṣṭān kulmāṣān bhuñjānaḥ hastipakena uktaḥ
kulmāṣān iva mad ucchiṣṭam udakam kasmāt na anupibasi iti
evam uktaḥ tat udakam ucchiṣṭa doṣāt pratyācacakṣe
kāraṇam ca atrā uvāca
na vā a jīviṣṭam na jīviṣyāmi iti imān kulmāṣān akhādam

original: kāmo ma udakapānamiti svātantryaṃ me udakapāne nadīkūpataḍāgaprāpādiṣu yathākāmaṃ
analyzed: kāmaḥ me udaka pānam iti svātantryam me udaka pāne nadī kūpa taḍāga prāpa ādiṣu yathākāmam

original: prāpnomīti nocchiṣṭodakābhāve prāṇātyaya iti tatrocchiṣṭabhakṣaṇadoṣa iti maṭacīhateṣu
analyzed: prāpnomi iti na ucchiṣṭa udaka abhāve prāṇātyayaḥ iti tatra ucchiṣṭa bhakṣaṇa doṣaḥ iti maṭacī hateṣu
kuruṣu glāyan aśanāyayā muniḥ nirapatrapaḥ ibhyena sāmi jagdhān khādayāmāsa
vihita tvāt ca āśramatarma api
nityāni hi āśrama karmāṇi yāvat jīva śruteḥ nitya īhita upāya tayā avaśyam kartavyāni
vividiṣanti iti ca vidyā saṃyogāt vidyāyāḥ ca avaśyaṃbhāva niyama abhāvāt anitya tā prāpnoti
nitya anitya saṃyogaḥ ca ekasya na saṃbhavati
avaśya anavaśyaṃbhāvayoḥ ekatra virodhāt
na ca vākya bhedāt vāstavaḥ virodhaḥ śakyaḥ u panetum
tasmāt anadhyavasāyaḥ eva atra iti prāptam
etena ekasya tu ubhaya tve saṃyoga pṛthaktvam iti ākṣiptam

original: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-siddhe hi syādvirodho 'yaṃ na tu sādhye kathañcana /
analyzed: evam prāpte abhidhīyate siddhe hi syāt virodhaḥ yam na tu sādhye kathañcana
vidhi adhīna ātma lābhe smin yathāvidhi matā sthitiḥ
siddham hi vastu viruddha dharma yogena bādhyate

original: na tu sādhyarūpaṃ yathā ṣoḍaśina ekasya grahaṇāgrahaṇe /
analyzed: na tu sādhya rūpam yathā ṣoḍaśinaḥ ekasya grahaṇa agrahaṇe
te hi vidhi adhīna tvāt vikaspete eva
na punar siddhe vikalpa saṃbhavaḥ
tat iha ekam eva agnihotra ākhyam karma yāvat jīva śruteḥ nimittena yujyamānam nitya īhita upātta durita prakṣaya prayojanam avaśya kartavyam

original: vidyāṅgatayā ca vidyāyāḥ kādācitkatayānavaśyaṃ bhāve 'pi 'kāmyo vā naimittiko vā vikṛtya niviśate' iti nyāyādanityādhikāreṇa niviśamānamapi  #
analyzed: vidyā aṅga tayā ca vidyāyāḥ kādācitka tayā anavaśyam bhāve pi kāmyaḥ vā naimittikaḥ vā vikṛtya niviśate iti nyāyāt anitya adhikāreṇa niviśamānam api
na nityam anityayati

original: tenāpi tasmiddheriti saṃyogapṛthaktvānna nityānityasaṃyogavirodha ekasya kāryasyeti siddham /
analyzed: tena api tasmin ddheḥ iti saṃyoga pṛthaktvāt na nitya anitya saṃyoga virodhaḥ ekasya kāryasya iti siddham

original: sahākiratvaṃ ca karmaṇāṃ na kārye vidyāyāḥ kiṃ tūtpattau /
analyzed: sahākira tvam ca karmaṇām na kārye vidyāyāḥ kim tu utpattau
kaḥ ṛthaḥ vidyā sahakārīṇi karmāṇi iti
ayam arthaḥ satsu karmasu vidyā eva sva kārye vyāpriyate

original: yathā 'sahaiva daśābhiḥ pūtrairbhāraṃ vahati gardabhī' iti sātsveva daśaputreṣu saiva bhārasya vāhiketi /
analyzed: yathā saha eva daśābhiḥ pūtraiḥ bhāram vahati gardabhī iti sātsu eva daśa putreṣu sā eva bhārasya vāhikā iti
avidhi lakṣaṇa tvāt iti
vihitam hi darśa paurṇamāsa ādi aṅgaiḥ yujyate na tu avihitam
grāhaka grahaṇa pūrvaka tvāt aṅga bhāvasya vidhaiḥ ca grāhaka tvāt
avihite ca tad anupapatteḥ

original: catasṛṇāmapi ca pratipattīnāṃ brahmaṇi vidhānānupapatterityuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
analyzed: catasṛṇām api ca pratipattīnām brahmaṇi vidhāna anupapatteḥ iti uktam prathama sūtre

original: draṣṭavyo nididhyāsitavya iti ca vidhisarūpaṃ ni vidhirityapyuktam /
analyzed: draṣṭavyaḥ nididhyāsitavyaḥ iti ca vidhi sarūpam vidhiḥ iti api uktam
utpattim prati hetu bhāvaḥ tu sattva śuddhyāḥ vividiṣā upajana dvārā iti adhastāt upapāditam
asādhya tvāt ca vidyā phalasya apavargasya svarūpa avasthāna lakṣaṇaḥ hi saḥ

original: naca svaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sādhyaṃ nityatvāt /
analyzed: na ca svam rūpam brahmaṇaḥ sādhyam nitya tvāt
śeṣam atirohita artham
sarvathā api te eva ubhaya liṅgāt

original: yathā māsamagnihotraṃ juhvatīti prakaraṇāntarātkarmabheda evamihāpi 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena
analyzed: yathā māsam agnihotram juhvati iti prakaraṇa antarāt karma bhedaḥ evam iha api tam etam veda anuvacanena
brāhmaṇāḥ vividiṣanti yajñena iti kratu prakaraṇam atikramya śravaṇāt prakaraṇa antarāt tad buddhi vyavacchede

original: sati karmāntaramiti prāpta ucyate-satyapi prakaraṇāntare tadeva karma,
analyzed: sati karmāntaram iti prāptaḥ ucyate sati api prakaraṇa antare tat eva karma

original: śruteḥ smṛteśca saṃyogabhedaḥ paraṃ yathā 'agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ' 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt' iti tadevāgnihotramubhayasaṃyuktam
analyzed: śruteḥ smṛteḥ ca saṃyoga bhedaḥ param yathā agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ yāvajjīvam agnihotram juhuyāt iti tat eva agnihotram ubhaya saṃyuktam
nahi prakaraṇa antaram sākṣat bhedakam

original: kintu ajñātajñāpanasvaraso vidhiḥ prakaraṇaikye sphuṭatarapratyabhijñābalena svarasaṃ jahyāt /
analyzed: kintu ajñāta jñāpana sva rasaḥ vidhiḥ prakaraṇa aikye sphuṭatara pratyabhijñā balena sva rasam jahyāt
prakaraṇa antareṇa tu vighaṭuta pratyabhijñānaḥ sva rasam ajahat karma bhinatti

original: iha tu siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuñjāno na juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayitumarhati /
analyzed: iha tu siddha vat utpanna rūpāṇi eva yajña ādīni vividiṣāyām viniyuñjānaḥ na juhvati ityādi vat apūrvam eṣām rūpam utpādayitum arhati
na ca tatra api naiyamika agnihotre māsa vidhiḥ na apūrva agnihotra utpattiḥ iti sāṃpratam
homaḥ eva sākṣat vidhi śruteḥ
kālasya ca anupādeyasya avidheya tvāt

original: kāle hi karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla ityutsargaḥ /
analyzed: kāle hi karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kālaḥ iti utsargaḥ

original: iha tu vividiṣāyāṃ vidhiśrutiḥ na yajñādau /
analyzed: iha tu vividiṣāyām vidhi śrutiḥ na yajña ādau
tāni tu siddhāni eva anūdyante iti aikakarmyāt saṃyoga pṛthaktvam siddham
smṛtim uktvā liṅga darśanam uktam
antarā ca api tu tad dṛṣṭeḥ

original: yadi vidyāsahakārīṇyāśramakarmāṇi hanta bho vidhurādīnāmanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidyāyām,
analyzed: yadi vidyā sahakārīṇi āśrama karmāṇi hanta bho vidhura ādīnām anāśramiṇām anadhikāraḥ vidyāyām
abhāvāt sahakāriṇām āśrama karmaṇām iti prāptaḥ ucyate na atyantam akarmāṇaḥ raikka vidhura vācakravī prabhṛtayaḥ
santi hi teṣām anāśrami tve pi japa upavāsa devatā ārādhanāt iti karmāṇi
karmaṇām ca sahakāri tvam uktam āśrama karmaṇām upalakṣaṇa tvāt iti na teṣām anadhikāraḥ vidyāsu
janma antara anuṣṭhiteḥ api ca iti
na khalu vidyā kārye karmaṇām apekṣā
apitu utpāde
utpādayanti ca vividiṣā upahāreṇa karmāṇi vidyām
utpanna vividiṣāṇām puruṣa dhaureyāṇām vidhura saṃvarta prabhṛtīnām kṛtam karmabhiḥ

original: yadyapi ceha janmani tatheha janmanyāśramakarmotpāditavividiṣa eva vidyāyāmadhikṛto netara ityanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidhuraprabhṛtīnāmityata
analyzed: yadi api ca iha janmani tathā iha janmani āśrama karma utpādita vividiṣaḥ eva vidyāyām adhikṛtaḥ na itaraḥ iti anāśramiṇām anadhikāraḥ vidhura prabhṛtīnām iti atas
dṛṣṭārthā ca iti
avidyā nivṛttiḥ vidyāyāḥ dṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ
sa ca anu a vyatireka siddhaḥ na niyamam apekṣate iti arthaḥ
pratiṣedhaḥ vighātaḥ tasya abhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ
yadi anāśramiṇām api adhikāraḥ vidyāyām kṛtam tarhi āśramaiḥ ati bahula āyāsaiḥ iti āśaṅkya āha atas tu itarat jyāyaḥ liṅgāt ca
svasthena āśrami tvam āstheyam

original: daivātpunaḥ patnyādiviyogātaḥ satyanāśramitve bhavedadhikāro vidyāyāmiti śrutismṛtisaṃdarbheṇa vividiṣanti yajñenetyādinā jyāyastvāvagateḥ
analyzed: daivāt punar patnī ādi viyogāt sati anāśrami tve bhavet adhikāraḥ vidyāyām iti śruti smṛti saṃdarbheṇa vividiṣanti yajñena ityādinā jyāyaḥ tva avagateḥ
tena eti puṇya kṛt iti śruti liṅgam
anāśramī na tiṣṭheta ityādi ca smṛti liṅgam
tad bhūtasya tu na a tad bhāvaḥ jaimineḥ api niyama a tad rūpa abhāvebhyaḥ
āroha vat pratyavarohaḥ pi kadācid ūrdhvaretasām syāt iti manda āśaṅkā nivāraṇa artham idam adhikaraṇam
pūrva dharmeṣu yāga homa ādiṣu
rāgataḥ vā gṛhasthaḥ ham patnī ādi parivṛtaḥ syām iti
niyamam vyācaṣṭe tathā hi
atyantam ātmanām iti
a tad rūpa tām āroha tulya tā bhāvam vyācaṣṭe
tathā ca brahmacaryam samāpya iti
abhāvam śiṣṭa ācāra abhāvam vibhajate
na ca evam ācārāḥ śiṣṭāḥ iti
ati rohita artham anyat
na ca ādhikārikam apipatana anumānāt tad ayogāt

original: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmīti naiṣṭhikaṃ prati prāyaścittābhāvasmaraṇānnairṛtagardabhālambhaḥ prāyaścittamupakurvāṇakaṃ prati /
analyzed: prāyaścittam na paśyāmi iti naiṣṭhikam prati prāyaścitta abhāva smaraṇāt nairṛta gardabha ālambhaḥ prāyaścittam upakurvāṇakam prati

original: tasmācchinnaśirasa iva puṃsaḥ pratikriyābhāva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt chinna śirasaḥ iva puṃsaḥ pratikriyā bhāvaḥ iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: sūtrayojanā tu-na cādhikārikamadhikāralakṣaṇe prathamakāṇḍe nirṇītam 'avakīrṇipaśuśca tadvadādhānasyāprāptakālatvāt' ityanena yatprāyaścittaṃ  #
analyzed: sūtra yojanā ca ādhikārikam adhikāra lakṣaṇe prathama kāṇḍe nirṇītam avakīrṇi paśuḥ ca tadvat ādhānasya aprāpta kāla tvāt iti anena yat prāyaścittam
tat na naiṣṭhike bhavitum arhati
kutas ārūḍhaḥ naiṣṭhikam iti smṛtyā patana śruti anumānāt tad prāyaścitta ayogāt
upa pūrvam api iti eke bhāvam aśana vat tat uktam
śrutiḥ tāvat sarasataḥ saṅkacat vṛttiḥ brahmacāri mātrasya naiṣṭhikasya upakurvāṇasya ca aviśeṣeṇa prāyaścittam upadiśati sākṣāt
prāyaścittam na paśyāmi iti tu smṛtiḥ

original: tasyāmapi ca sākṣātprāyaścittaṃ na kartavyamiti prāyaścittaniṣedho na gamyate,
analyzed: tasyām api ca sākṣāt prāyaścittam na kartavyam iti prāyaścitta niṣedhaḥ na gamyate
na paśyāmi iti tu darśana abhāvena saḥ numātavyaḥ

original: tathā ca smṛtirniṣedhārtheti anumāya tadarthā śrutiranumātavyā /
analyzed: tathā ca smṛtiḥ niṣedha arthā iti anumāya tad arthā śrutiḥ anumātavyā
śrutiḥ tu sāmānya viṣayā viśeṣam upasarpantī śīghra pravṛttiḥ iti
smārtam prāyaścitta adarśanam tu yatna gaurava artham
etat uktam bhavati kṛta nirṇejanaiḥ api etaiḥ na saṃkhyānam kartavyam iti

original: sūtrārthastu-upapūrvamapi pātakaṃ naiṣṭhikasyāvakīrṇitvaṃ na mahāpātakamapirevakārārthe ata eke prāyaścittabhāvamicchantīti /
analyzed: sūtra arthaḥ tu upa pūrvam api pātakam naiṣṭhikasya avakīrṇi tvam na mahāpātakam apiḥ eva kāra arthe atas eke prāyaścitta bhāvam icchanti iti
ācāryāṇām vipratipattau viśeṣa abhāvāt sāmyam bhavet

original: śāstrasthā yā vā prasiddhiḥ sā grāhyā śāstramūlatvāt /
analyzed: śāstra sthā yā vā prasiddhiḥ sā grāhyā śāstra mūla tvāt
ca prāyaścitta bhāva prasiddheḥ śāstra mūla tvam iti
sugamam itaram

original: yadi naiṣṭhikādīnāmasti prāyaścittaṃ tatkimetaiḥ kṛtanirṇejanaiḥ saṃvyavahartavyamuta neti /
analyzed: yadi naiṣṭhika ādīnām asti prāyaścittam tat kim etaiḥ kṛta nirṇejanaiḥ saṃvyavahartavyam uta na iti

original: tatra doṣakṛtatvādasaṃvyavahārasya prāyaścittena tannibarhaṇādanibarhaṇe vā tatkaraṇavaiyarthyātsaṃvyavahāryā eveti prāpta ucyati-
analyzed: tatra doṣa kṛta tvāt asaṃvyavahārasya prāyaścittena tad nibarhaṇāt anibarhaṇe vā tad karaṇa vaiyarthyāt saṃvyavahāryāḥ eva iti prāptaḥ ucyati
bahis tu ubhayathā api smṛteḥ ācārāt ca

original: niṣiddhakarmānuṣṭhānajanyameno lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhimāpādayati dvaidham lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhirapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇaiḥ
analyzed: niṣiddha karma anuṣṭhāna janyam enaḥ loka dvaye pi aśuddhim āpādayati dvaidham loka dvaye pi aśuddhiḥ apanīyate prāyaścittaiḥ enaḥ nibarhaṇam kurvāṇaiḥ

original: kasyācittu paralokāśuddhimātramapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇairihalokāśuddhistvenasāpāditā na śakyāpanetum /
analyzed: kasyācid tu paraloka aśuddhi mātram apanīyate prāyaścittaiḥ enaḥ nibarhaṇam kurvāṇaiḥ ihaloka aśuddhiḥ tu enasā āpāditā na śakyā apanetum
yathā strī bāla ādi ghātinām
yathā āhuḥ viśuddhān api dharmataḥ na saṃpibet iti

original: tathā ca 'prāyaścittairapaityeno yadajñānakṛtaṃ bhavet' kāmataḥ kṛtamapi /
analyzed: tathā ca prāyaścittaiḥ apaiti enaḥ yat ajñāna kṛtam bhavet kāmataḥ kṛtam api

original: bālaghrādistu kṛtanirṇejano 'pi vacanādavyavahārya iha loke jāyata iti /
analyzed: bālaghrādiḥ tu vacanāt avyavahāryaḥ iha loke jāyate iti
vacanam ca bālaghrān ca ityādi
tasmāt sarvam avadātam  /
svāminaḥ phala śruteḥ iti ātreyaḥ

original: prathame kāṇḍe śeṣalakṣaṇe tathākāma ityatrartviksaṃbandhe karmaṇaḥ siddhe kiṃ kāmo
analyzed: prathame kāṇḍe śeṣa lakṣaṇe tathākāmaḥ iti atra ṛtvij saṃbandhe karmaṇaḥ siddhe kim

original: yājamāna utārtvijya iti saṃśapyārtvijye 'pi karmaṇi yājamāna eva kāmo guṇaphaleṣviti
analyzed: yājamāne uta ārtvijye iti saṃśapya ārtvijye pi karmaṇi yājamāne eva kāmaḥ guṇa phaleṣu iti

original: nirṇītamihi tvevañjātīyakāni cāṅgasaṃbaddhāni upāsanāni kiṃ yājamānanyevotārtvijyānīti
analyzed: nirṇītam ihi tu evañjātīyakāni ca aṅga saṃbaddhāni upāsanāni kim yājamānani eva uta ārtvijyāni iti
vicāryate iti na punaruktam
tatra upāsakānām phala śravaṇāt anadhikāriṇaḥ tad anupapatteḥ yajamānasya ca karma janita phala upabhoga bhājaḥ
dhikārāt ṛtvijām ca tad anupapatteḥ vacanāt ca rāja ājñā sthānīyāt kkacid ṛtvijām phala śruteḥ asati

original: vacane yajamānasya phalavadupāsanaṃ tasya phalaśruteḥ taṃ ha bako dālabhyo vidāñcakāretyāderupāsanasya
analyzed: vacane yajamānasya phala vat upāsanam tasya phala śruteḥ tam ha bakaḥ dālabhyaḥ vidāñcakāra ityādeḥ upāsanasya
ca siddha viṣaya tayā anyāya apavāda sāmarthya bhāvāt yājamānam eva upāsanā karma iti prāptaḥ ucyate  /
ārtvijyam iti auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate
upākhyānāt tāvat upāsanam audgātram avagamyate
tat balavati sati bādhake nyathā upapādanīyam

original: na cartvikkartṛka upāsane yajamānagāmitā phalasyāsaṃbhavinī tena hi sa parikrīyastadgāmine phalāya ghaṭate /
analyzed: na ca ṛtvij kartṛke upāsane yajamāna gāmi tā phalasya asaṃbhavinī tena hi sa parikrīyaḥ tad gāmine phalāya ghaṭate
tasmāt na vyasani tā mātreṇa upākhyānam anyathayitum yuktam iti rāddhāntaḥ
tasmāt brāhmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityam nirvidya niścayena

original: labdhvā bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa iti /
analyzed: labdhvā bālyena tiṣṭhāset bālyam ca pāṇḍityam ca nirvidya atha muniḥ amaunam ca maunam ca nirvidya atha brāhmaṇaḥ iti

original: yatra hi vidhivibhaktiḥ śrūyate sa vidheyaḥ /
analyzed: yatra hi vidhi vibhaktiḥ śrūyate sa vidheyaḥ

original: bālyena tiṣṭhāsedityatra ca sā śrūyate na śrūyate tu maune /
analyzed: bālyena tiṣṭhāset iti atra ca sā śrūyate na śrūyate tu maune
tasmāt yathā atha brahmaṇaḥ iti etat aśrūyamāṇa vidhikam avidheyam evam maunam api
na ca apūrva tvāt vidheyam

original: tasmādbrāhnaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidyeti pāṇḍityavidhānādeva maunasiddheḥ pāṇḍityameva maunamiti /
analyzed: tasmāt brāhnaḥ pāṇḍityam nirvidya iti pāṇḍitya vidhānāt eva mauna siddheḥ pāṇḍityam eva maunam iti

original: athavā bhikṣuvacano 'yaṃ muniśabdastatra darśanāt 'gārhasthyamācāryakulaṃ maunaṃ vānaprastham' ityatra /
analyzed: athavā bhikṣu vacanaḥ yam muni śabdaḥ tatra darśanāt gārhasthyam ācārya kulam maunam vānaprastham iti atra
tasya anyatas vihitasya ayam anuvādaḥ

original: tasmādbālyamevātra vidhīyate maunaṃ tu prāptaṃ praśaṃsārthamanūdyata iti yuktam /
analyzed: tasmāt bālyam eva atra vidhīyate maunam tu prāptam praśaṃsā artham anūdyate iti yuktam
bhavet evam yadi paṇḍita paryāyaḥ muni śabdaḥ bhavet

original: api tu jñānamātraṃ pāṇḍityaṃ jñānātiśayasaṃpattistu maunaṃ tatprasiddheḥ /
analyzed: api tu jñāna mātram pāṇḍityam jñāna atiśaya saṃpattiḥ tu maunam tad prasiddheḥ
āśrama bhede tu tad pravṛttiḥ gārhasthya ādi pada saṃnidhānāt

original: tasmādapūrvatvānmaunasya bālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: tasmāt apūrva tvāt maunasya bālya pāṇḍitya apekṣayā tṛtīyam idam maunam jñāna atiśaya rūpam vidhīyate

original: evaṃ ca nirvedanīyatvamapi vidhāna āñjasaṃ syādityāha-
analyzed: evam ca nirvedanīya tvam api vidhāne āñjasam syāt iti āha
nirvedanīya tva nirdeśāt iti
kasya idam maunam vidhīyate vidyā sahakāri tayā iti atas āha
tadvataḥ vidyāvataḥ saṃnyāsinaḥ bhikṣoḥ
pṛcchati
katham iti
vidyāvat tā pratīyate na saṃnyāsi tā iti arthaḥ
uttaran
tad adhikārāt bhikṣoḥ tad adhikārāt
tat darśayati
ātmānam viditvā iti
