nanu iti
pariharati
atas āha pakṣeṇa iti
vidyāvān iti na vidyā atiśayaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: api tu vidyodayāyābhyāse pravṛtto na punarutpannavidyātiśayaḥ /
analyzed: api tu vidyā udayāya abhyāse pravṛttaḥ na punar utpanna vidyā atiśayaḥ
tathā ca asya pakṣe kadācid bheda darśanāt saṃbhavaḥ iti arthaḥ
vidhi ādiḥ vidhi mukhyaḥ pradhānam iti yāvat

original: ata eva samidādirvidhyantaḥ sa hi vidhiḥ pradhānavidheḥ paścāditi /
analyzed: atas eva samidh ādiḥ vidhi antaḥ sa hi vidhiḥ pradhāna vidheḥ paścāt iti
tatra aśrūyamāṇa vidhi tve pūrva tvāt vidhiḥ āstheyaḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu yadi ayam āśramaḥ bālya pradhānaḥ kasmāt punar gārhasthyena upasaṃharati iti codayati
evam bālya ādi viśiṣṭā iti
uttaram paṭhati
kṛtsna bhāvāt tu gṛhiṇā upasaṃhāraḥ

original: chāndogye bahulāyāsādhyakarmabahulatvādgārhasthyasya cāśramāntaradharmāṇāṃ ca keṣāñcidahiṃsādīnāṃ samavāyāttenopasaṃhāro na punastena samāpanādityarthaḥ
analyzed: chāndogye bahulāyāsa ādhya karma bahula tvāt gārhasthyasya ca āśrama antara dharmāṇām ca keṣāñcid ahiṃsā ādīnām samavāyāt tena upasaṃhāraḥ na punar tena samāpanāt iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ tadāśramadvayopanyāsena kkacitkadāciditarābhāvaśaṅkā mandabuddheḥ syāditi tadapākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram-
analyzed: evam tad āśrama dvaya upanyāsena kkacid kadācid itara abhāva śaṅkā manda buddheḥ syāt iti tad apākaraṇa artham sūtram
mauna vat itareṣām api upadeśāt

original: vṛttirvānaprasthānāmanekavidhairevaṃ brahmācāriṇo 'pīti vṛttibhedo 'nuṣṭhātāro vā puruṣā bhidyante,
analyzed: vṛttiḥ vānaprasthānām anekavidhaiḥ evam vṛtti bhedaḥ nuṣṭhātāraḥ vā puruṣāḥ bhidyante
tasmāt dvi tve pi bahuvacanam aviruddham
an āviṣkurvan anvayāt
bālyena iti yāvat bāla carita śruteḥ prasiddheḥ
śauca ādi niyama vidhāyinaḥ ca sāmānya śāstrasya anena viśeṣa śāstreṇa bādhanāt sakala bāla carita vidhānam iti
prāpte bhidhīyate vidyā aṅga tvena bālya vidhānāt samasta bāla caryāyām ca pradhāna virodha prasaṅgāt yat tad anuguṇam aprauḍha indriya tva ādi
bhāva śuddhi rūpam tat eva vidhīyate

original: evaṃ ca śāstrāntarābādhenāpyupapattau na śāstrāntarabādhanamanyāpyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti //50 // 3.4.16.41.
analyzed: evam ca śāstra antara ābādhena api upapattau na śāstra antara bādhanam anyāpyam bhaviṣyati iti
aihikam api aprastuta pratibandhe tad darśanāt
saṃgatim āha
sarva apekṣā ca iti

original: kiṃ śravaṇādibhirihaiva vā janmani vidyā sādhyate utāniyama iha vāmutra veti /
analyzed: kim śravaṇa ādibhiḥ iha eva vā janmani vidyā sādhyate uta aniyamaḥ iha vā amutra vā iti

original: yadyapi karmāṇi yajñādinyaniyataphalāni teṣāṃ ca vidyotpadasādhanatvena vidyotpādasyāniyamaḥ pratibhāti /
analyzed: yadi api karmāṇi yajña ādinya niyata phalāni teṣām ca vidyā utpada sādhana tvena vidyā utpādasya aniyamaḥ pratibhāti

original: tathāca garbhasthasya vāmadevasyātmapratibodhaśravaṇāt 'anekajanmasaṃsiddhastato yati parāṃ gatim' iti ca smaraṇādāmuṣmikatvamapyavagamyate
analyzed: tathā ca garbha sthasya vāmadevasya ātma pratibodha śravaṇāt aneka janma saṃsiddhaḥ tatas yati parām gatim iti ca smaraṇāt āmuṣmika tvam api avagamyate
tathā api yajña ādīnām prameyāṇām apramāṇa tvāt śravaṇa ādeḥ ca pramāṇa tvāt teṣām eva sākṣāt vidyā sādhana tvam
yajña ādīnām sattva śuddhi ādhānena vā vidyā utpādaka śravaṇa ādi lakṣaṇa pramāṇa pravṛtti vighna upaśamena vā
śravaṇa ādīnām tu anapekṣāmām eva vidyā utpādaka tvam

original: naca pramāṇeṣu pravartamānāḥ pramātāra aihikamapi cirabhāvinaṃ pramotpādaṃ kāmayante kintu tādātvikameva prāgeva tu pāralaukikam /
analyzed: na ca pramāṇeṣu pravartamānāḥ pramātāraḥ aihikam api cira bhāvinam pramā utpādam kāmayante kintu tādātvikam eva prāk eva tu pāralaukikam

original: nahi kumbhalādidṛkṣuścakṣuṣī samunmīlayati kālāntarīyāya kumbhadarśanāya kintu tādātvikāya /
analyzed: nahi kumbhala ādi dṛkṣuḥ cakṣuṣī samunmīlayati kāla antarīyāya kumbha darśanāya kintu tādātvikāya
tasmāt aihikaḥ eva vidyā utpādaḥ na aniyata kālaḥ

original: śrutismṛtī ca pāralaukikaṃ vidyotpādaṃ stutyā brātaḥ /
analyzed: śruti smṛtī ca pāralaukikam vidyā utpādam stutyāḥ brātar
itthaṃbhūtāni nāma śravaṇa ādīni āvaśyaka phalāni yat kāla antare vidyām utpādayanti iti

original: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-yata evātra vidyotpāde śravaṇādibhiḥ kartavye yajñādīnāṃ sattvāśuddhidvāreṇa
analyzed: evam prāptaḥ ucyate yatas eva atra vidyā utpāde śravaṇa ādibhiḥ kartavye yajña ādīnām sattva aśuddhi dvāreṇa

original: vā vighnopaśamadvārā vopayogo 'ta eva teṣāṃ yajñādīnāṃ karmāntarapratibandhāpratibandhābhyāmaniyataphalatvena
analyzed: vā vighna upaśama dvārā te eva teṣām yajña ādīnām karma antara pratibandha apratibandhābhyām aniyata phala tvena
tad apekṣāṇām śravaṇa ādīnām api aniyata phala tvam nyāṭya niyata phala tvam nyāṭyam anapahata vighnānām
śravaṇa ādīnām anutpādaka tvāt aviśuddha sattvāt vā puṃsaḥ pratyanutpādaka tvāt

original: tathāca teṣāṃ yajñādyapekṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ cāniyataphalatvena śravaṇādīnāmapyaniyataphalatvaṃ yuktamevaṃ śrutismṛtipratibandho na stutimātratvena  #
analyzed: tathā ca teṣām yajña ādi apekṣāṇām teṣām ca aniyata phalatvena śravaṇa ādīnām api aniyata phalatvam yuktam evam śruti smṛti pratibandhaḥ na stuti mātra tvena
vyākhyeyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: puruṣāśca vidyārthinaḥ sādhanasāmarthyānusāreṇa tadanurūpameva kāmayiṣyante tadidamuktam-abhisaṃdherniraṅkaśatvāditi //51 // 3.4.17.52.
analyzed: puruṣāḥ ca vidyā arthinaḥ sādhana sāmarthya anusāreṇa tad anurūpam eva kāmayiṣyante tat idam uktam abhisaṃdheḥ niraṅkaśa tvāt iti
evam mukti phala aniyamaḥ tad avasthā avadhṛteḥ tad avasthā avadhṛteḥ
yajña ādi upakṛta vidyā sādhana śravaṇa ādi vīrya viśeṣāt kila tad phale vidyāyām aihika muṣmika tva lakṣaṇaḥ utkarṣaḥ darśitaḥ

original: tathā ca yathā sādhanotkarṣanikarṣābhyāṃ tatphalasya vidyāyā utkarṣāvevaṃ vidyāphalasyāpi mukterutkarṣanikarṣau saṃbhāvyete /
analyzed: tathā ca yathā sādhana utkarṣa nikarṣābhyām tad phalasya vidyāyāḥ utkarṣau evam vidyā phalasya api mukteḥ utkarṣa nikarṣau saṃbhāvyete

original: naca muktāvaihikāmuṣmikatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣa upapadyate brahmopāsanāparipākalabdhajanmani vidyāyāṃ jīvato mukteravaśyaṃbhāvaniyamātsatyapyārabdhavipākakarmāprakṣaye
analyzed: na ca muktāḥ vaihika āmuṣmika tva lakṣaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ upapadyate brahma upāsanā paripāka labdha janmani vidyāyām jīvataḥ mukteḥ avaśyaṃbhāva niyamāt sati api ārabdha vipāka karma aprakṣaye
tasmāt muktau eva rūpataḥ nikarṣa utkarṣau syātām
apica saguṇānām vidyānām utkarṣa nikarṣābhyām tad phalānām utkarṣa nikarṣau dṛṣṭau iti

original: mukterapi vidyāphalatvādrūpataścotkarṣanikarṣau syātāmiti prāpata ucyate-na muktestatra
analyzed: mukteḥ api vidyā phala tvāt rūpataḥ ca utkarṣa nikarṣau syātām iti prāpataḥ ucyate na mukteḥ tatra
tatra aikarūpya śruteḥ upapatteḥ ca
sādhyam hi sādhana viśeśaṣāt viśeṣavat bhavati

original: naca muktirbrahmaṇo nityasvarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇā nityā satī sādhyā bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: na ca muktiḥ brahmaṇaḥ nitya svarūpa avasthāna lakṣaṇā nityā satī sādhyā bhavitum arhati
na ca sa vāsana niḥśeṣa kleśa karma āśaya prakṣayaḥ vidyā jarnma viśeṣavān
yena tad viśeṣāt mokṣaḥ viśeṣavān bhavet
na ca sa avaśeṣaḥ kleśa ādi prakṣayaḥ mokṣāya kalpate

original: naca cirācirotpādānutpādāvantareṇa vidyāyāmapi rūpato bhedaḥ kaścidupalakṣyate tasyā apyekarūpatvena śruteḥ /
analyzed: na ca cira acira utpāda anutpādau antareṇa vidyāyām api rūpataḥ bhedaḥ kaścid upalakṣyate tasyāḥ api eka rūpa tvena śruteḥ
saguṇāyāḥ tu vidyāyāḥ tad tad guṇau apodjhāmābhyām tad kāryasya phalasya utkarṣa nikarṣau yujyete

original: na cātra vidyātvaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na ca atra vidyā tvam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam bhavati
āgama tad prabhava yukti bādhita tvena kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvāt

original: tasmāttasyā muktyavasthāyā aikarūpyāvadhṛtermuktilakṣaṇasya phalasyāviśeṣo yukta iti //52 //

analyzed: yuktam hi purovartini dravye drāghīyasi sāmānya rūpeṇa ālocite viśeṣa rūpeṇa agṛhīte viśeṣa antara samāropaṇam

original: iha tu prakāśātmano nirviśeṣasāmānyasyāparādhīnaprakāśasya nāgṛhītamasti kiñcidrupamiti kasya viśeṣasyāgrahe kiṃ viśeṣāntaraṃ samāropyatām
analyzed: iha tu prakāśa ātmanaḥ nirviśeṣa sāmānyasya apara adhīna prakāśasya na agṛhītam asti kiñcid rupam iti kasya viśeṣasya agrahe kim viśeṣa antaram samāropyatām

original: tasmādbrahmaṇo jīvabhāvāropāsaṃbhavājjīvo jīvo brahma ca hrahmeti tatvamasīti pratīkopadeśa eveti prāptam /
analyzed: tasmāt brahmaṇaḥ jīva bhāva āropa asaṃbhavāt jīvaḥ jīvaḥ brahma ca hrahma iti tat tvam asi iti pratīka upadeśaḥ eva iti prāptam

original: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate---śvetaketorātmaiva parameśvaraḥpratipattavyo na tu śvetaketorvyatiriktaḥ parameśvaraḥ /
analyzed: evam prāpte bhidhīyate śvetaketoḥ ātmā eva parameśvaraḥ pratipattavyaḥ na tu śvetaketoḥ vyatiriktaḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: bhede hi gauṇatvāpattirna ca mukhyasaṃbhave gauṇatvaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: bhede hi gauṇa tva āpattiḥ na ca mukhya saṃbhave gauṇa tvam yuktam

original: apica pratīkopadeśe sakṛdvacanaṃ tu pratīyate bhedadarśananindā ca(?) /

abhyāse hi bhūyaḥ tvam arthasya bhavati
na alpa tvam ati davīyaḥ eva upacarita tvam
tasmāt paurvāparya locanayā śruteḥ tāvat jīvasya paramātma tā vāstavī iti etat para tā lakṣyate
māna antara vīrodhāt atra aprāmāṇyam śruteḥ

original: naca mānāntaravirodha ityādi tu sarvamupāditaṃ prathamādhyāye /

original: kasyacidaṃśasyāgrahaṇādvibhrama iva paramārthastu na vibhramo nāma kaścinna ca saṃsāro nāma /

original: anye 'pyāhuḥ---'yadyadvaite toṣo 'sti mukta evāsi sarvadā ' iti /

analyzed: jīvātmanaḥ ca avidyā darpaṇāḥ yathā brahma pratibimbakāḥ tathā yatra yatra manaḥ brahma ādityaḥ

original: brahmetyādiṣu brahmadṛṣṭerupadeśastatra sarvatrāhaṃ mana ityādi draṣṭavyaṃ brahmaṇo

ahaṅkāra āspadasya brahma tayā brahma tvena upāsanīyeṣu manaḥ prabhṛtiṣu api ahaṅkāra āspada tvena upāsanam iti ced na

original: tasmādyasya yanmātrātmatayopāsanaṃ vihitaṃ tasya tanmātrātmatayaiva pratipattavyaṃ 'yāvadvacanaṃ vācanikam 'iti nyāyāt /

original: naca sarvasya vākyajātasya prapañcasya vilayaḥ prayojanam /

original: etadato.bhavati---pradhānībhūtānāṃ na pratīkānāmucchedo yukto naca taducchede vidheyasyāpyupapattiriti /

lokeṣu iti saptamī dvitīyā arthe īṃ kathañcid nīyate

original: akāre gāvo vāsyantāṃ prāvāre kusumānītivat tenoktanyānurodhena saptamyāścobhayathāpyavaśyaṃ kalpanīyārthatvādvaraṃ yathāśrutadvitīyārthānurodhāya  #
analyzed: akāre gāvaḥ vāsyantām prāvāre kusumāni iti vat tena ukta nyā anurodhena saptamyāḥ ca ubhayathā api avaśyam kalpanīya artha tvāt varam yathāśruta dvitīyārtha anurodhāya
tṛtīyā arthe saptamī vyākhyātavyā
loka pṛthvī ādi buddhyā pañcavidham hiṅara prastāva oṅkāra udgītha pratihāra upadrava nidhana prakāram sāma upāsīta iti nirṇīyate

original: nanu yatrobhayatrāpi dvitīyānirdeśo yathā khalvamumevādityaṃ saptavidhaṃ hiṅkāraprastāvoṅkārodgīthapratīhāropadravanidhanaprakāraṃ sāmopāsīteti,
analyzed: nanu yatra ubhayatra api dvitīyā nirdeśaḥ yathā khalu amum eva ādityam saptavidham hiṅkāra prastāva oṅkāra udgītha pratīhāra upadrava nidhana prakāram sāma upāsīta iti
tatra kaḥ vinigamanāyām hetuḥ iti atas āha
tatra api iti

original: tatrāpi samastasya saptavidhasya sāmna upāsanamiti sāmna upāsyatvaśruteḥ sādhviti pañcavidhasya /
analyzed: tatra api samastasya saptavidhasya sāmnaḥ upāsanam iti sāmnaḥ upāsya tva śruteḥ sādhu iti pañcavidhasya
sādhu tvam ca asya dharma tvam
tathā ca śrutiḥ sādhu kārī sādhuḥ bhavati iti

original: hiṅkārānuvādena pṛthivīdṛṣṭividhāne hiṅkāraḥ pṛthivīti prāpte viparītanirdeśaḥ pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ //6 //
analyzed: hiṅkāra anuvādena pṛthivī dṛṣṭi vidhāne hiṅkāraḥ pṛthivī iti prāpte viparīta nirdeśaḥ pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ
āsīnaḥ saṃbhavāt

original: karmāṅgasaṃmandhiṣu yatra hi tiṣṭhataḥ karma coditaḥ tatra tatsaṃbaddhopāsānāni tiṣṭhataiva kratavyā /
analyzed: karma aṅga saṃmandhiṣu yatra hi tiṣṭhataḥ karma coditaḥ tatra tad saṃbaddha upāsānāni tiṣṭhatā eva kratavyā
yatra tu āsīnasya
na api samyak darśane vastu tantra tvāt pramāṇa tantra tvāt ca

original: pramāṇatantrā ca vastuvyavasthā pramāṇaṃ ca .....nāpekṣata iti tatrāpyaniyamaḥ(?) /
analyzed: pramāṇa tantrā ca vastu vyavasthā pramāṇam ca na apekṣate iti tatra api aniyamaḥ
yat mahatā prayatnena vinā upāsitum aśakyam yathā pratīka ādi
yathā vā samyak darśanam api tad tvam asi ādi
tatra eṣā cintā

original: tatra codakaśāstrābhāvādaniyame prāpte yathā śakāyata ityupabhandhādāsīnasyaiva siddham /
analyzed: tatra ca udaka śāstra abhāvāt aniyame prāpte yathā śakāyate iti upabhandhāt āsīnasya eva siddham

original: nanu yasyāmavasthāyāṃ dhyāyatirupacariyate prayujyate kimasau tadā tiṣṭhato na bhavati na bhavatītyāha /
analyzed: nanu yasyām avasthāyām dhyāyatiḥ upacariyate prayujyate kim asau tadā tiṣṭhataḥ na bhavati na bhavati iti āha
āsīnaḥ ca a vidyamāna āyāsaḥ bhavati iti
ati rohita artham itarat
yatra ekāgra tā tatra aviśeṣāt

original: same śucau śarkarāvahnivālukāvivarjita ityādivacanānniyame siddhe digdeśādiniyamamavācanikamapi prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajetetivadvaidikārambhasāmānyātkvacitkaścitadāśaṅkate
analyzed: same śucau śarkarā vahni vālukā vivarjite iti ādi vacanāt niyame siddhe diś deśa ādi niyamam avācanikam api prācīna pravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajeta iti vat vaidika ārambha sāmānyāt kvacid kaścid tat āśaṅkate
tam anugrahītum ācāryaḥ suhṛd bhāvena eva tat āha sma
yatra ekāgra tā manaḥ tatra eva bhāvanam prayojayat
o viśeṣāt
na hi atra asti vaiśvadeva ādi vat vacanam viśeṣa ikam tasmāt iti
ā prāyaṇāt tatra api hi dṛṣṭam
adhikaraṇa viṣayam vivecayati
tatra yāni tāvat iti
a vidyamāna niyojyā yā brahma ātma pratipattiḥ tasyāḥ

original: śāstraṃ hi niyojyasya kāryarūpaniyegasaṃbandhamavabodhayati tasyaiva karmaṇyaiśvaryalakṣaṇamadhikāraṃ
analyzed: śāstram hi niyojyasya kārya rūpa niyega saṃbandham avabodhayati tasya eva karmaṇi aiśvarya lakṣaṇam adhikāram
tat ca etat ubhayam atīndriya tvāt bhavati śāstra lakṣaṇam pramāṇa antara a prāpye śāstrasya arthavat tvāt brahma tva pratīteḥ tu

original: jīvanmuktena dṛṣṭatvānnāstīha tirohitamiva kiñcaneti kimatra śāstraṃ kariṣyati /
analyzed: jīvanmuktena dṛṣṭa tvāt na asti iha tirohitam iva kiñcana iti kim atra śāstram kariṣyati

original: nanvevamapyabhyudayaphalānyupāsanāni tatra niyoganiyojyalakṣaṇasya ca kramaṇi svāmitālakṣaṇasya
analyzed: nanu evam api abhyudaya phalāni upāsanāni tatra niyoga niyojya lakṣaṇasya ca kramaṇi svāmi tā lakṣaṇasya
ca saṃbandhasya atīndri tvāt tatra sakṛt kāraṇāt eva śāstra artha samāptau prāptāyām upāsana pada vedanīya āvṛtti mātram eva
kṛtavataḥ uparaṃmaḥ prāptaḥ tāvatā eva kṛta śāstra artha tvāt iti prāpte bhidhīyate sa vijñānaḥ
bhavati ityādi śruteḥ yatra svarga ādi phalānām api karmaṇām prāyaṇa kāle svarga ādi vijñāna apekṣaka tvam
tatra kā eva kathā atīndriya phalānām upāsanānām

original: tāni khalu āprāyaṇaṃ tattadupāsyagocarabuddhipravāhavāhitayā dṛṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa prāyaṇasamaye tadbuddiṃ bhāvayiṣyanti /
analyzed: tāni khalu āprāyaṇam tad tad upāsya gocara buddhi pravāha vāhi tayā dṛṣṭena eva rūpeṇa prāyaṇa samaye tad buddim bhāvayiṣyanti

original: kimatra phalavatprāyaṇasamaye buddhyākṣepeṇa nahi dṛṣṭe saṃbhavatyadṛṣṭakalpanā yuktā /
analyzed: kim atra phalavat prāyaṇa samaye buddhi ākṣepeṇa nahi dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā yuktā
tasmāt āprāyaṇam pravṛttā vṛttiḥ iti
tat idam uktam
pratyayāḥ tu ete iti

original: tathā ca śrutiḥ sarvādīndriyaviṣaya--'sa yathākraturasmāllokāt praiti tāvatkraturhāmuṃ lokaṃ pretyabhisaṃbhavati' iti /
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ yathā kratuḥ asmāt lokāt praiti tāvat kratuḥ ha amum lokam pra iti abhisaṃbhavati iti
kratuḥ saṃkalpa viśeṣaḥ
smṛtayaḥ ca udāhṛtāḥ iti
tad adhigame uttara pūrva ardhayoḥ aśleṣa vināśau tad vyapadeśāt
gataḥ tṛtīya śeṣaḥ sādhana gocaraḥ vicāraḥ
idānīm etad adhyāya gata phala viṣayā cintā pratanyate

original: tatra tāvatprathamamidaṃ vicāryate kiṃ brahmādhigame brahmajñāne sati brahmajñānaphalānmokṣādviparītaphalaṃ duritaṃ bandhanaphalaṃ kṣīyate  #
analyzed: tatra tāvat prathamam idam vicāryate kim brahma adhigame brahma jñāne sati brahma jñāna phalāt mokṣāt viparīta phalam duritam bandhana phalam kṣīyate  /
na kṣīyate iti saṃśayaḥ
kim tāvat prāptam

original: śāstreṇa hi phalāya yadvihitaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ cānarthaparihārāyāśvamedhādi brahmahatyādi
analyzed: śāstreṇa hi phalāya yat vihitam pratiṣiddham ca anartha parihārāya aśvamedha ādi brahmahatyā ādi
ca apūrva avāntara vyāpāram kim tat apūrvam uparate karmaṇi atra sukha dukha upabhogāt prāṅgā virantum arhati

original: sa hi tasya vināśahetusdabhāve kathaṃ vinaśyediti /
analyzed: sa hi tasya vināśa hetuḥ tad abhāve katham vinaśyet iti
ti ākasmika tva prasaṅgāt śāstra vyākopāt ca iti

original: adattaphalaṃ cetkarmāpūrvaṃ vinaśyati karmaṇa eva phalaprasavasāmarthyabodhakaśāstramapramāṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: adatta phalam ced karma apūrvam vinaśyati karmaṇaḥ eva phala prasava sāmarthya bodhaka śāstram apramāṇam bhavet

original: naca prāyaścittamiva brahmajñānamadattaphalānyapi karmapūrvāṇi kṣiṇotīti sāmpratam /
analyzed: na ca prāyaścittam iva brahma jñānam adatta phalāni api karma pūrvāṇi kṣiṇoti iti sāmpratam
prāyaścittānām api tad aprakṣaya hetu tvāt tad vidhānasya ca enasvi nara adhikāri prāpti mātreṇa upapattau upātta durita nibarhaṇa phala ākṣepaka tva ayogāt

original: ata eva smaranti nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karmeti /
analyzed: atas eva smaranti na abhuktam kṣīyate karma iti

original: yadi punarapekṣitopāyatātmā prāyaścittavidhirna niyojyaviśeṣapratilambhamātreṇa nirvṛṇotītyapekṣitakāṅkṣāyāṃ doṣasaṃyogena śravaṇāttannibarhaṇaphalaḥ  #
analyzed: yadi punar apekṣita upāya tā ātmā prāyaścitta vidhiḥ na niyojya viśeṣa pratilambha mātreṇa nirvṛṇoti iti apekṣita kāṅkṣāyām doṣa saṃyogena śravaṇāt tad nibarhaṇa phalaḥ  /
kalpeta
tathā api brahma jñānasya tad saṃyogena a śravaṇa na t uparita nibarhaṇa sāmarthye pramāṇam asti
tasya api svarga ādi phalavat deśa kāla nimitta apekṣayā upapatteḥ

original: śāstraprāmāṇyātsaṃbhaviṣyatyasāvavasthā yasyāmupabhogena samastakarmakṣaye brahmajñānaṃ mokṣaṃ prasoṣyati /
analyzed: śāstra prāmāṇyāt saṃbhaviṣyati asau avasthā yasyām upabhogena samasta karma kṣaye brahma jñānam mokṣam prasoṣyati

original: yogādhdyairva vā divi bhuvyantarīkṣe bahūni śarīrendriyāṇi nirmāya phalānayupabhujyarddhena yogasāmarthyena yogī karmāṇi kṣapayitvā mokṣī saṃpatsyate
analyzed: vā divi bhuvi antarīkṣe bahūni śarīra indriyāṇi nirmāya yoga sāmarthyena yogī karmāṇi kṣapayitvā mokṣī saṃpatsyate

original: sthite caitasminnarthe nyāyabalādyathā puṣkarapalāśa ityādivyapadeśo brahmavidyāstutimātraparatayā
analyzed: sthite ca etasmin arthe nyāya balāt yathā puṣkarapalāśaḥ ityādi vyapadeśaḥ brahma vidyā stuti mātra para tayā

original: vyākhyeya iti prāpta ucyate--vyākhyāyetaivaṃ vyapadeśo yadi karmavirodhaḥ syānna tvayamasti /
analyzed: vyākhyeyaḥ iti prāptaḥ ucyate vyākhyāyeta evam vyapadeśaḥ yadi karma virodhaḥ syāt na tu ayam asti

original: śāstraṃ hi phalotpādanasāmarthyamātraṃ karmaṇāmavagamayati na tu kutaścidāgantukānnimittataḥ prāyaścittādestadapratibandhamapi /
analyzed: śāstram hi phala utpādana sāmarthya mātram karmaṇām avagamayati na tu kutaścid āgantukāt nimittataḥ prāyaścitta ādeḥ tad apratibandham api
tasya tatra audāsīnyāt

original: yadi śāstrabodhitaphalaprasavasāmarthyamapratibaddhamāgantukena kenacit karmaṇā tatastatphalaṃ prasūta evāti na śāstravyāghātaḥ /
analyzed: yadi śāstra bodhita phala prasava sāmarthyam apratibaddham āgantukena kenacid karmaṇā tatas tad phalam prasūtaḥ eva ati na śāstra vyāghātaḥ
na abhuktam karma kṣīyate eti ca smaraṇa pratibaddha sāmarthya karma abhiprāyam
ca apara vidyānām asti prāyaścitta vat vidhānam aiśvarya bhalānām api ubhaya saṃyoga aviśeṣāt

original: yatrāpi nirguṇāyāṃ paravidyāyāṃ doṣoddheśo nāsti tatrāpi tatsvabhāvālocanādeva tatprakṣayaprasavasāmarthyamavasīyate /
analyzed: yatra api nirguṇāyām para vidyāyām doṣa uddheśaḥ nā asti tatra api tad svabhāva ālocanāt eva tad prakṣaya prasava sāmarthyam avasīyate

original: nahi tatvamasivākyārthaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭanikhilakartṛbhokktṛtvādivibhramo jīvaḥ phalopabhogona yujyate /
analyzed: nahi tatvamasi vākya artha paribhāvanā bhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭa nikhila kartṛ bhokktṛ tva ādi vibhramaḥ jīvaḥ phala upabhogona yujyate

original: nahi rajjavāṃ bhujaṅkasamāropanibandhanā bhayakampādayaḥ sati rajjutatvasākṣātkāre prabhavanti,
analyzed: nahi rajjavām bhujaṅka samāropa nibandhanāḥ bhaya kampa ādayaḥ sati rajju tatva sākṣātkāre prabhavanti
kintu saṃskāra śeṣāt kiñcid kālam anuvṛttāḥ api nivartante eva

original: amumevārthamanuvadanto yathā puṣkarapalāśa ityādayo vyapadeśāḥ samavetārthāḥ santo na stutimātratayā kathañcidvyākhyānamarhanti /
analyzed: amum eva artham anuvadantaḥ yathā puṣkarapalāśaḥ ityādayaḥ vyapadeśāḥ samaveta arthāḥ santaḥ na stuti mātra tayā kathañcid vyākhyānam arhanti

original: nanūktaṃ saṃbhaviṣyanti sāvasthā jīvātmano yasyāṃ paryāyeṇopabhogādvā yogarddheḥ
analyzed: nanu uktam saṃbhaviṣyanti sā avasthāḥ jīvātmanaḥ yasyām paryāyeṇa upabhogāt vā yoga ṛddheḥ
prabhāvataḥ yugapad na ekavidha kāya nirmāṇena aparyāyeṇa upabhogāt vā jantuḥ karmāṇi kṣapayitvā
mokṣī saṃpatsyate iti atas āha
evam eva ca mokṣaḥ upapadyate iti

original: anādikālapravṛttā hi karmāśayā aniyatakālavipākāḥ kramavatā tāvadbhogena kṣetumaśakyāḥ /
analyzed: anādi kāla pravṛttāḥ hi karma āśayāḥ aniyata kāla vipākāḥ kramavatā tāvat bhogena kṣetum aśakyāḥ
bhuñjānaḥ khalu ayam aparān api saṃcinoti karma āśayān iti
na api aparyāyam upabhogena āsaktaḥ karmāntarāṇi a saṃcinvānaḥ kṣeṣyati iti sāmpratam
kalpa śatāni krama kāla bhogyānām samprati bhoktu sāmarthyāt
dīrgha kāla phalāni ca karmāṇi katham eka pade kṣeṣyanti

original: nanu satsvapi karmāśayāntareṣusukhadukhaphaleṣu mokṣaphalāt karmaṇaḥ samudācarato brahmabhāvamanubhūyātha labdhavipākānāṃ karmāntarāṇāṃ phalāni  #
analyzed: nanu satsu api karma āśaya antareṣu sukha dukha phaleṣu mokṣa phalāt karmaṇaḥ samudācarataḥ brahma bhāvam anubhūya atha labdha vipākānām karmāntarāṇām phalāni
bhokṣyante iti āha
na ca deśa kāla nimitta apekṣāḥ iti

original: nahi kāryaḥ sanmokṣo mokṣo bhavitumarhati brahmabhāvo hi saḥ /
analyzed: nahi kāryaḥ sat mokṣaḥ mokṣaḥ bhavitum arhati brahma bhāvaḥ hi saḥ
na ca brahma kriyate niya tvāt iti arthaḥ
parokṣa tva anupatteḥ ca jñāna phalasya
jñāna phalam khalu mokṣaḥ bhyupeyate
jñānasya ca anantara bhāvinī jñeya abhivyaktiḥ phalam
sā eva avidyā ucchedam ādadhatī brahma svabhāva svarūpa avasthāna lakṣaṇāya mokṣāya kalpate
evam hi dṛṣṭārtha tā jñānasya syāt

original: apūrvādhānaparamparayā jñānasya mokṣaphale kalpyamāne jñānasya parokṣaphalatvamadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: apūrva ādhāna paramparayā jñānasya mokṣa phale kalpyamāne jñānasya parokṣa phala tvam adṛṣṭārtha tvam bhavet
na ca dṛṣṭe saṃbhavati adṛṣṭa kalpanā yuktā iti arthaḥ
tasmāt brahma adhigame brahma jñāne sati advaita siddhau durita kṣayaḥ iti siddham
itarasya api evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu

original: adharmasya svābhāvikatvena rāgādinibandhanatvena śāstrīyeṇa brahmajñānena pratibandho yuktaḥ /
analyzed: adharmasya svābhāvika tvena rāga ādi nibandhana tvena śāstrīyeṇa brahma jñānena pratibandhaḥ yuktaḥ
dharma jñānayoḥ tu śāstrīya tvena
jyotiṣṭoma darśa paurṇamāsa virodhāt na ucchedya ucchettṛ bhāvaḥ yujyate
pāpnamanaḥ ca viśeṣataḥ brahma jñāna ucchedya tva śruteḥ tad ucchedya tvam
viśeṣa vidhānasya śeṣa pratiṣedha nāntarīyaka tvena lokataḥ siddheḥ

original: yathā devadatto dakṣiṇenākṣṇā paśyatītyukte na vāmena paśyatīti gamyate /
analyzed: yathā devadattaḥ dakṣiṇena akṣṇā paśyati iti ukte na vāmena paśyati iti gamyate

original: ubhe hyevaiṣa ete taratīti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ,
analyzed: ubhe hi eva eṣa ete tarati iti ca yathāsaṃbhavam
brahma jñānena duṣkṛtam bhogena sukṛtam iti

original: 'kṣīyante cāsya karmaṇi' iti ca sāmānyavacanaṃ 'sarve pāpmānaḥ' iti viśeṣaśravaṇātpāpakarmāṇīti viśeṣe upasaṃharaṇīyam /
analyzed: kṣīyante ca asya karmaṇi iti ca sāmānya vacanam sarve pāpmānaḥ iti viśeṣa śravaṇāt pāpa karmāṇi iti viśeṣe upasaṃharaṇīyam

original: tasmādbrahmajñānādduṣkṛtasyaiva kṣayo na sukṛtasyeti prāpte pūrvādhikaraṇarāddhānto 'tidiśyate /
analyzed: tasmāt brahma jñānāt duṣkṛtasya eva kṣayaḥ na sukṛtasya iti prāpte pūrva adhikaraṇa rāddhāntau tidiśyate

original: no khalu brahmavidyā kenacidadṛṣṭena dvāreṇa duṣkṛtamapanayatyapi tu dṛṣṭenaiva bhoktṛbhoktavyabhogādipravilayadvāreṇa taccaitattulyaṃ sukṛtepīti  #
analyzed: no khalu brahmavidyā kenacid adṛṣṭena dvāreṇa duṣkṛtam apanayati api tu dṛṣṭena eva bhoktṛ bhoktavya bhoga ādi pravilaya dvāreṇa tat ca etat tulyam sukṛte pi iti
katham etat api na ucchindyāt

original: evaṃ ca satina śāstrīyatvasāmyamātramavirodhaheturanahi pratyakṣatvasāmānyamātrādavirodho jalānalādīnāṃ /
analyzed: evam ca sati na śāstrīya tva sāmya mātram avirodha hetuḥ anahi pratyakṣa tva sāmānya mātrāt avirodhaḥ jala anala ādīnām
na ca sukṛta śāstram anarthakam abrahma vidam prati tad vidheḥ arthavat tvāt
evam avasthite ca pāpma śrutyā puṇyam api grahītavyam
brahma jñānam apekṣya puṇyasya nikṛṣṭa phala tvāt tad phalam hi kṣaya atiśayāt
na hi evam mokṣaḥ niratiśaya tvāt nitya tvāt ca
dṛṣṭa prayogaḥ ca ayam pāpma śabdaḥ vede puṇya pāpayoḥ

original: tadyathā puṇyapāpe anukramya sarve pāpmāno 'to nivartaneta ityatra /
analyzed: tat yathā puṇya pāpe anukramya sarve pāpmānaḥ taḥ nivartana itas iti atra
tasmāt aviśeṣeṇa puṇya pāpayoḥ aśleṣa vināśau iti siddham
anārabdha kārye eva tu pūrve tad avadheḥ
yadi advaita jñāna svabhāva ālocanayā uttara pūrva sukṛta duṣkṛtayoḥ aśleṣa vināśau hanta ārabdha anārabdha kāryayoḥ ca aviśeṣeṇa eva vināśaḥ syāt
kartṛ karma ādi pravilayasya ubhayatra aviśeṣāt
tad nibandhana tvāt ca vināśasya
na ca saṃskāra śeṣāt kulāla cakra bhramaṇa vat anuvṛttiḥ
vastunaḥ khalu anuvṛttiḥ

original: māyaivādinaśca puṇyapāpayoścamāyāmātravinirmitatvena māyānivṛttau na puṇyāpuṇye na tatasaṃskāro vastusantīti kasyānuvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: māyā evādinaḥ ca puṇya pāpayoḥ ca māyā mātra vinirmita tvena māyā nivṛttau na puṇya apuṇye na tata saṃskāraḥ vastu santi iti kasya anuvṛttiḥ

original: naca rajjau sarpādivibramajanitā bhayakamapādayo nivṛtte 'pi vibhrame yathānuvartante tathehāpīti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca rajjau sarpa ādi vibrama janitāḥ vibhrame yathā anuvartante tathā iha api iti yuktam

original: tatrāpi sarpāsatve 'pi tajjānasya satve tajjanitabhayakampādīnāṃ tatsaskārāṇāṃ ca vastusattvena nivṛtte 'pi vibhrame 'nivṛtteḥ /
analyzed: tatra api tad jānasya sattve tad janita bhaya kampa ādīnām tad saskārāṇām ca vastu sattvena nivṛtte vibhrame nivṛtteḥ

original: atra tu māyā na tajjaḥ saṃskāro na tadgocara iti tucchatvātkimanuvarteta /
analyzed: atra tu māyā na tad jaḥ saṃskāraḥ na tad gocaraḥ iti tuccha tvāt kim anuvarteta
na saṃskāra śeṣaḥ na karma iti aviśeṣeṇa ārabdha kāryāṇām anārabdha kāryāṇām ca nivṛttiḥ

original: naca tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃmapatya iti śruterdehāpratīkṣārabdhakāryāṇāṃ yuktā. nahyeṣā śrutiravadhibhedavidhāyinyapi  #
analyzed: na ca tasya tāvat eva ciram yāvat na vimokṣye iti śruteḥ deha a pratīkṣā ārabdha kāryāṇām yuktā na hi eṣā śrutiḥ avadhi bheda vidhāyinī api
tu kṣipra tā aparā

original: yathā loka etāvanme ciraṃ yatsanāto bhuñjānaśceti /
analyzed: yathā lokaḥ etāvat me ciram yat sanātanam bhuñjānaḥ ca iti

original: nahi tatra snānabhojane avadhitvena vidhīyate kitu kṣapīyastā pratipādyate. ubhayavidhāne
analyzed: nahi tatra snāna bhojane avadhi tvena vidhīyate kitu kṣapīyaḥ tā pratipādyate ubhaya vidhāne
hi vākyam bhidyeta avadhi bhedaḥ cira tā ca iti prāpte bhidhīyate yadi api advaita brahma tatva sākṣātkāraḥ
itayā tad madhya patita sakala karma viredhī

original: tathāpyanārabdhavipākaṃ karmajātaṃ drāgityeva samucchinatti na tvārabdhavipākaṃ saṃpāditajātyāyurvitatapūrvāparībhītasukhaduḥkhopabhogapravāhaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā api anārabdha vipākam karma jātam drāk iti eva samucchinatti na tu ārabdha vipākam saṃpādita jāti āyuḥ vitata pūrva aparībhīta sukha duḥkha upabhoga pravāham
karma jātam
tat hi samudācarat vṛtti tayā itarebhyaḥ prasupta vṛttibhyaḥ balavat

original: anyathā devarṣīṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhamanūddālakaprabhṛtīnāṃvigalitanikhilakleśajālāvaramatayā paritaḥ pradyotamānabuddhisatvānāṃ na jyogjīvitā bhavet
analyzed: anyathā devarṣīṇām hiraṇyagarbha manu uddālaka prabhṛtīnām vigalita nikhila kleśa jāla avarama tayā paritas pradyotamāna buddhi satvānām na jyok jīvitā bhavet

original: śrūyate caiṣāṃ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tatvajñatā ca mahākalpakalpamanvantarādijīvitā ca /
analyzed: śrūyate ca eṣām śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu tatva jña tā ca mahākalpa kalpa manvantara ādi jīvi tā ca

original: na caite mahadhiyo na tadīyasamastaphalopabhogapratīkṣā satyapi tatvasākṣātkāre /
analyzed: na ca ete maha dhiyaḥ na tadīya samasta phala upabhoga pratīkṣā sati api tatva sākṣātkāre

original: tāvadeva ciramiti na ciratā vidhīyate. api tu śrutyantarasiddhāṃ ciratāmanūdya dehapātāvadhimātravidhānaṃ tadetadabhisaṃdhāyaucityamātratayāha  #
analyzed: tāvat eva ciram iti na ciratā vidhīyate api tu śruti antara siddhām ciratām anūdya dehapāta avadhi mātra vidhānam tat etat abhisaṃdhāya aucitya mātra tayā āha
bhagavān bhāṣyākāraḥ
na tāvat an āśritya ārabdha kāryam karma āśayam iti

original: na cedaṃ na jātu dṛṣṭaṃ yadviredhisamavāye viroddhyantaramanuvartata ityāha---
analyzed: na ca idam na jātu dṛṣṭam yat viredhi samavāye viroddhi antaram anuvartate iti āha
akartṛ ātma bodhaḥ pi iti

original: yadā loke 'pi virodhinoḥ kiñcitkālaṃ sahānuvṛttirupalabdhā tadehagamabalāddīrghakālamapi bhavatīti na śakyā nivārayitum /
analyzed: yadā virodhinoḥ kiñcid kālam saha anuvṛttiḥ upalabdhā tad deha gama balāt dīrgha kālam api bhavati iti na śakyā nivārayitum
pramāṇa siddhasya niyoga paryanuyoga anupapatteḥ

original: tadevaṃ madhyasthanapratipādya ye bhāṣyakāramāptaṃ manyate tān pratyāha---
analyzed: tat evam ye bhāṣyakāram āptam manyate tān pratyāha
apica na eva atra vivaditavyam iti
sthita prajñaḥ ca na sādhakaḥ tasya uttara uttara dhyāna utkarṣeṇa pūrva pratyaya anavasthita tvāt
niratiśayaḥ tu sthita prajñaḥ
sa ca siddhaḥ eva
na ca jñāna kāryāḥ bhaya kampa ādayaḥ
jñāna mātrāt anutpādāt
sarpa avacchedaḥ hi tasya bhaya kampa ādi hetuḥ

original: sa cāsanna nirvacanīya iti kuto vastusataḥ karyotpādaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca āsan na nirvacanīyaḥ iti kutas vastu sataḥ karyā utpādaḥ
bhaya kampa ādi vastu sat
tasya api vicāra asaha tvena anirvācya tvāt
anirvācyāt ca anirvācya utpattau na anupapattiḥ
yādṛśaḥ hi yakṣaḥ tādṛśaḥ baliḥ iti sarvam avadātam
agnihotra ādi tu tad kāryāya eva tad darśanāt

original: yadi puṇyasyāpyaśleṣavināśau hanta nityamapyagnihotrādi na kartavyaṃ yogamārūrukṣuṇā /
analyzed: yadi puṇyasya api aśleṣa vināśau hanta nityam api agnihotra ādi na kartavyam yogam ārūrukṣuṇā
tasya api itara puṇya vat vidyayā vināśāt
prakṣālanāt hi paṅkasya dūrāt asparśanam varam iti nyāyāt

original: naca vividiṣanti yajñena dāneneti mokṣalakṣaṇaikakāryatayā vidyākarmaṇoravirodhaḥ /
analyzed: na ca vividiṣanti yajñena dānena iti mokṣa lakṣaṇa eka kārya tayā vidyā karmaṇoḥ avirodhaḥ
saha asaṃbhavena eka kāryatva asaṃbhavāt

original: nahyetamātmānaṃ viduṣo vigalitākhilakartṛtvādiprapañcavibhramasya pūrvottare nitye kriyājanye puṇye saṃbhavataḥ /
analyzed: na hi etam ātmānam viduṣaḥ vigalita akhila kartṛ tva ādi prapañca vibhramasya pūrva uttare nitye kriyā janye puṇye saṃbhavataḥ

original: tasmādvividiṣanti yajñeneti vartamānāpadeśo brahmajñānasya yajñādīnāṃ vā stutimātraṃ na tu mokṣamāṇasya muktisādhanaṃ yajñādividhiriti prāpta  #
analyzed: tasmāt vividiṣanti yajñena iti vartamāna apadeśaḥ brahma jñānasya yajña ādīnām vā stuti mātram na tu mokṣamāṇasya mukti sādhanam yajña ādi vidhiḥ iti prāpta
ucyate
satyam na vidyayā eka kārya tvam karmaṇām paraspara virodhena saha asaṃbhavāt
vidyā utpādaka tayā tu karmaṇām ārāt upakārakāṇām astu mokṣa upayogaḥ

original: naca karmaṇāṃ vidyayā virudhyamānānāṃ na vidyākāraṇatvaṃ,
analyzed: na ca karmaṇām vidyayā virudhyamānānām na vidyā kāraṇa tvam
sva kāraṇa virodhinām kāryāṇām bahulam upalabdheḥ
tathā ca vidyā lakṣaṇa kārya upāya tayā kārya vināśyānām api karmaṇām upādānam arthavat
tad abhāve tad kāryasya anutpādena mokṣasya asaṃbhavāt

original: evañca vividiṣanti yajñeneti yajñasādhanatvaṃ vidyāya apūrvamarthaṃ prāpayataḥ pañcamalakārasya nātyantaparokṣavṛttitayā jñānastutyarthatayā  #
analyzed: evam ca vividiṣanti yajñena iti yajña sādhana tvam vidyāya apūrvam artham prāpayataḥ pañcama lakārasya na atyanta parokṣa vṛtti tayā jñāna stuti artha tayā
kathañcid vyākhyānam bhaviṣyati
tat anena abhisamadhinā uktam

original: jñānasyeva hi prāpakaṃ satkarama praṇaḍyā mokṣakāraṇamityupacaryate /
analyzed: jñānasya iva hi prāpakam praṇaḍyā mokṣa kāraṇam iti upacaryate

original: yata eva na vidyodayasamaye karmāsti nāpi parastādapi tu prāgeva vidyāyāḥ,
analyzed: yatas eva na vidyā udaya samaye karma asti nā api parastāt api tu prāk eva vidyāyāḥ
atas eva ca atikrānta viṣayam etat kārya ekatva abhidhānam
etat eva sphorayati
na hi brahma vidaḥ iti
sūtra antaram avatārayitum pṛcchati
kiṃviṣayam punar idam iti
asya uttaram sūtram
atas nyā api hi ekeṣām ubhayoḥ
kāmya karma viṣayam aśle

original: vināśavacanaṃ śākhāntarīyavacanaṃ ca tasya putrā dāyamupayantīti //17 //
analyzed: vināśa vacanam śākhāntarīya vacanam ca tasya putrāḥ dāyam upayanti iti
yat eva vidyayā iti hi

original: asti vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ yajñādi ya evaṃ vidvānyajetetyādikam /
analyzed: asti vidyā saṃyuktam yajña ādi yaḥ evam vidvān yajeta iti ādikam
asti ca kevalam

original: tatra yathā brāhmaṇāya hiraṇyaṃ dadyādiyukte viduṣe brāhmaṇāya dadyātra brāhmaṇabruvāya mūkhāyeti viśeṣapratilambhaḥ tatkasya hetostasyātiśayavatvāt
analyzed: tatra yathā brāhmaṇāya hiraṇyam dadyāt iyukte viduṣe brāhmaṇāya dadyāt atra brāhmaṇabruvāya mūkhāya iti viśeṣa pratilambhaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tasya atiśayava tvāt
evam vidyā rahitāt yajña ādeḥ vidyā sahitam atiśayavat iti tasya eva paravidyā sādhana tvam upātta durita kṣaya dvārā na itasya
tasmāt vividiṣanti yajñena iti aviśeṣa śrutam api vidyā sahite yajña ādau upasaṃhartavyam iti

original: prāpte 'bhidhīyate--yadeva vidyayā karāti tadevāsya vīryavattaramiti tarabarthaśrutervidyārahitasya
analyzed: prāpte bhidhīyate yat eva vidyayā karāti tat eva asya vīryavattaram iti tarap artha śruteḥ vidyā rahitasya
vīryavat tā mātram avagamyate
na ca sarvathā akiñcitkarasya tat upapadyate

original: tasmādastyasyāpi kayāpi mātrayā paravidyotpādopayoga iti vidyārahitamapi yajñādi paravidyārthinānuṣṭheyamiti siddham //18 //
analyzed: tasmāt asti asya api kayā api mātrayā para vidyā utpāda upayogaḥ iti vidyā rahitam api yajña ādi para vidyā arthinā anuṣṭheyam iti siddham
bhogena tu itare kṣapayitvā saṃpadyate

original: anārabdhakārya ityasya nañaḥ phalaṃ bhogena nivṛttiṃ darśayatyanena sūtreṇa /
analyzed: anārabdha kāryaḥ iti asya nañaḥ phalam bhogena nivṛttim darśayati anena sūtreṇa

original: asya tūpapādanaṃ purastādapakṛṣya kṛtamiti neha kriyate punaruktibhayāt //19 //
analyzed: asya tu upapādanam purastāt apakṛṣya kṛtam iti na iha kriyate punarukti bhayāt

original: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī vācaspatimiśra viracite śārīraka bhagavat pāda bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām caturthasya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ
caturthe dhyāye dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
vāc manasi darśanāt śabdāt ca

original: athāsmin phalavicāralakṣaṇe vāṅmanasi saṃpadyata ityādivicāro 'saṃgata ityata āha--
analyzed: atha asmin phala vicāra lakṣaṇe vāc manasi saṃpadyate ityādi vicāraḥ saṃgataḥ iti atas āha
atha aparāsu vidyāsu phala prāptaye iti

original: aparavidyāphalaprāptyarthadevayānamārgārthatvādutkrāntestadgato vicāraḥ pāramparyeṇa bhavati phalavicāra iti nāsaṃgata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: apara vidyā phala prāpti artha deva yāna mārga artha tvāt utkrānteḥ tad gataḥ vicāraḥ pāramparyeṇa bhavati phala vicāraḥ iti na asaṃgataḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanvayamutkrāntikramo viduṣo nopapadyate 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantyatraiva samavanīyante' iti śravaṇāttatkathamasya vidyādhikāra ityata āha--
analyzed: nanu ayam utkrānti kramaḥ viduṣaḥ nā upapadyate na tasya prāṇāḥ utkrāmanti atra eva samavanīyante iti śravaṇāt tat katham asya vidyā adhikāraḥ iti atas āha
samānā hi vidvat a viduṣoḥ iti
viṣayam āha
asti iti
vimṛśati
kim iha iti
viśayaḥ saṃśayaḥ
pūrvapakṣam āha
tatra vāc eva iti
śrati lakṣaṇa aviśaye saṃśaye
siddhānta sūtram pūrayitvā paṭhati
vāc vṛttiḥ manasi saṃpadyate iti
vṛtti adhyāhāra prayojanam praśna pūrvakam āha
katham iti
uttara adhikaraṇa paryālocanena evam pūritam iti arthaḥ

original: tattvasya dharmiṇo vācaḥ pralayavivakṣāyāṃ tviha sarvatraiva paratreha cāvibhāgasāmyātkiṃ paratraiva viṃśiṣyādavibhāga iti na tvatrāpi /
analyzed: tattvasya dharmiṇaḥ vācaḥ pralaya vivakṣāyām tu iha sarvatra eva paratra iha ca avibhāga sāmyāt kim paratra eva viṃśiṣyāt avibhāgaḥ iti na tu atra api
tasmāt tra vṛtti upasaṃhāra mātra vivakṣā sūtrakārasya iti gamyate
siddhānta hetum praśna pūrvakam āha
kasmāt iti
satyām eva manaḥ vṛttau vāc vṛtteḥ upasaṃhāra darśanāt
vācaḥ tu upasaṃhāram adṛṣṭam gamayitum arhati
āgama prabhava yukti virodhāḥ ca

original: āgamo hi dṛṣṭānusārataḥ prakṛtau vikārāṇāṃ layamāha /
analyzed: āgamaḥ hi dṛṣṭa anusārataḥ prakṛtau vikārāṇām layam āha

original: na ca vācaḥ prakṛtirmano yenāsminniyaṃ līyate /
analyzed: na ca vācaḥ prakṛtiḥ manaḥ yena asmin iyam līyate
tasmāt vṛtti vṛttimatoḥ abheda vivakṣayā vāc padam tad vṛttau vyākhyeyam
saṃbhavati ca vāc vṛtteḥ vāc aprakṛtau api manasi layaḥ
tathā tatra tatra darśanāt iti āha
vṛtti udbhava abhibhavau iti
atas eva ca sarvāṇi anu

original: yata eva prakṛtivikārabhāvābhāvanmanasi na svarūpalayo vāco 'pi tu vṛttilayaḥ,
analyzed: yatas eva na svarūpa layaḥ vācaḥ tu vṛtti layaḥ

original: ata eva ca sarveṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāmidriyāṇāṃ satyeva savṛttike manasi vṛtteranugatirlayo na svarūpalayaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva ca sarveṣām cakṣuḥ ādīnām idriyāṇām sati eva sa vṛttike manasi vṛtteḥ anugatiḥ layaḥ na svarūpa layaḥ

original: vācastu pṛthak grahaṇaṃ pūrvasūtre udāharaṇāpekṣaṃ na tu tadeveha vivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2 //
analyzed: vācaḥ tu pṛthak grahaṇam pūrva sūtre udāharaṇa apekṣam na tu tat eva iha vivakṣitam iti arthaḥ
tat manaḥ prāṇaḥ uttarāt

original: yadi svaprakṛtau vikārasya layastato manaḥ prāṇe saṃpadyate ityatra manaḥsvarūpasyaiva prāṇe saṃpattyā bhavitavyam /
analyzed: yadi sva prakṛtau vikārasya layaḥ tatas manaḥ prāṇe saṃpadyate iti atra manaḥ svarūpasya eva prāṇe saṃpattyā bhavitavyam

original: tathā hi manaḥ iti nopacārato vyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tathā hi manaḥ iti na upacārataḥ vyākhyānam bhaviṣyati
saṃbhavati hi prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ prāṇa manasoḥ

original: annamayaṃ hi somya mana ityannātmatāmāha manasaḥ śrutirāpomayaḥ prāṇa iti ca prāṇasyābātmatām /
analyzed: anna mayam hi somya manaḥ iti anna ātma tām āha manasaḥ śrutiḥ āpaḥ mayaḥ prāṇaḥ iti ca prāṇasya ap ātma tām
prakṛti vikārayoḥ tādātmyāt

original: tathā ca prāṇo manasaḥ prakṛtiriti manaso vṛttimataḥ prāṇe laya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-- satyam,
analyzed: tathā ca prāṇaḥ manasaḥ prakṛtiḥ iti manasaḥ vṛttimataḥ prāṇe layaḥ iti prāpte bhidhīyate satyam
āpaḥ nnam asṛjanta iti śruteḥ ap annayoḥ prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ vagamyate
na tu tad vikārayoḥ prāṇa manasoḥ

original: khayoniprāṇāḍikayā tu mitho vikārayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvābhyupagame saṃkarādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
analyzed: kha yoni prāṇāḍikayā tu mithas vikārayoḥ prakṛti vikāra bhāva abhyupagame saṃkarāt atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt

original: tasmādyo yasya sākṣādvikārastasya tatra laya ityannasyāpsu layo na tvabvikāre prāṇe 'nnavikārasya manasaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yaḥ yasya sākṣāt vikāraḥ tasya tatra layaḥ iti annasya apsu layaḥ na tu ap vikāre prāṇe nna vikārasya manasaḥ

original: tathā cātrāpi manovṛttervṛttimati prāṇe layo na tu vṛttimato manasa iti siddham //3 //
analyzed: tathā ca atra api manaḥ vṛtteḥ vṛttimati prāṇe layaḥ na tu vṛttimataḥ manasaḥ iti siddham
saḥ dhī akṣe tad upagama ādibhyaḥ

original: prāṇastejasīti tejaḥśabdasya bhūtaviśeṣavacanatvādvijñānātmani cāprasiddheḥ prāṇasya jīvātmanyupagamānugamāvasthānaśrutīnāṃ ca tejoddhāreṇāpyupapatteḥ
analyzed: prāṇaḥ tejasi iti tejaḥ śabdasya bhūta viśeṣa vacana tvāt vijñāna ātmani ca aprasiddheḥ prāṇasya jīvātmani upagama anugama avasthāna śrutīnām ca teja uddhāreṇa api upapatteḥ
tejasi samāpanna vṛttiḥ khalu prāṇaḥ
tejaḥ tu jīvātmani samāpanna vṛtti
tad vārā jīvātma samāpanna vṛttiḥ prāṇaḥ iti upapadyate

original: tasmāttejasyeva prāṇavṛttipravilaya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--- sa prakṛtaḥprāṇo 'dhyakṣe vijñānātmanyavatiṣṭhate tattantravṛttirbhavati /
analyzed: tasmāt tejasi eva prāṇa vṛtti pravilayaḥ iti prāpte bhidhīyate sa prakṛtaḥ prāṇaḥ dhyakṣe vijñāna ātmani avatiṣṭhate tad tantra vṛttiḥ bhavati
kutas upagama anugama avasthānebhyaḥ hetubhyaḥ
tatra upagama śrutim āha
evam eva imam ātmānam iti
anugamana śrutim āha
tam utkrāmantam iti
avasthāna śrutim āha
sa vijñānaḥ bhavati iti ca iti

original: vijñāyate 'neneti vijñānaṃ pañcavṛttiprāṇasahita indriyagrāmastena sahāvatiṣṭhata iti savijñānaḥ /
analyzed: vijñāyate nena iti vijñānam pañca vṛtti prāṇa sahitaḥ indriya grāmaḥ tena saha avatiṣṭhate iti sa vijñānaḥ
codayati
nanu prāmaḥ tejasi iti śrūyate iti
adhika āvāpaḥ śabda artha vyākhyānam
pariharati
na eṣa doṣaḥ iti
yadi api prāṇaḥ tejasi iti atas tejasi prāṇa vṛtti layaḥ pratīyate

original: tathāpi sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena vidyānāṃ śrutyantarālocanayā vijñānātmani layo 'vagamyate /
analyzed: tathā api sarva śākhā pratyaya tvena vidyānām śruti antara ālocanayā vijñāna ātmani layaḥ vagamyate

original: na ca tejasastatrāpi laya iti sāmpratam /
analyzed: na ca tejasaḥ tatra api layaḥ iti sāmpratam
tasya anila ākāśa krameṇa paramātmani ta tu alaya avagamāt
tasmāt tejaḥ grahaṇena upalakṣyate tejaḥ sahacarita deha bīja bhūta pañcabhūta sūkṣma paricāra adhyakṣaḥ jīvātmā tasmin prāṇa vṛttiḥ apyeti iti
codayati
nanu ca iyam śrutiḥ iti

original: tejaḥsahacaritāni bhūtānyupalakṣyantāṃ tejaḥśabdenādhyakṣe tu kimāyātaṃ tasya tadasāhacaryādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tejaḥ sahacaritāni bhūtāni upalakṣyantām tejaḥ śabdena adhyakṣe tu kim āyātam tasya tad asāhacaryāt iti arthaḥ
pariharati
saḥ dhyakṣaḥ iti adhyakṣasya api iti

original: yadā hyayaṃ prāṇo 'ntarāle 'dhyakṣaṃ prāpyādhyasaṃparkavaśādeva tejaḥprabhṛtīni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi prāpnoti tadopapadyate prāṇastesīti /
analyzed: yadā hi ayam prāṇaḥ ntarāle dhyakṣam prāpya ādhya saṃparka vaśāt eva tejaḥ prabhṛtīni bhūta sūkṣmāṇi prāpnoti tadā upapadyate
atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha
yaḥ pi srughnāt iti
sūtra antaram avatārayitum pṛcchati
katham tejaḥ sahacariteṣu iti
na ekasmin darśayataḥ hi
atra bhāṣya kāraḥ numāna darśanam āha
kāryasya śarīrasya iti
sthūlaśarīra anurūpam anumeyam sūkṣmam api śarīram pañca ātmakam iti arthaḥ
darśayataḥ iti sūtra avayavam vyācaṣṭe
darśayataḥ ca etam artham iti
praśna prativacana abhiprāyam dvivacanam śruti smṛti abhiprāyam vā
aṇvyaḥ mātrāḥ sūkṣmāḥ daśārdhānām pañcabhūtānām iti
śruti antara virodham codayati
nanu ca upasaṃhṛteṣu vāc ādiṣu iti
karma āśraya tā iti pratīyate na bhūta āśraya tā iti arthaḥ
pariharati
atra ucyate iti
grahāḥ indriyāṇi atigrahāḥ tad viṣayāḥ
karmaṇām prayojaka tvena āśraya tvam bhūtānām tu upādāna tvena iti avirodhaḥ

original: praśaṃsāśabdo 'pi karmaṇāṃ prayojakatayā prakṛṣṭamāśrayatvaṃ brūte sati nikṛṣṭa āśrayāntare tadupapatterityāha--
analyzed: praśaṃsā śabdaḥ api karmaṇām prayojaka tayā prakṛṣṭam āśraya tvam brūte sati nikṛṣṭe āśraya antare tad upapatteḥ iti āha
praśaṃsā śabdāt api tatra iti
samānā ca asṛti upakramāt amṛta tvam ca an upoṣya

original: atrābhṛtatvaprāptiśruteḥ paravidyāvantaṃ pratyetaditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: atra ābhṛta tva prāpti śruteḥ para vidyāvantam prati etat iti manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
viśayānānām a saṃdihānānām puṃsām
codayati
nanu vidyā prakaraṇe iti
pariharati
na svāpa ādi vat iti
paravidyayā eva amṛta tva prāpti avasthām ākhyātum tad sadharmāḥ ca tad vidharmāḥ ca anyāḥ api avasthāḥ tad anuguṇa tayā ākhyāyante

original: sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ hi sphuṭataraḥ pratipipādayiṣite vastuni pratyayo bhavatīti /
analyzed: sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām hi sphuṭataraḥ pratipipādayiṣite vastuni pratyayaḥ bhavati iti

original: na tu viduṣaḥ sakāśādviśeṣavanto 'vidvāṃso vidhīyante yena vidyāprakaraṇavyākhyāto bhavedapi tu vidyāṃ pratipādayituṃ lokasiddhānāṃ tadanuguṇatayā  #
analyzed: na tu viduṣaḥ sakāśāt viśeṣavantaḥ vidvāṃsaḥ vidhīyante yena vidyā prakaraṇa vyākhyātaḥ bhavet api tu vidyām pratipādayitum loka siddhānām tad anuguṇa tayā
teṣām anuvādaḥ iti
evam prāpte bhidhīyate
samānā ca eṣā utkrāntiḥ vāc manasi ityādyā vidvat aviduṣoḥ
kutas
āsṛti upakṛmāt
sṛtiḥ saraṇam deva yānena pathā kārya brahma loka prāptiḥ āsṛteḥ ā kārya brahma loka prāpteḥ

original: ayaṃ vidyopakrama ārambhaḥ prayatna iti yāvat /
analyzed: ayam vidyā upakramaḥ ārambhaḥ prayatnaḥ iti yāvat

original: tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati-- neyaṃ parā vidyā yato nāḍīdvāramāśrayate /
analyzed: tasmāt etat uktam bhavati na iyam parā vidyā yatas nāḍī dvāram āśrayate
api tu apara vidyā iyam

original: na cāsyāmātyantikaḥ kleśapradāho yato na tatrotkrāntirbhavet /
analyzed: na ca asyām ātyantikaḥ kleśa pradāhaḥ yatas na tatra utkrāntiḥ bhavet
tasmāt apara vidyā sāmarthyāt āpekṣika bhā bhūta saṃplava sthānam amṛta tvam prepsate puruṣa arthāya saṃbhavati eṣaḥ utkrānti bhedavān sṛti upakrama upadeśaḥ
upa pūrvāt uṣa dāhe iti asmāt upoṣya iti prayogaḥ
tad āpīteḥ saṃsāra vyapadeśāt

original: siddhāṃ kṛtvā bījabhāvāvaśeṣaṃ paramātmasaṃpattiṃ vidvadaviduṣorutkrāntiḥ samarthitā /
analyzed: siddhām kṛtvā bīja bhāva avaśeṣam paramātma saṃpattim vidvat aviduṣoḥ utkrāntiḥ samarthitā
sā eva saṃprati cintyate

original: kimātmani tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ tatvapravilaya eva saṃpattirāhosvidbījabhāvāvaśeṣeti /
analyzed: kim ātmani tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām bhūta sūkṣmāṇām tatva pravilayaḥ eva saṃpattiḥ āhosvit bīja bhāva avaśeṣā iti
yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
na utkrāntiḥ
atha uttaraḥ tatas sā iti

original: tatrāprakṛtau na vikāratatvapravilayo yathā manasi na vāgādīnām /
analyzed: tatra aprakṛtau na vikāra tatva pravilayaḥ yathā manasi na vāc ādīnām

original: sarvasya ca janimataḥ prakṛtiḥ parā devateti tattvapralaya evātyantikaḥ syāttejaḥprabhṛtīnāmiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-- 'yonimanye prapadyante  #
analyzed: sarvasya ca janimataḥ prakṛtiḥ parā devatā iti tattva pralayaḥ eva ātyantikaḥ syāt tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām iti prāpte bhidhīyate yonim anye prapadyante  /
śarīra tvāya dehinaḥ
sthāṇum anye nusaṃyanti yathākarma yathāśrutam

original: ' ityavidyāvataḥ saṃsāramupadiśati śrutiḥ seyamātyantike tattvalaye nopapadyate /
analyzed: iti avidyāvataḥ saṃsāram upadiśati śrutiḥ sā iyam ātyantike tattva laye na upapadyate

original: na ca prāyaṇasyaivaiṣa mahimā vidvāsamavidvāṃsaṃ vā pratīti sāṃpratamityāha--
analyzed: na ca prāyaṇasya eva eṣa mahimā vidvāsam a vidvāṃsam vā prati iti sāṃpratam iti āha
anyathā hi sarvaḥ prāyaṇa samayaḥ eva iti
vidhi śāstram jyotiṣṭoma ādi viṣayam anarthakam prāyaṇāt eva ātyantika pralaye punarbhava abhāvāt
mokṣa śāstram ca a prayatna labhyāt prāyaṇāt eva jantu mātrasya mekṣa prāpteḥ
na kevalam śāstra ānarthakyam ayuktaḥ ca prāyaṇa mātrāt mokṣaḥ iti āha
mithyā jñāna iti
na asati nidāna praśame praśamaḥ tadvataḥ yujyate iti arthaḥ
atha itara bhūta sahitam tejaḥ jīvasya āśraya bhūtam utkrāntam at dehāt deha antaram vā saṃcarat kasmāt asmābhiḥ na nirīkṣyate
tat hi mahat tvāt vā aneka dravya tvāt vā rūpavat upalabdavyam

original: kasmānna mūrtāntaraiḥ pratibadhyata iti śaṅkāmapākartumidaṃ sūtram--
analyzed: kasmāt na mūrta antaraiḥ pratibadhyate iti śaṅkām apākartum idam sūtram
sūkṣmam pramāṇataḥ ca tathā upalabdheḥ
cakāre bhinnakramaḥ
na kevalam āpīteḥ tat avatiṣṭhate

original: tacca sūkṣmaṃ svarūpataḥ parimāṇataśca svarūpameva hi tasya tādṛśamadṛśyam /
analyzed: tat ca sūkṣmam svarūpataḥ parimāṇataḥ ca sva rūpam eva hi tasya tādṛśam adṛśyam

original: yathā cākṣuṣasya tejaso mahato 'pi adṛṣṭavaśādanudbhūtarūpasparśaṃ hi tat /
analyzed: yathā cākṣuṣasya tejasaḥ mahataḥ adṛṣṭa vaśāt anudbhūta rūpa sparśam hi tat

original: parimāṇataḥ saukṣmyaṃ yato nopalabhyate yathā trasareṇavo jālasūryamarīcibhyo 'nyatra pramāṇatastathopalabdhiriti vyācaṣṭe--
analyzed: parimāṇataḥ saukṣmyam yatas na upalabhyate yathā trasareṇavaḥ jāla sūrya marīcibhyaḥ nyatra pramāṇataḥ tathā upalabdhiḥ iti vyācaṣṭe
tathā hi nāḍī niṣkramaṇe iti

original: ādigrahaṇena cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdho vā anyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhya iti saṃgṛhītam /
analyzed: ādi grahaṇena cakṣuṣṭas vā mūrdhaḥ vā anyebhyaḥ vā śarīra deśebhyaḥ iti saṃgṛhītam
apratighāte hetum āha
svaccha tvāt ca iti
etat api hi sūkṣma tvena eva saṃgṛhītam

original: yathā hi kācābhrapaṭalaṃ svacchasvabhāvasya na tejasaḥ pratidhātam /

evam sarvam eva vastu jātam asya iti

atas eva ca svaccha tā lakṣaṇāt saukṣmyāt asakta tva apara nāmnaḥ
asya eva ca upapatteḥ eṣaḥ ūṣmā
upapattiḥ prāptiḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- dṛṣṭaśrutābhyāmūṣmaṇo 'nvayavyatirekābhyāmasti sthūlāddehādatiriktaṃ kiñciccadāmātsūkṣmaṃ śarīramiti //11 //
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati dṛṣṭa śrutābhyām ūṣmaṇaḥ nvaya vyatirekābhyām asti sthūlāt dehāt atiriktam kiñcid ca āmāt sūkṣmam śarīram iti
pratiṣedhāt iti ced na śārīrāt
adhikaraṇa tātparyam āha
amṛta tvam cīn upoṣya iti atas viśeṣaṇāt iti
viṣayam āha
atha a kāmayamānaḥ iti
siddhānti matam āśaṅkya tad nirākaraṇena pūrvapakṣī sva matam avasthāpayati
atas paravidyā viṣayāt pratiṣedhāt iti

original: yadi hi prāṇopalakṣitasya sūkṣmaśarīrasya jīvātmanaḥ sthūlaśarīrādutkrāntiṃ pratiṣedhecchrutiḥ tata etadupapadyate /
analyzed: yadi hi prāṇa upalakṣitasya sūkṣmaśarīrasya jīvātmanaḥ sthūlaśarīrāt utkrāntim pratiṣedhet śrutiḥ tatas etat upapadyate
na tu etat asti

original: na tasmātprāṇa utkrāmantīti hi tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānāvamarśinābhyudayaniḥ śreyasādhikṛto dehi pradhānaṃ parāmṛśyate /
analyzed: na tasmāt prāṇe utkrāmanti iti hi tadā sarvanāmnā pradhāna avamarśinā abhyudaya niḥ śreyasā adhikṛtaḥ dehi pradhānam parāmṛśyate

original: tathā ca tasmāddehino na prāṇaḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīramutkrāmantyapi tu tatsahitaḥ kṣetrajña evotkrāmatīti gamyate /
analyzed: tathā ca tasmāt dehinaḥ na prāṇaḥ sūkṣmam śarīram utkrāmanti api tu tad sahitaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ eva utkrāmati iti gamyate

original: sa punaratikramya brahmanāḍya saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaparyantaṃ saliṅgo jīvaḥ parasminbrahmaṇi līyate tasmātparāmapi devatāṃ viduṣa utkrāntirata  #
analyzed: sa punar atikramya brahmanāḍya saṃsāra maṇḍalam hiraṇyagarbha paryantam sa liṅgaḥ jīvaḥ parasmin brahmaṇi līyate tasmāt parām api devatām viduṣaḥ utkrāntiḥ atas
eva mārga śrutayaḥ
smṛtiḥ ca mumukṣoḥ śukasya āditya maṇḍala prasthānam darśayati iti prāptam
evam prāpte pratyucyate
spaṣṭaḥ hi ekeṣām
na ayam dehī apādānasya pratiṣedhaḥ
api tu deha apādānasya

original: tathā hi -- ārtabhāgapraśnottare hyekasminpakṣe saṃsāriṇa eva jīvātmano 'nutkrāntiṃ
analyzed: tathā hi ārtabhāga praśna uttare hi ekasmin pakṣe saṃsāriṇaḥ eva jīvātmanaḥ na utkrāntim

original: parigṛhya na tarhyeṣa bhṛtaḥ prāṇānāmanutkrānteriti svayamāśaṅkya prāṇānāṃ pravilayaṃ
analyzed: parigṛhya na tarhi eṣa bhṛtaḥ prāṇānām an utkrānteḥ iti svayam āśaṅkya prāṇānām pravilayam
pratijñāya tad siddhi artham utkrānti avadheḥ ucchvayana ādhmāne bruvan yasya ucchvayana ādhmāne
tasya tad avadhi tvam āha

original: śarīrasya ca te itiśarīrameva tadapādānaṃ gamyate /
analyzed: śarīrasya ca te iti śarīram eva tat apādānam gamyate
nanu evam api astu aviduṣaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ viduṣaḥ tu kim āyātam iti atas āha
tad sāmānyāt iti

original: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehi parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha--
analyzed: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhāna tayā dehi parāmṛṣṭaḥ tat katham atra deha avagatiḥ iti atas āha
tat sāmānyat iti

original: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehī parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha--
analyzed: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhāna tayā dehī parāmṛṣṭaḥ tat katham atra deha avagatiḥ iti atas āha
abheda upacāreṇa

original: dehadehinordehiparāmarśinā sarvanāmnā deha eva parāmṛṣṭa iti pañcamīpāṭhe vyākhyeyam /
analyzed: deha dehinoḥ dehi parāmarśinā sarvanāmnā dehaḥ eva parāmṛṣṭaḥ iti pañcamī pāṭhe vyākhyeyam
ṣaṣṭhī pāṭhe tu na upacāraḥ iti āha
yeṣām tu ṣaṣṭhī iti

original: api ca prāptipūrvaḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāprāpte /
analyzed: api ca prāpti pūrvaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati na aprāpte

original: aviduṣo hi dehādutkrāmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti viduṣo 'pi tatsāmānyāddehādutkramaṇe prāpte pratiṣedha upapadyate na tu prāṇānāṃ jīvāvadhikaṃ kvacidutkramaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: a viduṣaḥ hi dehāt utkrāmaṇam dṛṣṭam iti viduṣaḥ pi tad sāmānyāt dehāt utkramaṇe prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ upapadyate na tu prāṇānām jīvau adhikam kvacid utkramaṇam
dṛṣṭam yena tat niṣidhyate

original: apicādvaitaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭanikhilaprapañcāvabhāsajātasya gantavyābhāvādeva nāsti gatirityāha--
analyzed: api ca advaita paribhāvanā bhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭa nikhila prapañca avabhāsa jātasya gantavya abhāvāt eva nā asti gatiḥ iti āha
na ca brahma vidaḥ iti

original: apadasya hi brahmavido mārge padaiṣiṇo 'pi devā iti yojanā /
analyzed: apadasya hi brahma vidaḥ mārge pada eṣiṇaḥ pi devāḥ iti yojanā
codayati
nanu gatiḥ api iti
pariharati
sa śarīrasya eva ayam yoga balena
apara vidyā balena iti
tāni pare tathā hi āha
pratiṣṭhā vilayana śrutyoḥ vipratipatteḥ vimarśaḥ tam apanetum ayam ārambhaḥ

original: tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditānīndriyāṇyekādaśa sūkṣmāṇi ca bhūtāni pañca /
analyzed: tāni punar prāṇa śabda uditāni indriyāṇi ekādaśa sūkṣmāṇi ca bhūtāni pañca
brahma vidaḥ tasmin eva parasmin ātmani iti
ārambha bījam vimarśam āha
nanu gatāḥ kalāḥ iti
ghrāṇa manasoḥ eka prakṛti tvam vivakṣitvā pañcadaśa tvam uktam
atra śrutyoḥ viṣaya vyavasthayā vipratipatti abhāvam āha
sā khalu iti
vyavahāraḥ laukikaḥ sāṃvyavahārika pramāṇa apekṣā iyam śrutiḥ
na tāttvika pramāṇa apekṣā

original: itarā tu evamevāsya paridṛṣṭuḥ ityādikā vidvatpratipattyapekṣā tāttvikapramāṇāpekṣā /
analyzed: itarā tu evam eva asya paridṛṣṭuḥ ityādikā vidvat pratipatti apekṣā tāttvika pramāṇa apekṣā
tasmāt viṣaya bhedāt avipratipattiḥ śrutyoḥ iti
a vibhāgaḥ vacanāt
nimitta apāye naimittikasya ātyantika apāyaḥ

original: avidyānimittaśca vibhāgo nāvidyāyāṃ vidyayā samūlaghātamapahatāyāṃ sāvaśeṣo bhavitumarhati /

na ca tena iti anantara śruta ūrdhvīkramaṇa kriyā saṃbandhi nirākāṅkṣam āditya gamana kriyayā api saṃbanddhum arhati

original: te cātīndriyā iti kasminnu nāmāyamanubhavapaddhatimadhyāstāṃ saṃyogatapasvī /

original: lokaśabdaścālokane prakāśe vartayitavyo na tu sanniveśavati deśaviśeṣe /

original: etadapi vastuto vicārasahatayā sarvamanirvacanīyaṃ vijṛmbhitamavidyāyāḥ samutpannādvaitatattvasākṣātkāro na vidvānabhimanyate /

tathā ca aprāpta prāpteḥ gati upapattiḥ tad deśa prāptau ca liṅga deha nivṛtteḥ muktiḥ śruti prāmāṇyāt iti ced na

original: na tāvadvidyākārye tayā saha tasyā dvaitādvaitagocaratayā mitho virodhena sahāsaṃbhavāt /

original: naca brahmakratava eva brahmalokabhājo nātatkratava ityapyekāntaḥ /

original: na caite na brahmakratavo mano brahmetyupāsītetyādau sarvatra brahmānugamena tatkratutvasyāpi saṃbhavāt /

original: kimiva hi vacanaṃ na kuryāt nāsti vacanasyātibhāra iha tu tadabhāvāt /

original: āśrayāntarapratyayasyāśrayāntare prakṣepaḥ pratīka iti hi vṛddhāḥ /

tam eva prakṛtya sarvāsām tad śrutīnām pravṛtteḥ

original: apica samapradhānānāṃ hi na niyamavadaikamatyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti yadaikaḥ sisṛkṣati tadaivetaraḥ saṃjihīrṣatītyaparyāyeṇa sṛṣṭisaṃhārau syātām /
analyzed: apica sama pradhānānām hi na niyamavat aikamatyam dṛṣṭam iti yadā ekaḥ sisṛkṣati tadā eva itaraḥ saṃjihīrṣati iti aparyāyeṇa sṛṣṭi saṃhārau syātām
na ca ubhayoḥ api īśvara tvam vyāghātam
ekasya tu tad ādhipatye tad abhiprāya anurodhinām sarveṣām aikamatya upapatteḥ adoṣaḥ
tatra āgantukānām kāraṇa adhīna janma aiśvaryāṇām gṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa tayā asama tvāt nitya aiśvarya śālinaḥ

original: sa eva teṣāmadhīśa iti tattantrā vidvāṃsa iti parameśvaravyāpārasya sargasaṃhārasya neśate //17 //
analyzed: saḥ eva teṣām adhīśaḥ iti tad tantrāḥ vidvāṃsaḥ iti parameśvara vyāpārasya sarga saṃhārasya na īśate  /
pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ nuśaya bījam āśaṅkya nirākaroti
pratyakṣa upadeśāt iti ced na ādhikārika maṇḍala stha ukteḥ

original: yataḥ parameśvarādhīnamaiśvaryaṃ tasmāttato nyūnamaṇimādimātraṃ svārājyaṃ na tu jadatsraṣṭṛtvam /
analyzed: yatas parameśvara adhīnam aiśvaryam tasmāt tatas nyūnam aṇima ādi mātram svārājyam na tu jadat sraṣṭṛ tvam
uktāt nyāyāt
vikāra varti ca tathā hi sthitim āha
etāvān asya mahimā iti vikāra varti rūpam uktam
tatas jyāyān ca iti nirvikāram rūpam

original: tathā pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtānīti vikāravarti rūpaṃ tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divīti nirvikāramāha rūpam //19 //
analyzed: tathā pādaḥ u sya viśvā bhūtāni iti vikāra varti rūpam tri pādasya amṛtam divi iti nirvikāram āha rūpam

original: darśayataścāpare śrutismṛtī nirvikārameva rūpaṃ bhagavataste ca paṭhite /
analyzed: darśayataḥ ca apare śruti smṛtī nirvikāram eva rūpam bhagavataḥ te ca paṭhite

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi brūṣe saguṇe brahmaṇyupāsyamāne yathā tadguṇasya niravagrahatvamapi vastuto 'stīti niravagrahatve viduṣā prāptavyamiti  #
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yadi brūṣe saguṇe brahmaṇi upāsyamāne yathā tad guṇasya niravagraha tvam api vastutas sti iti niravagraha tve viduṣā prāptavyam iti
tat anena vyabhicārayate

original: yathā savikāre brahmaṇyupāsyamāne vastutaḥ sthitamapi nirvikārarūpaṃ na prāpyate tatkasya hetoḥ,
analyzed: yathā sa vikāre brahmaṇi upāsyamāne vastutas sthitam api nirvikāra rūpam na prāpyate tat kasya hetoḥ
a tad kratu tvāt upāsakasya

original: tathā tadguṇopāsanayā vastutaḥ sthitamapi niravagrahatvaṃ nāpyate /
analyzed: tathā tad guṇa upāsanayā vastutas sthitam api niravagraha tvam nā āpyate
tattva upāsanāsu puruṣa kratu tvāt

original: upāsakasya tadakratutvaṃ ca niravagrahatvasyopāsanavidhyagocaratvādvidhyadhīnatvāccopāsanāsu puruṣasvātantryābhāvātsvātantrye vā prātibhatvaprasaṅgāditi
analyzed: upāsakasya tat akratu tvam ca niravagraha tvasya upāsana vidhi agocara tvāt vidhi adhīna tvāt ca upāsanāsu puruṣa svātantrya abhāvāt svātantrye vā prātibha tva prasaṅgāt iti
bhoga mātra sāmya liṅgāt ca
na kevalam svārājyasya īśvara adhīna tayā a jagat sarjanam
sākṣāt bhoga mātreṇa tena parameśvareṇa sāmya abhidhānāt api vyapadeśa liṅgāt iti
bhūtāni avanti prīṇayanti iti bhojayanti iti yāvat
sūtra antara avatāraṇāya śaṅkate
nanu evam sati sātiśaya tvāt iti

original: saha parameśvarasyātiśayena vartata iti viduṣa aiśvaryaṃ sātiśayam /
analyzed: saha parameśvarasya atiśayena vartate iti viduṣaḥ aiśvaryam sa atiśayam

original: yacca kāryaṃ sātiśayaṃ tacca yathā laukikamaiśvaryam /
analyzed: yat ca kāryam sa atiśayam tat ca yathā laukikam aiśvaryam
tat anena kārya tvam uktam

original: tathāca kāryatvādantavatprāptamiti tacca na yuktamānantyena tadviduṣāṃ tatra pravṛtteriti //21 //
analyzed: tathā ca kārya tvāt antavat prāptam iti tat ca na yuktam ānantyena tad viduṣām tatra pravṛtteḥ iti
atas uttaram paṭhati
anāvṛttiḥ śabdāt anāvṛttiḥ śabdāt
kim arciḥ ādi mārgeṇa brahma loka prāptānām aiśvaryasya antavat tvam tvayā sādhyate
āhosvit candra lokāt iva brahma lokāt etad loka prāptiḥ mukteḥ antavat tvam
tatra pūrvasmin kalpe siddhasādhanam
uttaratra tu śruti smṛti virodhaḥ
tadvidhānām ca krama mukti pratipādanāt iti
tattvamasi vākya artha eka upāsana aparān pratyāha
samyak darśana vidhvasta tamasām iti
dvidhā avidyā tamaḥ

original: na caitannirvāṇaṃ svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ yenānityaṃ syādityāha-
analyzed: na ca etat nirvāṇam svarūpa avasthāna lakṣaṇam kāryam yena anityam syāt iti āha
nitya siddha iti
bhaṅktvā vādya sura indra vṛndam akhila avidyā upadhāna atigam yena āmnāya payonidheḥ naya pathā brahma amṛtam prāpyate

original: so 'yaṃ śāṅkarabhāṣyajātaviṣayo vācaspateḥ sādaraṃ saṃdarbhaḥ paribhāvyatāṃ sumatayaḥ svārtheṣu ko matsaraḥ //1 //
analyzed: saḥ yam śāṅkara bhāṣya jāta viṣayaḥ vācaspateḥ sādaram saṃdarbhaḥ paribhāvyatām sumatayaḥ sva artheṣu kaḥ matsaraḥ  /
ajñāna sāgaram tīrtvā brahma tattvam abhīpsatām
nīti nau karṇadhāreṇa mayā apūri manorathaḥ
yat nyāya sāṃkhya yogānām vedāntānām nibandhanaiḥ
samacaiṣam mahat puṇyam tat phalam puṣkalam mayā
samarpitam atha etena prīyatām parameśvaraḥ
nṛpa antarāṇām manasā api agamyām bhrū kṣepa mātreṇa cakāra kīrtim
kārtasvara āsāra su pūrita artha sārthaḥ svayam śāstra vicakṣaṇaḥ ca
nareśvarāḥ yad carita anukāram icchanti kartum na ca pārayanti
tasmin mahīpe mahanīya kīrtau śrīmat nṛge kāri mayā nibandhaḥ

original: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śaṅkarabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ /
analyzed: iti śrī vācaspatimiśra viracite śaṅkara bhagavat pāda bhāṣya vibhāge bhāmatyām caturthasya adhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ
